Title: Duales Bachelor-Studium Angewandte Informatik (B.Sc.) (m/w/d)
Description:
Mobilität gestalten für unsere Sicherheit!Die BwFPS setzt sich mit rund 900 Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeitern täglich ein, um die Bundeswehr und den Fahrdienst Bund mobil zu machen – für unser aller Sicherheit. Mit über 41.000 verschiedenen Fahrzeugen sind wir eines der größten öffentlichen Fuhrparkunternehmen in Deutschland. Lust etwas Großes zu bewegen? Dann schalten Sie einen Gang höher und kommen Sie in unser Team!Du möchtest Theorie und Praxis vereinen und hast Lust, als vollwertiges Mitglied (m/w/d) des Teams bei uns zu starten? Dann bewirb Dich jetzt in Kooperation mit der FHDW Bergisch Gladbach für ein duales Studium der Betriebswirtschaft mit dem Schwerpunkt Angewandte Informatik (B.Sc.). Das erwartet Dich bei uns: Im dualen Bachelor-Studium Angewandte Informatik in Kooperation mit der FHDW in Bergisch Gladbach wechseln sich Praxis und Studium vielseitig ab (ca. alle 3 Monate)Unser duales Studienprogramm ist ideal für Dich, wenn Du schon früh Verantwortung übernehmen und eine Vielzahl von relevanten und spannenden IT- Themen durch die Zusammenarbeit mit unseren IT- Experten aus unterschiedlichen Bereichen direkt in die Praxis umsetzen willst.Du erhältst im Rahmen der Praxisphasen Einblicke in die Kernbereiche unseres Unternehmens und unterstützt uns dabei primär in der Anwendungsentwicklung.Regelmäßige Feedbacks der Ausbildungsfortschritte und individuelle Schulungsmaßnahmen bereiten dich optimal auf Deine Prüfung und das spätere Berufsleben vor.Wir übernehmen alle anfallenden Studien- und Prüfungskosten, bieten dir eine attraktive zusätzliche Entlohnung sowie eine hohe Chance auf Übernahme, sodass du dein Potenzial langfristig bei uns einbringen kannst. Das bringst Du mit: (Fach-) HochschulreifeGute Kenntnisse in Informatik und Mathematik, ein analytisches Denken sowie eine schnelle AuffassungsgabeDu hast technisches Verständnis und interessierst dich für Computertechnologien, Programmiersprachen, Betriebssysteme und TrendsDu verfügst über logisches Denkvermögen und hinterfragst gerne ProzesseHohe Eigeninitiative, Engagement und Verantwortungsbewusstsein und zugleich Spaß an fachübergreifender TeamarbeitSehr gutes Ausdrucksvermögen in Wort und Schrift
Unsere Benefits

und vieles mehrFühlst Du Dich angesprochen?Sende uns Deine aussagekräftige Bewerbung über unser online Bewerbungssystem. Für Fragen steht Dir Barbara Heimbach unter der Telefonnummer 02241/1650-563 zur Verfügung.Werde Teil unseres Teams!

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Martailer is a leading retail media platform designed for and used by large retailers, providing advanced ad serving, audience targeting, and campaign optimization. We are looking for a Data Scientist to develop models and algorithms that enhance ad performance, audience segmentation, and inventory forecasting.
Key Responsibilities: • Build predictive models to improve audience targeting and ad relevance. • Develop bidding and pricing algorithms to optimize campaign performance. • Design models for ad inventory forecasting to enhance planning and yield management. • Analyze customer behavior, ad performance, and revenue trends to drive data-driven decisions. • Work closely with engineering teams to deploy machine learning models at scale. • Identify and integrate new data sources to refine campaign measurement and optimization.
Qualifications: • 3+ years of experience in data science, machine learning, or a related field. • Proficiency in Python, SQL, SageMaker. • Experience with A/B testing, causal inference, and marketing analytics. • Familiarity with ad tech, programmatic advertising, or retail media is a plus. • Strong analytical skills and the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights.
Why Join Martailer? • Work on cutting-edge retail media technology that supports top European retailers. • Play a key role in a fast-growing enterprise SaaS company. • Collaborate with a team of experienced engineers. • Remote-friendly environment with a culture of innovation and ownership.
Interested? Apply now or reach out for more details!

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
Jobbeskrivning

Data Engineer – Bli en nyckelspelare i framtidens datalösningar på Sopra Steria!

Vill du arbeta på utmanande och spännande konsultuppdrag inom data engineering, där du får skapa skalbara lösningar för våra kunder med den senaste tekniken? Vi söker flera drivna Data Engineers som trivs med att ta ansvar, arbeta nära verksamheten och leverera datadrivna insikter i toppklass! Har du några års erfarenhet och vill fortsätta utvecklas, eller har du en senior profil och letar efter nästa stora utmaning? Vi letar efter dig!

Vad vi erbjuder

Hjälpa våra kunder att bli mer datadrivna genom uppdrag hos ledande företag och organisationer där du arbetar med moderna plattformar så som Microsoft Fabric eller Azure för att stötta våra kunders datadrivna förmågorUtveckla och förvalta nya och existerande lösningarMöjlighet att påverka hela analyskedjan – från datainsamling och modellering till visualisering och beslutsstöd. Möjlighet att leda arbetet hos kunderna med dataplattformar och lösningar i tvärfunktionella team, och agera mentor och coach internt på Sopra Steria.En roll där du har möjlighet att växa som konsult i flera dimensioner, både ute i uppdrag och genom att hjälpa till att driva Sopra Sterias resa mot att bli ledande inom området.

Om rollen

Som Data Engineer kommer du att exemplevis:

Skapa och optimera dagens och framtidens dataplattformar: Microsoft Fabric och Azure Bidra till att framtidssäkra kunders dataplattform genom migreringsprojekt till molnet.Använda dig av olika tekniker och resurser för att uppnå önskade resultat: SQL Server, Azure Databricks, Azure Data Factory, Data Lake, Lakehouse etc.Bidra till framtagandet av skalbara och effektiva arkitekturer som medallion- och lakehouse-modeller.Samarbeta i hela utvecklingscykeln – från idé och kravställning till utveckling, testning och leverans, för att säkerställa framtidens Business Intelligence.

Din profil

Vi säker både dig med väldigt gedigen erfarenhet som samlat både bredden och djupet, och du som har erfarenhet av och behärskar stora delar av:

Erfarenhet av Microsoft FabricData warehouse byggda på SQL Server, inklusive lagrade procedurer, vyer och tabulära modeller, SSIS, SSAS etc.Erfarenhet av Azure-tjänster som ADF, Key Vaults och Data Lake, Databricks etc.Goda kunskaper i Azure Databricks och dataanalys.Trivs i konsultrollen.Pratar svenska obehindrat,

Meriterande: Power BI, Python, erfarenhet av medallionarkitektur, AI, Data Science

Varför välja oss?

Vi erbjuder en dynamisk och flexibel arbetsmiljö där du kan arbeta remote vid behov, samtidigt som du är en del av spännande projekt med hög påverkan. Du får möjlighet att utvecklas inom teknik och innovation tillsammans med kompetenta kollegor och kunder i framkant.

Ansök idag och bli en del av vår vision att skapa Sveriges bästa konsult-team! 🚀

Ytterligare information

Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

Sopra Steria, a major Tech player in Europe with 52,000* employees in nearly 30 countries, is recognised for its consulting, digital services and solutions. It helps its clients drive their digital transformation and obtain tangible and sustainable benefits. The Group provides end-to-end solutions to make large companies and organisations more competitive by combining in-depth knowledge of a wide range of business sectors and innovative technologies with a collaborative approach. Sopra Steria places people at the heart of everything it does and is committed to putting digital to work for its clients in order to build a positive future for all. In 2023, the Group generated revenues of €5.8 billion.

*Headcount reassessed following the sale of most Sopra Banking Software activities in September 2024.

Company Description:
Antea is a global company specializing in risk-based asset integrity software solutions with Digital Twin. Since 1989, Antea has been trusted by operators in asset-intensive industries around the world, including Oil and Gas, Chemical, Power Generation, Pharmaceutical, Upstream, Midstream, and Downstream. 

Antea facilitates complete digital transformation for operators in a scalable and cost-effective manner, ushering them into Industry 4.0 digitalization.  Our innovative solutions deliver one-click access to asset data for improved maintenance, reliability, regulatory compliance, and risk mitigation. The company’s proprietary digital twin technology creates virtual replicas of equipment for immersive visualization and next generation analytics. 

Antea’s market-leading mobile solutions enable remote collaboration and workflows. In addition to technology and software, the company’s team of trusted engineers deliver unrivaled data management services, deploying complete support from implementation through to sustainable operations -- providing cost-effective solutions from single to multi-site.

As a private company, Antea has a domestic and international network of sales, consulting, and support. Antea is represented in Italy, USA (Texas), Canada (Montreal), Malaysia (Kuala Lumpur), UAE (Abu Dhabi), Saudi Arabia, and Algeria. Antea also has local partnerships in Germany, Egypt, Iran and Nigeria.

Antea works with top market-leading companies such as Eni, Exxon, Versalis, LyondellBasell, Sasol and many more.

Antea guarantees the most advanced technologies and a complete range of services for the monitoring maintenance and inspection operations. Helping customers improve inspections and maintenance while reducing time and resources is top priority. 

Antea’s dedication to customer service is evident in our 100% customer retention rate: in over 34 years of business, we have never lost a customer.

Title: IT Auditor

Title: Senior Informationssicherheitsmanager / Information Security Manager (m/w/d) in Renewable Energies
Description:
Auf was wir bei ENCAVIS setzen? Die Sonne. Den Wind. Und auf dich.

Willkommen in der Welt von Encavis! Bei uns dreht sich alles um die Kraft der Sonne, des Windes und der mehr als 200 Menschen, die gemeinsam das Energiesystem der Zukunft mitgestalten. Was wir genau tun? Wir machen erneuerbare Energien wirtschaftlich. Unser Kerngeschäft ist der Erwerb und Betrieb von Solar- und Windparks in ganz Europa. Schon heute sind wir hier einer der führenden konzernunabhängigen Stromproduzenten im Bereich der erneuerbaren Energien. Und wir wachsen weiter. Was das für dich bedeutet? Die Möglichkeit, viel zu bewegen, zu gestalten und zu verändern. Als Teil eines multinationalen Teams, das Spaß daran hat, der Energiewende zum Erfolg zu verhelfen.Vieles spricht für deinen Wechsel zu Encavis – doch deine Erfahrung und dein Engagement sprechen für dich. Was dich bei uns erwartet? Abwechslungsreiche Aufgaben in einem dynamischen Team, in dem du schnell eine tragende Rolle einnehmen und in Zusammenarbeit mit den anderen Fachbereichen deinen Beitrag zur angestrebten Expansion von Encavis leisten kannst.

Deine sonnigen Aussichten:

Du bist verantwortlich für den Aufbau, den Betrieb und die kontinuierliche Weiterentwicklung des Informationssicherheitsmanagementsystems und Ansprechpartner für alle Fragen der Informationssicherheit innerhalb der Encavis Gruppe und gegenüber Dritten Du sorgst für die Umsetzung und Überwachung relevanter regulatorischer Vorgaben u.a. in unseren Solar- und Windparks, erstellst Richtlinien und Arbeitsanweisungen und unterstützt den Vorstand beim Festlegen der Informationssicherheitsleitlinie In Zusammenarbeit mit unserem externen ISB steuerst du für die Informationssicherheit relevante Projekte Du berätst und unterstützt die Fachbereiche in allen Belangen der Informationssicherheit Du konzipierst und führst Audits durch, bewertest Risiken und empfiehlst risikomindernde Maßnahmen Du unterstützt bei der Analyse und koordinierst Informationssicherheitsvorfälle Du wirkst mit bei Geschäftsprozessen mit Auswirkung auf die Informationsverarbeitung und bei der Einführung neuer IT-Systeme und IT-Anwendungen. Du planst Sensibilisierungs- und Schulungsmaßnahmen und führst diese durch 

Davon bekommen wir bald Wind:

Du bringst neben einem abgeschlossenen Studium im Bereich der IT-Sicherheit, Informationstechnik oder einer vergleichbaren Ausbildung eine große Begeisterung für das Thema Informationssicherheit, sowohl auf organisatorischer als auch auf technischer Ebene, mit Du besitzt mehrjährige Berufserfahrung in der Informationssicherheit und im IT-Sicherheitsumfeld sowie im Projektmanagement Du verfügst über fundierte Kenntnisse im Bereich der Informationssicherheits-Standards (z.B. ISO 27001, BSI Grundschutz) Du bringst Kenntnisse gängiger Sicherheitstechnologien und -aspekte mit, wie z.B. DDoS-Abwehr, SIEM, IDS/ IPS, Firewalls und Penetration Testing sowie Kryptographie Du verfügst über sehr gute Analysefähigkeiten und eine strukturierte Arbeitsweise Sehr gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift runden dein Profil ab

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Data ScientistLocation: Delft 
Our Global Data Science Team is primarily responsible for applying smart usage of data, Machine Learning (ML) algorithms, and upcoming Artificial Intelligence (AI) techniques to solve present challenges in the cybersecurity domain.
The teams’ work focuses on three pillars within our Managed SOC services:- enhancing detection capabilities of adversarial behavior in our customer’s networks- increasing automation of incident handling and workflows to assist our Security Analysts- continuously quantifying, reporting, and improving on the quality of our service.Our Managed SOC services deploy different technologies (e.g. Network detection, endpoint detection and SIEMs) which generate a vast amount of data on our customer’s network and cloud environments. The Data Scientist we are looking for is thrilled to apply their knowledge on this data to turn it into high-quality, actionable information for our SOC and customers.
Members of the Data Science Team work closely together with experts in different fields ranging from digital forensics experts, network analysts and threat intelligence analysts. While affinity with one or more of these fields is a big plus, there is ample opportunity to learn the necessary cybersecurity knowledge on the job!
Since the teams’ work is diverse, we are looking for candidates with a wide range of backgrounds. The exact responsibilities of any candidate can be tailored given their experience and skillset. However, the position will require candidates to be able to translate their ideas into (preferably) code so that they can be tested early in development. Therefore, familiarity with basic software development principles is essential.
Key accountabilities:
· Leverage Machine Learning and/or Artificial Intelligence techniques to create high-quality detection models for detection of anomalous behavior on analytical data provided by our advanced sensors.· Devise and (help) create smart improvements on our operations.· Devise, measure, and interpret performance metrics of e.g. algorithm performance or quality of our overall service so that we make our quality measurable to our customers and our own team.· Keep current with new developments in ML and AI (including Large Language Models) and their applicability on use cases within our Managed Services technology stack.
Desired Requirements:
· A bachelor’s degree in Machine Learning, Cybersecurity, Computer Science or a related field· A strong analytical and problem-solving mindset· Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills· Experience with or willingness to learn Python and different Machine Learning toolkits.· Experience with or willingness to learn version control (Git, Azure Dev Ops, etc.)· Experience with at least one of the following: an NDR product, an EDR product or a SIEM is an advantage.· Experience with applying ML/AI knowledge specifically within the cybersecurity domain is an advantage.
Our Offer
You will work in a place at the top of cybersecurity where your ideas are valued. You may not always be able to share all the details about your work, but you can tell that you are contributing to a safer society. Additionally, we offer you:
A good salary that matches the things you have already done and will do;Flexible working hours and flexibility in working from home or at the office, allowing you to optimally combine your private life with your work;A favorable pension scheme, 26 vacation days (+4 mandatory days off), and 8% holiday pay with a full-time contract;Plenty of development opportunities: you can gain and share knowledge through training, TechTalks, events, and our own Fox Academy;A laptop and business phone. If you use your own phone, you will receive a reimbursement of up to €25 per month;A remote work allowance (for hybrid working);A performance bonus and profit sharing because we value your effort;When we work in the office, we gather every day for a delicious lunch.
Become a Foxer!
Do you recognize yourself in the above description and see the match? Let us know how you envision this! You can apply via the button below. You will then be directed to our ATS Workday, allowing us to process your application quickly.
A comprehensive screening is part of the onboarding process at Fox-IT.
Help from recruitment agencies, however well-intentioned, is (really) not needed.
About Your Application
We review every application and will contact you if your knowledge and work experience match what we are looking for. If you do not hear from us within 10 days, please do not be disappointed; we will keep your CV in our database for potential future vacancies and encourage you to keep an eye on our vacancies on our website. Feel free to apply for another position that appeals to you!
If you do not want us to keep your details, please send an email to global.ta@nccgroup.com. All personal data is stored in accordance with the NCC Group's privacy policy. We are committed to diversity and flexibility in the workplace. If you need any adjustments during the application process, please let us know.
If you need further modifications or additional assistance, feel free to ask!
Company Description: Fox-IT prevents, solves and mitigates the most serious cyber threats with innovative solutions for government, defense, law enforcement, critical infrastructure, banking, and commercial enterprise clients worldwide. Our approach combines human intelligence and technology into innovative solutions that ensure a more secure society. We develop custom and packaged solutions that maintain the security of sensitive government systems, protect industrial control networks, defend online banking systems, and secure highly confidential data and networks.

Title: Junior IT Officer
Description:
The RoleForming part of the QA and Release Unit, this role involves taking ownership of the creation and maintenance support of internal testing systems, monitoring and troubleshooting of release pipelines together with the generation and delivery of releases to service all RS2 client/s assigned.
ResponsibilitiesOwnership of tasks assigned by the Release Automation Team Lead and/or Senior Release Automation Analyst for RS2 client/s assignedEnsure that all internal test environments are updated as required by internal teams.Building of releases, documentation and delivery to RS2 client/s assigned.Responsible for the quality of all deliverables to be released for the assigned client/s and ensure high quality/standard of work through following established release processes/proceduresMaintain a knowledge base on release standards, processes and related information as well as knowledge of release tools and other release informationContinuously learn on various automation technologies and best practices in release processes.Maintain and troubleshoot internal systems as part of the continuous deployment process.Contribute to the research and planning of scalable systems.Collaborate with and show interest in Systems Deployment and Building ReleasesPerform any other duties which may be assigned from time to time
RequirementsFamiliar with the use of tools that enable the selective access to information held within a database (e.g. SQL).Familiar with the use of automation tools for testing (e.g. Jenkins).Strong organisational and time management skills, able to prioritise across different tasks and meet deadlines as per business objectives.Fluency in written and spoken English is very important, as the role will be dealing with international clients.Experience in using Unix/Linux, Oracle databases, Jenkins, Rundeck and Jira/Confluence are considered an asset.
We welcome applications from candidates who hold IT certifications, even if they have no prior hands-on experience. If you're eager to learn and grow in fintech automation, we'd love to hear from you!
The selected candidate will be offered training by our internal training academy. Our team of experts will support and work with you to explore your learning potential and career goals.
Please send a detailed CV via email to recruitment@rs2.com stating the job title in the subject header. All applications will be treated in the strictest confidence.
Company Description:
RS2 is a global payments processor and technology provider, empowering some of the world’s leading banks, financial institutions, ISOs, ISVs, PayFacs, fintechs, and merchants to deliver digital payment excellence, simplicity, and control, across the entire payments value chain. 

It is the transaction processing power behind some of the world’s most innovative and fastest growing Payments companies and is currently deployed in 27 Countries all around the world.

Established in 1988, RS2 has continually focused on the development and implementation of highly scalable, reliable and flexible card payment processing solutions for an industry leading, end-to-end solution for Card Issuing, Card Acquiring and ATM Services; supporting all aspects of authorisation and message switching, transaction routing, merchant acquiring, card issuing, domestic and international clearing with full multi-currency facilities covering 121 currencies for cross-border clearing & settlement of payments.

Developed using a parameter based modular structure, the BankWORKS® system provides total flexibility through integrated modules that can meet the increasingly complex demands of the fast moving payments market. Our latest developments include modules for managing Alternative Payments, e-Wallets & Fraud Screening. 

With offices in Germany, Malta, Jordan, USA and the Philippines, the BankWORKS® system is used by well over a hundred banks, payment processors and other financial institutions and is capable of processing more than 7 million transactions an hour.
Specialties: Credit cards,payments,switch,issuing,acquiring,authorisation,card management,internet banking,ATM management,Managed Services,eWallet,Merchant portal,Dispute Management,Very high volume processing

Als dynamisches Unternehmen möchte das Unternehmen seinen Kunden das beste Einkaufserlebnis bieten, indem es Daten in den Mittelpunkt seiner Aktivitäten stellt. Wenn Sie auf der Suche nach einem sich schnell verändernden Umfeld sind, in dem Sie mit Hilfe von Data Science, AI, (LLM's) Large Language Model's, statistical Analysis und Machine Learning sofort großen Einfluss nehmen können, dann ist dieser Job genau das Richtige für Sie! Das Team setzt auf klare Eigenverantwortung und Verantwortung. Die Rolle des Data Scientist (m/f/d) innerhalb des Data & Analytics Teams umfasst die folgenden Hauptaufgaben:
Ihre Aufgaben:Analyse großer und komplexer Datensätze, um Trends, Muster und Erkenntnisse zu ermittelnEntwicklung und Implementierung von Predictive Models und Machine Learning AlgorithmenDurchführung von statistischen Analysen zur Unterstützung von GeschäftsentscheidungenErstellen überzeugender Datenvisualisierungen, um die Ergebnisse an die Beteiligten zu kommunizieren. Entwicklung von Dashboards und Berichten zur Überwachung wichtiger Leistungsindikatoren (KPIs)Präsentation von Data Insights in klarer und prägnanter Weise für non-technical StakeholderZusammenarbeit mit Business Stakeholder's, um deren Datenbedürfnisse zu verstehen, umsetzbare Erkenntnisse zu liefern und datengestützte Entscheidungsfindung im gesamten Unternehmen zu unterstützenUnterstützung von Datenanalysten und Dateningenieuren bei der Beschleunigung ihrer Projekte durch den Einsatz fortschrittlicher DatenlösungenVerwalten von Data-Science-Projekten vom Beginn bis zum Abschluss. Definieren von Projektumfang, -zielen und -ergebnissen und Sicherstellen der rechtzeitigen Bereitstellung von qualitativen Datenlösungen innerhalb des UnternehmensAls Datenberater für verschiedene Abteilungen fungieren und fachkundigen Rat zu datenbezogenen Fragen erteilen. Unterstützung bei der Interpretation von Daten und bei der Formulierung von umsetzbaren EmpfehlungenErleichterung der datengestützten Entscheidungsfindung durch Bereitstellung klarer und präziser ErkenntnisseSchulung und Beratung von Teammitgliedern und Stakeholder's in Data Literacy und Best Practices. Entwicklung und Durchführung von Workshops, Schulungen und Ressourcen zur Verbesserung der Datenkompetenz in der gesamten Organisation. Förderung einer Kultur der datengestützten Entscheidungsfindung durch Verbesserung der Datenkompetenz aller Mitarbeiter. Anleitung zur effektiven Interpretation und Nutzung von Daten in ihren RollenBleiben Sie auf dem Laufenden über die neuesten Entwicklungen in den Bereichen Data Science, Machine Learning und AI. Experimentieren Sie mit neuen Tools, Techniken und Methoden, um Datenanalyseprozesse zu verbessern. Leisten Sie Ihren Beitrag zur Entwicklung von Best Practices und Standards für Data Science innerhalb der OrganisationEntwerfen und Implementieren von Cloud-basierten Datenlösungen mit Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Sie träumen davon, fortschrittliche Analysen zu nutzen, um das Kundenerlebnis zu verbessern, und Sie sind ein geborener Data Scientist, der unserem Kunden hilft, die Art und Weise, wie er seine Kunden versteht und bedient, neu zu definieren.

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
Data EngineerAls Data Engineer ben je onmisbaar voor Data Analisten en Data Scientists. Van nature heb je een voortrekkers rol in allerlei veranderingen. Bij onze klanten ontwerp, bouw, integreer en visualiseer je jouw data uit verschillende bronnen.
Jouw profielEen afgeronde HBO-opleiding, een studie richting Computer Science of Cyber Security is een pré;Je hebt 2 tot 5 jaar aantoonbare relevante werkervaring;Ervaring met SQL and NoSQL Databases;Bedreven en bekend met ETL-tooling;Je bent communicatief vaardig en vindt het leuk om vanuit techniek kansen te zien en te creëren;Verder ben jij degene die proactief op zoek gaat naar de vraagstukken die binnen de organisatie liggen;Je kunt goed samenwerken en verbinden;Je kunt in zowel het Nederlands als het Engels uitstekend uit de voeten.
AanbodJe krijgt een persoonlijke coach en een uitstekend salaris;Volledige reiskostenvergoeding (indien nodig een auto van de zaak);Regelmatig bijeenkomsten om kennis te delen met collega’s (maar ook om plezier te maken);De koers bepalen we samen en jij bepaalt met je collega’s hoe we duurzame, innovatieve en complexe projecten gaan uitvoeren;Zeer goede secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden, zoals een vaste bonusstructuur;Je ontvangt een persoonlijk duurzaam inzetbaarheidsbudget (voor onder andere opleiding en coaching).
Over onsDataGreen is een club van jonge, enthousiaste professionals. Ons hart ligt bij de zorg en alles wat daarbij komt kijken. De motivatie om iets groots bij te dragen aan deze sector, is onze verbindende factor. Je krijgt hier de ruimte om te ontdekken, te groeien en de beste versie van jezelf te worden in datgene waar je goed in bent. We werken hard, helpen elkaar en doen leuke dingen samen.
Je komt terecht in een creatieve omgeving waar het bruist van de positieve energie en ondernemersgeest. Niet voor niets hebben we ons hoofdkantoor in B. Amsterdam, de ultieme hotspot voor startups en andere ambitieuze bedrijven. Het pand heeft cowork spaces en kantoorruimtes, inclusief sportschool en zelfs een padelbaan. Even de baan op in de pauze voor een boost in je productiviteit of ter ontspanning na werk. Gezelligheid en sportiviteit werken hier perfect samen.
Company Description:
DataGreen zet zich in om Data Science vraagstukken duurzaam op te lossen! Onze data analisten, engineers, scientists en consultants kunnen bijna elke uitdaging aan. Hoogwaardige en specialistische kennis is de kern van onze dienstverlening. We kijken verder dan de vraag. Onze missie is: duurzaam data vraagstukken oplossen met maatschappelijke impact. Om dat te bereiken werken wij voor sectoren met impact op de samenleving.

Data Science is een goed vertrekpunt, maar niet de oplossing om de samenwerking duurzaam te verbeteren. Onze ervaring en kennis in predictive analytics, machine learning en artificial intelligence helpt uw organisatie beter samen te werken met alle betrokkenen.
Specialties: Data Science,Data Engineering,Machine Learning,Datamining,Artificial Intelligence,SCRUM,Zorg,Deep learning,Textmining,Big Data,Overheid

Title: Junior Software Engineer
Description:
Yarix S.r.l.,da oltre 20 anni in prima linea nella cyber difesa delle aziende, specializzata in prevenzione e monitoraggio, threat intelligence, offensive security, risposta alle emergenze informatiche, awareness, ricerca una figura di Junior Software Engineer.La risorsa inserita nel team si occuperà di supportare le attività di base legate alla gestione della piattaforma di orchestrazione per il Security Operation Center (SOC). La persona sarà coinvolta in attività operative e di sviluppo, con un percorso di formazione e affiancamento iniziale per acquisire le competenze necessarie.
Attività previste:
Creazione, aggiornamento e manutenzione della documentazione tecnicaConfigurazione e gestione degli strumenti della piattaforma (es. modifiche di configurazione, onboarding nuovi clienti)Supporto al SOC e al team di reportistica per l’export e l’analisi dei dati da vari strumentiImplementazione di minor changes alla codebase in base alle richieste di Service Manager, clienti e analisti SOCSviluppo di piccoli moduli o sezioni da integrare nella codebase delle piattaforme
Requisiti richiesti:
Conoscenza base della programmazione, in particolare PythonFamiliarità con ambienti Linux e con il networking di baseComprensione della lingua inglese scritta e parlataCapacità analitica e spirito critico
Completano il profilo:
Conoscenza di strumenti di versionamento del codice (es. Git)Esperienza con database SQL e NoSQLConoscenza base di networking e protocolli di sicurezzaEsperienza con strumenti di automazione (es. Ansible)Curiosità e predisposizione all’apprendimento di nuove tecnologie
Sede di lavoro: Treviso
Cosa offriamo:· Ambiente di lavoro dinamico e in forte crescita· Formazione tecnica· Flessibilità lavorativa· Welfare aziendale
Inquadramento e pacchetto retributivo definiti in base alle capacità e all’esperienza.Yarix S.r.l.. promuove e persegue politiche di inclusione sociale, tutela della diversità e dell’equità, con un impegno costante verso la valorizzazione del proprio capitale umano e della cultura aziendale, contro ogni forma di discriminazione.Yarix S.r.l.. garantisce un approccio equo, meritocratico e trasparente al fine di creare un’organizzazione che ponga al centro la persona, valorizzando i differenti background, esperienze e competenze di ciascun individuo. Miriamo ad attirare, selezionare e trattenere i migliori talenti, attuando processi di selezione obiettivi ed imparziali ed offrendo piani di sviluppo professionale tesi alla valorizzazione delle competenze e delle capacità personali.
Skill: 5 of 6 skills match your profile - you may be a good fit
Company Description:
Yarix è un’azienda che si occupa di sicurezza informatica in tutte le sue forme, dall’analisi del rischio, alla predisposizione di soluzioni adeguate alle esigenze della clientela.

Innovazione e ricerca sono da sempre i cardini attorno ai quali ruota l’intera attività di Yarix che, nel 2010, apre a Tel Aviv un laboratorio costituito da un gruppo di ingegneri informatici impegnati sul fronte dello sviluppo di sistemi di sicurezza all’avanguardia.

Tra i progetti che distinguono in maniera significativa l’attività di Yarix troviamo la costituzione, in occasione di una collaborazione con Microsoft, dell’Osservatorio Nazionale per la Sicurezza Informatica, ideato allo scopo di raccogliere dati e segnalazioni che possano contribuire alla prevenzione di crimini digitali. Ha ideato poi il progetto Sicurezza Informatica Italia, con il coinvolgimento di un consistente numero di aziende, per risolvere le criticità che possono occorrere durante la navigazione web e la tutela dei dati.

Yarix is a company in the business of information security in all of its shapes and forms, from risk analysis to setting up solutions that are appropriate to clients’ needs.

Innovation and research have always been the key elements around which Yarix’s entire activity revolves. Indeed, in 2010 the company opened a laboratory in Tel Aviv comprising a group of computer engineers committed to developing state-of-the-art security systems.

Title: Junior Network Engineer
Description:
About Datacenter Luxembourg:
We are a leading provider in IT Managed Services, specializing in Cloud, Connectivity, Cyber Security/Resilience, and Data Center Technologies. At Datacenter Luxembourg, innovation and quality of service are at the forefront of what we do. Our team of dedicated professionals is committed to meeting the evolving needs of our clients with expertise in crafting tailor-made solutions.
The Role:
As a Junior Network Engineer at Datacenter Luxembourg, you will play a key role in maintaining and optimizing our network infrastructure, ensuring high availability and performance. This role combines hands-on technical expertise with a focus on troubleshooting, implementing network solutions, and supporting daily operations, offering a dynamic and growth-oriented position within our company.
Responsibilities:
Provision, install, integrate and monitor network related infrastructureWork within established configuration and change management policies to ensure awareness, approval and success of changes made to the network infrastructureIdentify and define system security requirementsPrepare and document standard security operating procedures and protocolsConfigure and troubleshoot security infrastructure devicesBuild network configurations and topologyMaximize performance by troubleshooting network problems and outages and scheduling upgradesApplying operating system updates, patches, and configuration changesSecure network system by establishing and enforcing policies and defining and monitoring accessProvision new circuitsConfigure and install various network devices and services (e.g., routers, switches, Firewalls, load balancers)Ensuring that the network infrastructure is up and running at all timesEnsure systems comply with industry standardsProvide Level-1/2 support and troubleshooting to resolve issuesWork within established configuration and change management policies to ensure awareness, approval and success of changes made to the network infrastructurePerform maintenance and system upgrades including service packs, patches, hot fixes, and security configurationsMonitor performance and ensure system availability and reliabilityMonitor system resource utilization, trending, and capacity planning
Experience and Education:
Master’s degree (Bac + 3) in Information TechnologyMinimum of 2 years of experience in Networking and Security preferably by an ICT services' providerGood understanding of networking protocols (BGP, MPLS, Is-IS, MACSEC, L2VPN, L3VPN, IPsec, OSPF, 802.1X, QoS, VLANs, MSTP, LACP, Lag/MC-Lag, VRF...)Notion of VMware NSX and SD-WAN will be considered as an assetYou are used to work in a project management frameworkProven track-record in complex environment or projectsProven experience in Cloud and Virtualization, Managed Infrastructure Solutions, Network & Communications;.Any networking certification will be considered as an asset
Key Competences:
Strong interpersonal capabilitiesCreative ‘out of the box’ thinker.Exceptional work ethic, the ability to work independently, self-motivated, driven and a strong desire to succeed.You are a team playerBe focused and passionate about customer and company success.Have problem solving skills, logical thinking and analytical abilities.Good level in English is required, other languages are considered as an asset (Luxembourgish, French, German);
Our offer:
A challenging, versatile, and varied field of activityA respectful employee culture, flat hierarchies, short communication channels and an open-door policyThe position will honor dedication, diligence and structured and independent workingEasy access (close to the French Boarder) with free parking space
Application:
You are ambitious, motivated and a team-player who wants to give a boost to his/her career? You want to join a dynamic and growing company with challenging national and international projects in different industries. Great, we were looking for you ! Come and join us.

Datacenter.eu is an independent data center Internet Services Provider, operating out of Luxembourg.

Wenn wir Ihr Interesse geweckt haben, dann freuen wir uns auf Ihre aussagekräftigen Bewerbungsunterlagen. Bewerben Sie sich bitte bis zum 13.03.2025.Wir sind ein moderner Arbeitgeber, der jedem eine faire Chance zur beruflichen Entwicklung gibt. Daher möchten wir alle Menschen, insbesondere Eltern, Menschen der LGBTQIA+-Community, aller Geschlechter und Nationalitäten sowie ethnischer Herkunft, Religionen oder Weltanschauungen, die im Einklang mit der freiheitlich-demokratischen Grundordnung stehen, Menschen mit (chronischen) Erkrankungen oder Behinderungen sowie Menschen aller Alters- und Erfahrungsstufen motivieren, sich gemeinsam mit uns für die Zukunft der Gesundheit zu engagieren.Dabei fördern wir auch die berufliche Entwicklung von Frauen und werden daher entsprechende Bewerbungen nach Maßgabe des Landesgleichstellungsgesetzes bei gleicher Qualifikation bevorzugt berücksichtigen. Unsere Stellen können grundsätzlich in Teilzeit besetzt werden.Um der Gleichstellung von schwerbehinderten und nicht schwerbehinderten Menschen gerecht zu werden, begrüßen wir ausdrücklich Bewerbungen von Menschen mit Behinderung. Bewerbungen von schwerbehinderten Menschen und ihnen gleichgestellten behinderten Menschen werden bei gleicher Eignung bevorzugt berücksichtigt, soweit nicht gesetzliche Regelungen entgegenstehen.Wir freuen uns auf Ihre Bewerbung! Ihre Bewerbung wird selbstverständlich vertraulich behandelt.Kontakt:Anja Brovot
Tel.: +49 211 5970 8020

Title: Junior SOC Analyst
Description:
Your Role as a Junior SOC Analyst
Location: Delft
In short:
The Junior SOC Analyst plays a vital role in the Security Operations Center (SOC), helping to protect organizations from cyber threats by identifying and containing security incidents. This role is crucial to maintaining a secure digital environment and supporting the broader mission of providing comprehensive cybersecurity services to our clients.
Fox-IT
We are Fox-IT, also known as Fox. We stand for 'A More Secure Society.' Together, we are committed to making society safer through our technical and innovative solutions. From ethical hackers and incident responders to developers, security consultants, and more: we do this for organizations where cybersecurity is of great importance.
We are critical thinkers, naturally security-minded, and love continuous development. We are part of the NCC Group, and together with 2,000 colleagues around the world, we work towards our mission of creating a safer world.
We have the mission to make our society safer. Our colleagues are the ones who make this possible; a global team of talented individuals working together towards a safer future.
We want to create an environment where everyone can reach their full potential. We work together, are immensely creative, embrace differences, and want you to be part of our mission.
This is You
A great Junior SOC Analyst is someone who:
Efficiently triages and analyzes incoming incidents to determine the appropriate response.Collaborates well with team members and clients to ensure the highest level of cybersecurity.Has a foundational knowledge of cybersecurity and security tools.Shows an enthusiasm for learning and developing within the SOC environment.
Essential Experience and Qualifications:
0-2 years of experience in cybersecurity or a related field.Educational level of MBO 4 or higher.Basic security knowledge and understanding of security tooling.Desired certifications: OSINT, Splunk Core User, Microsoft SC-200, and SC-900.
Our Offer
You will work in a place at the top of cybersecurity where your ideas are valued. You may not always be able to share all the details about your work, but you can tell that you are contributing to a safer society. Additionally, we offer you:
A good salary that matches the things you have already done and will do;Flexible working hours and flexibility in working from home or at the office, allowing you to optimally combine your private life with your work;A favorable pension scheme, 26 vacation days (+4 mandatory days off), and 8% holiday pay with a full-time contract;Plenty of development opportunities: you can gain and share knowledge through training, TechTalks, events, and our own Fox Academy;A laptop and business phone. If you use your own phone, you will receive a reimbursement of up to €25 per month;A remote work allowance (for hybrid working);A performance bonus and profit sharing because we value your effort;When we work in the office, we gather every day for a delicious lunch.
Become a Foxer!
Do you recognize yourself in the above description and see the match? Let us know how you envision this! You can apply via the button below. You will then be directed to our ATS Workday, allowing us to process your application quickly.
A comprehensive screening is part of the onboarding process at Fox-IT.
Help from recruitment agencies, however well-intentioned, is (really) not needed.
About Your Application
We review every application and will contact you if your knowledge and work experience match what we are looking for. If you do not hear from us within 10 days, please do not be disappointed; we will keep your CV in our database for potential future vacancies and encourage you to keep an eye on our vacancies on our website. Feel free to apply for another position that appeals to you!
If you do not want us to keep your details, please send an email to global.ta@nccgroup.com. All personal data is stored in accordance with the NCC Group's privacy policy. We are committed to diversity and flexibility in the workplace. If you need any adjustments during the application process, please let us know.
If you need further modifications or additional assistance, feel free to ask!
Company Description: Fox-IT prevents, solves and mitigates the most serious cyber threats with innovative solutions for government, defense, law enforcement, critical infrastructure, banking, and commercial enterprise clients worldwide. Our approach combines human intelligence and technology into innovative solutions that ensure a more secure society. We develop custom and packaged solutions that maintain the security of sensitive government systems, protect industrial control networks, defend online banking systems, and secure highly confidential data and networks.
Specialties: Intelligence,Cyber security,Forensic investigation,Threat monitoring,Managed services,Red teaming,Pentesting,Education,Fraud detection,Detection,Incident Response,Security Operations Center,Crypto technlogy

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
We are representing our client, one of the world's leading businesses that specialises in creating productivity tools and extensions for the Atlassian ecosystem, particularly for the Confluence collaboration platform. Their mission is to help teams share their knowledge freely, simply, and effectively.
Currently, we are looking for top performers in data engineering. As the company's first data engineer, you will have a greenfield-type project to use various methods to transform raw data into valuable data for the business.
Primary Responsibilities:- Analyze and organize raw data- Build data systems and pipelines- Setup a self-service BI (to some degree) / Reporting tool- Evaluate business needs and objectives- Prepare data for prescriptive and predictive modelling- Build algorithms and prototypes- Combine raw information from different sources- Explore ways to enhance data quality and reliability- Evaluate and introduce analytical tools and programs- Collaborate with different stakeholders across the company
Basic Requirements:- Previous experience as a data engineer or in a similar role, ideally with 3+ years of experience- Knowledge of Tableau, Looker Studio or similar reporting tool- Technical expertise with data models, data mining, and segmentation techniques- Knowledge of programming languages (e.g. Java and Python)- Hands-on experience with SQL database design- Experience with BigQuery is a plus- Hands-on experience with any cloud computing platform (AWS, GCP, or Azure)- Great numerical and analytical skills- Degree in Computer Science, IT, or a similar field; a Master’s is a plus

What We Offer:Permanent employment with a competitive salary (70,000 - 85,000 EUR, depending on experience)Flexible, remote-first work policy (with quarterly onsite meetings in Stuttgart (HQ))A diverse and inclusive work environmentOpportunities to work with the latest technologies and industry best practices
Why Join Us?Impact: Contribute to a product used by numerous enterprise customers.Stability: Work on a mature, reliable platform.Growth: Learn from other experienced developers and mentor junior team members.
Skill: 5 of 6 skills match your profile - you may be a good fit
Company Description:
DigiTech Search is a leading boutique European technology recruitment business that prioritises networking, human relationships, and collaboration. Founded with a vision to bridge the gap between talented technical professionals and innovative companies, we understand the importance of meaningful connections. With a vast network of industry experts and top-tier organisations, we connect talent with the right employers, fostering mutually beneficial collaborations. 

Alongside our core brand focussed on technology digitisation, our sub brands DigiTech Health, DigiTech Eco and DigiTech Blockchain offer a relentless focus on matching top talent with organisations in these industries.  We empower our clients to drive innovation, sustainability, and transformative change. Our goal is to be the catalyst for success, connecting visionary individuals with opportunities that align with their passions and expertise. Together, we can shape a brighter future for these vital sectors.

In today's job market, trust and relationships have become paramount for job seekers. We are currently in the "Relationship Age" of hiring, where individuals prioritise job opportunities that originate from their trusted personal and professional networks.

Through our deep experience in the European technology hubs, we have been able to help companies to attract, retain and up-skill our customers' teams, embedding ourselves within the tech community. We cultivate a passion for the technologies and markets we work with, meaning we truly have a finger on the pulse of the latest ideas, trends and analytics that our customers are demanding in the digital transformation era.

With a focus on values, we establish enduring and strategic alliances with our clients, supporting them in attaining their technology transformation objectives. Our service is centred on care, providing a comprehensive, customised range of talent solutions.

At our core, we believe in treating people with compassion and respect.

Title: SQL Database Administrator
Description:
Unijobs on behalf of our public sector client have a requirement for a suitably skilled Database Administrator to join their team. The duration of this post is 12 months initially with possible extensions thereafter. This role will be remote working but the successful candidate must be available to attend client sites when required.
Working 35 hours per week, the successful candidate will be employed as an agency employee and will be paid an hourly rate of €30.17 per hour based on an annualised salary of €55,093. You will accrue 30 days annual leave per year and paid Bank Holidays.
The Database Administrator will join the Customer Service Experience (CSE) Database Services team working on the Application Modernisation Project (AMP). The successful candidate will provide:
Database support for upgrades and assessmentsAdvice and support to AMP project stakeholders regarding to all aspects of Database support.
Responsibilities:Support our clients Application Modernisation Programme – AMP in the management of the SQL database estate.Contribute and assist in the migration of databases from out of support servers.Manage database upgrades and consolidation projectsMaintain and administer database security accessPerform database Ad-hoc backups and restoresTrouble shoot and resolve database connectivity issuesSQL Server Installation, Upgrades, Migrations and ConfigurationInstall database software service packs and cumulative updates as necessaryMonitor and maintain database storage resourcesMonitor and maintain database maintenance plans for backups, index rebuild/defragment, and database statistics
Deliverables for this position:Health check Assessments of SQL database estate in the regions:Identification of SQL Servers/DatabasesDocumentation on configurations, version, dependencies, availability of backupsTesting of Ability to restore from backupsAnalysis of Storage and configuration requirementsMigration to new locations on National Data Centres:Configuration of new SQL Servers & SQL Server InstancesApplication of latest patches/updateTransfer of DatabasesRollback plans
Post-Migration tasks:Continuous Monitoring of additional SQL database estateUpdating of relevant documentation,Decommissioning of redundant SQL Servers
Required Skills & Competencies:The successful candidate will be required to demonstrate the following skills:Proven expertise in the area of SQL DBA; min 2 years experience Proven experience of setting up, managing and monitoring replicated SQL databases Excellent knowledge of database security, backup and recovery and performance monitoring standardsAbility to ensure business continuity in terms of database replication, backup and recoveryPowerShell scripting skills would be advantageousExperience creating stored procedures, views and functions
Personal Characteristics:Demonstrate good problem solving, analytical and decision making skillsThe ability to interact in a professional manner with key stakeholdersThe ability to produce against set timelinesSelf-starter with a willingness to take responsibilityExcellent teamwork and interpersonal skillsExcellent written and verbal communication skillsImpeccable attention to detail
*This position may be subject to Garda Vetting and Foreign Police Clearance, if applicable you will be required to obtain these prior to commencing in this role*
Unijobs is an equal opportunities employer
Company Description:
Unijobs is a recruitment company established for the purposes of providing a shared service designed to achieve efficiencies within the public sector.

Unijobs recruits and employs staff at all levels from administration to specialist professional skilled experts.

Unijobs provides employment flexibility to both employees and organisations using end to end on-line systems from applications to timesheet submittals right through to final invoicing.

A subsidiary of UL and reporting to a Board of Directors, under the Chairmanship of Mr Michael McDonnell, former Managing Director of the Chartered Institute of Personnel & Development (CIPD) Ireland for over 30 years up to his retirement.

Title: Data engineer
Description:
Wat krijg je van ons?

Locatie Wageningen

Solliciteer direct!

Heb je vragen over jouw toekomstige baan?

Peter Vork

Landelijke recruiter

 +31 6 21 58 83 71 

 peter.vork@aaff.nl 

 Neem contact op met deze expert (externe link) 

Data engineer in Wageningen

Aangenaam, wij zijn aaff. De nieuwe naam in accountancy en advies met 180 jaar ervaring. Bij ons ben je meer dan een werknemer; je bent één van de 2000 co-eigenaren. Wij zoeken iemand die samen met ons ondernemers verder wil brengen. Die samen met wil bouwen aan een duurzame toekomst.

Wat ga je doen als data engineer bij aaff?

Als data engineer ben je verantwoordelijk voor de ontwikkeling, optimalisatie en het onderhoud van het dataplatform en -pipelines. Je werkt samen met verschillende teams om data te ontsluiten, modelleren en te integreren in ons platform. Je zorgt ervoor dat gegevens optimaal benut worden voor data-analyse en rapportage. Als lid van een sterk groeiend data team draag je bij aan het verder uitrollen van onze datastrategie en neem je deel aan verschillende projecten.

Hoe ziet ons team eruit?

We zijn een zelfsturend scrum team dat bestaat uit meerdere data engineers, data analisten en een scrum master.

Hoe ziet ons dataplatform eruit?

Ons dataplatform draait geheel op Azure. Het ontsluiten, het opschonen en het modelleren (icm dbt) van de data gebeurd geheel op Databricks. Ons platform is opzet in een OTAP straat als infra-as-code met behulp van bicep templates.

Met wat voor data werken we?

Als accountantsorganisatie is financiële data van onze klanten belangrijk, maar absoluut niet het enige. We onderscheiden ons juist door ook naar niet-financiële data te kijken, zoals agrarische data (VEM, droge stof gehaltes, kg melk, stikstof, grondgebruik, etc.) Maar ook intern hebben we verschillende databronnen die we gebruiken om de efficiency en kwaliteit van onze processen te meten en inzichtelijk te krijgen. Het is dus best breed waar wij mee bezig zijn om een steeds meer data-gedreven organisatie te worden.

Wat bieden wij jou?

Co-eigenaarschap: bij indiensttreding krijg je 10 certificaten en deel je mee in de winst. Dit zorgt voor een betrokken sfeer met weinig hiërarchie.

Flexibiliteit als norm: werken op tijden die voor jou het beste uitkomen, in overleg met je collega's.

Vast contract: je ontvangt direct een contract voor onbepaalde tijd.

Wat neem jij mee?

Ervaring met

SQL in combinatie met dbtPythonDatabricksVersiebeheer (git)Technische vaardigheden in modeleren (bijv. data vault, inmon, kimball)

Pré

Ervaring met Bicep of andere infra-as-code toolsAzure DatafactoryPowerBI

De arbeidsvoorwaarden

Salaris: marktconformThuiswerken: mogelijkheid om thuis te werken met een vergoeding van € 2,35 per dag en € 40 per maand voor internet en faciliteiten voor een fijne werkplek thuis.Tot 38 vakantiedagen: je krijgt standaard 33 vakantiedagen. Maak je ze niet allemaal op? Dan kun je maximaal 8 dagen laten uitbetalen. Daarnaast kun je tot 5 dagen bij kopen.Reiskostenvergoeding: € 0,30 per kilometer of € 0,40 per kilometer als je met de fiets of te voet komt en een volledige vergoeding voor reizen met de trein.Flexibel verlof: sabbatical of langere vakantie? Dát kan met ons spaarverlof. Ruil daarnaast tot 2 feestdagen in voor andere religieuze of culturele feestdagen.Een groeipad: een belonings- en functiehuis dat jou loopbaanperspectief biedt.Ontwikkeling: jaarlijks budget voor externe trainingen en cursussen, plus begeleiding van een ervaren collega en toegang tot ons interne opleidingsinstituut.aaff = er voor jou: aantrekkelijke pensioenregeling, vitaliteitsbudget, toegang tot mentale gezondheidszorg en aanvullende vergoedingen bij mantelzorg, jubilea of overlijden.Uitdaging: je werkt aan uitdagende projecten met een acceptabele werkdruk en veel zelfstandigheid.Laptop en telefoon: die krijg je van aaff.En natuurlijk ontbreekt het niet aan gezellige teamuitjes, borrels en teambuildingactiviteiten.

Op 1 april lanceren we het officiële aaff-arbeidsvoorwaardenpakket. Benieuwd naar de details? Je leest het hier.

Is deze vacature iets voor jou?

We zijn benieuwd naar jouw verhaal en horen graag hoe jij ons als co-eigenaar komt versterken. Heb je nog vragen? Schroom niet om contact op te nemen met Peter Vork, via peter.vork@aaff.nl. Of solliciteer direct.

Company Description:
Overal van betekenis, dát is aaff. Geboren uit ABAB en Alfa, kom je ons met ruim 50 vestigingen overal tegen. We zijn graag dichtbij én werken het liefst mét mensen en vóór mensen. We zijn ambitieus en willen jou helpen om het beste uit je organisatie te halen. Dat doen we onder meer op het gebied van accountancy, audit & assurance, fiscaal advies, bedrijfsadvies én juridisch advies. aaff is lokaal betrokken en wij delen onze kennis graag, daar staan én gaan we voor. 

Als werkgever maken we het graag persoonlijk. Daarom hebben we geen partnerstructuur. Bij aaff zijn we met alle 2000 collega’s voor 100% eigenaar. We zorgen voor een inclusieve werkomgeving en zetten in op werkplezier en een goede work-life balance. Daarnaast investeren we volop in opleiding, ontwikkeling, kennis en innovatie. Tegelijkertijd willen we op allerlei manieren bijdragen aan een betere wereld. Echt impact maken! Het zit diepgeworteld in onze genen. 

Kom je werken bij aaff en ga je ook voor échte betekenis? Ontdek alle mogelijkheden op www.aaff.nl.

Title: Traineeship IT
Description:
ErasmusTalent.nl is een online vacatureplatform voor Studenten, Trainees, Junior & Medior Professionals op HBO/WO-niveau met 0-5 jaar ervaring.
Voor onze Partner PMT Groep zoeken wij Trainees IT
Ben jij een (bijna) afgestudeerde, talentvolle starter die altijd de nieuwste technologische snufjes en ontwikkelingen in de gaten houdt? Houd je van puzzelen en het bestuderen van programmeertalen in je vrije tijd? Wil je hier graag je werk van maken? Lees dan verder!Wij bieden jou een uitgebreid opleidingstraject waarin het proces, de mens en techniek centraal staan. Je start met een opleidingstraject waarin je aan de slag gaat met de basis van programmeren, het platform UiPath en procesoptimalisatie. Je werkt toe naar je eerste stages en optimaliseert je eerste, echte processen. Zo maak je alvast vlieguren en stoom je jezelf klaar voor het echte werk: opdrachten en projecten uitvoeren als RPA-developer bij één van onze opdrachtgevers.
Wat ga jij doenAls RPA Developer wordt je gedetacheerd. Dat betekent dat je aan de slag gaat bij één van onze opdrachtgevers. Daar werk je doorgaans hybride, voor een deel bij de opdrachtgever en voor een deel vanuit huis. Periodiek kom je samen met je PMT-collega’s in Gouda om te sparren en van elkaars ervaringen te leren. Bij de opdrachtgever ga je aan de slag met het ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en implementeren van RPA-oplossingen. Je taken omvatten onder andere:Analyseren van bedrijfsprocessen en identificeren van automatiseringskansen;Samenwerken met verschillende teams om procesverbeteringen te identificeren;Ontwerpen en ontwikkelen van RPA-oplossingen;Testen en implementeren van RPA-bots in de productieomgeving;Onderhouden en optimaliseren van bestaande RPA-oplossingen.
Wie zoeken wijJe hebt een afgeronde hbo- of wo-opleiding. Welke opleiding je precies hebt gevolgd maakt niet uit. We zijn geïnteresseerd in jouw verhaal! Voor deze rol heb je geen werkervaring nodig. Het kan echter ook zijn dat je al wat werkervaring hebt, maar een switch wilt maken naar automatisering. Ook dan maken we graag kennis met jou! Je bent sociaal vaardig en een soepele gesprekspartner wat belangrijk is in deze rol. Je hebt affiniteit met IT. Dit kan voortkomen uit hobby’s, trainingen, interesse of eerdere werkzaamheden. Belangrijkste is dat jij er enthousiast van wordt en dit verder wilt onderzoeken. Je kunt goed zelfstandig werken. Uiteraard is er regelmatig afstemming met het team, maar grote delen van de werkweek ben je zelf aan de slag. Je hebt een analytische mindset en bent in staat om complexe processen te doorgronden.
Wat bieden wijEen startsalaris van € 2.700,- + min. € 200 verhoging na 1 jaar!Dit salaris groeit mee met de ontwikkeling van jouw talent. Je kunt hier denken aan de jaarlijkse procentuele verhogingen en de prestatieverhoging.Opleidingstraject.Een op maat gemaakt opleidingstraject waarin je leert van ervaren developers en de ruimte krijgt om je snel te ontwikkelen tot RPA Developer. Trainingen en certificeringen op maat, bijvoorbeeld UiPath, Requirements, Lean, Agile en Belbin teamrolmanagement.Uitdagende projecten.De mogelijkheid om te werken aan uitdagende projecten bij verschillende opdrachtgevers zoals de uitrol van RPA bij een gemeente of het versterken van een RPA team bij een grote verzekeraar.Enthousiast en divers team!Een enthousiast en divers team waarin samenwerking en persoonlijke groei centraal staan, we komen periodiek samen in Gouda voor inspiratie en kennisdeling.Flexibiliteit - Parttime is ook mogelijk bij PMT!Meer vrije tijd overhouden om te sporten, vrijwilligerswerk te doen of gewoon te chillen met je vrienden? Dan werk je in plaats van 40 uur toch gewoon 32,36 of 38 uur?We groeien samen.Je gehele PMT carrière word jij ondersteund door je challenge manager, die je ondersteunt bij je ontwikkeling, je helpt bij je opdrachtuitvoering en altijd voor je klaar staat.Goede secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden.Een persoonlijk opleidingsbudget, maximale reiskostenvergoeding (€ 0,23 cent/km), maximale thuiswerkvergoeding (€ 2,40 per dag), een ingerichte thuiswerkplek, 25 vakantiedagen en 8,33% vakantiegeld.
Wie zijn wijAls PMT richten we ons al bijna 25 jaar op het ontwikkelen van talent. Vanaf dag één ben je volwaardig onderdeel van een team vol enthousiasme, gedrevenheid, humor en optimisme. PMT Challenge Our Technology is het onderdeel binnen PMT Groep dat voorop loopt als het gaat om IT en bestaat uit zo’n 20 collega’s. PMT zelf bestaat in totaal uit 120 PMT'ers die actief zijn bij tientallen verschillende opdrachtgevers. Bij PMT Challenge Our Technology brengen we mens, proces en techniek samen. We helpen onze opdrachtgevers processen te versnellen door middel van Robotic Process Automation (RPA). Zo creëren we samen ruimte om extra waarde toe te voegen voor de klant! Onze RPA Developers implementeren automatiseringsoplossingen bij opdrachtgevers in verschillende branches, zoals financiële instellingen, gemeenten, ministeries en bij energiebedrijven.
Benieuwd naar meer uitdagende vacatures? Neem een kijkje op www.erasmustalent.nl/vacatures !
Solliciteren via ErasmusTalent gaat zo:Vul je gegevens in en solliciteer via ons platform.Het bedrijf laat je zo snel mogelijk weten of je bent uitgenodigd voor de volgende ronde.Niet door? Geen zorgen! Wij ondersteunen je graag in je zoektocht naar een nieuwe kans. Je ontvangt hierover een bericht in je mail.
We staan klaar om je te helpen bij elke stap van je carrière!

Title: Software Developer (JavaScript, Python)
Description:
Description
We currently have a vacancy for a Software Developer (JavaScript, Python), fluent in English, to offer his/her services as an expert who will be based in Vienna, Austria. The work will be carried out either on the company’s premises or on-site at customer premises. In the context of the first assignment, the successful candidate will be integrated and closely cooperate with a major client’s IT team, on-site.
Your tasks:
Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and product managers, to further improve existing products while also prototyping new solutions;Utilize expertise in front-end-development (e.g. Vue.js, React.js) and user experience design (UX);Use Python to process and explore data of different types and integrate AI/ML components;Leverage your experience in backend-development (e.g. Node.js) and common database technologies (e.g. SQL Server, MongoDB, Elasticsearch);Participate in code reviews, bug tracking, and other quality assurance activities to ensure that software meets high standards of quality and reliability;Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in the field of software development, AI/ML and Generative AI, and share that knowledge with the team.
Requirements
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field and relevant IT experience of at least 5 years;3+ years of experience in front-end-development (e.g. JavaScript, Vue.js, React.js) and in Python programming;Knowledge in backend development with Node.js and common database technologies (e.g. SQL Server, Elasticsearch, MongoDB);Experience with software design patterns, algorithms, and data structures;Familiarity with Agile methodologies and DevOps practices;Basic understanding of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning;Excellent command of the English language.
Company Description:
Trijit provides Staffing & Recruitment along with IT Consulting Services across USA, UK, Europe & India to our valued customers. We specialize in Staffing, Recruitment, IT Services & Consulting. We have over 15 years of experience within Recruitment | Staffing | IT Consulting  and have catered to wide variety of clientele from SMEs to global corporations. 

We have a well-oiled machine in place, where we have a dedicated and experienced team at your disposal. We specialize in providing Staffing & Recruitment Services in Information Technology, Healthcare, Finance, Engineering & Telecom domain.

All our candidates undergo a 3-step screening process.
1st stage:  Intense screening by our recruiters.
2nd stage:  We have a diverse range of technical tests that are constantly upgraded by our exceptionally talented in-house developers. Candidates will have to be in the top 20 percentile to be qualified.
3rd Stage:  Candidates will undergo a 30-minute interview with our in-house Project Managers. Candidates are submitted to you only after we are satisfied with their technical prowess.

Title: Software Engineer
Description:
The roleAs a software engineer at PSQR you will become a part of a highly skilled team. PSQR favour above all the relevancy of technical solutions coming from the team: the hierarchy is flat, and the process of decision making is collaborative – we strive towards choosing good solutions no matter who came up with them.
We are a diverse team of international employees working together at our head office located in the city centre of Copenhagen.
Your profileWe are looking for a candidate with an innovative and solution-oriented approach who can think creatively in complex situations. You are a team player who naturally collaborates across various disciplines and thrives on achieving results together with your colleagues.
Succeeding in a position at PSQR isn’t about a specific set of tools or a fixed process. Instead, it’s your mindset, dedication, and ability to see opportunities rather than limitations that will be key to your success.
You have solid experience with Java development and knowledge with some of the tech stacks mentioned below:JavaReactLinuxDockerCassandra/ScyllaDBMySQL/MariaDBRabbitMQElasticSearchZooKeeper
Your task and responsibilities:Develop and maintain backend systems: build, optimise, and maintain backend services for secure supply chain traceability, ensuring scalability and performance.Integrate external systems: Integrate into APIs for external systems, or develop supplemental APIs in the solution for external systems to connect, to secure data-sharing protocols to maintain data integrity and enhance traceability.Extend front-end and mobile components: Extend the web UI or mobile application with additional functionality to serve the needs of the customersDebug, test, and optimise codebase: identify and resolve software bugs, write tests to ensure code accuracy, and optimise performance.Enhance system security: conduct security audits, manage vulnerabilities, and implement best practices to maintain a secure platform.These are the core tasks that emphasise PSQR’s focus on secure, reliable, and collaborative software development.
PSQR is offeringA diverse team of international employees, representing 13 different nationalities, working together at our head office in the city centre of Copenhagen.A flat organisation, promoting open communication. The employees are empowered to contribute directly, focusing on collaboration and results over titles. This structure creates an agile, dynamic workplace where everyone’s input is valued.They foster a relaxed, open environment for creativity and open communication, while maintaining high standards in delivering quality work
Application and contactRandstad manages the recruitment process on behalf of the company. If the position has caught your interest, please apply for the role through this site.
For more detailed information regarding this position, please contact Chief Consultant Kasper Kjærgaard on +45 61 95 92 51. All inquiries will be handled confidentially.
About PSQRPSQR is a Danish software development company that specialises in providing highly scalable software for storing, processing, and analysing vast amounts of traceability data to industry- as well as government customers. The software is modular and extensible which allows PSQR and our software integration partners to bring it into play for any product vertical all the way from raw materials, through processing, to finished goods, and finally recycling – establishing the complete traceability circle.
About RandstadRandstad is the world’s largest talent company and a partner of choice to clients. As a Partner for Talent, we are committed to providing equitable opportunities to people from all backgrounds and helping them remain relevant in the rapidly changing world of work.
We have a deep understanding of the labour market and help our clients to create the high-quality, diverse and agile workforces they need to succeed. We support people to realise their true potential throughout their entire working life. This is what we do and what motivates us every day.
Randstad DK is part of the international Randstad Group. Every day, we help more than 600,000 people around the world find jobs. We specialise in finding, attracting, and retaining skilled talent to power businesses at speed and at scale. Randstad DK is a leader in this field, with offices in Copenhagen, Aarhus, Aalborg, and Kolding.
Company Description:
Hos Randstad hjælper vi mennesker og virksomheder med at udnytte deres fulde potentiale. Vi kombinerer viden med moderne teknologi til at skabe forandringer, der hjælper mennesker fremad. Vi kalder det: human forward.

Randstad DK er en del af den internationale Randstad Group, som er en af verdens største udbydere af HR-løsninger. Med mere end 4.700 kontorer fordelt på 38 lande formidler vi hver dag arbejde til over 650.000 mennesker verden over. 

I Danmark er vi blandt de førende vikar- og rekrutteringsbureauer med afdelinger i København, Aarhus, Aalborg og Kolding. En position, vi har opnået, fordi vi som eksperter på arbejdsmarkedet formår at matche kvalificerede kandidater med de rette jobmuligheder. 

Vi hjælper virksomheder med at rekruttere og ansætte kvalificeret personale til vikariater, projektansætteler og faste stillinger.

Kendetegnende for Randstad er nogle meget tydelige processer samt en god evne til, på en innovativ måde, at etablere sig på de forskellige markeder. 

Randstad bygger i Danmark sin forretning på tre kerneområder: 

Staffing: Vikar- og rekrutteringsydelser på operativt niveau

Professionals: Rekruttering og headhunting af ledere, specialister og freelance konsulenter.

Inhouse Services: Randstad etablerer en enhed i kundens virksomhed og rekrutterer derfra.

Randstad er et certificeret vikar- og rekrutteringsbureau, som er medlem er VB, Vikarbureauernes Brancheforening. VB er Danmarks førende brancheforening på vikarområdet og vores medlemskab er din garanti for en høj standard og etik. Alle medlemsvirksomheder skal overholde en række certificeringskrav som løbende kontrolleres af foreningens eksterne revisor.

Kontakt Randstad på tlf. 70 10 13 12

Title: Information Technology Operations Specialist
Description:
Job descriptionWe are now looking for an IT Operations Specialist to join our internal IT team. If you are the right one, as part of your role, you will be expected to provide professional and efficient support (hardware and software) onsite and remotely to our employees and to creatively drive solutions for automating and improving IT processes while ensuring increased data and infrastructure security.
﻿As a member of our internal IT team, your main responsibilities will be:1st level & field service technical support (end-users, workstations, cloud services, , printers, infrastructure refresh)User & workstation administrationActive Directory & Microsoft 365 administration1st level Network & Telephone support (VPN, VoIP, mobiles)Install updates and software upgrades on workstations and troubleshoot performance issuesBackup monitoring & restore operationsImplement, enhance and update processes & best practices regarding information security & data protectionExternal vendor managementActive involvement in technical projects and implementations
The successful candidate should have:1-3 years of experience in an IT Support role. Working experience in a corporate environment will be a plusExperience in Microsoft Windows & Microsoft Azure environment with strong troubleshooting skillsIn-depth knowledge of Microsoft Office products (Outlook, OneDrive, Teams)Working knowledge of Apple products (Apple business manager, iPhone devices)Basic knowledge of network infrastructureExperience in implementing & monitoring information security mechanisms for end users (such as email). Support users in identifying potential malicious email messages and applicationsFamiliarity with ISO 27001 and 27701 processes & procedures will be a plusExcellent command of EnglishStrong communication, negotiation and problem solving skills and a service-oriented attitudeEnthusiasm for collaborating with team members, sharing knowledge and finding solutionsAttention to detail

This applies to recruitment and selection process and all employment terms and conditions including pay, training, promotion and every other aspect of employment.
Company Description: Our law firm was established in 1963, and has since grown and expanded steadily. The firm offers legal services and advice as regards the entire spectrum of commercial and financial law, including banking and finance law, capital markets law, general corporate and commercial law, competition law/anti- trust, energy law, mergers and acquisitions, privatizations, project finance law, real estate law, tax law, employment law and telecommunications law.
