Title: Developer & Data
Description:
Le rôle combine les compétences de Data Analyste et Developer pour contribuer à la transformation de la société vers une prise de décision basée sur les données (data-driven decision making).
Vos misions seront : Collecter, analyser, enrichir et transformer les données internes et externes pour améliorer les processus décisionnels au sein des différentes équipes (commerciales, logistique, comptabilité, marketing, etc.). 
Votre première mission principale sera de créer un système de gestion des actifs numériques(DAM) pour gérer efficacement les images et documents liés aux produits.
Tâches opérationnelles et responsabilités• Création du Digital Asset Management (DAM) : Développer une plateforme interne pour la gestion, le stockage et la recherche d'images et de documents associés aux produits. Le DAM devra permettre une organisation efficace, un accès rapide et une gestion de versions des assets numériques.
• Collecte et traitement des données : Identifier les flux de données nécessaires et récupérer les données internes (ERP, CRM, etc.) ainsi que des sources externes (scraping de sites concurrents, données publiques, etc.) pour enrichir les analyses.
• Analyse des données : Effectuer des analyses avancées des données en utilisant des outils comme Python (pandas, scikit-learn), PowerBI pour créer des rapports et dashboards adaptés aux besoins des équipes business.
• Création de Dashboards : Concevoir et maintenir des dashboards PowerBI pour faciliter la prise de décision au sein des équipes commerciales et autres départements.
• Développement d'outils et d'analyses : Programmer des solutions en Python et d'autres technologies web (Javascript, Node.js, React) pour répondre aux besoins des équipes métier et faciliter l’accès à l'information.
• Proposer des solutions IA : Identifier des cas d’usage pour l’intégration de l’intelligence artificielle afin d'améliorer la prise de décision et optimiser les processus métier.
• Collaboration inter-équipes : Travailler en étroite collaboration avec les équipes commerciales, logistique, marketing et autres départements pour comprendre leurs besoins et leur fournir des analyses pertinentes.
• Autonomie et formation continue : Apprendre de manière autonome, être proactif dans la mise à jour des connaissances techniques et appliquer les nouvelles technologies pour l’enrichissement des données et l'amélioration des processus.
Objectifs/indicateurs d'activité• Déploiement du DAM : Réussite de la mise en place du Digital Asset Management, en assurant sa facilité d'utilisation et son adoption par les équipes internes.• Précision des données : Garantir que les données collectées sont pertinentes, exactes et fiables pour les analyses et décisions.• Utilisation des dashboards : Nombre d’utilisateurs actifs des dashboards PowerBI et satisfaction des équipes métiers concernant la qualité des rapports.• Progrès dans l’adoption des décisions data-driven : Mesurer l'impact des décisions basées sur les données dans la performance des équipes métiers.• Intégration d’IA : Nombre d’initiatives d’IA mises en place et leur impact sur les processus décisionnels et la performance.• Respect des délais : Gestion efficace des projets et respect des échéances dans la collecte et la mise en œuvre des solutions analytiques.
Liens hiérarchiques et fonctionnels• Hiérarchique : Rattaché(e) au responsable de la Data Science ou du département Informatique.• Fonctionnels : Collaboration avec les responsables des départements commerciaux, marketing, logistique, et autres départements métiers pour bien comprendre leurs besoins et leur fournir des outils et analyses.
Délégations de pouvoir, habilitations, qualifications• Habilitations : Accès aux bases de données internes et externes de l'entreprise dans le cadre de l’analyse des données.• Qualifications : Compétences avancées en Python, JavaScript, PowerBI, scraping, IA, et gestion de projets data.
Formations / compétences requises• Compétences techniques :o Maîtrise des langages Python, JavaScript, Node.js, React.o Expertise avec les outils de data science : pandas, scikit-learn, Jupyter Notebook.o Bonne maîtrise de PowerBI pour la création de dashboards interactifs.o Expérience avec la gestion de versions via Git, et l’utilisation de Visual Studio et des environnements virtuels.o Expérience de scraping et collecte de données externes.o Connaissances sur les plateformes Azure et gestion de données sur cloud.
• Compétences interpersonnelles :o Capacité à travailler de manière autonome et à s’adapter rapidement.o Compétences en gestion relationnelle pour interagir efficacement avec des équipes aux objectifs parfois divergents.o Forte capacité d’apprentissage et d'adaptation aux nouvelles technologies.
Company Description:
Cherry Pick, c'est plus qu'une plateforme de recrutement de freelances !
C’est une plateforme de matching entre talents et clients finaux, permettant de créer de véritables connexions.

Cherry Pick a développé un véritable système de matching se basant sur les besoins de l’entreprise et les compétences de chaque talent (hard & soft skills).

Cette innovation permet une parfaite adéquation entre les compétences du freelance et la culture de l’entreprise.

Une technologie couplée avec une véritable expertise et un accompagnement de A à Z des membres de l'équipe.

Nous animons 4 collectifs de freelances:
- Management de Projet & transition
- Transformation Digitale
- IT & Devops
- Data

Notre équipe a un seul objectif : 
Trouver, sélectionner, attirer et retenir les meilleurs talents pour nos clients.

Cherry Pick est membre du groupe Néo-Soft. Groupe indépendant labellisé Happy At Work et certifié RSE par AFNOR, Néo-Soft regroupe 1700 consultants qui accompagnent les entreprises du CAC-40 et SBF-120 dans leurs projets de transformation digitale.

💡 Le terme "Cherry Picking"​ désigne l'action de sélectionner uniquement les meilleurs éléments d'un ensemble.

Title: Software Engineer
Description:
Meet the Team 

Cisco Cyber Vision is a cybersecurity solution from the Industrial IOT business at Cisco, specially designed for organizations in the power and water, oil and gas, manufacturing and public transport sectors, to ensure the continuity, resilience and security of their industrial operations. It gives asset owners full visibility of their networks, so they can ensure process integrity, build secure infrastructures, ensure regulatory compliance and enforce security policies through seamless integration and easy deployment within the industrial network.

By joining our team, you will be asked to perform exciting tasks, whether it be developing new features, optimizing our code, or adapting the architecture to position the product into new markets and environments.

 Your Impact 

 Participate in the development of Cyber Vision components using the Go language. (If you’ve never worked in Go, deep knowledge of C, C++, and/or Python will get you started quickly).  Work closely with senior developers and other team members to contribute to project goals.  Demonstrate a willingness to learn new technologies, seek feedback, and improve skills through mentorship.  Communicate effectively with the team, document work clearly, and contribute to a positive and inclusive team environment. 

 Minimum Qualifications: 

 Backend oriented programming language  SQL language  Basic knowledge of networking 

 Preferred Qualifications: 

 Golang experience  GNU/Linux operating system  PostgresSQL  An experience in frontend development and particularly React is a plus  Eager to learn – there’s always something new to build in cybersecurity. Curiosity is a must.  Problem solving skills – in a complex stack, bugs can be hidden very deep down… if you enjoy treasure hunts, you’ll be happy at Cisco.  English proficiency – we’re a US company with teams across the entire world and work with them daily. 

 #WeAreCisco 

#WeAreCisco where every individual brings their unique skills and perspectives together to pursue our purpose of powering an inclusive future for all.

Our passion is connection—we celebrate our employees’ diverse set of backgrounds and focus on unlocking potential. Cisconians often experience one company, many careers where learning and development are encouraged and supported at every stage. Our technology, tools, and culture pioneered hybrid work trends, allowing all to not only give their best, but be their best.

We understand our outstanding opportunity to bring communities together and at the heart of that is our people. One-third of Cisconians collaborate in our 30 employee resource organizations, called Inclusive Communities, to connect, foster belonging, learn to be informed allies, and make a difference. Dedicated paid time off to volunteer—80 hours each year—allows us to give back to causes we are passionate about, and nearly 86% do!

Our purpose, driven by our people, is what makes us the worldwide leader in technology that powers the internet. Helping our customers reimagine their applications, secure their enterprise, transform their infrastructure, and meet their sustainability goals is what we do best. We ensure that every step we take is a step towards a more inclusive future for all. Take your next step and be you, with us!
Company Description: Cisco is the worldwide technology leader that is revolutionizing the way organizations connect and protect in the AI era. For more than 40 years, Cisco has securely connected the world. With its industry leading AI-powered solutions and services, Cisco enables its customers, partners and communities to unlock innovation, enhance productivity and strengthen digital resilience.  With purpose at its core, Cisco remains committed to creating a more connected and inclusive future for all.
Specialties: Networking,Wireless,Security,Unified Communication,Cloud,Collaboration,Data Center,Virtualization,Artificial Intelligence,Observability,Sustainability,Computing,Software,Services (CX)

Title: IT Analyst
Description:
ALTEN – Światowy lider usług inżynieryjnych i ITGrupa ALTEN, założona w 1988 roku we Francji, jest wiodącym partnerem technologicznym, obsługującym największych klientów na świecie. W 2023 roku osiągnęła przychody przekraczające 4,07 miliarda euro i zatrudnia ponad 57 000 pracowników, w tym 88% inżynierów i ekspertów IT.ALTEN Polska działa od 13 lat, wspierając innowacje, badania i rozwój oraz systemy IT swoich klientów. Title: IT Infrastructure Junior Analyst
Description:
Stefanini is hiring IT Infrastructure Junior Analysts to join one of our clients operating in Lisbon.
Project duration: 1 year, with chances of extending;
Work model: hybrid (3 days per week on site in Lisbon’s office)

Role responsibilities: 
Analysis of the current IT infrastructure to identify any areas that require updates or improvements. Monitor system performance and troubleshooting issues as they arise. Monitor and manage day-to-day IT infrastructure including hardware, software, network, and server administration. Maintenance of system security by implementing and managing appropriate measures. Collaborate with business teams to customize and adapt existing systems to the organization’s specific needs. Provide technical support and guidance to business teams. Monitor system backups, archiving, and disaster recovery, under the internal policies and procedures. Create and maintenance the necessary technical documentation of software, hardware, and network inventory, under the internal policies and procedures. Support in developing and implementing IT standards and policies and provide guidance during system upgrades or installations.

Role requirements:
Experience in supporting and implementing technology infrastructure. Experience managing and supporting Windows Infrastructures. Experience supporting Microsoft Cloud environment. Experience in supporting corporative Microsoft Windows Network. Experience in supporting final users on IT issues. University degree in computer science / information technology or equivalent. Portuguese and English fluency.Experience with international and multicultural projects. Capability to work collaboratively with others to meet shared objectives. Capability to constantly look for new innovations, technologies and methods which can improve the daily work activities. Capability to assimilate new knowledge. Communication and collaboration skills.Basic knowledge in Information Security. Problem-solving skills.  
The preceding job description had been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed by employees within this classification. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties and responsibilities required of employees assigned to this job.

What we offer
You will find here not only a challenging and interesting workplace, but also a rewarding work experience, with competitive compensation and benefit packages:Career development: opportunity to grow within the team;Special referral bonuses for recommending your friends;Private Medical subscription;Friendly team who is eager to meet you.

What's next
It's best to apply today, because job postings can be taken down and we wouldn't want you to miss this opportunity. To apply, please submit your updated English-written CV.

Diversity & inclusion
Here at the Stefanini Group, we value plurality and equity, regardless of race, sexual orientation, disability, age, ancestry, religion, gender, and nationality. We understand and encourage the importance of being you!

About us
We are a multinational company with over 35 years of experience in delivering IT services worldwide, ranging from IT outsourcing to application development or IT staffing. We have a direct presence in 41 countries, through our 70 offices located throughout the world. We have managed to become the preferred partner of many small-to-midsize local and regional companies as well. Most of our clients come from industries such as financial services, manufacturing, telecommunications, chemical, services, technology, public sector and utilities.
Stefanini has career opportunities locally and around the world for professionals interested in a vibrant, passionate, team-oriented workplace. If you are a customer-centric person with a "get it done" attitude, come over for coffee and a talk on your future career with us!
Learn more about us on www.stefanini.com and join us on LinkedIn, Facebook and Instagram where we regularly post insights from our colleagues.

Title: Data Scientist / Ingeniero IA
Description:
🥇¿Te apasiona trabajar con las tecnologías más trending en el mundo y con trabajo en modalidad híbrida?. Si es así, en Yeeply te queremos conocer 🖖👋❗
✅ Un recorrido por Yeeply
Yeeply cuenta con una red mundial de talentos tecnológicos remotos de primer nivel disponibles para ayudar a startups, pymes y grandes empresas a abordar su transformación digital y desarrollar sus proyectos digitales.
Te ofrecemos la oportunidad de unirte al proyecto de una empresa de reconocido prestigio en su sector como Data Scientist.
🌐Nuestra página web www.yeeply.com
☄ ¿Cúales serán tus funciones?
Participación en proyectos que requieren la aplicación de principalmente para tareas de creación de soluciones machine learning y deep learning. El desarrollador tiene experiencia en:
Trabajo con plataformas y frameworks de ML/DL, así como uso de lenguajes de programación comunes.Desarrollar soluciones de ML/DL.Perfil de desarrollador con posibilidades de crecimiento en la empresa.

¿Qué puedes aportarnos?🔥
Lenguajes de programación: Python, Java, C++, entre otros.Plataformas y frameworks de IA: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, scikit-learn.Experiencia con herramientas de procesamiento de datos como Pandas, NumPy y SciPy.Experiencia en proyectos de ciberseguridad: conocimiento de los principales problemas de la ciberseguridad y cómo aplicar técnicas de IA para abordarlos.Experiencia en la implementación de algoritmos de IA como redes neuronales profundas (DNN), redes neuronales recurrentes (RNN), y modelos de transformers (por ejemplo, BERT, GPT)
Valorable:Sólidos conocimientos de matemáticas y estadística, incluyendo álgebra lineal, cálculo y probabilidad.Conocimientos de ciberseguridad a nivel básico, entendimiento de los desafíos y riesgos de la IA aplicada a la ciberseguridad.Optimización y análisis de modelos: Validación de modelos, tuning de hiperparámetros, evaluación de desempeño con métricas apropiadas (precisión, recall, F1-score, etc.).Familiaridad con herramientas de Big Data (Apache Spark, Hadoop)

✨ ¿Qué podemos ofrecerte? Entre otros:
Contrato indefinido y plan de retribución flexible.Modalidad híbrida de trabajo, 4 días de teletrabajo, trabaja desde dónde quieras 🏕 y 1 presencial en oficina situada en Madrid zona Cuzco.Importantes beneficios: seguro médico, seguro de vida, plus de teletrabajo, etc.Desarrollo de carrera en un ambiente colaborativo y con bonificaciones a tu formación, para que siempre estés actualizado y a la última en cuanto a tecnología y tendencias en transformación digital.
¡Te esperamos!📣

Title: Information Technology Analyst
Description:
Role IT Analysis - External Attack Surface Management (cloud based)On-site MonsCity in Belgium
Search ResultsDuties:1. Daily Tasks:o Maintain a comprehensive list of vulnerabilities, including remediation or mitigation status.o Update dataset within two working days after receiving change notifications.2. Weekly Tasks:o Deliver a comprehensive vulnerability report to the Service Delivery Manager (SDM) and Service Owner (SAO).o Provide risk assessment, remedial action recommendations, and current status.3. Monthly Tasks:o Submit an overview of critical/high vulnerabilities.o Present graphical trends of security posture.4. Yearly Tasks:o Summarize all events and actions from the past year.o Deliver the yearly report within 15 working days after year-end.5. Operational Responsibilities:o Support NATO Cyber Security Centre (NCSC) with External Attack Surface Management.o Assist in data analysis and reporting from Online Vulnerability Assessment (OVA).o Monitor and assess internet-facing services for vulnerabilities.o Ensure domain controllers' security to prevent exploitation.o Participate in daily status update meetings and planning sessions.o Submit retrospective sprint reports after each sprint cycle.o Ensure deliverables meet NATO security and documentation standards.6. Compliance and Coordination:o Adhere to NATO security policies and confidentiality regulations.o Work onsite in Mons, Belgium, with no remote work option.o Maintain compliance with NATO high-side network security audit requirements.Requirements:1. Educational and Professional Background:o Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field (or equivalent experience).o Minimum of 3 years of experience in IT security, security audits, or vulnerability assessment.2. Technical Skills:o Strong knowledge of cloud-based security best practices.o Proficiency in assessing internet-facing assets for vulnerabilities and anomalies.o Experience with threat intelligence, incident response, and security remediation.o Familiarity with Tenable Identity Exposure software and Active Directory Security Assessment.o Understanding of NATO cybersecurity regulations and standards.3. Certifications (Preferred but Not Mandatory):o CISSP, CISM, or CISA.4. Security Clearance:o COSMIC TOP SECRET clearance is mandatory.5. Other Skills:o Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.o Excellent communication and collaboration skills.o Experience working with NATO, government, or defense entities (preferred).6. Work Environment:o Onsite presence required at SHAPE, Mons, Belgium.o Provided with NATO IT equipment.o Compliance with NATO CIS operational rules and regulations.

Title: Junior Software Developer
Description:
La nostra opportunità per te
Scegliendo Horsa avrai l’opportunità di far parte di una delle più importanti realtà di consulenza IT del panorama italiano. Siamo specializzati nelle aree ERP, Business Analytics, Technology e nelle aree più innovative come la Cyber Security, il Cloud e la Industry 4.0. Grazie alla qualità del nostro operato, siamo riconosciuti come Partner d’eccellenza per guidare i processi di trasformazione digitale dei nostri Clienti a respiro nazionale e internazionale.
Siamo alla ricerca di giovani talenti appassionati di tecnologia, da inserire nel nostro team che si occupa di sviluppo di software volti all’ottimizzazione dei processi aziendali.Crediamo fortemente nel potere della formazione continua dei nostri professionisti; avrai quindi l’opportunità di essere sempre aggiornato sulle nuove tecnologie e di ampliare le tue conoscenze personali e professionali.
La persona sarà inserita presso la nostra sede di Scorzé.
Il tuo ruoloIl nostro obiettivo è sviluppare al meglio le tue potenzialità e il tuo talento. Per questo, parteciperai a percorsi di formazione studiati appositamente per fornirti conoscenze e competenze nello sviluppo Power, PHP e Angular.
Sarai coinvolto nei nostri progetti e farai parte di un team dinamico, in cui collaborazione, formazione e affiancamento a figure con esperienze consolidate ti consentiranno di crescere professionalmente e tecnicamente. Inoltre, avrai l'opportunità di sviluppare competenze nella gestione dei progetti, con una prospettiva di crescita verso un ruolo da Project Manager.
Le tue responsabilità:Acquisire competenze e conoscenze che ti permetteranno di analizzare, progettare, sviluppare e documentare progetti di ingegnerizzazione dei processi aziendali;Affiancare le figure più senior nell’implementazione di soluzioni che rispondono alle esigenze dei nostri clienti.

Chi cerchiamo?Cerchiamo giovani persone con una forte motivazione personale nell’acquisizione di nuove conoscenze tecnologiche pronti ad affrontare nuove sfide.
Prendiamo in considerazione diplomati o laureati con formazione STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering e Mathematics)

Sei la persona giusta per noi se…Hai una forte motivazione personale nell’acquisizione di nuove conoscenze tecnologiche e ad affrontare nuove sfide.Hai buone doti relazionali, comunicative e attitudine al team working;Sei disponibile a trasferte.

La ricerca è rivolta anche a persone appartenenti alle categorie protette L.68/99 Art.1.Inviare curriculum vitae dettagliato, con l’autorizzazione al trattamento dei dati personali secondo il Regolamento UE 2016/679 (GDPR).Ai sensi della normativa vigente l'offerta di lavoro si intende estesa a entrambi i sessi (L 903/77).

Title: Software Engineer, Platform Team
Description:
Sisu Group is a fast growing iGaming startup with offices in Tallinn and Malaga, and over 140 team members. We are on a mission to revolutionise iGaming and sports betting by creating the next-generation platform and products. Our offerings are 100% cloud-based, capable of seamless scaling across different regions and brands. So far in 2024, we successfully launched two brands, ReSpin and Epicbet, on our proprietary platform. Sisu Group is founded by iGaming veteran Jan Svendsen, who previously founded Coolbet, NordicBet and Triobet. The majority of the company is owned by staff, with secured funding totalling €21M.
We are seeking a Software Engineer for the Platform (Tooling) Team to help build the next-generation iGaming platform. The ideal candidate has experience with infrastructure as code (IaC), tooling development, possesses strong coding skills, understands infrastructure security and CI/CD processes, and is passionate about automation.
What we use:TypeScript & Node.js Google CloudCDK for Terraform (CDKTF)GitHub/Github ActionsArgoCDMonorepoGrafana/MimirSentry
What We Expect:Experience in Software Development preferably within a Platform or Tooling teamUnderstanding of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as CDKTF or PulumiKnowledge of Docker and KubernetesFamiliarity with CI/CD processes and tools (e.g., ArgoCD, GitHub Actions)Strong Problem-solving and Troubleshooting skills
Nice to Have:Experience with cloud infrastructure (Google Cloud, Azure, or AWS)Good understanding of networking and security concepts
You'll Have the Opportunity To:Manage and maintain Infrastructure as Code (IaC)Monitor and troubleshoot issues related to the cloud environmentImplement and manage security measuresCollaborate with development teams to enhance the developer experience and deploy/scale applicationsImprove the reliability and cost-effectiveness of the environment
Recruitment ProcessIntroduction interviewTechnical home task (CDKTF)Technical interview
Company culture and benefits:
At Sisu Group we believe in creating a positive and inclusive workplace culture where teamwork is the key. We value collaboration, open communication, and treat all team members as equals. We encourage each other to be proactive and take ownership, while also providing the support and resources needed to help them grow and develop even further.
We understand that our employees are our biggest asset, which is why we offer a competitive compensation package that includes stock options, and generous paid time off. We believe that building a great company is about more than just creating a successful product, it's about building a community of passionate and driven individuals who share a common goal.
If you're looking for a company where you can grow professionally, work with talented and dedicated colleagues, and make a real impact, while sharing our key values of caring, thinking outside the box, taking charge and having a positive mindset, then Sisu Group is the place for you.

By submitting this application, the candidate agrees that Sisu Group stores personal details to be able to process the job application. Sisu Group follows and is compliant with the General Data Protection Regulation. Clear police record required, ensuring a commitment to integrity and a safe workplace.
Company Description:
Sisu Group is a fast growing iGaming startup with offices in Tallinn and Malaga, and over 130 team members. We are on a mission to revolutionize iGaming and sports betting by creating the next-generation platform and products. Our offerings are 100% cloud-based, capable of seamless scaling across different regions and brands. 

Sisu Group is founded by iGaming veteran and hall-of-famer Jan Svendsen, who previously founded Coolbet, NordicBet and Triobet. Co-founders are CEO Anders Karlsen and CFO Yannick A. Svendsen. The majority of the company is owned by staff, with secured funding totaling €21M.

We are passionate about what we do, we are product driven and always moving forward. We are dedicated to creating a workplace that is truly enjoyable and motivating, where everyone is aligned and enthusiastic about their work. Sisu is a Finnish word with a meaning of extraordinary courage, determination and perseverance. It embodies the core meaning of our company in our journey to creating the best iGaming products and platform in the world.

Our team is highly experienced with over 800 years of industry experience. We know what it takes to build a successful company and top-notch software from scratch.

In January 2024 we launched our first brand built on our proprietary platform, ReSpin.com, which is a lightning fast online casino that focuses on personalized rewards and user experience. In June 2024 we launched our second brand, Epicbet.com, a sports-driven brand powered by our proprietary sportsbook, with user experience and product in focus.

We are scaling up the organization rapidly and are always in the lookout for talented team players. We offer competitive salaries combined with stock options, because here in Sisu we are all owners! Reach out to info@sisugroup.com if you want to know more and join our fun journey.

Title: Information Technology Manager
Description:
With a legacy spanning over five decades, Bluegr Hotels & Resorts has firmly established itself as a leader in the hospitality industry, embodying the three pillars of quality tourism: exceptional locations, exemplary services, and authentic experiences. Its portfolio includes three distinctive hotels in Crete—Minos Beach Art Hotel, a member of Design Hotels and Marriott Bonvoy; the holistic wellness retreat Minos Palace Resort; and the family-friendly Candia Park Village—as well as the boutique Life Gallery Athens in the capital. These properties seamlessly integrate into their natural surroundings, highlighting the unique character of each region. Its commitment to its people, culture, and sustainability is underscored by numerous international accolades, including a five-star certification from the EFQM Business Excellence Model. It has also been recognized as one of Fortune’s 100 Best Companies to Work for in Europe 2024 and is the only hospitality company to rank among the top ten workplaces in Greece for two consecutive years, according to Great Place to Work Hellas.Guided by the belief that hospitality and culture are deeply intertwined, Bluegr actively supports contemporary artistic creation and research through the G & A Mamidakis Foundation, further cementing its role as a champion of culture and innovation in the industry.
Bluegr people are the heart of our success, creating exceptional experiences and delivering outstanding value to guests worldwide.
We are currently looking for a visionary Information Technology (IT) Manager based in Athens headquarters.
The IT Manager will drive IT strategy, infrastructure, and operational excellence, ensuring seamless system performance that meets and exceeds the diverse needs of stakeholders. As a key leader in digital transformation, you will oversee technology planning, implementation, troubleshooting, and maintenance, continuously optimizing processes to enhance efficiency, innovation, and guest experiences across Bluegr.
We are looking for a tech trendsetter ready to challenge, excel and make the difference!
Education & CertificationsUniversity/College degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field.MSc, MBA or relevant will be considered a plus.Professional/Technology certifications are a plus.ExperiencePrevious experience in an IT managerial role.Hospitality sector experience preferred.Strong background in IT stakeholder and external vendor management.Service Level Agreement (SLA) management expertise.Technical SkillsDatabases & ERP: SQL, Entersoft ERP.WiFi & Network Management: Cisco, Mikrotik, Telecom engineering.Systems & Infrastructure: Windows Server, Virtualization (Hyper-V), Backup operations.Security & Cybersecurity: Firewall management, Email security, Antivirus (ESET, Microsoft Defender), MDM, VPN.Software & Applications: Protel PMS, POS systems, TV headend systems.Microsoft Tools: Office 365, Power BI, Dynamics, SharePoint, Teams, OneDrive.Hardware & Troubleshooting: Operating systems, PABX operations.Core CompetenciesStrong communication and interpersonal skills.Excellent command of English.Problem-solving and critical thinking.Innovative mindset with a passion for technology-driven solutions.Ability to train and present technical concepts effectively.Strong organizational and time-management skills.Self-motivated, proactive, and adaptable in fast-paced environments.Team player with a collaborative approach.
The IT Manager will be based in Athens and will be expected to travel to Bluegr. hotels.
What bluegr Hotels & Resorts Offers:Competitive Remuneration Package.Private Insurance.Development & Training Opportunities.Excellent working environment, recognized as a Great Place to Work Certified based on international standards of Business Excellence.
At bluegr Hotels & Resorts, we prioritize the well-being and development of our team members and guests. If you are passionate about hospitality and eager to contribute to our purpose and vision, we invite you to join our team.
All applications will be treated with the utmost confidentiality.
Are you ready to Live the Blue Experience?

Title: Software Engineer Fullstack
Description:
Your RoleYou will join our Rotterdam based Investment Engineering team, in some cases working together with the larger engineering team in London and Malaga, to help development of Data Pipelines, ETL processes and Python tooling to make Cardano’s Investment business more robust, scalable and efficient. You work directly together with the business to convert their needs into software solutions that is compatible with our stack, design philosophy and architecture. You develop a good understanding of financial markets and pension funds to maintain a conversation with the business and think along with their problem statement.We believe in picking the best tool for the job. Our stack consists of a variety of technologies that can best solve a specific problem. You have a voice in using, reducing or expanding that stack. The developer would be expected to work collaboratively and share their knowledge with other team members and contribute to the improvement of the platform, practices and patterns and technology stack. They would actively participate in our culture of learning program to stay current with industry trends, to train and to participate in the data engineering community.This is an opportunity for a bright and enthusiastic individual to learn, grow and make a significant contribution to the technology, business productivity and efficiency. 
Key responsibilitiesThe responsibilities will consist of solving Cardano’s LDI (Liability Driven Investment) team’s business problems by delivering in-house software solutions together with the Investment Engineering team.
Core tasks include:Use your Software Engineering skills to provide complete solutions using best practices, ensuring performance and reliability.There is typically no middle person between you and the business and together with the business you convert their needs into software that is compatible with our stack, design philosophy and architecture. You develop a good understanding of financial markets, financial risk management and pension funds in order to maintain a conversation with the business and think along with their problem statement. Work closely with the DataOps, DevOps, infrastructure platform team and other data project teams to ensure your projects use the most appropriate technology consistent with the firm’s strategic tools.Staying abreast of changing technologies, and continuous learning of innovative approaches to data and software engineering and technologies and bring those ideas into the firm.As part of the software engineering support rota, approximately one day every two weeks within working hours, provide production monitoring, and management of applications, API’s, overnight batches, and data feeds into, and out of the firm.
Skills RequiredTo perform the role effectively, you will need the following skills:Good programming skills with minimum 2 years production experience in building Web APIs and Web ApplicationsExperience working with PythonExperience in writing and maintaining automated tests (unit, integration …)Experience working with databases (Relational or non-Relational)Experience with FastAPI, GraphQL and RabbitMQ is a bonusExperience with JavaScript/TypeScript and React is a bonusExperience with Big Data Technologies such as Airflow, Hive, NiFi is a bonus 
What we need from youCandidates see technology as a means, not as an end. Candidates know what good architecture and good code are and always strive for it. They also understand that languages change so they have the skills that can be applied to any future language Candidates display strong communicative skills and understand that programming in a team has a significant social component, both in interacting daily within your team and with business stakeholders.Motivated to learn and grow in the role.Like working with the broader engineering team including Infrastructure and DevOps as well as business developers and users.Proven ability of taking ownership of tasks and drive them to completion.Strong, clear and concise communication skills – verbal, written & interpersonal.
What Cardano offers youCardano offers good employment conditions in addition to ample development opportunities. In addition to your salary, you will receive a 13th month, a variable remuneration scheme, a free lunch when you work at the office (we work hybrid – 2 days in the office + 3 days at home). Cardano is located in Rotterdam right opposite the Central Station and a 1st class train card (if you live outside Rotterdam) is also part of the employment conditions.
Next to this your job will provide you:Challenging work with a good working atmosphereMany opportunities for personal and professional growth.
Who we areCardano was founded in 2000. At Cardano, we believe that security around wealth and the standard of living it offers contributes greatly to the quality of life. We ensure that financial institutions with a pivotal role in society for citizens - such as insurers, pension funds and banks - can cope with the major changes that are coming their way. Changes as a result of the transition to a sustainable society are central to this. We advise and implement sustainable investment policies for them. Cardano has offices in the UK (London, Nottingham) and the Netherlands (Rotterdam), where more than 600 highly experienced specialists work.
Cardano has become part of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) as of November 1, 2024, working closely with Mercer.
GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) / Privacy notice
Cardano collects and processes personal data about its applicants. How Cardano uses and protects this data, and your rights in relation to this data are set out in the Cardano Privacy notice. This Privacy notice applies to all personal data Cardano collects and processes about you and can be found on our Company Website.
Company Description:
Founded in 2000, Cardano is a privately-owned investment management and advisory business with a focus on risk and sustainability. Widely recognised as a market leader, our c. 550 professionals support pension schemes and other long-term savings organisations in the United Kingdom and the Netherlands to secure better, resilient, and more sustainable financial outcomes for savers, employers and wider society. 
 
•	Advisory: A specialist provider of pensions advisory services, including covenant, sustainability, strategic investment issues, risk transfer, and corporate and regulatory events, serving over 350 scheme and corporate clients. Our scheme clients have aggregated assets of over £400bn.  
 
•	Investment Management: A purpose-built investment advisory, investment management and fiduciary management provider, with a leading-edge sustainability offering, serving long-term savings clients and pension schemes, with risk management requirements. Cardano has £52bn of assets under management and £22bn of assets under advice as at 31 December 2023. 
 
•	DC: We manage over £20bn in DC assets across the UK and the Netherlands. In the UK, we operate NOW: Pensions, an award-winning UK workplace pension provider, serving over 2m members and tens of thousands of employers from a wide range of industry sectors.
Specialties: Fiduciary Management,Risk Management,Investment Advisory,Investment Management,Pension specialists,Covenant & DB pensions strategy advisor

Title: Junior Cyber Intelligence Analyst (M/F/D)
Description:
We are looking for a Junior Cyber Intelligence Analyst to integrate the team of our client – a Cyber Resilience company,

What will be your main tasks and responsibilities?


Leverage a wide stack of cyber threat intelligence tools to add value directly to clients or to deliver support to offensive and defensive teams;Manage a cyber intelligence stack, aiming to provide actionable security intelligence to other teams, such as indicators of compromise;Execute threat assessment, based on publicly available information identifying possible attack vectors, and produce relevant reports;Be technically capable to determine the root cause of every discovery (independent of source) and escalate incidents describing the necessary actions for its mitigation and / or issue requests for further information;Curate and integrate all available sources of threat information;Perform OSINT activities to further increase visibility.


What is required from you?


Academic degree in information technology or similar areas;Previous experience in the cybersecurity area, with knowledge on vulnerability types and their impacts;Basic network knowledge;Risk calculation based on affected assets and the information available;Understanding of APTs and their modus operandis;Basic linux services knowledge and scripting;Programming skills (python, pearl, go, or others);Ability to summarise threats and write thorough reports;Communication skills both written and spoken.English written/spoken.


Sounds like you? Send us your CV and let’s talk!

Title: Compliance Officer
Description:
Compliance Officer As a Compliance Officer, you will be responsible for ensuring the organization's compliance with relevant laws and regulations, including anti-money laundering (AML), counter-terrorist financing (CTF), and data protection laws such as the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). You will develop and implement policies and procedures, assess risks, and ensure that the organization adheres to both national and international compliance standards.
ResponsibilitiesEnsure compliance with AML/CTF regulations, GDPR, and other relevant laws.Develop, implement, and regularly update compliance policies and procedures related to AML, CTF, and data protection.Serve as the primary point of contact for staff, regulators, and relevant authorities on all compliance-related matters, including AML/CTF and GDPR.Conduct regular compliance checks and audits to assess adherence to AML/CTF and data protection laws.Provide guidance, training, and support to employees on compliance best practices, including AML/CTF and GDPR.Respond to and investigate compliance breaches, including data protection and AML violations, and implement corrective actions.Maintain and update records of all compliance activities, including data processing and AML/CTF activities.Support the promotion and maintenance of a culture of compliance across the organization.Support the implementation of compliance programs across group subsidiaries.Stay informed of changes to AML/CTF and GDPR regulations, as well as other relevant regulations.
QualificationsA university degree in a relevant field (e.g., Law, Business, Finance, Information Security, etc.).Expertise in national and international compliance regulations, including a deep understanding of AML/CTF laws and GDPR.Minimum of 4 years of experience in a similar role, ideally within compliance.Strong project management skills, with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks.Excellent communication, organizational, and analytical skills.Proficiency in both written and spoken English, Arabic is a plus.

Title: Software Engineer
Description:
Hľadáme C++ Developera pre spoločnosť, ktorej produkty sú používané meteorologickými úradmi po celom svete. Softvérové produkty, ktoré vyvíjajú, sú komplexné meteorologické systémy nasadené na meteorologických úradoch, letiskách, vojenských základniach a v súkromných spoločnostiach. Užívatelia ich softvéru prichádzajú doslova zo všetkých kútov sveta: UK, Nemecko, Brazília, Malajzia, Austrália, USA a mnohé ďalšie, pokrývajú všetky kontinenty (áno, vrátane Antarktídy).
Lokalita: Bratislava (hybridný režim), počas skúšobnej lehoty onsiteZačiatok: podľa dohodyTyp zmluvy: Trvalý pracovný pomerPlat: Junior od 1800€ fixne, Senior až 3200€ fixne + mesačný bonus (0-25%) + ročný bonus (1-3 násobok mesačnej mzdy) do 4500€/mesačne
Predpoklady a zručnostiC++ na pokročilej úrovni (štandardná knižnica, Boost, šablóny, výnimky).Znalosť Pythonu je výhodou.Ak ste naozaj dobrý programátor, ktorý nepoužíva C++, môžete sa uchádzať o prácu, ak ste ochotní naučiť sa C++ na veľmi dobrej úrovni.Skúsenosti s vývojom softvéru v tíme na reálnom projekte pre firmu, organizáciu, open-source projekt alebo hobby projekt.Otvorená myseľ a ochota učiť sa nové oblasti a technológie, pretože meteorológia je veľmi odlišná oblasť.Hľadáme ľudí, ktorí majú záujem o dlhodobé zamestnanie.Anglický jazyk na minimálnej úrovni B2.
Výhody kandidáta:Pochopenie časovej/priestorovej zložitosti algoritmov.Znalosť reálnych problémov s CPU/pamäťou/sieťou.Kreativita pri vymýšľaní nových algoritmov.Tvorba GUI pomocou Qt.Základné znalosti analytickej geometrie a numerických výpočtov.Ochota cestovať do zahraničia.
Výhody a benefityPráca na projektoch a produktoch v jedinečnej oblasti – meteorológia.Takmer 100% ich vývoja sa uplatňuje v reálnom podnikaní prostredníctvom ich zákazníkov.Práca vo finančne stabilnej spoločnosti s medzinárodným podnikaním.Mesačný bonus, ročný bonus, bonus za vernosť.Home-office niekoľko dní v týždni.Multisport karta.Referral bonus od 1000 do 2000 €.

Title: DevOps Engineer
Description:
Oferta de Empleo: DevOps / DevSecOpsUbicación: Salamanca (presencial)Nivel de inglés: Medio/AltoSector: Fintech, pagos electrónicos, banca
Sobre PaymaticoPaymatico es un proveedor de servicios de pago autorizado por el Banco de España, con una sólida trayectoria en la industria de los pagos. Gracias a nuestra avanzada plataforma tecnológica, nos posicionamos como una de las fintechs más innovadoras y dinámicas del sector, ofreciendo soluciones de pago seguras, ágiles y adaptadas a las necesidades del mercado.
Descripción del puestoBuscamos un DevOps / DevSecOps para unirse a nuestro equipo en Salamanca. En este rol, serás responsable de garantizar la seguridad en todo el ciclo de vida del desarrollo de software, implementando prácticas de seguridad en entornos DevOps y asegurando el cumplimiento de normativas como PSD2, DORA, NIS2, PCI-DSS e ISO27001.
ResponsabilidadesDiseñar e implementar estrategias de seguridad en entornos DevOps.Automatizar controles de seguridad en CI/CD y herramientas de infraestructura como código.Monitorizar y mejorar continuamente la postura de seguridad en sistemas y aplicaciones.Gestionar herramientas de seguridad como SAST, DAST, SIEM, IDS/IPS y WAF.Aplicar principios de Zero Trust y defensa en profundidad en los entornos de Paymatico.Garantizar el cumplimiento de normativas del sector financiero como PSD2, DORA, NIS2, PCI-DSS e ISO27001.Colaborar con equipos de desarrollo y operaciones para integrar seguridad en todo el ciclo de vida del software.Gestionar auditorías de seguridad y responder a incidentes de ciberseguridad.Liderar iniciativas de formación y concienciación sobre seguridad dentro de la empresa, asegurando que todos los equipos adopten las mejores prácticas y fomentando una cultura de seguridad en Paymatico.
Si alguna de estas responsabilidades no las has trabajado en profundidad, pero te entusiasma el puesto, ¡anímate a aplicar! En Paymatico aprenderás y te formarás en todas ellas.
RequisitosExperiencia con herramientas DevSecOps como Terraform, Ansible, Kubernetes, Docker, GitLab CI/CD o similares.Conocimientos en seguridad en la nube (AWS, Azure o GCP).Experiencia en detección y mitigación de vulnerabilidades.Conocimientos en criptografía, gestión de identidades y accesos.Nivel medio/alto de inglés.Se valorará positivamente experiencia en fintech, banca o pagos electrónicos.
BeneficiosFlexibilidad horaria y oficinas en Madrid y Salamanca.Paquete de beneficios sociales.Oportunidades de crecimiento y desarrollo profesional.Ambiente de trabajo dinámico y creativo.Proyectos innovadores y variados.Salario competitivo.
Si te interesa formar parte de una fintech innovadora y te apasiona la seguridad en entornos DevOps / DevSecOps, ¡esperamos tu candidatura!

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
V Albertu jsme hrdí na svoji práci, protože naším cílem je pomáhat Čechům jíst a žít lépe. Každý z našich kolegů odvádí denně neuvěřitelný kus práce, abychom mohli našim zákazníkům nabízet zdravější, šetrnější a lokální potraviny. Proto práce, kterou společně odvádíme, není „jen práce“. Je to práce, která je smysluplná pro nás, pro naše komunity, pro naši zem a pro naši planetu. Je to práce, která dává smysl!

Do týmu IT&Digital hledáme kolegu na pozici specialista Azure. Nebude ale omezený pouze prostředím Azure – potká a bude mít možnost se pohybovat i v jiných databázích (Oracle, MS SQL) a dalších aplikacích, které využíváme pro oblast BI.

Jaký jsme zaměstnavatel

podporujeme zdravý životní styl: sportujeme a relaxujeme se zvýhodněnou kartou MultiSport, používáme aplikaci Zdrabert na podporu fyzického i mentálního zdraví, máme program Prevence s Albertem a pořádáme Dny zdraví, všem zaměstnancům pravidelně rozdáváme ovocné svačiny, na Albert linku pomoci se můžeme v nesnázích obracet my i naši rodinní příslušníciklademe důraz na vyváženost mezi pracovním a osobním životem: zavedli jsme flexibilní pracovní dobu, pětkrát ročně využíváme slevy na rodinný nákupdbáme na společenskou a ekologickou zodpovědnost: jsme největší firemní dárce potravin, papírové účtenky nahrazujeme elektronickými, provozujeme Nadační fond Albert, pravidelně darujeme neprodané potraviny, spolupracujeme s lokálními dodavateli, pořádáme charitativní běhy na podporu dětských domovů, podepsali jsme Chartu diverzityjsme inovativní: rekonstruujeme a modernizujeme svoje prodejny, distribuční centra a kanceláře, v prodejnách instalujeme samoobslužné pokladny a elektronické cenovky, pracujeme s Albert scanem a chytrými váhami, díky věrnostní aplikaci Můj Albert nakupujeme výhodnězaměstnáváme více než 20 000 kolegůjsme součástí nadnárodní skupiny Ahold Delhaizeobsloužíme u nás týdně 4 000 000 zákazníkůpůsobíme na trhu více než 30 let (od roku 1991)máme více než 340 prodejen po celé ČR, 3 distribuční centra a e-shop Albert Online


V našich inzerátech používáme tzv. generické maskulinum, mužský rod pro souhrnné označení mužů i žen.
Primary Description: Albert Česká republika · Praha - východ, Central Bohemia, Czechia (Hybrid)
Company Description:
Jsme tu pro zákazníky už více než tři desetiletí. A pyšníme se jedním prvenstvím – na počátku 90. let jsme otevřeli historicky první novodobý supermarket v Česku. Jmenoval se Mana a zákazníky v Jihlavě poprvé přivítal 6. června 1991. 

Dnes je Albert známou značkou po celém Česku a více než 300 našich obchodů obslouží každý týden čtyři miliony zákazníků. Supermarkety i hypermarkety najdou zákazníci v každém kraji. O zákazníky se stará 20 000 zaměstnanců na různých pozicích a s různými úvazky, kteří pracují v obchodech, ve třech distribučních centrech a v centrální kanceláři v Praze. 

Albert se řadí k největším soukromých zaměstnavatelům v zemi. Jsme odpovědným obchodníkem a záleží nám na tom, abychom byli dobrým sousedem všude tam, kde působíme. Ve více než 300 obchodech Albert chceme být pro naše zákazníky pomocníkem při výběru potravin a inspirovat ke zdravému životnímu stylu. 

V roce 2021 získal Albert ocenění za mimořádnou kvalitu v soutěži EFQM Global Award. Jako jediný zástupce České republiky jsme uspěli v konkurenci firem z celého světa a dosáhli na nejvyšší možné hodnocení. Porota ocenila jasně definovanou strategii rozvoje naší společnosti, důraz na prodej kvalitních produktů podporujících zdravý životní styl, ale také péči o zaměstnance a podporu udržitelných řešení šetrných k přírodě.

V Albertu jsme hrdí na svoji práci, protože naším cílem je pomáhat Čechům jíst a žít lépe. Každý z našich kolegů odvádí denně neuvěřitelný kus práce, abychom mohli našim zákazníkům nabízet zdravější, šetrnější a lokální potraviny. Proto práce, kterou společně odvádíme, není „jen práce“. Je to práce, která je smysluplná pro nás, pro naše komunity, pro naši zem a pro naši planetu.

Je to práce, která dává smysl!
Specialties: Retail,FMCG,Maloobchod,Food&Beverages,Category Management,Commerce,Stores,Distribution Centers,Headquarter,Operations,Fresh

Title: Junior Sales Engineer
Description:
Ready to bridge the gap between technology and sales? Join us as a Junior Sales Engineer and drive innovation with your expertise!
InsTech Netherlands is a dynamic and innovative company at the forefront of smart security inspection technology. Established in 2017 the company has rapidly expanded its presence with offices in Rotterdam and Amsterdam. InsTech Netherlands is committed to pioneering inspection solutions across various industries, including cargo, aviation, mining, food safety, etc.
As a Junior Sales Engineer, you’ll play a crucial role in maintaining and expanding our commercial activities. You’ll act as the linchpin between technology and commerce, supporting our field sales force in delivering top-tier solutions to our customers. From conceptualizing technical and commercial proposals to working closely with specialists and customers, this is a role where your expertise truly makes a difference.
Your role as Junior Sales Engineer
As a Junior Sales Engineer, you’ll be at the forefront of customer interactions, helping translate their needs into technically and commercially viable solutions. You’ll support the sales team by preparing offers, estimating risks, and ensuring smooth project execution. With your expertise in X-ray products and market insights, you’ll advise customers and guide them toward the best solutions.Whether you’re negotiating contracts, optimizing pricing strategies, or visiting clients alongside the sales team, you’ll be shaping the future of security technology while developing strong customer and supplier relationships.
Key responsibilities
Account Management● Build and maintain strong, long-lasting relationships with customers and commercial partners.● Perform active sales activities, including price negotiations, contract discussions, and delivery planning.● Set up and execute account strategies, ensuring growth and business development.● Identify opportunities within market segments and collaborate with sales teams to maximize results.● Oversee aftersales activities and maintain high customer satisfaction.● Ensure smooth and timely delivery of solutions based on customer needs.
Product Management● Conduct market research to identify potential new products and suppliers.● Develop and execute pricing strategies while ensuring profitability and cost efficiency.● Maintain strong partnerships with suppliers to secure optimal product offerings.
Analysis & Strategy● Gain insight into market trends, industry indicators, and customer demands.● Plan and maintain an efficient sales pipeline with clear targets and projected margins.● Ensure compliance with information security policies and manage confidential data securely.
What we’re looking for● You have a bachelor’s degree, preferably in industrial or aviation engineering, and a strong interest in sales and technology.● Fluency in English (Dutch is a plus) with excellent presentation and negotiation skills.● You think strategically, build relationships easily, and know how to identify market opportunities.● You assess risks, calculate costs, and develop commercially sound solutions.● You know how to put the customer first and translate their needs into the best technical solutions.● Familiarity with Microsoft Office 365 and other digital tools.
What we offer● Competitive salary in line with the CAO.● Full-time role for 38 hours per week.● Whether you’re a junior, medior, or senior, we provide mentorship and professional development tailored to your experience.● Innovative work environment: Work with cutting-edge security technology that makes an impact worldwide.● Join a group of experts who value knowledge-sharing and teamwork.
Why join InsTech Netherlands?At InsTech Netherlands, we don’t just sell products - we provide solutions that matter. As a Sales Engineer, you’ll be at the heart of technical and commercial decision-making, playing a key role in delivering industry - leading security solutions.
Ready to take on this exciting challenge? Send your resume to rbos@instechnl.com. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!
Primary Description: InsTech Netherlands · Rotterdam, South Holland, Netherlands (On-site)

InsTech Netherlands is a dynamic and innovative company at the forefront of smart security inspection technology. Title: Data Scientist, Fraud Risk
Description:
JR0123833

Data Scientist, Fraud Risk – Vilnius, Lithuania

Are you passionate about data? Are you ready to join an advanced team in a global company that customers depend on to prevent fraudulent transactions? Are you interested in joining a globally diverse organization where our unique contributions are recognized and celebrated, allowing each of us to thrive? Then join Western Union as a Data Scientist, Fraud Risk.

Western Union powers your pursuit.

Role Responsibilities

Develop and maintain machine learning models to capture fraudulent transactions in real-time while ensuring minimal impact on good customers and lowest false positive rates.Continuously tracking and evaluating the effectiveness of fraud and risk models and rules.Perform big data analysis of WU transactions while leveraging advanced quantitative analytics to identify possible fraud mitigation opportunities and controls to decrease losses or improve customer experience.Prepare monitoring dashboards to monitor and communicate the performance of fraud controls and machine learning models.Ensure timely optimizations are made to improve fraud controls & models upon degradations.Assessment of the impact of deployed risk rules and models and tracking the full flow across different risk stages.Perform clustering, profiling and customer segmentation based on big data of customer behavior and related data variables to identify opportunities to enhance model/rule performance.Lead and participate in data-driven projects that are geared at improving risk controls and customer experience.Conduct ad-hoc data analysis in response to internal and external analytic requests.Provide guidance and mentorship for junior team members.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to improve losses controls and customer experience while translating complex data into actionable insights.Optimize and maintain robotic process automations to improve overall effectiveness and efficiency of risk rules, models, reporting and applied controls.Perform presentations to different audiences on fraud controls, models, improvements and possible opportunities.

Role Requirements

Advanced SQL & Python programming skills.Proficiency at developing machine learning models (supervised and unsupervised).Advanced skills at Excel and Big Data manipulation and presentation.Having advanced degree or extensive proven experience (at least 1 year) or qualification in quantitative related fields (Statistics, Math, Operations Research, etc.) is required.Strong problem solving and analytical skills to analyze problems and produce justification to enhance fraud decisions.Strong communication skills to convey fraud insights.Fluency in English language (oral and written).

Nice To Have

Master's degree in quantitative related field (Statistics, Math, Operations Research etc).Working knowledge of statistical analysis tools like SAS, R, Matlab etc.

We make financial services accessible to humans everywhere. Join us for what’s next.

Western Union is positioned to become the world’s most accessible financial services company —transforming lives and communities. We’re a diverse and passionate customer-centric team of over 8,000 employees serving 200 countries and territories, reaching customers and receivers around the globe. More than moving money, we design easy-to-use products and services for our digital and physical financial ecosystem that help our customers move forward.

Just as we help our global customers prosper, we support our employees in achieving their professional aspirations. You’ll have plenty of opportunities to learn new skills and build a career, as well as receive a great compensation package. If you’re ready to help drive the future of financial services, it’s time for Western Union. Learn more about our purpose and people at https://careers.westernunion.com/.

Salary

The monthly gross base salary range is 2,416 - 3,666 EUR. This range represents the anticipated low and high end of the salary for this position. This role is also eligible to receive an annual bonus that align with individual and company performance. Actual salaries will vary and are based on factors such as a candidate’s qualifications, skills, and competencies.

Benefits

You will also have access to short-term incentives, multiple health insurance options, accident and life insurance, and access to best-in-class development platforms, to name a few (https://careers.westernunion.com/global-benefits/). Please see the location-specific benefits below and note that your Recruiter may share additional role-specific benefits during your interview process or in an offer of employment.

Your Lithuania Specific Benefits Include

Private Health Insurance (3 options)Life & Accident InsuranceAdditional days offWide variety of discounts and special offers⁠Free Fitness facilitiesVolunteering activitiesReferral programRelocation Buddy support upon request

Western Union values in-person collaboration, learning, and ideation whenever possible. We believe this creates value through common ways of working and supports the execution of enterprise objectives which will ultimately help us achieve our strategic goals. By connecting face-to-face, we are better able to learn from our peers, problem-solve together, and innovate.

Our Hybrid Work Model categorizes each role into one of three categories. Western Union has determined the category of this role to be Hybrid. This is defined as a flexible working arrangement that enables employees to divide their time between working from home and working from an office location. The expectation is to work from the office a minimum of three days a week.

We are passionate about diversity. Our commitment is to provide an inclusive culture that celebrates the unique backgrounds and perspectives of our global teams while reflecting the communities we serve. We do not discriminate based on race, color, national origin, religion, political affiliation, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, marital status, or veteran status. The company will provide accommodation to applicants, including those with disabilities, during the recruitment process, following applicable laws.

Estimated Job Posting End Date

03-14-2025

This application window is a good-faith estimate of the time that this posting will remain open. This posting will be promptly updated if the deadline is extended or the role is filled.

Title: Software Engineer
Description:
Software Engineer / Amsterdam / 16 months Freelance Contract / Start ASAP
Job Description: ABOUT THE ROLE:We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Software Engineer II to join our team, focusing on Incident Management and Systems Reliability. In this critical role, you will be instrumental in ensuring the stability and performance of our production systems. You will be responsible for responding to and resolving live production issues, developing long-term solutions, and contributing to the continuous improvement of our systems and processes. Your software engineering expertise will be crucial in providing architectural guidance and contributing to the design, development, and maintenance of robust and scalable software systems.
 KEY RESPONSIBILITIES: Incident Management & Response:- Demonstrate your software engineering skills to diagnose and resolve live production incidents, minimizing customer impact and adhering to SLAs.- Conduct thorough root cause analysis, applying your development knowledge to identify and address underlying code issues and implement preventative measures.- Maintain accurate records of incidents, contributing to postmortem processes and documenting live issues effectively.
 SYSTEMS RELIABILITY ENGINEERING (SRE):- Develop and implement automation to improve system reliability, observability, and incident response.- Contribute to the design and implementation of monitoring and alerting systems.- Participate in capacity planning and performance tuning activities.
 SOFTWARE SYSTEMS DESIGN & DEVELOPMENT:- Contribute to the design, development, and testing of robust and scalable software systems.- Apply software engineering best practices to ensure code quality, maintainability, and performance.- Participate in code reviews and contribute to the improvement of our development processes.  ARCHITECTURAL GUIDANCE:- Provide technical guidance to product teams, ensuring solutions meet functional, non-functional, and architectural requirements.- Challenge application designs and provide context within the broader architectural landscape.- Define clear technical direction by evaluating and aligning target architecture improvements, and effectively communicating architectural designs and decisions to various stakeholders.
CRITICAL THINKING & PROBLEM SOLVING:- Systematically identify patterns and underlying issues in complex situations, applying logical and analytical thinking to develop effective solutions.- Constructively evaluate and refine ideas, plans, and solutions, incorporating external knowledge and initiating SMART improvements with clearly articulated rationales.
 CONTINUOUS QUALITY AND PROCESS IMPROVEMENT:- Identify opportunities for process, system, and structural improvements (e.g., performance gains) by analysing existing workflows, methods, and standards.- Design and implement improvements by defining adapted or new process flows, standards, and practices that enhance business performance.- Maintain data security, integrity, and quality by adhering to company standards and best practices, and mentoring junior team members in these areas.
 COMMUNICATION & COLLABORATION:- Communicate clearly, concisely, and effectively with diverse audiences, tailoring communication style and language appropriately.- Facilitate collaborative problem-solving, achieving mutually agreeable solutions through adaptability, clear communication, and active listening.- Ask insightful follow-up questions to ensure thorough understanding and engage effectively with speakers.
 REQUIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:- Java, Perl, git, Linux, MySQL, Kubernetes, Kafka worked with, Linux, work/collaborate within an agile team- Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) are a good to have- 3-5+ years of software engineering experience,- Strong understanding of software engineering principles and best practices.- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.- Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, agile environment.
ON-CALL ROTATION:This role may require participation in an on-call rotation to provide support for production systems outside of normal business hours.Ava, Perl, GIT, Linux, MySQL, Kubernetes, Kafka worked with, Linux, work/collaborate within an agile teamAWS is good to have

Title: Python Developer
Description:
InvasysInvasys is an R&D company specializing in providing governments with security technology aimed at preventing terrorism, insurgency, and organized crime. We develop and manufacture mission critical hardware and software used in the most demanding environments and focus on extensive in-house research & development in the area of mobile phone and satellite communication.
Our philosophy is to give smart people freedom to solve tasks as they see most fitting. 
ContextInvasys has a project-oriented structure and delivers both standard and customised solutions to government customers like police and security services. Our engineering teams, supported by a creative and innovative team of scientists, work hard to deliver solutions the market has not seen before. The person we are looking for is creative and not afraid to do think outside the box but knows the value of a structured and predictable work environment. Both senior and junior candidates are encouraged to apply. As a Python developer you will work in a team with other developers, but also cyber security specialists. The customers are government security organizations with highly specialized requirements making this both challenging and rewarding. We seek those who are individually strong, but whom are also team players bringing out the best in their colleagues, helping the team maintain code quality. Most of the time you will work in a Czech speaking environment, but at least basic knowledge of English is required. The position offers good opportunities for the right person.

Title: Senior Security Consultant
Description:
Je gaat aan de slag in een breed georiënteerde functie, waarbij je adviezen geeft aan opdrachtgevers over integrale beveiligingsvraagstukken. Het uitvoeren van gedetailleerde risicoanalyses om potentiële bedreigingen en kwetsbaarheden te identificeren. Het ontwerpen van beveiligingssystemen die zowel bouwkundige als elektronische maatregelen omvatten, het opstellen van een beveiligingsbeleid, maar ook het opstellen van documenten ten behoeve van aanbestedingen kan onderdeel uitmaken van je werkzaamheden. Indien er over wordt gegaan tot implementatie van maatregelen is het mogelijk dat je dit verder begeleidt, afhankelijk van de behoefte van de opdrachtgever.
Voorbeelden van werkzaamheden zijn:
• Het uitvoeren en uitwerken van gedetailleerde risicoanalyses om potentiële bedreigingen en kwetsbaarheden te identificeren.• Verantwoordelijk zijn voor het uitwerken van beveiligingsbeleid, programma’s van eisen, audits, procedures en bijvoorbeeld security awareness trainingen.• Het geven van advies aan klanten over de beste beveiligingsoplossingen op basis van hun specifieke behoeften en de resultaten van de risicoanalyse.• Het ontwerpen van beveiligingssystemen die zowel bouwkundige als elektronische maatregelen omvatten.• Het geven van advies over de integratie van diverse beveiligingssystemen, zoals toegangscontrole, cameraobservatie en alarmsystemen, om een samenhangend en effectief beveiligingsnetwerk te realiseren.• Ervoor zorgen dat alle voorgestelde maatregelen voldoen aan de relevante wet- en regelgeving en industrie-standaarden.• Het coördineren van de implementatie van beveiligingsmaatregelen, inclusief het beheren van budgetten, tijdlijnen en het samenwerken met andere professionals zoals bouwkundigen en IT-specialisten.• Toepassen van jouw uitgebreide kennis en ervaring in techniek en organisatie• Focussen op zowel strategische, organisatorische als technische aspecten van beveiliging.• Creëren van draagvlak bij verschillende interne stakeholders van klanten.• Samenwerken met een team van ervaren (technische, IT en organisatorische) security experts bij R&T Consultancy, waarbij kennisdeling een groot pluspunt is.• Bijdragen aan de verdere toekomst van R&T Consultancy binnen een hecht en enthousiast team.
Dit krijg je van ons
• Een arbeidsovereenkomst voor 32 tot 40 uur;• Uitdagende en inspirerende projecten die jouw ambitie stimuleren;• Een open, authentieke en dynamische bedrijfscultuur;• Onderdeel van een klein en hecht team van leuke en ervaren collega’s;• Aandacht voor jouw werk/privé balans;• Je hebt de vrijheid om je eigen werkzaamheden in te plannen;• We bieden je een Hybride werkomgeving;• Een vergoeding die aansluit bij marktstandaarden
Wat vragen we van jou als security consultant?
• HBO werk en denkniveau; en taakvolwassenheid;• Minimaal 5 jaar relevante werkervaring binnen het domein van fysieke security in complexe en/of politiek gedreven organisaties;• Afgeronde opleiding Security Management of Integrale Veiligheidskunde (beide op HBO niveau);• Je hebt een vlotte pen en goede communicatie- en presentatie skills, in het Nederlands en het Engels;• Je hebt een uitgebreid en up-to-date technisch en organisatorisch inzicht in fysieke beveiligingsmaatregelen en bent volledig onafhankelijk van marktpartijen;• Je bent analytisch, gestructureerd en nauwkeurig;• Je bent discreet, resultaatgericht en durft verantwoordelijkheid nemen;• Je bent uiterst klantgericht en begrijpt perfect wat klanten nodig hebben en zet jouw ervaring en deskundigheid in om tot het gewenste resultaat te komen;• Je bent betrokken en maakt graag deel uit van een team.• Flexibele opstelling met betrekking tot taken en werktijden
Solliciteer directStuur een e-mail met je cv en motivatie naar carolien.callewaert@rtsecurity.eu. Geef duidelijk aan dat je solliciteert voor de vacature bij R&T Consultancy Nederland
Company Description:
R&T consultancy is an independent consultancy firm specialized in security in the broadest sense of the word. You have come to the right place for all your security and safety issues and can count on 100% independent advice, giving you the guarantee that the recommended solutions are fully tailored to your needs and have a measurable impact on your business processes.

R&T consultancy was founded with the mission of:
"Offering integrated and result-oriented security solutions in line with the client’s corporate culture and strategy, so that independence, professionalism, partnership and creativity are central."

R&T consultancy belongs to the R&T Group, which also includes the companies Robrechts & Thienpont, SCOPE and Praetorian Engineering. Together, these companies have more than 55 years of experience in security consultancy, each with their own focus or specialisation.

EXTENSIVE EXPERIENCE
As a group, we have built up years of experience in high-risk environments and critical infrastructure and we realized more than 500 security projects at home and abroad. We have a large customer portfolio in public and private companies, SME’s, and multinationals, giving us a very broad view on security and safety. 

ALLROUND EXPERTISE
Security and safety are complex matters that are constantly evolving, requiring both technical skills (engineering) and organisational skills (policy and process). Our multidisciplinary team consists of a unique mix of engineers, criminologists, and security generalists. Our experts follow the evolutions in the field of electronic, architectural, and organisational security solutions (so that you can fully focus on your core business).

Title: Full Stack Developer

Your Profile5+ years of experience developing web applications in mid- or large-scale production systems using a major programming languageExperience developing web applications with Node.js and TypeScriptExperiences with relational databases like MySQL or PostgresExperiences with at least one modern frontend technology (e.g. React, Vue.js, Angular)Interest in utilizing microservices architectureInterest in utilizing cloud services on AWSFluent written and verbal communication skills in English

Overpayment offered based on experience.Embrace the freedom of flexible, no core hours and take charge of your own scheduleExperience the best of both worlds with our hybrid work setup – work from your cozy home office or our lovely office in the 2nd districtWork in the office located in the heart of the most livable city, that waits for you to bring out the best of itEnjoy a full-time, 35-hour work week, with every second Friday offStay active and healthy with a monthly sports budget to book your favorite activities at Eversports – it's time to have fun while staying active!Invest in yourself with a €500 training budget and 5 extra vacation days for further trainings and self-improvementExplore your areas of interest during our quarterly “Day to explore”Embrace innovation with state-of-the-art equipment, whether you're an Apple enthusiast, a Windows Apple wizard, or a Linux Apple lover, you tell us what you need!Enjoy our monthly company lunch completely organized and paid by the companyJoin our after-work (sport) activities and exciting cross-national team eventsLast but not least, be a part of the passionate, international, innovative and, of course, sporty team – let’s make work feel like play!
At Eversports we acknowledge and value the strength in diversity which is why we have 100+ employees from over 25 different countries. Alongside our strong value for diversity is our emphasis on respect towards others. Every employee has a voice and the opportunity to contribute towards developing our company. Title: IT Data Engineer & System Developer
Description:
PartnerRe is a leading, privately owned, multi-line global reinsurer with a reputation of financial stability and strength, and a commitment to rebuilding businesses and communities after risk events around the world.

Our mission is to continue to be a financially stable and predictable business partner, supporting our clients with solutions tailored to their needs, delivering superior returns to our owner, providing rewarding opportunities for our people and making a positive contribution to society. To achieve this, we live by our values of Integrity, Performance, Collaboration, Straightforward Communication and Respect and Care.

Core to The PartnerRe Experience is our global nature. No matter where you sit in the company, you are part of something bigger. Our teams represent our truly international mindset, forging connections across office locations and all levels of the organization and building a network of mutual success. The result is a day-to-day experience that will allow you to:
