Make an impact

View Home - PartnerRe Experience e-book to find out more about what it’s like to work at PartnerRe.

We are always looking for bright, proactive individuals to join our team!

Please follow our Careers page for all updates on new positions. We look forward to receiving your application.

PartnerRe is an equal opportunities employer.

Please join our company LinkedIn Page for all updates on new positions that are coming live.



Job Description

About this job:

Play a crucial role in supporting the Finance & Actuarial teams and operational team’s technological needs, ensuring seamless operations and efficient workflows. This role involves integrating third-party applications and cloud services, developing, and maintaining applications as well as data interfaces, extracting, transforming, loading & reporting key financial & actuarial data that enhance productivity and streamline PartnerRe information systems.

 

About the role:

This role involves troubleshooting and maintaining existing dataflows and automated processes written in SQL, e.g. DataVirtuality and other ETL tools as well as developing and maintaining new web-based services and cloud-based applications. This implies to work closely with Business Analysts in order to design together the best IT solution to fulfill business requirements and includes the ability to:

Add new features and functionalities to existing applications & ETLs based on evolving functional needs.Update and improve existing functionalities for enhanced performance and user experience.Identify, diagnose, and resolve ETLs & software defects (bug fixes).Improve ETLs & application resilience and efficiency through code optimization and architectural enhancements.Perform necessary framework upgrades and address security vulnerabilities to maintain application security and compatibility.Collaborate with Business Experts to understand information needs, system flows, data usage, and work processes for new software development projects.Investigate problem areas and propose solutions.Develop ETLs and software solutions.Contribute to technical documentation.Conduct unit and regression testing, and support user acceptance testing.Prepare and document ETLs and software installations.Provide second-level support for developed ETLs & applications.

Qualifications

5+ years of experience in developing and maintaining technical solutions.Proficiency in SQL, PL/SQL, ETLs & orchestration handling a large volume of data a must.Experience in Data Virtuality and Snowflake a plus..NET/C# experience, User Interface development and web-app development using MudBlazor and/or AngularExperience in deploying cloud native applications, DevSecOps, and familiarity with Microsoft Azure cloud environment would be a plus.Ability to report on data through any reporting tool such as Power BI / BOExperience in agile / SCRUM frameworkUnderstanding of Finance, Reinsurance and Actuarial industry

Additional Information

Education / Further requirements

Information Technology / Computer Science or equivalent educationAt least 5 years of professional experienceProficiency in English is a must (writing and speaking).Based in Dublin 



PartnerRe provides a working environment in which diversity is valued, where all employees feel welcome, respected, and empowered to perform at their best. We invite you to learn more about D&I at PartnerRe.

Thank you,

PartnerRe Hiring Team

As an international reinsurer with a robust capital base, we are a market leader with a reputation of financial stability and strength, and a commitment to rebuilding businesses and communities after risk events around the world.

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
Jobbeskrivning

Bli en nyckelspelare i framtidens datalösningar på Sopra Steria i Malmö! 

Vill du arbeta på utmanande och spännande konsultuppdrag inom data engineering, där du får skapa skalbara lösningar för våra kunder med den senaste tekniken? Vi söker flera drivna Data Engineers som trivs med att ta ansvar, arbeta nära verksamheten och leverera datadrivna insikter i toppklass! Har du några års erfarenhet och vill fortsätta utvecklas, eller har du en senior profil och letar efter nästa stora utmaning? Vi letar efter dig!

Vad vi erbjuder 

Uppdrag hos ledande företag och organisationer, exempelvis projekt med Microsoft Fabric eller Azure - där vi stöttar våra kunder både på resan att etablera och migrera till nya molnplattformar, och för att utveckla existerande lösningar. Möjlighet att leda arbetet hos kunderna med dataplattformar och lösningar i tvärfunktionella team, och agera mentor och coach internt på Sopra Steria. En roll där du påverkar hela processen från strategi och arkitektur till utveckling och testning. Samt påverkar vår tillväxt i Malmö. 

Som Data Engineer kommer du att exemplevis: 

Skapa och optimera dagens och framtidens dataplattformar: Microsoft Fabric och Azure Bidra till att framtidssäkra kunders dataplattform genom migreringsprojekt till molnet. Använda dig av olika tekniker och resurser för att uppnå önskade resultat: SQL Server, Azure Databricks, Azure Data Factory, Data Lake, Lakehouse etc. Bidra till framtagandet av skalbara och effektiva arkitekturer som medallion- och lakehouse-modeller. Samarbeta i hela utvecklingscykeln – från idé och kravställning till utveckling, testning och leverans, för att säkerställa framtidens Business Intelligence. 

Din profil 

Vi säker både dig med väldigt gedigen erfarenhet som samlat både bredden och djupet, och du som har erfarenhet av och behärskar stora delar av:

Erfarenhet av Microsoft Fabric Data warehouse byggda på SQL Server, inklusive lagrade procedurer, vyer och tabulära modeller, SSIS, SSAS etc. Erfarenhet av Azure-tjänster som ADF, Key Vaults och Data Lake, Databricks etc. Goda kunskaper i Azure Databricks och dataanalys. Trivs i konsultrollen. 

Meriterande: Power BI, Python, erfarenhet av medallionarkitektur, AI, Data Science

Varför välja oss? 

Vi erbjuder en dynamisk och flexibel arbetsmiljö där du kan arbeta remote vid behov, samtidigt som du är en del av spännande projekt med hög påverkan. Du får möjlighet att utvecklas inom teknik och innovation tillsammans med kompetenta kollegor och kunder i framkant.

Ansök idag och bli en del av vår vision att skapa Malmös bästa konsult-team! 🚀

Ytterligare information

Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.
Primary Description: Sopra Steria · Malmo, Skåne County, Sweden (On-site)
Company Description:
Sopra Steria, a major Tech player in Europe with 52,000* employees in nearly 30 countries, is recognised for its consulting, digital services and solutions. It helps its clients drive their digital transformation and obtain tangible and sustainable benefits. The Group provides end-to-end solutions to make large companies and organisations more competitive by combining in-depth knowledge of a wide range of business sectors and innovative technologies with a collaborative approach. Sopra Steria places people at the heart of everything it does and is committed to putting digital to work for its clients in order to build a positive future for all. In 2023, the Group generated revenues of €5.8 billion.

*Headcount reassessed following the sale of most Sopra Banking Software activities in September 2024. 

The world is how we shape it

Title: Praxismanager:in (m/w/d) in neuer Tierarztpraxis in Frankfurt!
Description:
filu what?Wir denken Tierarztpraxis neu! Als tierärztlich geführtes Unternehmen revolutionieren wir die Tierarztpraxis mit innovativen, personalisierten Ansätzen und unserer einzigartigen "filu-sophie". Unsere Vision #happyvetshappypets steht für eine bessere Erfahrung für Haustiere, Tierhalter:innen und Tiermediziner:innen. Wir bieten ein Arbeitsumfeld, in dem du dich entfalten, weiterentwickeln, aktiv mitgestalten kannst und in dem deine Arbeit angemessen wertgeschätzt wird.
Gestartet sind wir mit zwei Tierarztpraxen in München. Mit Praxiseröffnungen in Düsseldorf, Hamburg, Köln und weiteren Städten bauen wir unser Praxisnetzwerk derzeit deutschlandweit aus!
Werde Teil unseres Teams und gestalte mit uns die Zukunft der Tiermedizin!
Deine Rolle als Praxismanager:in (m/w/d)Ideal geeignet für diese Schlüsselrolle) bist du, wenn du ein Organisationsgenie bist, gerne administrativ arbeitest und dich dafür begeisterst, Prozesse aufzusetzen, zu verbessern und ihre Umsetzung im Team voranzubringen. Dabei bist du immer für dein Team da und hast große Freude daran, ein außergewöhnliches Erlebnis für Tierhalter:innen, unsere tierischen Patienten und unser medizinisches Team zu schaffen.
Klingt spannend?Dann lies weiter und bewirb dich noch heute schnell und unkompliziert über unser Bewerbungsformular oder schreib uns eine kurze E-Mail an jobs@filu.vet – dein CV genügt uns für den ersten Eindruck!

Title: Software Engineer (Data)
Description:
Your Role You will join our Rotterdam based Investment Engineering team, in some cases working together with the larger engineering team in London and Malaga, to help development of Data Pipelines, ETL processes and Python tooling to make Cardano’s Sustainable Investment business more robust, scalable and efficient. You work directly together with the business to convert their needs into software solutions that is compatible with our stack, design philosophy and architecture. You develop a good understanding of financial markets and pension funds to maintain a conversation with the business and think along with their problem statement. We believe in picking the best tool for the job. Our stack consists of a variety of technologies that can best solve a specific problem. You have a voice in using, reducing or expanding that stack. The developer would be expected to work collaboratively and share their knowledge with other team members and contribute to the improvement of the platform, practices and patterns and technology stack. They would actively participate in our culture of learning program to stay current with industry trends, to train and to participate in the data engineering community. This is an opportunity for a bright and enthusiastic individual to learn, grow and make a significant contribution to the technology, business productivity and efficiency.  
Key responsibilities The responsibilities will consist of solving Cardano Sustainable Investment team’s business problems by delivering in-house software solutions together with the Investment Engineering team. Core tasks include: Use your Software Engineering skills to provide complete solutions using best practices, ensuring performance and reliability. There is typically no middle person between you and the business and together with the business you convert their needs into software that is compatible with our stack, design philosophy and architecture. You develop a good understanding of financial markets, financial risk management and pension funds in order to maintain a conversation with the business and think along with their problem statement. Work closely with the DataOps, DevOps, infrastructure platform team and other data project teams to ensure your projects use the most appropriate technology consistent with the firm’s strategic tools. Staying abreast of changing technologies, and continuous learning of innovative approaches to data and software engineering and technologies and bring those ideas into the firm. As part of the software engineering support rota, approximately one day every two weeks within working hours, provide production monitoring, and management of applications, API’s, overnight batches, and data feeds into, and out of the firm.  
Skills Required To perform the role effectively, you will need the following skills: Good programming skills with minimum 2 years production experience in dealing with data Experience working with Python Experience in writing and maintaining automated tests (unit, integration …) Experience working with databases Experience with integrating with 3rd party APIs and Systems is a bonus Experience with Data Lake technologies is a bonus Experience with Big Data Technologies such as Airflow, Hive, NiFi is a bonus  
What we need from you Candidates see technology as a means, not as an end. Candidates know what good architecture and good code are and always strive for it. They also understand that languages change so they have the skills that can be applied to any future language Candidates display strong communicative skills and understand that programming in a team has a significant social component, both in interacting daily within your team and with business stakeholders. Motivated to learn and grow in the role. Like working with the broader engineering team including Infrastructure and DevOps as well as business developers and users. Proven ability of taking ownership of tasks and drive them to completion. Strong, clear and concise communication skills – verbal, written & interpersonal.  
What Cardano offers you Cardano offers good employment conditions in addition to ample development opportunities. In addition to your salary, you will receive a 13th month, a variable remuneration scheme, a free lunch when you work at the office (we work hybrid – 2 days in the office + 3 days at home). Cardano is located in Rotterdam right opposite the Central Station and a 1st class train card (if you live outside Rotterdam) is also part of the employment conditions. 
 Next to this your job will provide you: Challenging work with a good working atmosphere Many opportunities for personal and professional growth.  
 Who we are Cardano was founded in 2000. At Cardano, we believe that security around wealth and the standard of living it offers contributes greatly to the quality of life. We ensure that financial institutions with a pivotal role in society for citizens - such as insurers, pension funds and banks - can cope with the major changes that are coming their way. Changes as a result of the transition to a sustainable society are central to this. We advise and implement sustainable investment policies for them.  Cardano has offices in the UK (London, Nottingham) and the Netherlands (Rotterdam), where more than 600 highly experienced specialists work.  Cardano has become part of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) as of November 1, 2024, working closely with Mercer. 
GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) / Privacy notice Cardano collects and processes personal data about its applicants. How Cardano uses and protects this data, and your rights in relation to this data are set out in the Cardano Privacy notice. This Privacy notice applies to all personal data Cardano collects and processes about you and can be found on our Company Website.

•	Advisory: A specialist provider of pensions advisory services, including covenant, sustainability, strategic investment issues, risk transfer, and corporate and regulatory events, serving over 350 scheme and corporate clients. Our scheme clients have aggregated assets of over £400bn.

Cardano has £52bn of assets under management and £22bn of assets under advice as at 31 December 2023. 
 
•	DC: We manage over £20bn in DC assets across the UK and the Netherlands. In the UK, we operate NOW: Pensions, an award-winning UK workplace pension provider, serving over 2m members and tens of thousands of employers from a wide range of industry sectors.

Title: Python Software Engineer
Description:
Summary

Join ESET, a global leader in cybersecurity, and become a part of our dynamic Big Data team. We are looking for a skilled Python Software Engineer to contribute to the development and maintenance of cutting-edge Big Data technologies and internal solutions aimed at combating web security threats, including automated detection logic and research.

Job Description

As an experienced Python-oriented Big Data Engineer, you will be at the forefront of advancing our big data technologies, leveraging Kubernetes. Your primary responsibilities will include back-end development, managing terabytes of data on distributed storage systems such as Impala, ScyllaDB, and Apache Druid, working with messaging systems like Apache Kafka, querying data using SQL or in-house alternatives, and processing data in parallel using tools like Apache Spark and Flink.

In this role, you will join our Automated Systems and Intelligent Solutions Department, located in Bratislava, Brno, or Prague. You will design, implement, and maintain scalable data workflows and pipelines that drive our data-driven decisions. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure the efficient handling and transformation of massive datasets, enhancing our detection systems.

Additionally, you will create monitoring scripts and data pipelines to automate processing.

What We Are Looking For:

While you don’t need to have mastered everything listed below, we are seeking a professional with the following skills and experience:

Proficiency in Python programming (experience with Java and C/C++ is also a plus).Hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes, SQL, and RESTful API frameworks (e.g., Flask).Expertise with Apache Kafka and its role in messaging and streaming systems.Solid understanding of NoSQL database such as ScyllaDB, Apache Druid, or HBase.Knowledge of the Linux and Windows operating systems.Familiarity with Jenkins for CI/CD pipelines and automation.Experience with version control systems like Git.

Candidate Profile:

We are looking for a motivated professional with a Master’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science or Cybersecurity. Your background should demonstrate strong Python programming skills and a commitment to writing clear, maintainable code. Proficiency in Linux, scripting, and container technologies (Docker, Kubernetes) is essential. A hands-on understanding of computer security, network security, or reverse engineering will distinguish you from other candidates.

What We Offer:

This position provides a unique opportunity to enhance your expertise in cutting-edge Big Data technologies and methodologies. You will work on challenging, large-scale systems and play a crucial role in shaping the future of our data-driven initiatives.

Basic wage component (brutto): from 2500 EUR

* The final basic wage component can be increased accordingly to individual skills and experience of the selected candidate.

* Performance bonus 2 times per year up to 10% of the basic salary paid for the evaluation period(usually 6 months).

Benefits

Health & well-being

BenefitPlusHealthcare (check-ups/annual programs)Multisport cardTravel card "električenka"Supplementary pension savingSick days

Get to know us:

Bratislava is the true home of ESET, housing the world headquarters of the company.

The majority of ESET software is developed in the heart of Technology Division based in Bratislava.

It is as well the center of ESET research and other HQ divisions – like finance, operations, sales and business, communication and marketing.

Along the fact that ESET in Bratislava is the business global business HQ, it is regional sales center for the region of Europe, Middle East and Africa – and of our business activities in Slovakia – as well.

Established: 1992

At ESET, diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are integral to our corporate culture. We believe in creating a respectful environment, where everyone feels valued and respected, welcoming applications from individuals of all backgrounds, including race, gender, age, religion, disability, and sexual orientation.
Company Description:
For more than 30 years we have been here helping to watch over and protect progress.  Over a billion users worldwide rely upon ESET’s solutions to stay secure from increasingly sophisticated digital threats. ESET´s award-winning IT security software and services provide protection in over 200 countries and territories worldwide, with its software localized into more than 30 languages. 

Meanwhile, the world continues to move forward at pace. When ESET was founded, the Internet was in its infancy. Now technology is part of everything we do and is central to the continued advancements in our society. Most of the time technology does just what it is supposed to, but in order to ensure continued progress in the digital age we need someone to question what’s going on in the background.

And that’s why we are here – to continue protecting technology from threats, enabling everyone to fully embrace it’s potential and rely on it. 
Put simply - when technology enables progress, ESET is here to protect it.

Title: Manager ICT en informatiemanagement
Description:
Plek voor jou, Manager ICT en informatiemanagementAmsterdam NoordFulltime (32-36 uur)€ 4.750 tot € 6.498 (o.b.v. 36 uur)

Zoek jij een plek waar je jouw expertise en talenten inzet voor een belangrijk maatschappelijk doel? TintelTuin is die plek. Al ruim 40 jaar bieden we eersteklas kinderopvang en zijn we een begrip in de regio’s Amsterdam Noord, Zaanstreek en Waterland. En dat willen we in de toekomst ook blijven. Kwaliteit staat bij ons voorop. Dat zie je onder andere terug in ons meerjarenplan, onze pedagogische visie en de inrichting van onze locaties en hoofdkantoor.

Bij TintelTuin word je gewaardeerd om wie je bent en wat je meebrengt. Je krijg alle vrijheid en verantwoordelijkheid om je vak uit te oefenen. Samen zorgen we ervoor dat jouw talenten passen bij je werkzaamheden. En je kunt je talenten bij ons ook verder ontwikkelen, op een manier die bij jou past. Je werkt op ons prachtige kantoor in Amsterdam en in overleg thuis.

We werken met betrokken en bevlogen mensen die het hart op de juiste plek hebben. Die samen een hecht team vormen. Dat zich sterk verbonden voelt met elkaar en met TintelTuin. Samen zorgen we ervoor dat onze kinderen kunnen groeien en bloeien. En dat ouders en alle collega’s hun wereld ten volle kunnen benutten.

Klaar voor je nieuwe plek? We horen heel graag van je.

Meer informatie
Lees op https://tinteltuin.nl/kantoor/ meer over werken op kantoor bij TintelTuin.

Functieomschrijving
Als Manager ICT en Informatiemanagement bij TintelTuin speel je een cruciale rol in het optimaliseren, beheren en benutten van IT-middelen en informatie. Je ontwikkelt en implementeert het ICT- en informatiebeleid, waarbij je zorgt dat systemen voldoen aan de veiligheidsnormen en data op de juiste manier worden ontsloten. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het netwerk, de hardware en software en geeft leiding aan het ICT-team, dat momenteel bestaat uit drie applicatiebeheerders. Naast strategische projecten ben je er ook voor het team, help je bij het stellen van prioriteiten en bied je de nodige ondersteuning. Ook werk je nauw samen met de projectmanager Data & Duurzaamheid en andere TintelTuin collega’s.

In de afgelopen periode zijn veel ICT-diensten succesvol uitbesteed, wat goed werkt voor TintelTuin. Het onderhouden en waar nodig uitbreiden of aanpassen van deze samenwerkingen is een belangrijk aandachtspunt. Ook kijk je kritisch naar de huidige verdeling van verantwoordelijkheden.

Jouw taken en verantwoordelijkheden:Ontwikkelen en vertalen van strategisch ICT- en informatiebeleid naar concrete projecten en investeringsplannen.Waarborgen van informatiebeveiliging en privacy volgens geldende wet- en regelgeving.Aansturen van het ICT-team en externe leveranciers om een veilige, betrouwbare en up-to-date IT-omgeving te garanderen.Beheren en onderhouden van het netwerk, hardware en software, met optimale ondersteuning van eindgebruikers.Gevraagd en ongevraagd adviseren van het directieteam over strategische ICT-vraagstukken en nieuwe toepassingsmogelijkheden.

Jouw plek
Bij TintelTuin willen wij dat alle kinderen zelfverzekerd de wereld in stappen en dat ouders én collega’s hun ambities waar kunnen maken.

Daarom bieden we eersteklas kinderopvang aan waar iedereen zich thuis voelt. Samen worden we nog beter.

Het DNA van TintelTuin laat zich in 4 woorden vangen: samen, stabiel, leergierig & innovatief en plezier (nou 5 dan..):Samen: we zijn betrokken bij de maatschappij, ouders en kinderen. Met en voor elkaar.Stabiel: met 40 jaar ervaring weten we wat kinderen, ouders en medewerkers nodig hebben.Leergierig & innovatief: we zijn nieuwsgierig van aard en innoveren door met vernieuwende oplossingen.Plezier: dat is waar het om draait. Bij TintelTuin is het niet alleen chill voor kinderen, maar ook voor medewerkers!

Wij kunnen niet wachten tot jij ons komt versterken!

Wat kan je van ons verwachten?
Om te beginnen bieden we jou natuurlijk salaris, eindejaarsuitkering, reiskostenregeling en 6 weken vakantie conform de cao Kinderopvang. Maar daar bovenop bieden we je nog een flink aantal mooie extra’s. We noemen er een paar:Een plek waar jouw talenten tot hun recht komen.Veel ontwikkelingsmogelijkheden.Mogelijkheid tot hybride werken.Aandacht voor jouw vitaliteit, waarbij beweging, voeding, rust en werkgeluk centraal staan en we je regelmatig verassen met leuke attenties.Sporten met korting en mogelijkheid tot flinke korting bij aanschaf van een (elektrische) fiets.Een mooi inwerkprogramma met een gezellige en leerzame introductiedag waarbij je al je nieuwe collega’s leert kennen en kennismaakt met de medewerkers van ons servicekantoor.

Bekijk op https://tinteltuin.nl/werken-bij/arbeidsvoorwaarden/ alle arbeidsvoorwaarden en extra’s van TintelTuin.

Wat vragen we van jou?
Wij zoeken een gedreven en ervaren professional met een heldere visie op ICT en informatiemanagement. Je hebt brede kennis van zowel de technische als functionele kant van ICT: van infrastructuur, werkplekken en wifi tot applicatiebeheer en softwareoplossingen. Je begrijpt de uitdagingen binnen dit vakgebied en kunt tactisch handelen in een complexe organisatie. Je bent sociaal en communicatief sterk, een verbinder die geduldig en goed kan luisteren naar verschillende collega’s en stakeholders. Daarnaast ben je proactief en doortastend, weet je je verhaal overtuigend over te brengen en ben je een stevige gesprekspartner op strategisch niveau.

Wat we vragen:Hbo-/wo-werk- en denkniveau, met een afgeronde opleiding in informatiekunde, bedrijfskunde of informatica.Ruime ervaring in ICT- en informatiemanagement, met kennis van projectmatig en procesgericht werken.Sterke communicatieve vaardigheden, tact en overtuigingskracht om stakeholders mee te nemen en draagvlak te creëren.Analytisch vermogen en een proactieve, resultaatgerichte instelling om ICT-uitdagingen om te zetten in effectieve oplossingen.Ervaring met Microsoft 365 of AFAS is een pre.

Je speelt een belangrijke rol in het vertalen van ontwikkelingen naar een toekomstbestendig ICT- en informatiebeleid. Samen met collega’s en externe partners zorg je voor een betrouwbare en veilige IT-omgeving die bijdraagt aan de doelstellingen van TintelTuin.

Sollicitatieproces
Lees op https://tinteltuin.nl/werken-bij/sollicitatieproces/ meer over het sollicitatieproces.

Klaar voor je nieuwe plek? Dan nodigen we je van harte uit om te solliciteren.
Company Description:
Je bent ergens pas echt thuis als je je op je plek voelt. En dat geldt ook voor waar je werkt. TintelTuin is zo’n plek. Waar je elke dag met plezier naartoe gaat omdat je je gezien, gehoord en gewaardeerd voelt. Omdat je deel uitmaakt van een hecht team. En omdat je voelt dat je mooi en belangrijk werk doet: kinderen spelenderwijs helpen groeien. Terwijl je zelf ook alle ruimte krijgt om te groeien en te bloeien.

✅   Met meer dan 40 jaar ervaring zijn we een begrip in de regio
✅   90+ locaties in de regio’s Amsterdam, Zaanstreek en Waterland
✅   Onze eigen BBL-klassen
✅   Exclusieve baby-, dreumes- en peuteropvang
✅   Met medewerkers die zich altijd blijven ontwikkelen
✅   Hechte samenwerking met schoolbesturen Agora in Zaanstad en Innoord in Amsterdam

Lijkt je dat wat? Mooi. Want we zijn hard op zoek naar nieuwe, goede collega’s. Oriënteer je op deze website, maar kom vooral eens langs om zelf te ontdekken hoe het voelt, zo’n plek.

TintelTuin. Jouw plek.

Why us?

Flexible work options - work from home for up to three days a week an join us in the office for the remaining two days in Berlin 28 Vacation Days - plus Christmas & New Year’s Eve (half day)Competitive Compensation - Attractive salary & equity optionsContinuous Learning - Support for your professional growth and developmentTeam & Social Events - Quarterly gatherings, regular socials, and Thursday drinks on the houseChallenging & Supportive Culture - Work with motivated colleagues in an environment where you can grow, achieve, and enjoy the journeyLong-Term Growth - A stable career path in a fast-growing companyWelcoming Team - A people-first culture where joy at work and future prospects come first

About Us

Baobab's mission is to protect SMEs against cyber attacks better.

We rethink Cyber protection for SMEs by integrating Cyber Insurance with preventive cyber security services.

Like the Baobab tree, Baobab stands for security and support in all circumstances. We help our partners, as well as customers, to better understand cyber (risks). We not only focus on remediation after an incident but also reduce the likelihood of such an event.

We are supported by renowned investors such as Project A, and La Famiglia. In Zurich Insurance, we also have a solid partner with whom we have made a dynamic start as a risk carrier in the market.

Why is cyber insurance important for SMEs? Regardless of size, every business has vulnerabilities that cybercriminals can exploit. Just because a company is small doesn't mean it can't be a target of a cyber-attack. The cyber sector is so fast-moving that there is always a residual risk here, which should then be insured.

We believe that diversity in the team makes the company stronger. We do not discriminate on the basis of religion, skin color, nationality, gender, sexual orientation, or disability and welcome applications from all backgrounds. Apply now to become part of our team!

The research project is co-financed by Investitionsbank Berlin (IBB) and the European Regional Development Fund (ERDF).

Title: Geschäftsführung (m/w/d) für angewandte Cybersicherheitsforschung in Heilbronn
Description:
Ort: Heilbronn
Geschäftsführung für angewandte Cybersicherheitsforschung in Heilbronn
Die Fraunhofer-Gesellschaft (www.fraunhofer.de) betreibt in Deutschland derzeit 76 Institute und Forschungs-einrichtungen und ist eine der führenden Organisationen für anwendungsorientierte Forschung. Rund 32 000 Mitarbeitende erarbeiten das jährliche Forschungsvolumen von 3,4 Milliarden Euro.
Das Fraunhofer SIT sucht für seinen neuen Standort ab sofort eine Person für die Geschäftsführung in dem neuen Forschungs- und Innovationszentrum für Cybersicherheit in Heilbronn. Die Aufgabe der Geschäftsführung besteht in der Organisation und Steuerung der angewandten Cybersicherheitsforschung am neuen Standort und in der Koordination der Forschung und Entwicklung in Abstimmung mit dem Hauptstandort des Fraunhofer SIT und dem Nationalen Forschungszentrum für angewandte Cybersicherheit ATHENE in Darmstadt.
Heilbronn gehört zu den Standorten, die sich in Deutschland in den Bereichen der Innovation, Technologie-ent-wick-lung und Wissenschaft momentan am dynamischsten entwickeln. Auf dem dortigen Bildungscampus arbeiten verschiedene Einrichtungen aus der universitären und außeruniversitären Forschung und Entwicklung in einer einzig-artigen Kooperation und einer hochmodernen Umgebung an der Entwicklung von datenbasierten Techno-logien und smarten Anwendungen von morgen. Ab 2025 wird die Fraunhofer-Gesellschaft acht Forschungs- und Innovationszentren an dem Standort gründen, darunter eines zum Thema Cybersicherheit. Das Zentrum für Cyber-sicherheit wird ein neuer Standort des Fraunhofer-Instituts für Sichere Informationstechnologie in Darmstadt, kurz Fraunhofer SIT. Cybersicherheit ist der Schlüssel für die Digitalisierung von Wirtschaft, Gesellschaft und Staat. Ohne adäquate Cybersicherheit wird die Digitalisierung nicht gelingen.
Das Fraunhofer SIT zählt zu den weltweit führenden Forschungseinrichtungen für Cybersicherheit und Privatsphä-renschutz. Das Institut gehört zu den Impulsgebern der internationalen IT-Sicherheitslandschaft und ist seinerseits der größte Mitwirkende im Nationalen Forschungszentrum für angewandte Cybersicherheit ATHENE, das größte Forschungszentrum für Cybersicherheitsforschung seiner Art in Europa und ein wesentlicher Bestandteil der Cyber-sicherheitsarchitektur Deutschlands. Das Fraunhofer SIT und ATHENE beschäftigen sich mit den zentralen Sicher-heitsherausforderungen und betreiben angewandte Spitzenforschung und Innovationsentwicklung. Die Personen am neuen Standort Heilbronn werden eng mit den bereits in ATHENE tätigen Experten für Cybersicherheit und den Experten aus angrenzenden Gebieten in Heilbronn kooperieren, wie etwa der künstlichen Intelligenz.
Die Stellenausschreibung richtet sich an Personen mit Berufserfahrung in der Forschung und Entwicklung, die daran interessiert sind, den erfolgreichen Aufbau des neuen Forschungs- und Innovationszentrum für Cyber-sicher-heit mitzugestalten und sich in einem Thema mit vielen großen Herausforderungen und den besten Zukunfts-chancen in einem hochspezialisierten Umfeld unter hervorragenden Bedingungen weiter zu qualifizieren.
Was Sie bei uns tun

Innovationszentrum für Cybersicherheit am Standort Heilbronn
Koordination der Zusammenarbeit zwischen dem Forschungs- und Innovationszentrum für Cybersicherheit und den Forschungsabteilungen des Fraunhofer SIT und von ATHENE in Darmstadt
Gestaltung der Zusammenarbeit mit den weiteren Forschungs- und Innovationszentren der Fraunhofer-Gesell-schaft in Heilbronn
Co-Koordinierung und Unterstützung von Forschungsprojekten im Bereich Cybersicherheit mit einem Fokus auf praxisorientierte und marktorientierte Lösungen
Akquise, Wissenstransfer und Ergebnistransfer zur praktischen Verwertung der Forschungsergebnisse

Wir wertschätzen und fördern die Vielfalt der Kompetenzen unserer Mitarbeitenden und begrüßen daher alle Bewerbungen - unabhängig von Alter, Geschlecht, Nationalität, ethnischer und sozialer Herkunft, Religion, Welt-anschauung, Behinderung sowie sexueller Orientierung und Identität. Die wöchentliche Arbeitszeit beträgt 39 Stunden. Die Stelle kann auch in Teilzeit besetzt werden. Anstellung, Vergütung und Sozialleistungen basieren auf dem Tarifvertrag für den öffentlichen Dienst (TVöD). Als Weg-weiser und Impulsgeber für innovative Entwicklungen und wissenschaftliche Exzellenz wirkt sie mit an der Gestal-tung unserer Gesellschaft und unserer Zukunft.

Company Description:
In den Augen der Westeuropäer ist Plastik in den Ozeanen
die größte Bedrohung für die Umwelt. Das ergab
eine globale Umfrage auf fünf Kontinenten des Instituts
YouGov und der Non-Profit-Organisation „Orange Ocean“.
Demnach ist die Verschmutzung der Meere sowohl für die
meisten Deutschen, nämlich 49 Prozent, als auch für die
Mehrzahl der Briten - hier sind es sogar 55 Prozent - das
größte Problem.
Genau da kommt Naturapack ins Spiel: Geboren aus
einem Gedankenspiel zwischen Profiwindsurfer und Verpackungsexperten,
haben wir uns entschieden, unseren Teil
zur Rettung der Weltmeere und zur Reduzierung von Plastikmüll
beizutragen. Herr Schliemann war Profisportler und
ist durch seine vielen Wettkämpfe ständig mit dem Thema
Plastikmüll im Meer konfrontiert worden. Die Entwicklung
war erschreckend und stetig wachsend. So entstanden
die ersten Gespräche und Ideen zusammen mit Herrn Eric
Klawohn. Daraus resultierte das flexible und Hersteller
ungebundene Startup Naturapack. Als markenunabhängiger
Systemlieferant können wir jedem Unternehmen die
richtigen Verpackungsmaterialien und Maschinen anbieten.
Wir haben für jeden Verpackungsprozess die besten Produkte
herausgefunden und bieten daher unseren Kunden
stets das für Sie ökologisch und ökonomisch Sinnvollste an.
Wir freuen uns darauf, gemeinsam mit Ihnen den Versand
plastikfreier zu gestalten.

Title: Software Engineer
Description:
About Us:Validaide supports pharmaceutical logistics service providers in transporting valuable and sensitive pharmaceutical products using our data-sharing Capability Platform and data-driven Lane Assessments and Lane SOPs.
With Validaide we help to ensure that healthcare products can be delivered to patients around the world in good quality. Pharmaceutical manufacturers (e.g. Pfizer, AstraZeneca, etc.) and logistics service providers (e.g. DSV, Agility, Yusen, Hellmann, etc.) use Validaide to assess transportation risk and optimize their transportation and packaging decisions and be GDP compliant in doing so. We enable this by providing a new level of transparency into the services and capabilities across the global logistics industry using our Capability Platform, and by the creation and online collaboration of data-driven Lane Assessments and Lane SOPs.
Job Summary:We are looking for a full-time PHP Software Engineer to join our team who has excellent English skills and can work on implementing (and improving / maintaining) key features and functionalities of the application, including establishing any specifications and architectural (re)designs as needed. You’ll need to build a good understanding of the pharma logistics industry in general and our Lane Risk Assessment architecture and algorithms specifically. A background in using the Symfony framework is required. What we offer you is a diverse team, ample training time during working hours and a budget to further grow your skills. You can get involved with our tooling, devops, security, compliance or something else if you have an interest in any of those areas.
Validaide itself is a PHP application built using the Symfony Framework, Doctrine ORM and Bootstrap for the UI with a fair amount of JS tidbits (vanilla, jQuery, Vue). We have a local Mac OS development setup, use GitHub repositories with PRs and GitHub Actions, a fully automated build pipeline in Jenkins, use Ansible for deployment, and a variety of other supporting tools. Noteworthy is also our extensive use of Behat to continuously maintain a fully functionally tested application. This is necessary to develop fast in a reliable manner, but also ensure we comply with pharmaceutical guidelines and regulations (GAMP 5, FDA 21 CFR Part 1). 
We’re a 20-person company, and our agile development team currently consist of seven members with varying levels of experience, including a dedicated test automation engineer. Our mindset towards development is this: we want to optimize our development speed whilst maintaining software quality and reliability. We achieve this with the following mantras: “good over perfect”, “don’t introduce a technology unless it is really needed”, “pragmatic DRY”, “don’t DIY if there are fantastic tools that DIFY (e.g. rector)”, “sometimes you got to write stuff down, dummy (Wiki, e-QMS)”, “integration/smoke tests over unit tests”, “be a {boy/girl/other}scout“, “Bug? Write a test!”, and many more!
A Typical Day:On a typical day we start with the Daily Standup at 9. On Tuesday’s we do this physically with a mug of coffee or tea in our hands when we are all in the office in Utrecht. Once we completed our round, you move into a detailed refinement session with our Product Owner and some selected team members. While we refine, you identify a list of development and testing activities for several stories, as well as highlight the need for an update to a requirements specification. You agree on a follow-up task to draft a document - that you align with the other involved developers - for the next refinement so a final decision can be made. You then continue to work on one finishing one of your PRs that received some feedback until lunchtime. After lunch in the office canteen, you review someone else’s PR, and wrap up your own. The rest of the day is focused on a new feature currently on your plate, and you align with one of our Test Automation Engineers on making sure that it can be tested easily by writing some specific Behat contexts.
Key Responsibilities:Feature Development: Design, develop, and maintain features in the Validaide platform, and any related software development activities that stem from these.Agile Collaboration: Proactively work in our Agile team, participating in sprints, stand-ups, and retrospectives, and contributing to optimizing quality and productivity throughout the development lifecycle.Test Suite Maintenance: Write and maintain automated test suites to ensure code quality, including unit, integration, and end-to-end smoke tests.Code Review: Participate in peer code reviews to maintain high coding standards and ensure knowledge sharing within the team.Technical Documentation: Create and maintain clear and concise technical documentation for new and existing systems.Performance Optimization: Identify and address performance bottlenecks to enhance application efficiency and scalability.Compliance Alignment: Ensure developed solutions align with regulatory requirements such as FDA 21 CFR Part 11 and EU GMP Annex 11.
Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.Proven experience as a software engineer with solid expertise in PHP, and the Symfony framework.Strong understanding of software testing principles and experience in writing and maintaining test suites (e.g., PHPUnit, Behat).Relevant certifications such as Certified Agile Developer, PHP, Symfony, Twig.Familiarity with Agile methodologies.Experience working with relational databases, particularly MySQL.Familiarity with CI/CD tools like GitHub Actions and/or Jenkins.Proficiency with version control systems such as git.
Nice-to-have:Knowledge of Java and/or DevOps skillsFamiliarity with software compliance frameworks (e.g. GAMP, FDA 21 CFR Part 11).Knowledge in software security.Experience with other testing frameworks.
You Are:Looking to contribute to something meaningful and interested in our industry (pharma logistics).A team player, well-versed in English, with excellent communication and soft skills, pragmatic and well-suited for a company of our size.Good in solving problems using strong analytical skills.Able to work on complex features, specifications, and architecture, requiring an in-depth knowledge of the application functionality (i.e. you need to understand our industry and customer).A quick learner, interested to develop yourself further as a professional.Living and eligible to work in the Netherlands and willing to grow with us for a longer period of time.
What We Offer:Startup mindset, flat hierarchy, cooperative and supportive mentality.Hybrid work environment with 2 days in the office in Utrecht, rest work-from-home.Diverse, international team (Romania, Bulgaria, Italy, Cyprus, Latvia, Lithuania, Turkey).Competitive salary depending on current skillset + company bonus.Pension + expenses (home office, travel) + training budget.We plant trees on your behalf to compensate CO2 using Ecologi: https://ecologi.com/validaide Most of us are a 'digital nomad' from time to time, e.g. visiting one's home country.
Company Description:
Global transportation puts products at risk. We help you keep them in capable hands. Directly access the special handling capabilities of logistics suppliers and use this information to digitally manage your Lane Assessments for healthcare and pharmaceutical shipments.

Validaide was founded in 2016 to support the logistics industry with innovative solutions for supplier qualification and lane risk assessments. Working closely with all types of logistics providers, we aim to standardize and digitalize supplier qualification and lane risk assessment processes, related to pharmaceutical and healthcare transports.

With a sophisticated community capabilities platform, we search for innovative ways to make the pharmaceutical and other special cargo industries more efficient
Specialties: Trade Lane Management,Supplier Qualification,Route Management,Data sharing,Supplier Data,Logistics,Temperature sensitive shipments,GDP,Pharmaceutical Logistics,Digital Platform,Lane risks Assessments,Digitalization
Hiring Manager Subtitle: Co-founder & CTO at Validaide

Title: Full Stack Developer
Description:
Are you an experienced developer who is passionate about healthcare, deep-tech, and positive societal impact? Fascinated by 3D, cloud and machine learning? Love working with cutting-edge tools, on a blank canvas, and in unconstrained environments? Want to play a leading role as H3D grows from a profitable startup to an iconic scaleup?We are looking for an ambitious Full Stack Developer who gets excited by these questions! You will report directly to the R&D Director and shape the DNA of our company.Location: Denmark or Ireland
About H3DH3D is an Australian Ph.D. research spinout whose mission is to make custom-fit devices (e.g. hearing aids, dental appliances) accessible to everyday people. We do this by providing AI technology to audio and dental labs – our Dental CAD, Audio CAD and Smartphone Scanning products – to grow their businesses and better support patients.Since our product launch in 2021, H3D are growing fast and working with industry leaders such as Logitech, GN Resound, Modern Dental Group and many others. The company is backed by leading VC investors and has customers based worldwide.
The OpportunityYou'll join our core engineering team building AutoDesign - our groundbreaking cloud platform that transforms how medical devices are designed and manufactured. This isn't just another web application - you'll be working with 3D visualization, machine learning pipelines, and cloud infrastructure to solve real human problems. Your code will directly impact people's quality of life by making custom medical devices more accessible and affordable.
What You’ll DoOutcomes you’ll deliver:Assist in the development and deployment of web apps hosted on AWS, using common frameworks such as VueJS, Flask, etc.Solve complex AWS cloud architecture to deliver reliable and efficient services to both web applications and iOS apps.Contribute to architectural decisions that will shape our platform's futureCollaborate with our product managers and customers to design, build and integrate new features into our systems.Establish scalable development processesEstablish, maintain and document multiple API systemsWork within an enthusiastic team of over 10 developers based in EU and AUS
Who You AreMust-Have Experience:5+ years as a professional full-stack software developerStrong expertise in full-stack development:Frontend: JavaScript/TypeScript and Vue.jsBackend: Python, Flask, and API developmentExperience building secure, scalable cloud-native applicationsProficiency with CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure as codeDeep knowledge of AWS services (Lambda, S3, DynamoDB, Cognito, etc.)Strong understanding of software security principles and best practicesExperience with RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
Nice-To-Have Experience:Processing 3D data – e.g. visualizing 3D models in a web browserDesigning and maintaining CI/CD pipelinesFamiliarity with AWS CDK or similar IaC toolsExperience working in regulated industriesDeveloping iOS applications or knowledge of Swift programming
Leadership & Process SkillsExperience establishing engineering best practices and processesAbility to drive architectural decisions and technical strategyStrong documentation skills and commitment to knowledge sharingExperience working in distributed, remote-first teamsProficient communication: regular reporting, agile meetings, documentation
Why Join Us?Work on meaningful technology that directly improves people's livesBe part of a rapidly growing startup in an exciting industryShape our technical direction and engineering cultureFully remote work environment with flexible hours (close proximity to Dublin or Copenhagen office preferred)Opportunity to work with cutting-edge AI/ML technologyCompetitive compensation package including equity
We're looking for someone who thrives in a startup environment, is excited about solving complex technical challenges, and is passionate about using technology to improve healthcare accessibility. If you're ready to make a real impact while working with cutting-edge technology, we want to hear from you.
The BenefitsImpactful Work: your work will benefit patients and humanity at large, and you will gain a unique career experience.Remote First + Flexible: we enjoy the liberty of living where we want and working when we want, with teammates spanning Ireland, Denmark, Ukraine, France, and Australia.

Company Description:
H3D is an Australian PhD research spinout whose mission is to make custom-fit medical devices accessible for everyday people. 

We do this by providing B2B software to manufacturers/labs which unlocks rapid growth for their custom-fit businesses: 
- Product #1 = AutoDesign, which automates CAD processes with AI and removes the need for highly skilled CAD technicians.
- Product #2 = Smartphone Scanning, which enables remote, non-intrusive capture of 3D digital impressions

Since launching in 2021, H3D has become the Audio industry’s leading provider of AI CAD Automation. We partner with iconic brands such as Sennheiser, Dreve, and Formlabs.

Title: Junior Developer
Description:
Haluatko päästä työskentelemään nousevien teknologioiden parissa huippuluokan asiantuntijoiden seurassa? Me Advianilla etsimme nyt tiimiimme useaa junior kehittäjää. Haluamme tarjota maailman parhaille asiantuntijoille heidän unelmiensa työpaikan. Siksi tavoittelemme vaatimattomasti 50 pisteen Employee Net Promoter Scorea, jota mittaamme joka kuukausi.

ADVIAN

Advian on edistyksellinen jalostetun analytiikan asiantuntijatalo, jonka voimavaroihin kuuluu uniikki Edge AI ja GeoAI sekä ja timanttinen informaationhallinta. Meillä on teknologia-agnostinen ote työhömme sekä tuotamme asiakkaillemme epäreilua kilpailuetua. Advianin litteä ja itseohjautuva organisaatiomalli mahdollistaa jokaiselle yksilöllisen tuen ja vapauden yhdistelmän.

TÄTÄ HAEMME

Oletko sinä etsimämme junior kehittäjä? Sinulla on mahdollisesti kokemusta harjottelusta tai ensimmäisestä paikasta ja etsit nyt seuraavaa askelta urallasi. Saatat toivoa tulevaisuudessa työskenteleväsi koodaamisen lisäksi myös koneoppimisen parissa tai paikkatiedon parissa työskentely kiinnostaisi sinua. Odotamme sinulta etenkin intoa oppia uutta ja päästä kehittymään.

Lyhyesti:

Vakituinen ja kokoaikainen rooli Espoo, Tampere tai etänä muualta Suomesta 


Sopisimme toisillemme täydellisesti, mikäli:

Sinulla on hieman työkokemusta koodauksen parissa Sinulla on kokemusta esimerkiksi jostain näistä: Javascript, Java, PostgreSQL Olet mahdollisesti työskennellyt AWS ympäristössä Puhut sujuvasti suomea 


MIKSI ADVIANILLE

Kukapa tämän paremmin kertoisi, kuin advianlaiset itse. Esimerkiksi eräs asiantuntijamme totesi, että Advianilla parasta on "kaiken tekemisen vapaus, itseohjautuvuus sekä panostaminen työntekijöiden viihtymiseen". Tarjoamme sinulle muun muassa:

Oikeasti joustavan työn, jossa voit itse vaikuttaa työaikoihisi ja -sijaintiisi. Kannustava palkkamalli, jolla voit kerryttää lisäansioita joka kuukausi. Huipputiimin, joka tarjoaa sinulle tukea ja apua. Merkityksellisiä projekteja, joissa taatusti opit ja kehityt yhdessä ammattilaisten kanssa. 


Lisää Advianista ja Advianlaisista: https://www.advian.fi/rekrytointi

KIINNOSTUITKO?

Jätä rohkeasti tavoitteistasi kertova hakemus hakuportaaliimme. Hae nopeasti, sillä täytämme paikan heti, kun löydämme sopivan jäsenen tiimiimme!

Jos sinulla on kysymyksiä, voit olla yhteydessä Pinja Fernströmiin. Pinjan tavoitat joko puhelimitse (+358 50 434 5435) tai sähköpostitse (pinja.fernstrom@advian.fi).

Vain tavoitteet ja unelmat rajana!

Title: Information Technology Auditor
Description:
Ben jij een analytische en proactieve IT Auditor die impact wil maken binnen een dynamische accountantsorganisatie? Wil je werken in een omgeving waar jouw ontwikkeling centraal staat en je direct verantwoordelijkheid krijgt? Dan is deze rol bij aaff perfect voor jou!
Jouw rol als IT AuditorAls IT Auditor bij aaff speel je een cruciale rol in het waarborgen van de betrouwbaarheid van IT-systemen en processen bij hun klanten. Je werkt nauw samen met financiële auditors en ondersteunt hen bij IT-gerelateerde controles en vraagstukken. Je houdt je bezig met:IT-audits uitvoeren: Je beoordeelt IT-omgevingen, voert data-analyses uit en onderzoekt IT-processen in het kader van jaarrekeningcontroles.Klantadvies en procesverbetering: Je adviseert klanten over IT-risico’s en hoe ze hun IT-omgeving en processen kunnen optimaliseren.Uitvoeren van assurance-opdrachten: Denk aan ISAE 3402, SOC2-audits en privacy-audits.Samenwerken & kennisdeling: Je werkt intensief samen met financiële auditors en leidt minder ervaren collega's op.Bijdragen aan business development: Acquisitie is een onderdeel van je rol; je helpt mee om nieuwe klanten en opdrachten binnen te halen.Flexibele werkomgeving: Je werkt zowel op kantoor als bij klanten, en soms op afstand.
Je krijgt direct veel verantwoordelijkheid en hebt een divers klantenbestand met zo’n 300 klanten. De opdrachten variëren van enkele uren tot meerdere dagen, waardoor je planning en communicatie cruciaal zijn.
Wat wij van jou vragenEen afgeronde HBO/WO-opleiding in Accountancy, IT-auditing of vergelijkbaar.3 tot 7 jaar ervaring als IT Auditor, bij voorkeur binnen een Big Four-kantoor of vergelijkbare omgeving.Bijna afgeronde of voltooide Post-master IT Audit (RE-opleiding) is een pré.Sterke analytische vaardigheden en kennis van IT-processen, cybersecurity en privacyvraagstukken.Communicatief sterk en in staat complexe IT-risico’s begrijpelijk te maken voor klanten.Zelfstandigheid, maar ook een teamplayer die kennis deelt en minder ervaren collega’s begeleidt.Je woont in (of bent bereid te verhuizen naar) Tilburg, Den Bosch of Nijkerk en hebt geen moeite met reizen.
Bedrijfsprofiel aaff is een top-10 accountantskantoor in Nederland, met een sterke focus op ondernemerschap en persoonlijke groei. Medewerkers krijgen veel vrijheid en verantwoordelijkheid en worden gestimuleerd om hun carrière in te richten op een manier die bij hen past. De organisatie biedt een breed scala aan diensten en werkt voor uiteenlopende klanten, van MKB-bedrijven tot grotere ondernemingen.
BedrijfscultuurDe werkomgeving bij aaff is professioneel, maar toegankelijk en informeel. Er wordt veel aandacht besteed aan kennisdeling en samenwerking. Nieuwe medewerkers krijgen een uitgebreid inwerkprogramma, waarbij zij kennismaken met collega’s, klanten en de werkwijze van de organisatie. Medewerkers hebben de mogelijkheid om zich te specialiseren binnen verschillende IT-auditdisciplines en door te groeien naar leidinggevende functies.
ArbeidsvoorwaardenSalaris tussen €3.500 en €6.500, afhankelijk van ervaring.Leaseauto of reiskostenvergoeding.Mogelijkheid tot hybride werken en een thuiswerkvergoeding.25 vakantiedagen bij een fulltime dienstverband.Individueel Keuzebudget (5,08%) voor extra vakantiedagen of salaris.Uitgebreide opleidingsmogelijkheden via de aaff Academie.Optie om mede-eigenaar te worden en te profiteren van winstuitkering.
Solliciteren?Wil jij je carrière een boost geven als IT Auditor bij aaff? Solliciteer dan direct!
Contact Weis Seraj 06 217 017 66 of weisseraj@haselhoff.nl.We kijken uit naar jouw sollicitatie en bespreken graag de mogelijkheden.

Company Description:
Haselhoff Groep is sinds 1986 de specialist in het invullen van ICT vacatures en vacatures die op het snijvlak met ICT liggen, zoals bijvoorbeeld CRM marketeer en marketing data analist. Of het nu gaat om automotive, FMCG, B2C, financiële dienstverlening, de gezondheidszorg of een andere branche wij kunnen jou helpen met het vinden van de juiste kandidaat. 

Dit doen wij zowel op het gebied van werving & selectie, executive search als interim vacatures. Onze ervaren recruitment consultants helpen jouw bedrijf graag met het invullen van ICT vacatures en ICT professionals en managers bij het vinden van een nieuwe baan. 

•	Meer dan 30 jaar ervaring in verschillende branches zoals FMCG, financiële dienstverlening en automotive
•	ICT en vacatures die op het snijvlak met ICT liggen zoals CRM marketeer en marketing data analist
•	Recruitment consultants die zelf meer dan 20 jaar werkervaring in het bedrijfsleven hebben
•	Inclusief 3 coach sessies om onboarding zo goed mogelijk te laten verlopen

•	Bij iedere vacature staat de driehoek kennis, kunde en persoonlijkheid centraal
•	Lid van een van de grootste internationale executive search netwerken ter wereld

Doordat we ons specifiek op deze markt richten, hebben we een breed en relevant netwerk opgebouwd van kandidaten met de juiste vakinhoudelijke kennis. Als kers op de taart wordt ieder traject afgesloten met een “onboarding” coachtraject van drie gesprekken. Zo zoeken, vinden en selecteren wij voor iedere vacature steeds weer de juiste kandidaat.

Wil je je bij ons inschrijven of wil je meer weten? Neem dan contact met ons op via info@haselhoff.nl of bel naar 0346-586000.

Title: Penetration Tester
Description:
Offensive Penetration Tester – Web & Cloud Security
Location: Stockholm, Sweden (Hybrid – 2-3 days onsite per week)Language: Swedish and English (Fluent, Mandatory)
A leading Swedish cyber security consultancy is looking for an Offensive Penetration Tester to join their security team. This company provides security services to local Swedish organisations, primarily within the defence and government sectors. The role involves hands-on penetration testing of web applications, cloud environments, and Active Directory, helping clients strengthen their security posture against real-world threats.
The RoleAs an offensive penetration tester, you will:
Perform manual and automated penetration tests on web applications, APIs, and cloud environments.Assess Active Directory security, including Kerberos attacks, credential abuse, and privilege escalation risks.Identify and exploit vulnerabilities based on OWASP Top 10 and beyond.Conduct cloud security assessments across AWS, Azure, or GCP environments.Work with Swedish defense and government clients, ensuring security best practices are implemented.Provide detailed reports with remediation recommendations tailored to highly regulated industries.Stay updated on emerging attack techniques and contribute to research and knowledge sharing.
What We’re Looking For:
Strong experience in web application penetration testing, following OWASP methodologies.Hands-on expertise in Active Directory security testing, including lateral movement techniques.Experience with cloud security testing (AWS, Azure, or GCP).Proficiency with penetration testing tools (Burp Suite, SQLmap, Responder, Metasploit, etc.).Scripting knowledge (Python, PowerShell, Bash, etc.) for exploit development and automation.Previous experience working with government, defence, or regulated industries is a strong plus.Swedish and English fluency is mandatory due to the nature of the clients.Certifications like OSCP, OSWE, GWAPT, or similar are a plus.
If you’re looking for a role where you can apply offensive security techniques in a highly secure environment and work with Swedish national security-focused clients, let’s talk.

Title: Junior Business Analyst
Description:
Tinexta Cyber, nata dall’unione delle società Corvallis, Swascan e Yoroi, è uno dei poli italiani più importanti nel campo della cybersecurity. Con i propri servizi sviluppati in Italia e allineati alle norme UE su data residency, data protection e GDPR, l'azienda garantisce sicurezza nei processi di trasformazione digitale delle aziende e del sistema Paese. Offre servizi di assessment e advisory, curando il design, lo sviluppo e l’integrazione delle soluzioni, svolgendo attività di controllo e management per conto dei clienti e intervenendo per anticipare, bloccare e risolvere le situazioni di rischio.
Tinexta Cyber fa parte di Tinexta SpA, Gruppo industriale che offre soluzioni innovative per la trasformazione digitale e la crescita di imprese, professionisti, istituzioni. È quotato all'Euronext STAR Milan con un solido azionista di riferimento istituzionale e inserito nell'indice europeo Tech Leader come azienda tech ad alto tasso di crescita. Basata in Italia e presente in 12 Paesi tra Europa e America Latina con oltre 2.500 dipendenti, Tinexta è attiva nei settori strategici del Digital Trust, Cyber Security e Business Innovation.
POSIZIONESiamo alla ricerca di una figura di Junior Business Analyst da inserire nel team. La figura individuata darà supporto nella manutenzione e allo sviluppo della configurazione di un sistema completo e complesso di front-end in ambito bancario/assicurativo. Sarà coinvolta nella raccolta dei requisiti del cliente individuando, stimando e proponendo sia verbalmente che in forma scritta la soluzione che meglio si adatta all’esistente.
Principali responsabilità:Application Maintenance e sviluppo formule attuariali e processi Configurazione Prodotto/Tariffa vita (parametrizzazione e definizione degli algoritmi di calcolo) Test delle funzionalità per la verifica degli algoritmi e del processo Controlli e verifiche riserve Supporto nelle verifiche dei processi massivi quali quietanzamento/provvigioni/stacco cedoleManutenzione e sviluppo delle formule di calcolo per i processi massivi
Requisiti:Almeno 6 mesi di esperienza nel ruolo di Business AnalystLaurea magistrale in Economia, Finanza, Ingegneria Informatica o discipline affiniConoscenza del linguaggio SQL per l’analisi dei datiConoscenza di almeno un linguaggio programmazione (R, Python) e di ExcelCompetenze di matematica finanziaria ed attuarialeAbilità comunicative e interpersonali, sia scritte che oraliCapacità di problem solving e pensiero criticoBuone capacità di comprendere rapidamente l’uso degli strumenti per lo sviluppo di formule e configurare processi
Sedi di lavoro: Milano o Padova, ma si valutano candidature anche a livello nazionale

Company Description:
Tinexta Cyber è il punto di riferimento italiano dell’innovazione digitale sicura, con un focus sui temi della sicurezza digitale, forti competenze verticali e soluzioni custom.

Grazie ai nostri servizi, interamente basati in Italia e conformi alle normative europee su data residency, data protection e GDPR, assicuriamo una transizione sicura e affidabile nella trasformazione digitale delle aziende clienti e del sistema Paese.
 
Rendiamo la Cybersecurity accessibile e efficace nei settori dei Servizi Finanziari, delle Telecomunicazioni, delle PMI, del settore Pubblico e dei Professionisti, colmando il divario di sicurezza che ancora caratterizza questo importante segmento del sistema produttivo.
 
Offriamo servizi completi di assessment e consulenza per la cybersecurity, curando ogni fase del processo: dal design allo sviluppo e all’implementazione delle soluzioni.

Monitoriamo e gestiamo le soluzioni per conto dei nostri clienti, intervenendo tempestivamente per prevenire, bloccare e risolvere situazioni di rischio, garantendo la continuità operativa e contribuendo a creare organizzazioni cyber resilienti che siano in grado di affrontare con sicurezza tutte le fasi di un approccio strategico alla cybersecurity: predittivo, preventivo e proattivo.

Inoltre curiamo la System Integration di soluzioni verticali per il segmento Large Enterprise.
In particolare per il mondo finance e insurance sviluppiamo soluzioni sui temi dell'AML, pagamenti e gestione fondi. 

Tinexta Cyber è parte integrante di Tinexta S.p.a., un Gruppo dinamico e in forte espansione, quotato sul segmento STAR di Borsa Italiana. Erede di Tecnoinvestimenti, è da sempre al fianco di cittadini, imprese e Pubblica Amministrazione per favorirne la crescita e la modernizzazione. Leader nel settore della digitalizzazione avanzata, tramite le società controllate opera in quattro aree di business: Digital Trust, Cybersecurity, Credit Information & Management, Innovation & Marketing Service.

Title: Data Privacy Junior
Description:
Are you passionate about data privacy and eager to make an impact? Join our Privacy Center of Excellence in Bucharest as a Data Privacy Junior and play a key role in protecting personal data while driving compliance and innovation.
As a Data Privacy, you’ll be responsible for:Executing transactional processes for the global privacy program, including:Addressing and coordinating data subject request responses.Maintaining and quality-checking records of processing activities.Conducting vendor assessments for privacy and AI compliance risks.Reviewing contracts and data processing agreements (DPAs).Responding to inquiries regarding privacy rights and data protection practices.Monitoring the data privacy inbox and managing escalations effectively.Supporting client privacy assessments and compliance-related requests.Conducting cookie compliance checks for public-facing websites.Managing privacy-enhancing technology tools to maintain asset and processing records.Staying up to date with global privacy regulations and advising the company on compliance requirements.Liaising with global and regional data privacy leadership to ensure adherence to regulations.Providing insightful reporting to global and regional leadership.
Experience:1-2 years in Privacy, Information Security, Risk, Compliance, or Program/Project Management.Experience with records of processing activities and privacy tools (e.g., OneTrust).Skills:Strong organizational skills and ability to work autonomously.Exceptional communication and collaboration abilities.Critical thinking and problem-solving aptitude.Flexibility to adapt to changing priorities and global environments.Education: Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent experience.
What’s in It for You?Be part of a collaborative and forward-thinking team.Contribute to impactful projects that drive data protection and compliance.Develop expertise in privacy-enhancing technologies and global regulations.

Title: Information Security Specialist
Description:

Vas veseli delo v kreativnem in povezanem delovnem okolju z dobrimi odnosi, kjer vlagajo v zaposlene in njihov razvoj? Za vas imamo pravi izziv.
Za našega naročnika, eno vodilnih finančnih institucij v Sloveniji, ki nenehno stremi k inovacijam in napredku, pri čemer sta varnost njihovih strank in podatkov vedno na prvem mestu, iščemo novega člana ekipe, ki bo samostojno skrbel za področje informacijske varnosti in zagotavljal zanesljivost produktov podjetja.

upravljanje in nadzor informacijske varnostianaliziranje informacijskih tveganj in priprava predlogov ukrepov za njihovo zmanjševanjenačrtovanje in izvajanje varnostnih pregledov in vdornih testovizvajanje simulacij odzivov na kibernetska tveganjaspremljanje alarmov in zaznav orodij informacijske varnosti ter razvijanje in nadgradnja obstoječih kontrolsodelovanje pri notranjih in zunanjih revizijah informacijske varnosti ter vzpostavitev priporočenih ukrepovvpeljava dobrih praks in inovacij na področju informacijske varnostisodelovanje pri izobraževanju in svetovanju uporabnikom znotraj institucijesodelovanje pri načrtovanju in testiranju neprekinjenega poslovanja
Pričakujemo:
najmanj VI stopnja izobrazbe (računalniške ali druge ustrezne smeri)vsaj dve leti izkušenj na primerljivem delovnem mestuizkušnje z administracijo sistemske infrastrukturerazumevanje informacijske arhitekture, informacijske varnosti in neprekinjenega poslovanjasamoiniciativno spremljanje razvoja informacijske varnosti in predlaganje novih pristopovpoznavanje zakonov, regulative in metodologij s področja informacijske varnostiodgovornost, odločnost, doslednost in zanesljivostdobre medosebne veščineznanje angleškega jezika
Nudimo:
zaposlitev v uspešni in inovativni finančni instituciji, usmerjeni k nenehnemu napredkupriložnost za soustvarjanje enega najpomembnejših področij poslovanja podjetjaredno udeležbo na izobraževanjih in možnosti profesionalnega razvoja na področju informacijske varnostiuporabo najnaprednejših tehnologij in delo na zanimivih, inovativnih projektihpoudarek na ravnovesju med delom in prostim časom, fleksibilno delo z možnostjo občasnega dela od domahorizontalno ali vertikalno napredovanje, možnost vključenosti v tim ključnih kadrovosebno in ekipno nagrajevanje uspešnosti pri deluletna druženja in srečanja, spodbujanje zdravega načina življenja z vključevanjem v dodatna zdravstvena zavarovanja, vključitev v kolektivno dodatno pokojninsko zavarovanjefleksibilno delo z možnostjo občasnega dela od doma

Title: Junior IT Administrator
Description:
We are looking for a Junior IT Specialist to provide user support, network administration, and access management in an international environment. If you have experience with Microsoft systems, computer networks, and enjoy solving technical challenges – join our team!
Our company:Nippon Seiki Group is one of the world’s leading suppliers for the Automotive Industry with an innovative product range in Driver Information Systems. Our passion and goal is deliver instrument panels and display modules with high quality, readability and reliability throughout the entire lifecycle of a car.Being market leader in high-end Head-Up Display, Nippon Seiki is a benchmark to the industry for middle and high segment automobile brands.Our 15.000 employees all over the globe strive every day to design, develop and produce high-end product solutions for our customers. Working closely with larger international automotive manufacturers, from the early life stage of new car models to the manufacturing process, we operate at the center of next generation driver information systems development.Nippon Seiki (Europe) B.V (NSEU) has been established in 2002 and is a fully owned subsidiary of Nippon Seiki Co. Ltd., based in Nagaoka, Japan. Our European headquarter is located in Hoofddorp – The Netherlands. We focus on the European automotive market with our engineering sites located close to the industry in Hallbergmoos (Germany), Redditch (United Kingdom) and a software development office in Gdansk (Poland).

Our OfferA competitive salaryA pleasant working environment with strong focus on flexibility and work-life balanceWorking with state-of-the-art technologies on development of premium brand carsA chance to boost up your career in a multi-national companyAdditional vacation daysFlexible working hoursTrainings opportunity

Title: Junior Data Engineer
Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Software Engineer to join our research and trading team. You will be responsible for designing, developing and maintaining cutting-edge systems and databases that support quantitative research and data-driven decision making. This role blends software development, real-time data monitoring and infrastructure engineering.
Key Responsibilities:
Design and implement real-time data monitoring solutions using Grafana, InfluxDB, and other observability tools.Develop automated monitoring and alerting systems to ensure trading platform reliability.Manage and maintain production code by monitoring dependencies, handling missing data, generating timely alerts, and ensuring clear and informative logging—primarily using PythonDevelop, optimize, and maintain scalable, trading systems and research infrastructure.Assist team in daily task regarding reporting and optimization of application

Qualifications and Attributes:
Bachelor, MSc, PhD in a STEM degree, preferably in Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Engineering, or a related field.At least 2+ years experience as software developer/engineer.Experience working in a Linux-based environment with scripting (Bash, Python).Experience with Grafana, InfluxDB, Prometheus, or similar monitoring/observability tools.Proficiency with SQL and NoSQL databases for data processing.Understanding of market data feeds and electronic trading systems is a plus.Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
Benefits and Culture:
Competitive compensation package.Opportunities for professional development and mentorship from experienced researchers.Collaborative and innovative work environment, where interns can make a tangible impact.Enjoy the vibrant lifestyle of Limassol, Cyprus, with access to social and cultural activities.Flexible work-life balance with a focus on employee well-being.Hybrid Work model.Provident Fund.Private Health Insurance.
Company Description:
At Boltzmann Research, we’re at the forefront of innovation in the field of quantitative research and technology. We’ve made it our mission to push the boundaries of what’s possible in finance.
Our team comprises some of the brightest minds from around the globe, all united by a common goal: to tackle the most pressing and complex questions in the world of finance. We combine our expertise with cutting-edge technologies, including machine learning and big data, to predict market movements and shape the future of finance.

Title: IT System Engineer – IT Security (m/w/d)
Description:
Ihr neuer Arbeitgeber ist ein international agierendes Unternehmen im Bereich Elektrotechnik mit rund 4.000 Mitarbeitenden und einem Umsatz von ca. 800 Mio. EUR. Am Standort in der Nähe von Aalen suchen wir einen Cloud Security Engineer (Azure & IT-Infrastruktur), der die Weiterentwicklung und Sicherstellung des sicheren Betriebs der Cloud-Infrastruktur übernimmt. In dieser Position tragen Sie maßgeblich dazu bei, die IT- und Sicherheitsarchitektur zu optimieren und die Umsetzung innovativer IT-Cloud-Projekte voranzutreiben.
Sind Sie bereit für Ihre neue berufliche Herausforderung als IT System Engineer – IT Security (m/w/d)?
Ihre Aufgaben:In dieser Rolle sind Sie verantwortlich für die Betreuung, Optimierung und Weiterentwicklung der Cloud-Umgebung. Sie stellen den sicheren und effizienten Betrieb der Azure-Infrastruktur sicher und tragen aktiv dazu bei, die IT-Sicherheitsarchitektur kontinuierlich zu verbessern.Sie implementieren und verwalten Security Best Practices mit Fokus auf Identity-, Client- und Storage-Sicherheit.Sie überwachen, analysieren und dokumentieren die Cloud-Sicherheitsarchitektur, um Bedrohungen frühzeitig zu erkennen und abzuwehren.Als technische Ansprechperson für verschiedene Fachbereiche unterstützen Sie aktiv den Second-Level-Support.Sie bringen Ihr Wissen und Ihre Ideen in internationale IT-Cloud-Projekte ein und helfen bei deren Planung und Umsetzung.

B. PRINCE2) von Vorteil

Title: Information Security & Privacy Officer
Description:
Information Security & Privacy Officer | 32-36 uur | Techbedrijf in mobiliteitssector | Tot 70k | Regio Utrecht | Vast dienstverband
Wil jij een sleutelrol spelen in de digitale veiligheid van een toonaangevend techbedrijf? Voor een innovatieve organisatie in de mobiliteitssector zoeken we een Security & Privacy Officer!
Over de functie:Als Security & Privacy Officer ben je verantwoordelijk voor het waarborgen van de informatiebeveiliging en privacy binnen de organisatie. Je werkt nauw samen met collega’s en externe partijen om de beveiliging te optimaliseren en te zorgen dat de organisatie voldoet aan wet- en regelgeving. De verdeling security- en privacy werkzaamheden is 80/20, waarbij de focus dus ligt op information security.
Je taken omvatten onder andere:Opstellen, implementeren en up-to-date houden van het informatiebeveiligings- en privacybeleid;Zorgdragen voor naleving van wetgeving zoals de AVG en ISO27001;Uitvoeren van risicoanalyses en DPIA’s;Bewustwording creëren binnen de organisatie door middel van trainingen en advies;Ondersteunen bij incidentmanagement en audits.
Over de organisatie:Deze organisatie ontwikkelt digitale oplossingen die dagelijks door een groot publiek worden gebruikt. Innovatie en betrouwbaarheid staan centraal, en informatiebeveiliging speelt hierin een essentiële rol. Je krijgt de kans om in een dynamische omgeving te werken waar jouw expertise direct impact heeft.
Wie ben jij:HBO werk- en denkniveau;Minimaal 1,5 jaar ervaring met informatiebeveiliging en privacy;Kennis van ISO27001, NIS2 en de AVG;Sterke communicatieve vaardigheden en ervaring met stakeholdermanagement;Een analytische en pragmatische aanpak.
Wat bieden we je:Een salaris tot 70k o.b.v. 40 uur;Hybride werken, met een moderne werkplek in de regio Utrecht;Een jaarcontract met uitzicht op een vast dienstverband;Ruime opleidings- en ontwikkelmogelijkheden;27 vakantiedagen en een goede pensioenregeling.
Interesse?Spreekt deze functie je aan en wil je meer weten? Neem contact met ons op en stuur je CV mee, dan kijken we direct of jouw ervaring aansluit!

Company Description:
Als Elevation Group zijn wij een fullservicepartner bestaande uit: Elevation Partners, The.NextGen en TNG Staffing, met één streven: het behalen van de hoogste kwaliteit op het gebied van IT-Staffing.

Elevation Group is meer dan alleen een naam. Het is een beweging. Een beweging die maar één kant op gaat: omhoog. Groei naar nieuwe hoogten met Elevation Group. Want groei is waar we voor staan. Elke uitdaging is een kans om te groeien. Niet alleen voor onze klanten maar ook voor onszelf.

Inmiddels zijn we van een start-up, opgericht in 2012, uitgegroeid tot scale-up met 3 locaties in Nederland en Duitsland. Onze missie is duidelijk; Elevation Group wordt de toonaangevende full-service partner voor IT-staffing in binnen- en buitenland. 

We heten niet voor niets Elevation. Ready to join our movement?
