Title: Junior Full-Stack Software Developer (MSSP Platform)
Description:
Decanos is a leading provider in the field of Managed Security Service Providers (MSSP) and offers a comprehensive platform for advanced cybersecurity solutions. Our software is specifically designed to proactively identify IT security risks, analyze threats, and automate the implementation of security measures. Our MSSP software includes powerful modules such as Extended Detection & Response (XDR), Security Information and Event Management (SIEM), a 24/7 operational Security Operations Center (SOC), as well as specialized solutions for Threat Intelligence, Incident Response, and Behavioral Security Training. Leveraging artificial intelligence, automated playbooks, and real-time data analysis, Decanos helps companies detect security incidents early and respond effectively.
Through close collaboration with Cyber Curriculum GmbH, we ensure that our solutions comply with the latest regulatory requirements, such as NIS2 and KRITIS. We offer tailored security services to companies in critical infrastructure, the financial sector, federal authorities, and the defense industry, strengthening their cyber resilience in the long term.
Decanos stands for an integrated, intelligent, and forward-thinking security strategy that helps companies effectively defend against cyberattacks and build a secure digital future.
Tasks
As a Junior Software Developer, you will work closely with Senior Developers in the team to build and maintain our MSSP platform. While cyber security knowledge is a plus, the main focus is on your ability to contribute to the full-stack development process and work with SQL, APIs, and modern web technologies. This is a learning-intensive role, with mentorship from experienced engineers.
Key responsibilities:

Assist in designing, developing, and maintaining the MSSP platform’s backend and frontend.
Implement features in NextJS (TypeScript), Python (API development), and SQL (Supabase database).
Support the integration of security tools into the platform for unified insights.
Debug, test, and improve existing code based on best practices.
Participate in code reviews and follow software development methodologies.
Work with security experts to translate threat intelligence into software features.

Requirements
Required skills & experience:
✅ 1-3 years of experience in software development.
✅ Solid programming skills in TypeScript, Python, and SQL.
✅ Experience with modern frontend frameworks like NextJS.
✅ Basic knowledge of API development and database management.
✅ Strong problem-solving mindset and eagerness to learn from senior developers.
Nice to have:
🔹 Interest in cybersecurity and experience with security tools.
🔹 Familiarity with cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure).
🔹 Experience with Supabase or PostgreSQL.
Benefits
🚀 Work on an innovative MSSP platform with a hands-on security and engineering approach.
🏢 Hybrid setup: 3 days in a modern Berlin office, 2 days remote.
💡 Impactful role in shaping the technical foundation of the company.
📚 Training budget for cybersecurity certifications or conferences.
✅ Option for a company pension
⛑️ A private supplementary health insurance
🚲 Option for a company bike
Please also take a look at the career page of Cyber Curriculum GmbH to discover other exciting jobs: https://cyber-curriculum.com/karriere/
Company Description:
Cyber Curriculum®, steht für ganzheitliche Cyber Security. Wir bündeln fachliche und methodische Exzellenz in Sachen IT-Sicherheit für die Kernthemen Informationssicherheit (ISMS), Datenschutz (DSMS), Cloud Security sowie Betriebskontinuität-, Krisen- und Notfallmanagement (BCMS).
 
Und wir stehen für ein powervolles erfolgreiches Team, dass mit Energie bei der Sache ist und ausreichend Raum, Zeit und Geld bekommt, um seine Energiereserven aufzuladen.
 
Lieber High Five als Big Four … wie wir auf Instagram zu sagen pflegen 😜 @cybercurriculum

Title: Junior IT Support
Description:
Who are we?
Welcome to Multiple (https://themultiple.com), your go-to iGaming service provider. We’re here to empower iGaming operators, allowing them to thrive in such a volatile industry. Our years of expertise, cutting-edge technology, and passion for delivering extraordinary player experiences make us the right choice for any company looking to elevate their success. We offer a range of iGaming offerings such as; Gaming Services, Casino Marketing, Sportsbook Marketing and Operations, Creative, Data and B.I, Operations (CS, RPF, KYC), VIP Management, Acquisition, Social Media, Content, Product, Legal and Compliance.
The Role
The Junior IT Support will be responsible for providing technical assistance and support to end-users, ensuring their hardware and software systems function effectively and efficiently. This role is crucial in helping individuals and the organization troubleshoot and resolve various technology-related issues to maintain a smooth operation.
In this role you will be required to work on-call.

Key Responsibilities
Provide first-line technical support to clients both onsite and remotely, addressing hardware and software issues.Diagnose and troubleshoot technical issues efficiently to ensure minimal disruption.Manage and maintain accurate IT inventory records and documentation.Ensure timely resolution of incidents and service requests while adhering to established service level agreements.Assist in the installation and configuration of computer systems, IT hardware, and peripherals.Administer user accounts, permissions, and access rights.Support corporate applications and assist users in utilizing them effectively.Follow established procedures and guidelines to perform tasks with accuracy and efficiency.Handle and resolve day-to-day IT requests promptly.
Skill Requirements 
A diploma or higher certification in IT or a related field.At least 1 year of experience working with Microsoft 365 products.Strong knowledge of computer hardware components and troubleshooting techniques.Additional educational qualifications or certifications in Networks, Infrastructure, or related areas will be considered an asset.Willingness to learn, adapt to, and administer various software packages.Highly motivated with a positive attitude, eagerness to learn, and a commitment to staying updated with ICT technologies.Strong diagnostic and troubleshooting skills for supporting internal staff effectively.Ability to work collaboratively as part of a team as well as independently.
What we offer:
Attractive remuneration packagePerformance bonusHealth InsuranceWellness benefit (after probation)Optician/Spectacle and Blue Lens Benefit (after probation)Breakfast/lunch all weekMonthly snacks allowanceTraining supportModern office facilitiesExciting Company EventsBeer FridaysRefer a friend bonus
You should not apply if ...
You want a normal 9-5 job. This role is not easy & requires an all-in mentality. We`re looking for team members who will put in the work that others won`t.You cannot take constructive feedback.You can`t handle stress and pressure.You have the mindset of "Quick Money", this is a marathon, not a sprint.You do not embody our core values.

Title: Junior Consultant - Cybersecurity
Description:
Chi siamoSiamo un gruppo multinazionale di consulenza direzionale, leader nell'analisi e nella progettazione di modelli di Governance, Organizzazione e Controllo. Aiutiamo i nostri clienti ad esplorare nuove opportunità di sviluppo e crescita del valore, identificando rischi e definendo le migliori strategie di gestione e controllo. Abbiamo una significativa presenza internazionale, con 85 uffici e oltre 7000 dipendenti in tutto il mondo. Operiamo in Italia dal 2004 con oltre 500 professionisti. Protiviti è un Worldwide partner di soluzioni cloud di Microsoft con diversi Microsoft MVP e Microsoft MCT nei nostri team.
Chi cerchiamoA fronte di un consolidato trend di crescita dei servizi di Cybersecurity, per la nostra sede di Milano, siamo alla ricerca di risorse junior da inserire nell'area della Technology Consulting.Il team di Cybersecurity e Data Protection di Protiviti trasforma il rischio potenziale in un vantaggio competitivo, proteggendo ogni livello dell’organizzazione per concedere nuove opportunità di business, in modo sicuro.Entrare a far parte del team di Cybersecurity di Protiviti consente di lavorare su progetti di:Security Program & Strategy: supporto alla definizione e al mantenimento di strategie e modelli di Information Security;Incident Response & Recovery: definizione dei processi di security incident management e analisi e supporto operativo nella gestione degli stessi;Data Security & Privacy: definizione di progetti di data security sia a livello di governance (data classification, definizione policy procedure e processi) che di implementazione di soluzioni tecniche a supporto (es. DLP, Encryption, ecc.);Digital Identity: supporto complessivo nella definizione di programmi di Digital Identity sia a livello di governance che di implementazione delle relative soluzioni tecniche a supporto;Microsoft Security: implementazione di soluzioni di sicurezza Microsoft.

Requisiti:Laurea STEM o laurea in Economia a indirizzo informatico;Curiosità nell’approfondimento tematico e applicativo della Sicurezza informatica;Conoscenza fluente dell'inglese;Buone capacità relazionali e comunicative, predisposizione al lavoro di gruppo, intraprendenza e flessibilità.

Protiviti è una società che offre pari opportunità e valorizza la diversità e l'inclusione. Il nostro processo di selezione è meritocratico e lontano da qualsivoglia forma di discriminazione diretta o indiretta, nel rispetto dei migliori standard internazionali e delle leggi applicabili (inclusi ma non limitati alla L. 903/77).
Company Description:
Protiviti è un Gruppo multinazionale di consulenza direzionale, leader nell’analisi e progettazione di modelli di Risk Management, Organizzazione, Compliance e Controllo; supporta le aziende nell’identificazione dei rischi e nella definizione delle migliori strategie di gestione, governo e controllo. 

In Italia, Protiviti opera nelle sedi di Milano, Torino e Roma e conta oltre 250 professionisti.

Protiviti è un network caratterizzato da una presenza internazionale di rilievo con oltre 70 uffici nel mondo e oltre 4.600 persone. La base Clienti include oltre il 60% delle imprese del Fortune 1000 e il 35% delle Global 500. Obiettivo di Protiviti è la diffusione di una cultura aziendale finalizzata ad allineare i processi, i sistemi informativi e l’organizzazione alle migliori prassi internazionali. 

Protiviti fa parte del Gruppo Robert Half (RHI), quotato al NYSE e appartenente all’indice S&P 500.

Title: Data Privacy Consultant
Description:
Are you passionate about data privacy compliance topic, spiced with IT mindset and enthusiastic about customer support? This opportunity is for you!
A Data Privacy Consultant position has opened at our multinational client. They are a leading agricultural technology company who focuses on transforming food production through Regenerative Agriculture to improve soil health, increase productivity, and combat climate change.In this position you will work with the Data Protection team providing customer service to internal clients using the Data Privacy tool, significantly contributing to the company’s efforts to comply with data privacy laws and safeguard personal information.
As a Data Privacy Consultant, you will:
Assist in deploying the data privacy tool across the company’s diverse jurisdictions.Support privacy assessments, data mapping and investigations of the organisation's data processing activities as part of the ongoing maintenance of the data privacy tool data protection management system.Assist with customer support for various departments within the company like HR, Marketing, IT to integrate data protection controls into the organisation's supporting systems.Oversee and address data privacy inquiries, including those concerning the use of the tool.Assess new regulations and develop compliance strategies, including updating data privacy tool assessments.Educate the organisation about the importance of data privacy compliance.Develop and deliver policies, guidelines, and training materials to ensure the organisation is compliant with data privacy rules and regulations.
What you will need to succeed:
A dedicated customer support professional with a keen interest in data privacy compliance, committed to developing expertise in this dynamic area.Minimum 1–2 years of experience in leading or participating in tool or process implementation, or has a background in advisory/consulting.Excellent communication skills in English with a proactive attitude and problem-solving abilities.Nice to have law degree.
What you’ll get in return:
Long-term career and internal training opportunities.Energetic and international work environment.Modern office in Budapest with Home Office opportunities.Competitive salary and benefit package.
If you are interested in this position, do not hesitate to apply! Simply upload your English CV. Please note that only selected candidates will be contacted.

Title: Software Engineer
Description:
Who We AreAt Nosto, we’re on a mission to make every impression relevant. Nosto helps digitally native commerce and direct-to-consumer brands create personalized shopping experiences that drive more revenue from every visit. Our platform powers billions of dollars of additional revenue for over 2,500 digital commerce brands, such as Dermalogica, Patagonia, MUJI, and Bellstaff. We process data for thousands of merchants with tens of millions of visitors daily.
Utilizing behavioral data, deep integrations, machine-learning technology, and automated workflows, the Nosto Commerce Experience Platform makes it easy for brands and retailers to quickly deploy fully personalized commerce experiences at scale.
As a Software Engineer with focus on PHP, you will play a pivotal role in the development and optimization of our e-commerce platform integrations, ensuring seamless merchant experiences. You will be the main contact and responsible person for Shopware, Magento, and Prestashop integrations.
At Nosto, we believe in working together towards a common vision. We're a team of talented & earnest professionals who love a good challenge while maintaining a healthy work-life balance. We foster a diverse, supportive, and positive culture, where collaboration and innovation thrive.
What you would be working onTogether we shape our technical trajectory by developing future-focused APIs and integrations with leading e-commerce platforms and technology partners. Your primary focus is on the development of new products and features and the implementation of improvements to existing ones with strong relations on the platforms we are working with.Additionally, you will support our partners with technical guidance and reviews. You will report to the Head of Platform Integrations and contribute actively to the design of our software architecture.You will play a key role in tightly collaborating with our product manager to ensure that product, security, and technical requirements are fully aligned with the team for seamless execution.
Key Responsibilities:Take primary responsibility for developing and maintaining Nosto’s integrations with Shopware, Magento, and Prestashop, ensuring seamless functionality and adherence to best practices.Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code by integrating our platforms with external services and APIs.Write thorough tests and apply systematic debugging to resolve issues.Contribute to the development of new products and features from concept to launch, ensuring alignment with platform capabilities and architectural standards.Monitor and improve integration performance using operational data.Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for integration solutions, including architectural designs, API specifications, and operational guidesEngage in agile processes (sprint planning, stand-ups, retrospectives) and ensure incremental delivery.Mentor colleagues and provide support for internal teams with platform-related questions and technical planning for internal projects.Engaging with platform partners and merchants, understanding their needs, resolving technical challenges, and implementing improvements.Communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders, ensuring clarity and alignment. Encourage open discussions within the team, valuing diverse opinions and constructive feedback.
What We ExpectBachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.Minimum of 6 years of PHP development experience. Additional Java experience is a plusDeep expertise in Shopware, Magento, and Prestashop, with a strong understanding of their architecture, APIs, and extension mechanisms.Excellent problem-solving skills, with an ability to diagnose complex technical issues efficiently.Fluent in spoken and written English.
What We AppreciateThese are not strict requirements but valuable skills that will support your journey at Nosto:Knowledge of GraphQL, API technologies, AWS, and MongoDB.Understanding of systematic debugging, security best practices, and architectural principles.Commitment to delivering high-quality, well-tested code.Familiarity with additional e-commerce platforms such as Shopify or BigCommerce.
What We OfferApple Devices 💻 📱Ergonomic and centrally located offices🏢 with flexible working hours and remote working options 🏡 🗺️Opportunities to meet and collaborate with awesome team members from all over the world 👋An extra day off on your birthday 🥳Mental Health App benefit 🧘Paid time off to do good for the community around you 🫶About five weeks of vacation 🌴 and other benefits depending on the location
Nosto Supports Workplace DiversityWe are committed to Equal Employment opportunities without regard for race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, or veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know.

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
Your Role as a Data Engineer

In this role, you will work with our customers on various data engineering projects. This role is perfect for those with a good foundation in data engineering, and a passion for operational excellence in data management and analytics. You will design, build, and maintain efficient, scalable data pipelines and work closely with data scientists, analysts, and stakeholders deliver customized data solutions that drive impactful business decisions.

In this role, you will

 Develop and manage scalable data pipelines, ensuring efficient and reliable data flows.  Implement processes and solutions to improve data quality, accuracy, and consistency.  Create scripts and tools to automate repetitive tasks, improving efficiency and reducing manual work.  Build and maintain data integrations, including file, messaging, and API-based systems.  Develop data models tailored to meet business requirements.  Contribute to implementing infrastructure as code solutions.  Collaborate with data scientists, architects, and software developers to support the creation of data architecture and governance models.  Enhance the performance of existing data pipelines, optimizing queries and indexing for faster data retrieval.  Implement security measures to protect data from unauthorized access.  Ensure compliance with data governance policies and regulatory requirements, maintaining documentation and data lineage.  Monitor cost efficiency and identify areas for optimization.

We are looking for a Incident Analyst who will be responsible for handling incidents according to the Incident Process and is a part of Customer Service.

You are going to be responsible for the quickly troubleshooting process providing a good analysis of an incident and a solution to it in order to restore the disturbed service as soon as possible.

 Investigate, diagnose and report incidents found;  Determines if an incident needs to be escalated according to the priority of the issue;  Verify that the incident is resolved and close the incident;  Participate in Continual Service Improvement;  Recording the problems encountered and techniques used to solve them for future reference.

 Basic SQL knowledge;  Proven experience with several operating systems and monitoring tools is considered a strong advantage;  Experience with Windows, Linux operating systems;  Basic Knowledge of hardware components and server equipment;  Availability for evening shifts;  Good knowledge of English and Swedish is required;  Bachelor's Degree in Computer Sciences is good to have.

Title: Data Academy
Description:
Company Description

At Devoteam, we believe that technology with strong human values can actively drive change for the better. Discover how Tech for People unlocks the future, creating a positive impact on the people and the world around us. We are a global leading player in Digital Transformation for leading organisations across EMEA, with a revenue of €1B. We believe in transforming technology to create value for our clients, partners and employees in a world where technology is developed for people. We are proud of the culture we have built together. We are proud of our people at the service of technology. We are proud of our diverse environment. Because we are #TechforPeople. Join our multidisciplinary team of Cloud experts, Designers, Business consultants, Security experts, Engineers, Developers and other extraordinary talents, spread across more than 20 EMEA countries. Become one of our +10.000 tech and business leaders on cloud, data and cyber security. Let’s fuse creativity with technology together and build innovative solutions that actively change things for the better.
 
 
Job Description

Kickstart your data career at Devoteam's Data Academy!

Are you a recent graduate with a passion for data and a drive to learn? Devoteam’s Data Academy is your gateway to a thriving career in data analytics. We're seeking ambitious individuals with degrees in Management, Economics, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Data Science or related fields to join our dynamic team and embark on a journey of continuous learning and professional growth.

This is more than just a job; it's an immersive learning experience designed to equip you with the skills and knowledge needed to excel in the world of data. You'll dive deep into the world of data, learning to:

Collect, cleanse, and transform diverse data sources: Master the art of preparing data for meaningful analysis.

Develop impactful reports and dashboards using Power BI: Become a Power BI expert through hands-on, practical training.

Uncover valuable insights and trends to drive strategic decisions: Learn to translate data into actionable intelligence.

Collaborate with experienced professionals on real-world projects: Gain practical experience and build your portfolio.

Ensure data quality and integrity through best practices: Learn to maintain the highest standards of data managemen.



Learning and Development Highlights:

100% Practical Training: Our comprehensive program focuses on hands-on learning, with a strong emphasis on Power BI for Tech Professionals and the art of data storytelling.

Mentorship and Guidance: Learn from experienced data professionals who will guide you through your learning journey.

Continuous Learning: We foster a culture of continuous learning, providing you with opportunities to expand your skills and knowledge.
 
 
Qualifications

 
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Management, Economics, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Data Science or related fields

Familiarity with Excel and data visualization concepts.

Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.

Excellent English communication skills.

A proactive attitude and a passion for learning.



What We Offer:

Permanent employment contract.

Integration into a collaborative and innovative team.

Participation in challenging and impactful projects.

A supportive work environment that fosters professional growth.

Networking opportunities with industry experts.
 
 
Additional Information

Devoteam Group works for equal opportunities, promoting its employees based on merit and actively fights against all forms of discrimination. We are convinced that diversity contributes to the creativity, dynamism and excellence of our organization. All of our vacancies are open to people with disabilities.

Title: Intern Artificial Intelligence Consulting (m/w/d)
Description:
DEINE AUFGABEN

Du unterstützt bei der Durchführung von Beratungsprojekten im Bereich Artificial Intelligence für unsere Kund:innen.Du entwickelst überzeugende Präsentationen und erstellst durchdachte Konzepte um Projekterkenntnisse und -ergebnisse effektiv an interne sowie externe Stakeholder zu vermitteln.Du führst tiefgehende Recherchen zu aktuellen KI-Trends und Marktentwicklungen durch, identifizierst Chancen und Risiken und entwickelst daraus gezielte Business Development-Ideen.Du unterstützt bei der Entwicklung und Umsetzung von KI-Strategien sowie Maßnahmenplänen, die den digitalen Wandel vorantreiben.Du arbeitest eng mit erfahrenen Consultants und Projektteams zusammen, um die erfolgreiche Implementierung von KI-Lösungen zu gewährleisten.

DEIN PROFIL

Du bist in einem Studiengang mit Schwerpunkt vorzugsweise in Wirtschaftswissenschaften, Ingenieurwissenschaften, Informatik oder verwandten Disziplinen immatrikuliertDu hast Interesse an interdisziplinären Fragestellungen zwischen KI-Technologie und dessen Anwendung in der PraxisDu bist sicher im Umgang mit MS Office, insbesondere Excel und PowerPointDu hast vorzugsweise erste Erfahrungen im Bereich Consulting oder einer ähnlichen Tätigkeit gesammeltDu verfügst über eine analytische Denkweise und ausgeprägte ProblemlösungsfähigkeitenDu arbeitest eigenständig, strukturiert und übernimmst gerne VerantwortungDu bist teamfähig, motiviert, leistungsbereit, flexibel, kommunikativ und eigeninitiativDu verfügst über sehr gute Deutschkenntnisse und sichere Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift

Deine Benefits

Unterstützende Teamkultur: Gemeinsam mit Dir setzen wir innovative Ideen in die Tat um, fördern Teamwork und feiern unsere Erfolge zusammen.Schnelle Verantwortungsübernahme: Als junges Unternehmen mit flachen Hierarchien bieten wir Dir spannende Aufgaben und volle Verantwortung.Klare Karriere- und Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten: Wir unterstützen Deine Weiterbildung durch regelmäßiges Feedback und vielfältige Schulungsmöglichkeiten. Dabei bestimmst Du selbst das Tempo und das Ziel Deiner Entwicklung.Freiräume für kreatives Arbeiten: Kreative Lösungen benötigen Freiraum. Deshalb entscheidest Du, welche Software, Methoden oder Arbeitsmodelle Du nutzt, um Deine Ideen umzusetzen.Team-Events: Unsere regelmäßigen Events stärken den Teamzusammenhalt und sorgen für gemeinsame Erlebnisse abseits des Arbeitsalltags.

Über uns

Wir sind eine dynamische und schnellwachsende Unternehmensberatung, die das Beste aus beiden Welten vereint: die Agilität eines Startups kombiniert mit der Expertise und Erfahrung unseres Top-Managements. Wir unterstützen führende Unternehmen in den Bereichen IT-Strategy, Cybersecurity, Data Analytics, Cloud, AI und ESG. Bei uns erwarten Dich flache Hierarchien, eine herausragende Teamkultur und Raum für Deine persönliche und berufliche Weiterentwicklung. An unseren Standorten in München, Köln und Zagreb kannst Du gemeinsam mit einem kreativen, interdisziplinären Team innovative Lösungen gestalten und die Zukunft aktiv mitprägen.

Title: Software Developer
Description:
Utveckla framtiden med ossOmegapoint är ett konsultföretag som skapar framtidens digitala tjänster. Vi fortsätter att växa och letar nu efter dig som har några års erfarenhet av systemutveckling.
Brinner du för säkerhet inom systemutveckling?I denna roll blir du en viktig spelare i vårt team och vi tror därför att du är en teamplayer med högt ansvarstagande och kvalitétstänk. Du trivs i kundrelationerna där du är en både strukturerad och engagerad rådgivare och har förmåga att omsätta dina kunskaper i konkreta lösningar. Du är van att agera självständigt och inte rädd för att ta egna initiativ. Som person tror vi vidare att du är öppen, positiv och trivs i en organisation präglad av kompetensutveckling där vi är vassa och snälla mot varandra.Att du vill dela med dig av din kompetens till dina kollegor genom exempelvis mentorskap eller att delta på våra interna kompetensdagar tycker vi är en självklarhet. Vi bygger och stärker vår fina kompetenskultur tillsammans!
För den här tjänsten tror vi även att du:har minst tre års erfarenhet av programmering i Java, C#/.NET eller liknandearbetar kvalitetsinriktat och känner dig bekväm med såväl testdriven utveckling som automatiserade testerhar kunskap kring IaC, pipelines och traditionell DevOps/DevSecOpseventuellt har erfarenhet av domändriven designhar arbetat med agila utvecklingsmetoderhar en akademisk examen eller motsvarandebehärskar svenska i tal och skrift
Om ossOmegapoint grundades 2001 och är Norra Europas ledande konsultbolag inom cybersäker digitalisering. Med en vision om en framtid där vi fullt ut kan lita på teknik använder vi vår expertis för att säkra våra kunders och medarbetares utveckling. Vi är vassa och snälla, något som karaktäriseras av vår kompetensutvecklingskultur och viljan att dela vår kunskap med varandra. För närvarande är vi över 900 anställda konsulter i Stockholm, Oslo, Drammen, Köpenhamn, Göteborg, Malmö, Örebro, Västerås, Enköping, Uppsala och Umeå.
Vi satsar på digPå Omegapoint sätter vi din kompetens i centrum och ger dig alla förutsättningar för ett utvecklande och varierat jobb. Som konsult hos oss tillbringar du vardagen i uppdrag hos någon av våra kunder, men har alltid en välkomnande hemmahamn på kontoret i centrala Stockholm. Här ordnar vi mängder av aktiviteter under året för att vi ska utvecklas och ligga i framkant. Det är en del i vår kompetenskultur som bygger på samarbete och en vilja att stärka varandra.
Med en stor och varierande kundbas, från små specialistföretag till stora och välkända företag och myndigheter, har vi en möjlighet att erbjuda utmanande och roliga uppdrag.
Givetvis erbjuder vi även allt det andra som är viktigt, som marknadsmässiga löner, förstärkt föräldralön, anpassade förmånspaket, friskvårdsbidrag, sjukvårdsförsäkring och möjlighet till delägarskap.
Vi vågar lova dig en arbetsplats där du kommer att trivas, utvecklas och ges alla möjligheter till en ljus framtid.

You will work with the team in developing excellent models to keep our games fair, fun, and free of cheaters.We support hybrid work, and you will work two days per week in our Vancouver using scheduled processes, models, and alerts.Work with partners to design and improve metrics that guide our decisions by summarizing the state of game security.Detect patterns associated with fraudulent accounts and anomalous behavior.Solve scientific problems and create new methods independently.Translate requirements and security questions into data insights.Set up alerting mechanisms so our leadership is always aware of the security posture.Qualifications:Postgraduate degree, with specialization in machine learning, artificial intelligence, statistics, or related fields, or 2+ years of equivalent work experience in applied machine learning and analytics.Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases.Proficiency in Python programming.Familiarity with statistics, modeling, and data visualization.Experience with online gaming and an interest in addressing cheating issues.EXPERIENCEExperience building statistical and machine learning models, applying techniques such as regression, classification, clustering, and anomaly detection.Experience with Visualization tools and libraries such as Tableau, Looker, or Matplotlib.Familiarity with Big Data tools such as Hadoop, Spark, or Splunk.Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP or Azure.Some experience to software development or data engineering.Analyze business problems or research questions, identify relevant data points, and extract meaningful insights.Experience or familiarity with security concepts, including network/software security, security data, and attack vectors.

Title: IT Traineeship - Launch your career
Description:
What does this job entail?

How can you direct your career when IT is such a broad field? There's no obvious path, we know that too. That's why we've created this traineeship at KBC IT: a 30-month fast track with projects and assignments in various IT domains. Together with your coach (one of the general IT managers) and mentors, you'll get to know our corporate culture and discover where your talents really lie. Do you get a buzz from the content, or do you prefer to guide colleagues, or both?

What's more, you'll work on projects that give you valuable practical experience. Perhaps you'll contribute to digital applications which help us achieve our sustainability goals, offer our customers a better experience, or enable us to work in a more data-driven way. Perhaps you'll add your weight to our cybersecurity programme or contribute to a high-performance IT infrastructure.

What do we expect from you?

More specifically:

 You have the opportunity to discoverthree of these six IT domainsin roles you'd prefer:Cybersecurity & IT risk management;Services & infrastructure;IT services for employees;Retail banking & insurances;Corporate & investments;Data & reporting. You will become acquainted with various domains within our IT, where Kris Vervaet, as the driving force and CIO of IT, will help set the course. The first domain will be assigned to you based on the interview, the other two you will be offered options.Kris's colleagues will think along with you about which domain and which team best suits you. So you're in good hands. After twelve months in the first domain, you'll switch to the next. After another nine months, you'll switch again. After 30 months you'll have completed various projects and assignments in three different IT domains.

What's important to us is that wherever you work, you work well together, communicate smoothly, and help each other grow. We want to make the most of the opportunities new technologies offer and that needs teamwork. So, after 30 months, you'll have built a considerable network.

Your key strengths?

This traineeship is open to you if you obtained a master’s degree, preferably in Computer Science, Informatics, Software/Computer Engineering, Mathematics (with clear programming affinity) or Commercial Engineering Informatics,no more than 3 years ago. You have a demonstrable and indomitable passion for Tech and you have the desire to grow. In time, you might want to become a scrummaster/teamleader or system architect, for example.

The fact that KBC Group has offices in several European countries appeals to you. You’re looking forward to tackling the IT challenges of today while working together with an exceptionally diverse and international team of colleagues.

Already looking forward to working with AI applications, innovating, flex-working, remote collaboration? What are you waiting for?

Still not entirely sure? Then talk to us and find out more. Together we will see if we can give you more support in a particular area, more time or even an extra challenge.

What can we offer you?

A well-thought-out onboarding programme to give you a flying start. For example, there are starters days, and you'll soon meet your mentor who'll guide you through your traineeship. There's a cycle of training courses for you to follow throughout your traineeship. These include internal and external courses covering hard skills as well as soft skills.Every rotation, you'll be working in a different IT domain so you'll also learn on the job from your colleagues in the various departments. We believe that you'll learn more from working in different environments. You'll learn today's IT challenges in a creative and innovative environment. You'll discover how experts view these challenges, let them inspire you.You can count on numerous opportunities for networking within KBC. You'll also be part of the Young KBC Community.At KBC, you'll find a combination of applications and integrations developed in-house, you'll work with state-of-the-art technologies, and get to know the colleagues who made the best mobile banking app in the world. Sounds good, doesn't it?

And you certainly won't stop learning at the end of this traineeship. As part of our IT team, during your career you'll be continually learning from your colleagues, and they from you. What's more, you'll have every opportunity to progress or explore another job within KBC.

Your next step

Send us your CV with a note explaining what it is about this traineeship that appeals to you before the 17th of March 2025.We'll organise online tests, video interviews and a businesscase.We will organise interviews between selected candidates and managment IT on Friday the 4th of April and Tuesday the 29thof April 2025. Save the dates!You'll hear quickly whether you can start in this traineeship!

Isabel is looking forward to getting to know you 😃 In the meantime, do get in touch if you have any questions!

Title: Professional Internship - AI
Description:
VORTEX-CoLab is a growing collaborative laboratory that brings together academia and industry partners in an innovation framework to drive technology transfer in the areas of cyber-physical systems and cybersecurity. We are embarking on a journey that combines cutting-edge research and agile market solutions to create world-class products with the highest safety guarantees.
WHO?
We are looking for master’s degree students in the fields of Computer Science and Data Science with technical skills and enthusiasm to join our team. The ideal profile includes:Master’s degree in Computer Science - Data Science;Knowledge in: - Data pre-processing; - Development of Machine Learning models; - Statistical analysis; - Scripting; - Frameworks such as TensorFlow and PyTorch.
WHAT?
As an intern at VORTEX-CoLab, you will:Contribute to the work of the innovation team;Work within the Scrum methodology (training provided);Develop and train AI models, focusing on GenAI, for optimization in networks and embedded applications.
OBJECTIVES TO ACHIEVE
Develop skills in data science and machine learning applied to embedded environments;Participate in innovation projects that directly impact market solutions;Actively collaborate in the team, contributing to the development of GenAI model
WHY?
If your goal is to work in an applied research and cutting-edge development environment, focusing on innovation in AI and GenAI technologies, this is a unique opportunity. Here, you will:Collaborate with a multidisciplinary and motivated team;Gain access to training in agile methodologies and emerging technologies;Develop solutions applicable to a fast-evolving market.
At VORTEX-CoLab, we combine innovative minds, academic insights, and a business mindset to transform technological challenges into world-class solutions. If you are ready to be part of this challenge, we look forward to hearing from you!

Company Description:
VORTEX-CoLab is a Collaborative Laboratory in Cyberphysical Systems and Cybersecurity whose vision is to create outstanding innovations that have a meaningful impact in industry and society.
VORTEX-CoLab’s innovation model thrives on combining academic insights and business mindsets to build acceleration programs with focus on raising the level of technological maturity of new research coming from our scientific partners and demonstrating their applicability in the Automotive, Aerospace, Telecommunications, Medical Devices and Energy sectors. 
Using collaboration and diversity of knowledge as cornerstones, VORTEX-CoLab fosters a creative and open-minded culture to produce original combinations of innovative solutions and cutting-edge proof-of-concepts to create products that go far beyond just meeting customers’ expectations.
Specialties: R&D,Cyberphysical Systems,Cybersecurity,Automotive,Telecommunications

Title: Junior Information Security Officer (ISO) - Young Professional Program
Description:
Wat ga je doen?

How you will take on this challenge:

As an Information Security Officer (ISO) at Enexis, you will be the central point of contact for all information security-related questions within the IT domain. With your expertise, you focus on collaborating with Management and Improvement chains, ensuring continuous feedback exchange and closely monitoring the latest market trends. You contribute to developing and implementing information security policies, standards, and guidelines, particularly for the IT department. You play a key role in implementing security measures, conducting risk analyses, and providing training. Additionally, you monitor the information security status by regularly reporting and ensuring that measures and tests are executed correctly. Thanks to your close collaboration with various departments and external parties, we collectively ensure that every security challenge is addressed, and security is continuously improved.


You are the point of contact for information security-related questions within the IT domain.You develop and implement information security policies and guidelines, specifically for the IT department.You provide training, support risk analyses, and assist with ISMS implementation.You monitor the security status and regularly report on the execution of measures.


You work together with..

You mobilize internal knowledge experts to implement the latest technological developments and best practices, and you proactively collaborate with your stakeholders to ensure compliance with all security standards. Your expertise is also indispensable in defining security requirements for our suppliers and conducting due diligence.

Your close collaboration with various departments is crucial to continuously ensure and improve security. By maintaining contact with external parties, you gain valuable insights and information about sector-wide threats, which you then apply within Enexis.

But most importantly, you play a central role in exchanging experiences and knowledge within our organization, enabling us to collectively tackle any security challenge.

We want you to feel at home with us. We are all different, and the beauty of that is that we complement each other from these differences. We need each other's perspectives and opinions for a successful energy transition! Read more about our diversity and inclusion policy here .



Functie-eisen

Job requirements: 

You help others come to responsible conclusions and decisions by evaluating their arguments. With convincing power, you support team members in aligning differences in viewpoints. You promote the expansion and utilization of relationships and networks to achieve information security objectives. Additionally, you have:


A bachelor's or master's degree, preferably in computer science, security, or another IT-related field.Interest in gaining experience in cybersecurity/information security.You learn to work with information security management systems (ISMS) and risk management, and you become familiar with common security standards (such as ISO 27001).Good command of both Dutch and English, both written and spoken.Team & cultuur

With your energy, it's possible!

As an Information Security Officer (ISO) at Enexis, you are a trusted advisor to the organization and senior management. You balance between business objectives and information security within the IT domain and provide broad support on these issues. As a proactive professional, you share your knowledge of information security within the organization, with a strong focus on Management and Improvement Chains. Your advice on the implementation and execution of our company-wide information security policy is invaluable. Both internal and external stakeholders know you as the expert on information security at Enexis.

We vinden het belangrijk dat je je bij ons thuis voelt. We zijn allemaal anders en het mooie daarvan is dat we elkaar vanuit die verschillen aanvullen. We hebben elkaars perspectieven en meningen nodig voor een succesvolle energietransitie! Lees hier mee over ons beleid op diversiteit en inclusie.



Wat krijg je van ons?

And we also invest energy in you:

At Enexis, you work at the forefront of one of the greatest challenges of our time: the energy transition. We make sure to take good care of you. This starts with an extensive welcome package and program to get to know your colleagues. Additionally, we offer excellent working conditions:


Salary between € 3.220 and € 4.600 gross per month (based on a 40-hour work week). Including secondary benefits, your salary can rise to € 5920,- gross per month.A 70% contribution to your ABP Optional Pension.Personal budget of 10% and a 13th-month salary of 10.7% of your gross annual salary. You can use this budget flexibly or have it paid out monthly or annually.24.5 vacation days for a full-time employment. Need more recharging time? With your personal budget and 13th-month salary, you can buy up to 35.5 additional leave days.Opportunities to work from home, including a home office setup provided by us and a € 25 monthly allowance.Laptop or tablet and phone that you can use privately as well.Travel allowance and a first-class public transport subscription for business use.Vitality budget of € 500 for, for example, a gym membership.Opportunities for growth with our internal development platform or through external training and courses.


Read more about our employment terms.

Work as a Information Security Officer (ISO) - Young Professional on the energy of tomorrow!

Apply at the bottom of this page. You will receive a response within two weeks. If you have questions about the position, please contact Klara Sarti, Campus Recruiter, at klara.sarti@enexis.nl or at 0615457248.

Good to know

After your application, you will receive an email with more information about the procedure. This usually consists of two interviews: a first (online) interview with the manager and recruiter and a second interview with your future colleagues on-site (Arnhem). A screening is part of the application process. This may include an assessment, reference checks, and a Certificate of Conduct (VOG). You will receive more information about this during the procedure. This Junior Information Security Officer (ISO) - Young Professional Program starts on

June 1, 2025.

Title: Full Stack Developer (f/m/d)
Description:
Tangany, based in Munich, is a highly innovative technology company with a market-leading B2B solution for the custody of digital assets on the blockchain (e.g. cryptocurrencies, tokenized assets, NFTs). Our solution is already used by more than 40 institutional customers. Tangany is regulated by the German federal financial supervisory authority, BaFin.
Using our modern blockchain API, we enable our customers to easily and securely integrate blockchain functionalities into their systems. This white-label solution saves high development costs and time, enabling fast market access and easy usability for end users. Regulatory requirements can be covered for appropriate assets via Tangany's crypto custody license if required.
For our continued growth, we are looking for a Full Stack Developer (f/m/d) to join our Platform team.
Tasks

Collaborate with a team of experienced developers on enhancing and maintaining the foundational platform that supports all our key products. 
Support our product owner and development team by providing technical insights during the design process of new products & features, especially in the area of API design. 
Collaborate on discussions about architecture, software design, and implementations. 
Develop scalable and secure backend services and APIs based on node.js using TypeScript. 
Develop user-friendly frontend web applications using React consuming a GraphQL API. 
Bring in your DevOps mindset to implement and maintain Microsoft Azure CI/CD pipelines, ensuring the highest quality standards while continuously delivering customer value. 
Be responsible for testing, rollout, and go-live of product increments. 
Develop and maintain standards for our software development, especially regarding code quality, clean code, automated testing and deployment, diagnostics, and monitoring.

Requirements

Proven experience in designing and developing REST and GraphQL APIs using TypeScript and node.js. Experience using NestJS is an advantage. 
Experience in building frontend applications with React and Tailwind; familiarity with Relay and Cypress is an advantage. 
Ideally, proven experience in the Microsoft Azure ecosystem, including Azure Functions and Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines. 
Strong proficiency in SQL databases (e.g. MSSQL), with hands-on experience in query optimization, database migrations, and transaction management. Experience in performance optimization is a significant advantage. 
Solid knowledge of NoSQL databases like CosmosDB and/or MongoDB.
Knowledge of web architectures, as well as API design and communication with OAuth2-based authentication methods. 
Ideally, experience in the areas of software security and automated testing. 
Hands-on experience deploying applications using Kubernetes and Helm charts is a significant advantage. 
Interest in blockchain technology is essential; technical blockchain know-how is an advantage. 
Fluency in English (at least B2); German is a plus.

Benefits
Flexibility & work-life balance:

30 days of vacation plus 1/2 day off December 24th and December 31st and additional unpaid leave if needed to recharge your battery.
Two weeks extra paid vacation for new parents
Possibility to work from home or any other place within Germany (depending on the role) or in our beautiful and fun office located in the heart of Munich.
Possibility to go on workation for up to 40 days per year.
Flexible working hours, you work when you are most productive.

Your development:

It starts from day one: With our onboarding that is tailored to your needs, you will receive a structured onboarding plan and feedback talks within the probation period (and of course after).
We grow and we want you to grow with us. Learning on the job, becoming a blockchain expert, exchanging knowledge with our highly motivated, well-rehearsed team with diverse skill sets, as well as taking part in individual training - our learning culture enables you to bring your personal and professional development to the next level.
Once a year we evaluate your career pathway and take the next steps in the right direction.

Wellbeing:

We offer free yoga classes on tuesday and thursdays.
Fun at work: A match with a colleague at our ping pong table, enjoy an after-work drink with your colleagues on our amazing rooftop terrace, take part in our team events.

Remuneration and additional benefits:

An attractive annual salary in line with the market standards.
The possibility of virtual shares (ESOP) in the company.
Your choice of hardware: Mac or Windows
Your choice between EGYM Wellpass subsidy or Job Ticket

+++ ONLY APPLICATIONS FROM GERMANY +++ NO HEADHUNTERS +++

Tangany, based in Munich, is a highly innovative fintech company with a market leading b2b solution for the custody of digital assets (e.g. crypto currencies, tokenized securities, NFTs) on blockchain networks. Our solution is already employed by more than 60 institutional customers. Tangany is regulated by the German federal financial supervisory authority BaFin.

Our customers integrate blockchain protocols into their systems easily and reliably through our APIs. This white-label solution saves substantial cost and time for proprietary developments and enables quick market readiness and simplified use for end customers. If needed, regulatory requirements can be covered by Tangany's German license for crypto custody.

Title: Software Engineering Intern (School of Code)
Description:
We believe it takes great people to create a great product. That’s why our team lives our company values, and we hire based on them, too. Since 2010, Pipedrive has been on a mission to support sales and marketing teams with easy-to-use, powerful tools that make everyday work faster and easier. Today, our cloud-based software is trusted by over 100,000 companies and used in 179 countries. We have grown from a five-person team to a truly international company of over 850+ people, representing more than 50 nationalities, with ten offices distributed across Europe and the US. In 2020, Pipedrive received a majority investment from Vista Equity Partners, a global investment firm that invests exclusively in enterprise software, data and technology-enabled businesses, making Pipedrive the fifth unicorn from Estonia.

One wise man once said that life isn’t about finding yourself but about creating yourself.

Are you a fresh university graduate or in your final year of studies and trying to land your first tech job? Have you done some pet projects but aren’t sure how things are done in large companies? Or maybe you’ve been studying software development independently and looking for job opportunities?

Pipedrive will provide you with a chance to learn how industry-level software development is done at one of Estonia's unicorns. We’re looking for motivated candidates who may not have prior work experience but can showcase their dedication and passion for IT through university or personal projects, hobby apps, and other independent initiatives.

We will take 10 interns, and the internship will take place from April 07 to June 20 in Pipedrive’s Tallinn office. 

Your new adventure:

Participate in an eleven-week intensive training and team projectLearn and practice Pipedrive’s tech stack (NodeJS, React, Fastify, Knex, SQL, Docker)Receive 1000€ monthly stipend and free equipment during your internshipWork with engineers from Pipedrive, who will mentor you throughout the processEnjoy a vibrant workplace with perks, snacks, and office dogsTake part in tons of fun experiences!

 Does this sound like you?

You’re strongly motivated to land your first software engineering jobOpen to learning new skills and working as part of a teamReady to commit to the program full-time in our Tallinn officeYou can speak and understand English

Why Pipedrive?

People-first culture - Be part of a team that values authenticity, champions collaboration, and supports each other—no egos, just teamwork. Work alongside top talent from around the world in an inclusive space where different perspectives fuel our best ideas. Everyone is welcomeUnlock potential – Push boundaries, take ownership, and experiment with the latest technologies as we enhance our AI First Vision. We empower bold ideas that drive real changeWe’ve got you – Your well-being matters. Enjoy flexible hours, wellness perks and SWAG. Think performance-based bonuses, 28 paid leave days, well-being days, compassionate leave, and even pawternal leave—because we take care of ourselves and our peopleGrow with us – Whether through mentorship, coaching, or internal mobility, we invest in helping you unlock your potential. Open, honest feedback and clear communication are at our core. We grow together through trust and accountability Packed with purpose – Help 100,000+ small and medium-sized businesses grow and succeed while doing meaningful, customer-driven work

How to apply? 

Click "Apply now" below and send us your CV and a short video (2 minutes max) introducing yourself, describing your previous studies/experience and telling us why you’re interested in our program. We don’t care about your video editing skills, we just want to get to know you! (please, share your video with us via a link we can access: link to an unlisted video on YouTube, link to Google Drive, etc.)

Application deadline: March 10th, 2025

Please note that at this time, we are unable to offer visa or relocation for this role, therefore we only accept applications from people already in Tallinn. 

Based on this role's access to certain data, Pipedrive might conduct a pre-employment background investigation in conjunction with your application for employment with our company. Such data will be handled in accordance with Pipedrive's Privacy Policy for Recruitment.

Pipedrive is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage diversity in the workplace regardless of age, gender, race, religion, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity or veteran status.

We’re on the lookout for a Software Engineering Intern to take part in our unique learning-focused internship and start a career in the tech industry.

If this is something for you, send us your resume (in English) or a link to your LinkedIn profile and please add why we should pay extra attention to your application.

The company is backed by majority holder Vista Equity Partners, Bessemer Venture Partners, Insight Partners, Atomico, and DTCP. 

Learn more at www.pipedrive.com.

Title: Cyber Security Internship
Description:
Primary Location

Netherlands-The Hague

NATO Body

NATO Communications and Information Agency (NCIA)

Schedule

Full-time

Application Deadline

16-Mar-2025, 11:59:00 PM

Salary (Pay Basis)

1,424.59

Grade

INTERN

For more than 75 years, NATO’s mission has been to preserve peace and security in the Alliancefor nearly one billion citizens. The NATO Communications and Information Agency (NCIA) is NATO’s technology and cyber hub. We are a team of 3000 civilian and military staff, working together to connect all corners of NATO and maintain its Edge from 30 locations across the Alliance.

We are a key partner in NATO's Digital Transformation, working hand in hand with industry to provide technical solutions and expertise, facilitating political consultations and decision-making, and enabling multi-domain operations.

Our experts provide secure static and deployable communications infrastructure, satellite communications and information technology services, connected the Alliance’s forces, and strengthening NATO’s defence and deterrence posture. Fulfilling NCIA’s missions is possible because of our greatest force, our people. In order to reinforce NATO’s edge, we aim to hire, train and retain the very best staff.

Our staff members represent both the diversity and unity of our Alliance. When you join NCIA, you will be part of an organization where you can contribute authentically to the mission and purpose of NATO and help us ensure seamless connectivity among Allied partner nations.

About The Program

The NCIA internship is a 6-month program based at one of our key hubs in The Netherlands, Belgium or Portugal. Our internship opportunities start from either 1 March or 1 September with the start date being dependent on the timeline to secure the required security clearance to work within the NATO community. During an internship, you will join and support a diverse international team and simultaneously learn from our experts via on-the-job training, working independently on purposeful projects or initiatives during your tenure.

About The Internship

Internship duration: 6 months

Location:  The Hague, Netherlands 

The NATO Cyber Security Centre (NCSC) is responsible for planning and executing all lifecycle management activities for cyber security. In execution of this responsibility, it provides specialist cyber security-related services covering the spectrum of scientific, technical, acquisition, operations, maintenance, and sustainment support. NCSCprovides services in the specialist security areassuch as: CIS Security, Cyber Defence, Information Assurance, Computer Security and Communications Security.

The intern will be assigned to a project for integrating Authonomous Cyber Defence agents with automated cloud incident responses.

 Duties and Responsibilities : 

 Assist in designing, deploying and maintaining an IaC-based cloud infrastructure. Develop, test and integrate automated and AI-based incident response workflows. Participate in research and development initiatives. Support preparation of publications and presentations.


 About you: 

The valuable knowledge and experience that you bring to this role is:

 Basic cybersecurity knowledge Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) Hands on experience with IaC tools (Terraform, Ansible) Hands on experience with programming\scripting languages (Python, Bash)


 Incident management  : 

Follows agreed procedures to identify, register and categorise incidents.Gathers information to enable incident resolution and allocates incidents as appropriate.

 IT infrastructure  : 

Contributes, under supervision, to routine infrastructure operation. Gains understanding of infrastructure components and services by following the activities of experienced colleagues.

 Research  : 

Within given research goals, assists in selection and review of credible and reliable resources.Searches for relevant material using specialised websites and sources, reads relevant articles to update knowledge of the relevant field.Reports on work carried out and may contribute sections of publication-quality material.Curates, under guidance, a personal collection of relevant material.

 Eligibility Criteria 

To be eligible to apply for our internship program, you will need to meet the following criteria:

 You are a national of a NATO member country You are currently studying towards a university-level degree or have recently graduated in the past 12 months A thorough knowledge of one of the two NATO languages, both written and spoken, is essential and some knowledge of the other is desirable. Most of the work of the NCI Agency is conducted in the English language.


We also request that you please attach the following documents to your application form:

 Copy of the university degree you have completed and/or Proof of ongoing studies with the dates clearly mentioned if you are still studying


 Application Process: 

The application process for an internship at NCIA is:

Ø Apply via the NCIA Careers site by 23:59 CET 16 th March 2025

Ø If selected to progress to the first stage evaluation this will consist of a logic, numeracy and behavioral gamification exercises in addition to on-demand video questions aligned to the requirements of the internship

Ø Virtual interviews will take place in the month of April

Ø Tentative offer to be presented to successful candidates in early May

Compensation

Netherlands

You will be compensated at a fixed taxable rate of 1,424.59 EUR per month, based on 38 hours of work per week and for reasonable travel expenses to start on day 1 and to return to your home location once the internship is complete.

Thank you for your patience while we consider your application.To learn more about NCIA and our work, please visit our website .

NCIA prides itself on being an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment of mutual respect and value uniqueness and differences in gender, gender identity, race, ethnic or cultural origin, age, religion, sexual orientation and physical or neurocognitive ability.

Additional details on the conditions of application can be found via the NCIA career site.

Title: Junior IT Business Analyst
Description:
A PwC-nél azon dolgozunk, hogy együttműködve segítsük ügyfeleinket a megalapozott döntések meghozatalában, hatékony működésben, és közösen formáljuk a jövőt. Ehhez az izgalmas kihíváshoz élvezetes feladatokat és inspiráló munkakörnyezetet kínálunk.

Jól hangzik? Most lehetőség van, hogy Te is csatlakozz SmartTax csapatunkhoz Junior IT Business Analyst pozícióba.

SmartTax fejlesztői csapatunk ügyfeleink számviteli rendszereihez dolgoz ki okos megoldásokat. Ha magabiztos project management tudással rendelkezel, szívesen dolgoznál komplex multinacionális szakmai környezetben, akkor téged keresünk!

Miért izgalmas ez a lehetőség?

Munkád során lehetőséged nyílik részt venni globális, regionális projektekben, illetve hazai, ügyfél projektekben is;Szakmai fejlődési lehetőségek várnak rád (pl.: trainingek);A legújabb technológiákat ismerheted meg és használhatod nálunk;Inspiráló és fiatalos multinacionális közegben dolgozhatsz. 

Feladataid a következők lesznek:

Kulcsfontosságú szerepet fogsz betölteni, ahogy ügyfelek igényeit tolmácsolod fejlesztőink felé, és okos megoldásaink implementációját, optimalizálását koordinálod;Professzionális támogató dokumentumok (Blueprint dokumentumok, felhasználói útmutatók, folyamatábrák, tesztelési jegyzőkönyvek, stb.) készítésében számítunk rád;A projektek során lehetőséged lesz pénzügyi folyamatokat optimalizálni, pénzügyi rendszereket specifikálni és konfigurálni;Lehetőséged nyílik a csapat munkáját támogatni (prezentációk és ajánlatok készítése, termékismertetők megfogalmazása). 

Ahhoz, hogy sikeres legyél a kiválasztási folyamatban, az alábbi kompetenciákkal kell rendelkezned:

Legalább 1 év tapasztalattal rendelkezel IT Business Analyst vagy projektmenedzsment területen;Közgazdasági vagy informatikai diplomával rendelkezel;Magabiztosan kommunikálsz angolul írásban és szóban egyaránt; A dokumentáció készítéséhez szükséges eszközöket (pl. Office eszközök, Visio, markdown) ismered;Előnynek számít a Jira, YouTrack vagy más project management tool ismerete;Előnyt jelent, ha ismered a Microsoft Azure technológiákat;Előnyt jelent, ha rendelkezel már MS Power Platform, egyéb low-coding platformok vagy bármilyen programnyelv ismeretével. 

Miért minket válassz?

Változatos feladatokkal teli munkakörnyezet és folyamatos szakmai fejlődés: nálunk lehetőséged nyílik arra, hogy tapasztalatot szerezz, miközben fejleszted képességeidet egy ösztönző, támogató közegben. Rugalmas munkarend és home office lehetőség: igény szerint te oszthatod be a munkaidődet, és részben otthonról is dolgozhatsz. Támogatás a tanulás és fejlődés útján: számos üzleti és digitális tréning, valamint egyéb workshopok várnak, hogy folyamatosan fejleszthesd személyes és szakmai képességeidet. Sokszínű juttatási csomag az alapbéren felül: éves bónusz rendszerünkön felül minden kollégánknak SZÉP-kártya, home office támogatás, és magán egészségügyi szolgáltatás biztosított. Céges sportolási lehetőségek, edzőtermi kedvezmények és változatos egészségmegőrző programok biztosítják a testi-lelki feltöltődést. Aktív közösségi élet, melyet a cég különböző programok segítségével (pl. “all staff” események, csapatépítők) támogat. Központi helyen, kényelmes irodában dolgozhatsz: székhelyünk a Nyugati tér mellett található patinás Eiffel Palace. A PwC-nél a sokszínűségben hiszünk, mivel ez az alapja a felelősségteljes kultúránknak és a hosszútávú értékteremtésnek. Célunk, hogy befogadó és támogató munkahelyet biztosítsunk a megváltozott munkaképességű munkavállalóknak is. 

Felkeltettük az érdeklődésed? Jelentkezz hozzánk, és építsd tovább nálunk a karriered!

További információt az Adó és jogi szolgáltatást nyújtó üzletágról, a benne található csapatokról, nekik a működésükről a következő oldalon találhatsz.

Title: Information Technology Operations Specialist
Description:
Due to the continued growth of the company, we are seeking a proactive and experienced specialist to be our first dedicated IT hire at Validaide. This is an expert but also hands-on role where you will be responsible for managing, executing and continuously improving IT and security operations. You will continue to develop and implement IT strategies, run information security projects such as the roll-out of AI within the organization, ensure the security and integrity of our systems, and work closely with other departments to support our customers and software development activities. Given the scope of this role, many of the activities will be carried out directly by you, particularly in the initial stages. In addition, you will collaborate closely with Quality Management to seek out synergies with the QMS.
You will report directly to the CTO and effectively take over as many as possible information security responsibilities and activities. You will also lead the internal 'ISMS' focus group which is an in-house group of team members that currently jointly take care of information security activities.
Key Responsibilities:IT Infrastructure Management: Oversee and directly manage the maintenance and optimization of IT infrastructure, including networks, servers, and software applications.ISMS Management: Maintain and continuously improve our ISMS to ensure compliance with ISO 27001, including conducting regular reviews, updates, and audits.Security Management: Develop and implement security policies and protocols, monitor and analyze security events, performing hands-on tasks to protect company data and systems from cyber threats.Compliance Management: Ensure compliance with relevant security standards and regulations (e.g., GDPR, ISO 27001) and support internal and external audits.Customer Support: Assist customers by responding to security and compliance questionnaires, providing necessary documentation and information, as well as support customer audits.Risk Assessment: Conduct regular security audits and risk assessments, and develop and implement strategies to mitigate identified risks.Incident Response: Lead and execute the response to IT security incidents, including investigation, resolution, and post-incident analysis.Direct Execution: Given the hands-on nature of this role, take a direct approach in executing many IT and security activities due to the absence of an immediate team.Vendor Management: Manage relationships with IT vendors and service providers, ensuring quality and cost-effectiveness.
Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.3+ years of experience in IT and security management, preferably in a hands-on role.Strong knowledge of IT infrastructure, cloud, and security best practices.Experience with maintaining and improving ISMS in line with ISO 27001 standards, or willingness to learnKnowledge of regulatory compliance standards (21 CFR Part 11, GAMP 5), are a plusProficiency in risk management, compliance, and incident response.Strong problem-solving and analytical abilities.Fluent in English; Dutch language skills are a plus.Ability to work independently and handle multiple tasks with minimal supervision.
Preferred Skills:Certifications in administering e.g. MS Entra ID, M365, etc.Certifications such as CISSP, CISM, etc.Experience with cloud technologies and security (M365, MS Entra, Datadog, etc).Familiarity with regulatory requirements in the Netherlands and the EU.
What We Offer:A chance to be an integral part of a dynamic and growing team.Competitive salary and benefits package.Opportunities for personal and professional development.Flexible working hours and remote work options.
In addition, Validaide offsets the carbon emitted of our work activities for every employee, in partnership with a company called Ecologi. You can see our contribution here:https://ecologi.com/validaide

Validaide was founded in 2016 to support the logistics industry with innovative solutions for supplier qualification and lane risk assessments. Working closely with all types of logistics providers, we aim to standardize and digitalize supplier qualification and lane risk assessment processes, related to pharmaceutical and healthcare transports.

With a sophisticated community capabilities platform, we search for innovative ways to make the pharmaceutical and other special cargo industries more efficient

Title: Business Analyst (Power BI)
Description:
We are Concord EU! We help optimize leading North American and European businesses through expertly developed products based on artificial intelligence, cloud applications and well-designed user experiences. Our Concord EU teams digitize traditional businesses and help launch new digital business models.
We're seeking a Functional Business Analyst to act as a vital link between our business objectives and technical solutions. The ideal candidate will collaborate closely with both business stakeholders and technical teams to gather requirements, prepare documentation, and map data from JDE (JD Edwards) systems to our Global DataHub platform. While primarily focused on business analysis, the role also requires some technical proficiency in Power BI and SQL. Basic knowledge of Microsoft Azure is a plus.
Business Analyst (Power BI) - Remote
Responsibilities:
Work with business stakeholders to understand their needs and translate them into detailed functional requirements.Prepare comprehensive documentation, including Business Requirement Documents (BRDs), data mapping documents, and other related materials.Serve as a liaison between business users and technical teams to ensure clear communication and mutual understanding.Map data from JDE systems to our global data platform to facilitate seamless integration.Utilize Power BI to create reports and dashboards that support business decision-making.Run SQL queries to extract and analyze data as needed.Ensure data integrity and accuracy throughout the data mapping and integration processes.Participate in meetings and workshops to align project goals and deliverables.
Requirements:
Minimum of 3 years of experience as a Business Analyst, preferably with exposure to JDE systems.Strong understanding of data mapping and business analysis methodologies.Proficiency in Power BI and SQL.Excellent documentation skills, with experience in creating BRDs and data mapping documents.Basic knowledge of Microsoft Azure is a plus.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Exceptional communication and interpersonal abilities.Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.Excellent English Skills.
*The position allows a labor contract (available only to Bulgarian citizens), a project-based civil contract, or a B2B arrangement.
If you believe that your profile meets the above requirements and you are interested in joining our team, please apply with your CV in English.
Only short listed candidates will be contacted.
By submitting your application, you acknowledge and consent to the data privacy policies of Condord EU. You grant us use of your personal data for the purpose of validating your professional qualifications for the purposes of potential employment by Concord EU.
Company Description:
Concord helps big companies untangle their business and technology messes. More than just making promises, we are the doers who get results. Together with our USA headquarters, we are on a quest to transform the IT world! 🚀

We focus on five core capabilities: Business Strategy & Alignment, Digital & User Experience, Cloud Applications & Integration, Data Solutions & Analytics, and Information Security.

Title: IT-Helpdesk-Support
Description:

Du bist technikaffin und liebst es, anderen zu helfen? Perfekt! Als IT Support Mitarbeiter bist Du der erste Ansprechpartner bei technischen Fragen und Problemen unserer Kollegen. Mit Deiner proaktiven und lösungsorientierten Arbeitsweise sorgst Du dafür, dass alles rund läuft. Profunde Kenntnisse in Betriebssystemen wie Windows und Erfahrung in der Verwaltung von Azure Active Directory, Exhange und Office 365Fähigkeit zur Durchführung von Remote-Support über verschiedene Plattformen und ToolsStarkes Problemlösungs- und Diagnosevermögen, um technische Probleme effizient zu lösen.Fachwissen in der Konfiguration und Verwaltung von Unternehmensnetzwerken, einschließlich LAN, WLAN, VPN (Sonic Wall) und FirewallsBelastbarkeit und die Fähigkeit, unter Druck zu arbeiten, um zeitkritische Probleme zu lösen und Service-Level-Vereinbarungen einzuhaltenErfahrung mit Datenmanagement und DatensicherheitKommunikationsstärke und Freude am Umgang mit MenschenTeamfähigkeit und eine selbstständige Arbeitsweise
Unser Angebot:
Zentrale Top Lage: Unser Büro befindet sich in bester Lage von Hamburg, umgeben von einer Vielzahl an Einkaufs- und Essensmöglichkeiten und keine 5 Fußminuten vom Hauptbahnhof entferntAttraktives Büroumfeld: Ein modern gestaltetes Büro mit einer Außenterrasse, Karaoke-Ecke und einer Grillstation für kreative Pausen, ergänzt durch eine Kantine mit einer Auswahl an leckeren und gesunden Speisen, die jeden Gaumen erfreuenWeiterbildung und Entwicklung: Regelmäßige Schulungen und Workshops halten Dich technologisch auf dem neuesten StandFrischekick: frischer Orangensaft, Kaffeespezialitäten, Obst – immer gratisMitarbeiter-Vorzüge: Sonderkonditionen auf Produkte, die das Zuhause verschönernNachhaltige Mobilität: Beitrag zum Deutschlandticket für Deine Umwelt

Als IT Support Mitarbeiter wirst Du:Benutzer bei technischen Problemen unterstützen und Lösungen bereitstellenHardware und Software installieren und konfigurierenFehler systematisch analysieren und behebenSoftwareupdates und Sicherheitspatches verwaltenDatensicherungen durchführen und bei Datenwiederherstellung assistierenNetzwerksicherheit überwachen und Sicherheitsrichtlinien implementierenBenutzerkonten und Berechtigungen verwaltenSupportanfragen und Lösungen dokumentierenSchulungen für Benutzer durchführenMit Benutzern kommunizieren und sie über den Fortschritt von Supportanfragen informieren
Über uns: 
Über 50 Jahre pure Leidenschaft – seit 1969. Kabs ist der führende Fachmarktbetreiber für Polstermöbel und Boxspringbetten mit Produkten im Konsumbereich bis hin zu hochwertigen Designermöbeln. Unsere Kunden finden uns in Schleswig-Holstein, Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Hamburg, Niedersachsen, Bremen, Nordrhein-Westfalen, Sachsen und 24/7 auf www.kabs.de
Kabs ist ein SPITZENTEAM, in dem wir jeden Tag Höchstleistungen bringen. Das Grundgerüst für unsere tägliche Weiterentwicklung sind Vertrauen, Respekt und wertschätzende Zusammenarbeit. Wir arbeiten miteinander, nicht gegeneinander.
Wir freuen uns auf Deine Bewerbung!
Bereit für Deine Rolle als IT-Held? Dann bewirb Dich jetzt und werde Teil unseres dynamischen Teams. Nutze unser Online-Bewerbungsformular und teile uns Deine Gehaltsvorstellungen sowie den frühestmöglichen Eintrittstermin mit.Für Rückfragen stehen wir Dir jederzeit gern zur Verfügung: Du erreichst uns per Mail an work@kabs.de oder telefonisch unter der Rufnummer (040) 210 910 199.
