Title: Junior Data Protection Consultant
Description:
Cegeka legt momenteel een wervingsreserve aan van junior Data Protection Consultants en zoekt hiervoor masters met een passie voor gegevensbescherming en informatiebeveiliging met minimum 1 jaar werkervaring om aan de slag te gaan als Data Protection Consultant. Je past wet- en regelgeving, zoals GDPR, correct toe en integreert deze in de dagelijkse werking van organisaties.

Je start met een intensieve opleiding tot Data Protection Consultant, waarna je aan de slag gaat samen met collega’s in boeiende en uitdagende projecten of in een operationele rol bij klanten. Als consultant: Begeleid en ondersteun je organisaties bij de naleving van richtlijnen en regelgeving rond gegevensbescherming. Stel je kwalitatieve documentatie en rapporten op die voldoen aan hoge standaarden. Adviseer en implementeer je strategieën en verbeteringen vanuit legaal, IT- en informatiebeveiligingsperspectief. Werk je risicogebaseerd en oplossingsgericht aan concrete problemen.Bouw je expertise op in een vakgebied dat steeds belangrijker wordt. Met uitdagende projecten en een sterke focus op persoonlijke ontwikkeling maak je bij Cegeka écht impact! 

Wat breng jij mee?

Sterke basis: Je hebt een bachelor IT én een eerste werkervaring in het ruime kader van gegevensbescherming en/of informatiebeveiliging. Of je hebt een masterdiploma in de Rechten, Economische Wetenschappen, Politieke & Sociale Wetenschappen, een Advanced Master in Digital Humanities of gelijkwaardig. Je hebt een eerste werkervaring van minimaal 1 jaar achter de rug. Domeinkennis: Kennis over en affiniteit met Europese gegevensbescherming wet- en regelgevingen zoals de GDPR is een pluspunt maar niet noodzakelijk.Flexibiliteit: Je past je snel aan nieuwe werkomgevingen en taken aan.Werkethiek en specifieke eigenschappen: Je documenteert grondig en graag. Je bent nauwkeurig en pragmatisch. Je bent analytisch en organisatorisch sterk en zoekt graag naar oplossingen voor problemen. IT skills: Je kan vlot overweg met MS Office.Sterke communicator en teamplayer: Je werkt graag samen, maar functioneert ook prima zelfstandig. Met je communicatieve vaardigheden breng je jouw ideeën helder over, zowel in het Engels als in het Nederlands, en eventueel ook in het Frans. 

Wat hebben wij jou te bieden?

We vragen heel wat (talenten) van jou. Gelukkig krijg je er ook heel wat voor terug!Je start bij een Top Employer! Een marktconform loon aangevuld met extralegale voordelen. Een elektrische wagen met laadpas of een mobiliteitsbudget, maaltijdcheques, ecocheques, een interessante groeps- en hospitalisatieverzekering, een gsm-abonnement, een forfaitaire onkostenvergoeding, een krachtige laptop en de mogelijkheid om je salarispakket een eigen accent te geven dankzij ons Flex Reward Plan. Flexibele werkuren én een mooie work/life balans. Een top team: waarin nieuwe frisse ideeën en initiatieven steeds welkom zijn! Team-events, happy hours en een steeds legendarisch bedrijfsfeest horen daar ook bij. Continu bijleren: door innovation centers, leesgroepen, knowledge sharing meetings, hackatons, deelname aan conferenties en externe opleidingen zetten we kennisdeling en bijleren centraal. Mogelijkheid tot groei: afhankelijk van je eigen interesses en initiatieven, biedt Cegeka verschillende horizontale en verticale carrièrepaden. Hybride werken: je werkt vanuit het kantoor van de klant wanneer nodig, bent bereid naar ons kantoor te Diegem te reizen, gecombineerd met thuiswerk. Wij hechten waarde aan duurzaamheid door CO2-neutraliteit na te streven met de elektrificatie van ons wagenpark en een milieuvriendelijk datacenter. We ontwikkelen innovatieve oplossingen met een positieve impact op milieu, mens en maatschappij, en streven naar een inclusieve en diverse werkomgeving waarin iedereen gewaardeerd en gehoord wordt.  

Aspire to more: onze belofte aan jou

Je krijgt bij Cegeka alle ruimte om jezelf als professional verder te ontwikkelen. Samen realiseren we wat je écht wil betekenen voor onze klanten en collega’s. We nodigen je graag uit om met ons mee te groeien. In een ongekende veelzijdigheid aan uitdagende, betekenisvolle IT-projecten. Zet je stempel op projecten voor aansprekende klanten waarbij we het verschil maken. Aspire to more.

Intensief, met veel plezier en betrokkenheid. We werken hier altijd met elkaar samen, in close cooperation met collega’s én met de klant. Binnen een cultuur, gedreven door onze waarden: eigenaarschap, persoonlijke ontwikkeling, respect en authenticiteit. Kom deel uitmaken van de volgende fase van een succesvol, snelgroeiend en innovatief internationaal IT-bedrijf.

As a family-owned company with a global team of over 9,000 professionals, we serve our 2500+ customers across 19 countries. Our ‘In Close Cooperation’ work ethic ensures a commitment to customer-centric partnerships and pragmatic solutions, spanning legacy technology, existing systems and innovation.

Title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER ENGINEER
Description:
Ambisci a poter lavorare per un'azienda fashion retail modernamente digitalizzata e in espansione? Questo è il ruolo giusto che fa per te!
La Capri S.r.l, realtà multinazionale italiana del fashion retail, con i brand Alcott e Gutteridge e una Rete di oltre 130 Stores a gestione diretta, è alla ricerca di un SOFTWARE DEVELOPER ENGINEER da inserire all'interno del proprio Head Quarter di Nola (Napoli).
Posizione
La persona, inserita all’interno della Direzione IT, supporterà il team occupandosi di sviluppo degli attuali progetti gestionali in utilizzo, della ottimizzazione dei processi informatici e parteciperà contestualmente ai nuovi progetti IT in corso di implementazione.Il/la candidato/a ideale sarà parte integrante della nostra crescita aziendale e avrà l'opportunità di lavorare su progetti che permettono - richiedono di attivare soluzioni gestionali innovative.
Responsabilità principali:
Gestione e manutenzione dell’infrastruttura IT aziendale, inclusi server, reti, sistemi dibackup e sicurezza informatica.Supporto tecnico per i punti vendita e gli uffici aziendali, risolvendo problematiche hardwaree software.Implementazione e gestione dei software aziendali (ERP, CRM, gestionali retail, sistemiPOS, e-commerce).Monitoraggio delle prestazioni dei sistemi IT e ottimizzazione delle risorse tecnologiche.Collaborazione con i diversi dipartimenti per migliorare i processi aziendali attraverso l’usodella tecnologia.Coordinamento con fornitori esterni per l'acquisto e la manutenzione delle soluzioni IT.Supporto nella gestione della cybersecurity e conformità alle normative GDPR.Formazione degli utenti interni sull’utilizzo di strumenti e procedure IT.
Requisiti:
Laurea in Informatica, Ingegneria Informatica o discipline affini (o esperienza equivalente).Esperienza pregressa in un ruolo simile, preferibilmente nel settore retail.Conoscenza dei principali sistemi operativi (Windows, MacOS, Linux) e delle reti aziendali.Competenze nella gestione di sistemi ERP, CRM e piattaforme e-commerce.Esperienza con strumenti di cybersecurity e protezione dei dati.Capacità di troubleshooting e problem-solving rapido ed efficace.Ottime doti comunicative e predisposizione al lavoro in team.Capacità di gestione autonoma delle attività e proattività nel proporre soluzioni tecnologicheinnovative.
Altre informazioni
In Capri srl troverai un'azienda strutturata, un ambiente dinamico e fortemente orientato al risultato. Stiamo innovando la tradizione, continuando negli investimenti sulle nuove tecnologie, per offrire a clienti e dipendenti un'esperienza sempre più completa e digitale, senza trascurare l'attenzione per l'ambiente, il futuro e la sostenibilità.
Ti stiamo aspettando, unisciti al nostro team!

What is Capri srl? Capri is an italian fast fashion retailer that, with the brands Alcott and Gutteridge, has widely established in 6 countries with over 200 stores. With 1600 employees, largely under 40, it is one of the youngest and most dynamic companies in Italy and working here can have a great impact on both your life and your career. 
Teamwork, growth, success, change... you can expect to find this and much more when coming and work here: everyday we see new trends being born, we see clothes coming to life from your own designs, stores being built from your project and campaigns running from your ideas. 
You will work with a valued team of highly skilled individuals that will give you the opportunity to thrive and deliver the best performance you can, and to learn from your everyday routine. 
Thanks to our established presence on the territory, you will be able to find a job closer to your loved one or you can try and live somewhere different and experience a new reality. 
From the design department, to the marketing, legal, admin, as long as you're the best in what you do, or if you have what it takes to become the number one, this is the place where you wanna be today!

Title: Information Technology Business Analyst
Description:
We are seeking talented and experienced Business Analysts to join our growing Software Development teams. This is a unique opportunity to work on NAXT, our proprietary ERP solution built on Microsoft Dynamics 365. Tailored specifically for the needs of equipment dealers, NAXT is trusted by thousands of users worldwide to drive efficiency and success in their operations.
We have open positions across multiple teams, offering you the chance to specialize in areas that align with your expertise and interests. If you’re passionate about Logistics or Equipment Sales&Rental-related business processes, you could be the perfect fit for our team.
Why Join Us?Be part of a company that values professional growth and cutting-edge technologyAttractive salary and bonus with various benefits such as private health insurance, cafeteria, and sports passHybrid working opportunityContribute to a globally recognized product that’s transforming the equipment dealership industryCollaborate with a talented, supportive, and innovative teamGet know the latest Microsoft technologies in the industry along with the chance to participate in relevant Microsoft exams and get certifications
As a Business Analyst, you will...Learn the functionality of the D365 Finance and Operations/AX 2012 software as well our product NAXTTranslate business requirements into functional design for the development team to implementDevelop appropriately detailed specifications for product features so that they are clearly understood by the development teams and are in line with XAPT standards/processesWork hand-in-hand with Support and Onsite consulting teams to troubleshoot and classify defects, prioritize appropriately and ensure expected functionality is fully understoodDo testing on bugfixes and enhancement developmentsWork closely with software developers to help them understand business needsOccasionally lead calls/meetings with clientsRun internal training and prepare training materials
What we expect from you:Degree in Business Informatics, Business Administration, Management, Logistics Management or related areaHands-on experience in a similar roleExcellent command of English, both in speaking and writingStriving for continuous learning and development, diligent and responsible attitudeStrong results-orientation combined with excellent judgment and problem-solving skillsDemonstration of outstanding communication skills internally and externally, across teams and functionsDemonstration of attention to detail, strong analytical and problem-solving skillsSolid experience with ERP products (e.g. SAP, MS Dynamics products etc. as a key user, business analyst or consultant)Previous experience with a Microsoft Dynamics product is a huge advantage (e.g. as a key user, business analyst or consultant)Experience gained in Logistics field is an advantage
If you’re ready to take on new challenges and grow with a team of professionals passionate about innovation and technology, we’d love to hear from you!
Company Description:
At XAPT, we believe that information technology can change the world for the better. With 25 years of experience in the equipment industry, we understand how it shapes the world into a better place. Title: Developer Intern
Description:
Rólunk / About us

Az ExxonMobilnál küldetésünknek tekintjük, hogy vezető szerepet vállaljunk az energiaszektor világméretű megújításában, ezáltal elősegítve a modern életforma terjedését, és a zéró kibocsátású jövő építését.

A világ egyik legnagyobb, tőzsdén jegyzett energia- és vegyipari vállalataként olyan egyedi és sokszínű munkavállalói közösséget tudhatunk magunkénak, amely büszkén áll ki vállalatunk tevékenysége és értékei mellett.

Upstream, Product Solutions és Low Carbon Solutions üzletágaink sikere munkatársaink tehetségének, kíváncsiságának és elhivatottságának eredménye. Kollégáink nap mint nap azon dolgoznak, hogy megoldásokat kínáljanak stratégiánk optimalizálására a vegyi anyagok, kenőanyagok és az alacsonyabb szén-dioxid kibocsátású technológiák terén.

Csatlakozz az ExxonMobilhoz, ahol ötleteidet olyan fenntartható megoldások formájában kamatoztathatod, amelyek hozzájárulnak az emberiség életminőségének javításához, miközben a társadalom változó igényeihez is alkalmazkodnak. Tudj meg többet arról, hogy vállalatunk Mit, Miért, és Hogyan csinál, és milyen lehetőségeket kínálunk a közös munkára.

Globális Üzletközpontunkat (Global Business Center - GBC) 2004-ben hoztuk létre Budapesten. Az ExxonMobil világméretű üzletágait mintegy 2000 fős sokszínű, nemzetközi munkavállalói közösségünk segíti. Büszkék vagyunk arra, hogy befogadó, biztonságos és energiával teli munkakörnyezetben dolgozunk, ahol célunk, hogy valamennyi munkatársunk számára izgalmas, hosszú távú karriert biztosítsunk. Együtt fejlődünk, együtt növekedünk. Büszkék vagyunk arra, hogy törekvéseink elismeréseként magunkénak tudhatjuk Az év felelős munkáltatója címet, valamint a Sokszínű munkahelyért és Ergonómiai programért kapott díjainkat.

At ExxonMobil, our vision is to lead in energy innovations that advance modern living and a net-zero future. As one of the world’s largest publicly traded energy and chemical companies, we are powered by a unique and diverse workforce fueled by the pride in what we do and what we stand for.

The success of our Upstream, Product Solutions and Low Carbon Solutions businesses is the result of the talent, curiosity and drive of our people. They bring solutions every day to optimize our strategy in energy, chemicals, lubricants and lower-emissions technologies.

We invite you to bring your ideas to ExxonMobil to help create sustainable solutions that improve quality of life and meet society’s evolving needs. Learn more about our What and our Why and how we can work together.

We established our Global Business Center (GBC) in Budapest in 2004. Our diverse, international community of around 2000 employees supports ExxonMobil's global business sectors. We take pride in working in an inclusive, secure, and dynamic work environment filled with energy. Our goal is to provide every team member with an exciting and long-term career. We grow together, we develop together. We are proud to have earned recognition for our efforts, including the title of Responsible Employer of the Year and awards for Diversity in the Workplace and Ergonomics programs.

A te szereped a csapatban / What role will you play in our team

IT csapatunk erősítésére keresünk olyan Automation Developer gyakornokot, akivel a 6 hónapos gyakornoki program után is együtt dolgozunk hosszú távon és közösen nézünk szembe az energia szektor kihívásaival. A gyakornoki csapatunk tagjaként lehetőséged lesz automatizálni az üzleti és IT folyamatainkat, az egész szervezetünk számára értékteremtő és érdekes feladatokon dolgozni, beleérte a Cyber Security, Software Engineering, API Development, Cloud Operations, Network Operations és egyéb területeket. IT projekteken keresztül architektekkel, szakértőkkel együttműködve, multikulturális környezetben szerezhetsz tapasztalatot a legújabb technológiákról.

At our IT Organization we are looking for University students to join our 6 month Internship program as Automation Developer Intern to help take on the world’s energy challenges with us through a career in ExxonMobil.

Forming part of an Intern team working on automating business and IT processes, you will be trusted with interesting tasks bringing business value across our entire organization, including Cyber Security, Software Engineering, API Development, Cloud Operations and Network Operations and so on. As an Intern you will have the opportunity to participate in real IT projects and work together with our architects, subject matter experts as part of a multicultural environment gaining valuable experience in cutting edge new technologies.

Our Global Business Center (GBC) in Budapest was established in 2004. Our diverse and multinational workforce of ~2,000 fellow colleagues has been powering ExxonMobil’s global businesses ever since. We are proud to work in an inclusive, safe, and vibrant work environment and we are aiming to provide an exciting, long term career to all our employees. We develop together, we grow together. Proudly awarded as Responsible employer of the year and received HRKomm award for Diverse workplace and award for Ergonomic program.

Mi lesz a feladatod? / What you will do

Együttműködés más IT csapatokkalNapi szintű kollaboráció architektekkel és szakértőkkelDefiniált és priorizált feladatok, projektekAgile munkametódus alkalmazása a DevOps csapatbanÚj end-to-end megoldások létrehozása központjaink számáraA gyakornoki idő végére komplett megoldás fejlesztése, bevezetése, dokumantálásaTapasztalat .NET, Python, Java, Javascript, HTML5 és adatbázis technológiákban Azure Cloud vagy AWS ismereteAlapvető ismeretek CI/CD: Github, Jenkins, Azure DevOps technológiákbanOktatás biztosítása az automation munka elsajátítására gyakorlati példákon keresztülPartner with other IT teams in the organizationCollaborate with architects and subject matter experts on an everyday basisWork on pre-defined and prioritized automation tasks and projectsWork as part of a DevOps team of Interns practicing agile methodologyCreate new end to end productivity and business solutions for our offices and production sitesBy the end of the internship develop and implement solutions with documentationWe are offering trainings to understand the automation concept through used cases and best practices

Téged keresünk / About you: skills and qualifications

Ha folyamatban vannak az informatikai BSc vagy MSc tanulmányaid Ha van tapasztalatod programozás, monitorozás, automation területenHa érdekel az Automation DevelopmentHa jó probléma megoldó és analitikai képességgekkel rendelkezel Ha jól szervezett vagy, hatékony multikulturális környezetben és virtuális csapat munkábanHa jó alapjaid vannak angol nyelvből szóban és írásban Ongoing BSc or MSc studies in Computer Science or relevant fieldSome experience in programming, monitoring and automation Interest in automation developmentExperience in .NET, Python, Java, Javascript, HTML5 and basic knowledge of database technologies is an advantageFamiliarity with Azure Cloud or AWS or any other cloud platforms is welcomedAwareness of CI/CD: Github, Jenkins, Azure DevOpsGood problem solving, planning and analytical skillsStrong organizational and interpersonal skills and effective multi-cultural & virtual team workSolid verbal and written communications skills in English 

Amit Kinálunk / What Awaits You
Lehetőség a gyakornoki pozíció hosszabbításáraRugalmas munkaidőInspiráló és sokszínű csapatokÉrdekes, ösztönző munkakörnyezet nemzetközi cégnélFejlődési lehetőség nyelvtudásod, kommunikációd erősítésére, funkcionális és egyéb képzésekOpportunity for internship extension Flexible working hours Inspiring and diverse working teamsInteresting, stimulating work environment in an international atmosphereOpportunities to enhance communication and language skills, job specific and broader trainings

Learn more at our website

Get an insight from one of our employees

Title: Frontend Developer with Angular
Description:
HCLTech is a global technology company, home to more than 220,755 + people across 60 countries, delivering industry-leading capabilities centered around digital, engineering, cloud, and AI, powered by a broad portfolio of technology services and products. We work with clients across all major verticals, providing industry solutions for Financial Services, Manufacturing, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Technology and Services, Telecom and Media, Retail and CPG, and Public Services. Consolidated revenues as of 12 months ending December 2024 totaled $13.8 billion.


Responsibilities: • Design, develop and implement our client's Geospatial Enterprise Platform; guide the project development to ensure alignment of the platforms with business short-term and long-term needs. • Collaborates with Architecture, Office of Information Security, and Infrastructure teams to design and implement the solutions. • Ensure application performance, uptime, and scalability requirements are met by maintaining high standards of code quality and thoughtful application design. • Maintain knowledge of current technologies, research emerging technologies and industry trends, and make recommendations on implementation. • Remain current in state-of-the-art software frameworks and programming methods. • Guide the project development to ensure alignment of the platforms with business short-term and long-term needs. 

Requirements:• Bachelor’s degree in Math, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.• Strong hands-on development experience using Angular 14+, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML/CSS.• Experience with spatial database, specifically PostgreSQL. • Experience in engineering cloud solutions and architectures on one or more cloud providers - Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, and/or Google Cloud Platforms. • Experience in using Web mapping API experience (ArcGIS JavaScript Leaflet, MapBox, OpenLayers, Google Maps, Google Earth Engine) will be a plus.• Experience with spatial database, specifically PostgreSQL.

Title: Software Engineer
Description:
Project
As a Software Engineer you will be able to make a valuable contribution every day to improving the quality of life of our patients of home dialysis therapies with the development of peritoneal dialysis devices.
Work
You will be a part of an interdisciplinary, cross-functional team in an agile context, which, together with other teams, independently drives the development and maintenance of our innovative product range and thus shapes the future of therapy systems.‍Your responsibilities will include:
A high-quality implementation in terms of functional security, testability of individual functions and easy maintainability is your top priorityYou will create solutions by designing software and software components (esp. in C/C++), developing software requirements from system/product requirements and creating the necessary documentation as a contribution to the analysis of software and cybersecurity risksYou will ensure quality by developing and executing software tests, especially unit tests and integration tests, and performing code reviews and checking countermeasuresYou will also be involved in supporting the development of software system test procedures as part of the verification of software and device functions, as well as performing failure analysis and developer testing as an important part of the challengeTogether with your team, you will be responsible for the technical design of the implementation of new product features as well as the maintenance of existing product variantsIterative-incremental development of software is a welcome approach for you and the basis for customer-centric development of software that creates valueYou develop your highest creativity in the team, but independent analysis and solving of tricky challenges are also part of your job‍We are looking for a person with the following experience:
Several years of professional experience in embedded software development on Linux platformsSeveral years of experience in C++ and C programming languagesKnowledge of scripting languages like PythonKnowledge of agile software development approaches, preferably ScrumKnowledge of various software testing methodologies (unit testing, integration testing, software system testing, regression testing, etc.)Knowledge of writing software requirements for functional safetyKnowledge regarding the secure (cyber security) development of softwareFamiliar with software architecture modelling tools such as Enterprise Architect, software configuration management tools such as Azure DevOps and GitStructured way of working and good organizational skillsFluency in English both in written and spoken
Our Offer
Support – You will have a Qdev buddy by your side Flexibility – Flexible working hours, vacation schedule Online and offline training/workshops and other knowledge-sharing possibilities Additional health and personal accident insurance Snacks and fun activities in the office Additional time off Personal and sport budget Loyalty benefits and perks Agile, friendly and international environment Gross salary in a range of 4600-6000 EUR (negotiable, based on competencies)

Title: IT Security Analyst (m/w/d)
Description:
Unser Kunde ist einer der wichtigsten Partner von gesetzlichen Krankenkassen in Deutschland und Treiber der Digitalisierung durch die Entwicklung und Betreuung von Informationssystemen, Apps und Plattformen.
Mit innovativen Technologien und hohen Sicherheitsstandards wird sich für den Schutz der Daten von 30 Millionen Versicherungsnehmern eingesetzt und leistet somit einen hohen Beitrag in der Gesellschaft.
Für das deutschlandweit agierende Secure Infrastructure Team sind wir aktuell auf der Suche nach einem IT Security Analyst (m/w/d).

Das bringst du mit:Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Studium in (Wirtschafts-)Informatik, IT-Sicherheit oder eine vergleichbare Ausbildung mit entsprechender BerufserfahrungMehrjährige Erfahrung im Bereich Cyber Security bzw. in der Analyse und Bewertung von Security Incidents (idealerweise im Umfeld SOC)Kenntnisse von IT-Sicherheitslösungen - insbesondere mit Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR), Extended Detection and Response (XDR) oder Security and Event Management (SIEM)Fließende Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse
Deine Benefits:Flexible Arbeitsmodelle sowie die Möglichkeit auf HomeofficeIndividuelle Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten mit hoher BudgetierungEine betriebliche Altersvorsorge, Gesundheitsprogramme, Kindergartenzuschuss, 30 Tage Urlaub sowie eine 39-Stunden-Woche

Title: SOC Anayst
Description:
Decskill, founded in 2014 as an IT Consulting Company, places paramount importance on its greatest asset: its people. Our main mission is to deliver value through knowledge and talent, and we achieve this by fostering a culture of excellence and investing in the development and well-being of our people. With over 600 dedicated professionals and offices in Lisbon, Porto, Madrid, and Luxembourg, Decskill operates across three core areas:
DECSKILL TALENT: We believe that our people are key to our success. Through Decskill Talent, we empower our team to embrace the digital transformation challenges of our clients. We collaborate with clients to drive innovation, ensuring project success and business growth.DECSKILL BOOST: Equipping our team with the latest tools and methodologies, we optimize Time-to-Market and deliver innovative solutions exceeding client expectations.DECSKILL CONNECT: Our team collaborates closely with clients to implement and manage IT infrastructures that generate long-term value.
At Decskill, we believe that by nurturing and empowering our people to confront the challenges of digital transformation, we create value not only for our clients but also for our entire ecosystem, fostering a digital community dedicated to growth and progress.
We are looking for a SOC Anayst!
Profile/Mission: Experience with the MSFT security suite is a great asset because the products the client uses in this area are SIEM Sentinel, Defenter, Purview.We are looking for an hands-on profiles, but people who challenge (optimize and define processes) are extremely valued. You will interact not only with SIEM Sentinel but also with ITSM Jira.
Responsibilities:Monitoring the platform and other systems that generate vulnerability alerts and security incident events.Periodic verification of sources to be managed and analysis of security events.Identification and notification of security alerts.Recording security incidents.Carrying out the first level of incident handling (assessment, triage, identification of actions to be taken, escalation, validation).Verifying the effective resolution of incidents.Identifying technical vulnerabilities.
Requirements:Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Cybersecurity, Management Information Systems or related field.Experience in network security.Experience in SoC environment valued.Experience with Blueteam (Plus).Ability to work in a team.Interest in research.
If you’re interested in this job please send your CV in to cesaltina.abreu@decskill.com with the reference “CA/SOC”.

Description:
Magyarország vezető tartalomszolgáltatója, a Central Médiacsoport Zrt. kutató-elemző csoportjába keres Adatfeldolgozó elemző munkatársat.A Central Médiacsoport Zrt. élen jár az innovatív hirdetési megoldások bevezetésében és tökéletesítésében, melyek magas szintű piacelemzésekre épülnek. Title: AI Engineer - Google
Description:
Quale sarà la tua sfida?

Il nostro team di Artificial Intelligence Engineering che lavora verticalmente su piattaforme Google Cloud (GCP) si impegna a supportare i clienti nel percorso di adozione dell’intelligenza artificiale attraverso la realizzazione di factory di soluzioni di AI, azionabili e integrate nell'architettura e nei processi aziendali.

La figura dell’AI Engineer progetta soluzioni software di Machine Learning (ML) scalabili per i casi d'uso dei clienti e le industrializza per l’esecuzione in produzione garantendo i livelli richiesti di performance, sicurezza e governabilità.

L’AI Engineer lavora a stretto contatto con altre figure di Bip xTech, come Cloud Data Architects, Data Scientists e Data Engineer, per realizzare soluzioni ML di alta qualità sotto ogni aspetto: disegnando e implementando per il team strumenti di lavoro come le piattaforme di MLOps, fornendo linee guida e best practise sulle architetture dati e di AI, supportando l’implementazione del software e funzionalità di osservabilità dell’AI, e altro ancora.

Sarai tu a entrare nel nostro team?

 Requisiti fondamentali

 Laurea specialistica in Ingegneria Informatica, Data Science, Informatica o discipline affini (STEM); Esperienza nell’utilizzo della piattaforma Google Cloud; Esperienza nello sviluppo di software in almeno un linguaggio, come per esempio: Python, Scala, Java, e/o simili; Esperienza nel disegno di soluzioni software e nell’implementazione di strutture dati, algoritmi; Esperienza nell’utilizzo degli strumenti di Code Repository, come per esempio: GitHub, GitLab, Azure DevOps e/o simili. Conoscenza dei concetti, algoritmi e metodologie di Machine Learning. Esperienza con linguaggi SQL per il design, query e gestione dei database; esperienza nell’utilizzo di linguaggi SQL per le attività di ETL. Indispensabile la conoscenza fluente di Italiano e Inglese professionali.  

Plus

 Esperienza nell’utilizzo delle piattaforme cloud (esempio: Google, AWS, Azure); Conoscenza dei concetti e tecnologie di Big Data e Data Warehousing (esempio: Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Kafka); Esperienza con framework e metodologie di Deep Learning (esempio: Tensorflow, Torch, Caffe, Theano).  

 

Perchè Bip?

People at the center of our culture

Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialità e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.

Lavorare in BIP è un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti. 

Challenge yourself

Avrai la possibilità di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attività e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, l’autonomia e la capacità di assumerti responsabilità e metterti in gioco.

Unlocking your potential

Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi all’avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.

Work-life Integration

Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworking fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

Valorizziamo l’unicità e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutti abbiano pari opportunità di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversità e all’inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrità e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, più ampi.

Promuoviamo l’inserimento e l’integrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette – in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 –.

Next Steps

Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prenderemo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.

Se c’è un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte all’interno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.

L’iter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.

L’ordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.

In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunità future.

Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.

Su di Noi

Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato l’esperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: l’innovazione e la digitalizzazione.

Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze più all’avanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.

Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualità su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.

Crediamo nel valore dell’eccellenza, che è la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.

Title: Python Developer / DevOps (m/f/d)
Description:
Looking for a chance to create a positive impact on our society?

We are looking for a Python developer for our Siemens Defense Platform. This team is responsible for evolving and maintaining the Threat Intelligence solutions used by our worldwide Cyber Threat Intelligence team. Cyber threat Intelligence provides useful and actionable information in a timely manner to multiple stakeholders to support in the tactical, operational, and strategical threat-based decision making.

If you are a Python developer, interested in the Cybersecurity field, keep reading!

As Python Developer / DevOps for Threat Intelligence platforms you will:

Work on projects to improve Cyber Threat Intelligence at Siemens; primarily by writing code in PythonCollaborate with internal security teams to implement and automate threat intelligence related processesContribute improvements, ideas and features for our internal applications and processesDevelop new features and integrate them into our applicationsIncrease the automation in our environment and improve our CI/CD pipelinesOperate and troubleshoot our applications on-premises and in the cloud

To make a difference, you must have:

At least 3 years of relevant work experience in Software development and/ or DevOps Engineering.Significant experience with software development with the following technologies: Python, web frameworks like Django/Fast API, JavaScript, Vue, REST APIs, Open API.Strong analytical skills with the ability to understand complex technical systems with attention to detail and accuracy.Ability to present and explain complex technical topics to both management and technical experts.Ability to work in a self-guided and result-oriented fashion with the clear desire to become an acknowledged technical expert in your own area of expertise.Fluent in spoken and written English.

Knowledge or experience in some of the following areas a nice to have:

Cloud Security expertiseTechnical system expertise with the following technologies: Linux, Kubernetes, AWS, Docker, Terraform, Gitlab CI, Elastic Search, Configuration Management (Ansible, Puppet).Experience with Cyber Threat Intelligence Platforms like MISP, etc., and Cyber Threat Intelligence feeds like STIX, and TAXII.Work experience in a SOC, CSIRT, CERT, or similar security teamExperience with IAM (OAuth2 / OpenID)Experience with Zero Trust architecture.

What do we offer?

A flexible way of working: Hybrid concept + flexible working hours to promote work-life balance.An environment where everyone can bring their whole self to work and feel a sense of belonging.A workplace that values curiosity and guarantees continuous learning, with development opportunities for both personal and professional growth.Share matching programs to become a shareholder of Siemens AG.A broad range of benefits and flexible compensation plans.

Siemens is committed to equal opportunities for people of all genders, as well as diversity as a source of creativity and innovation. Having different types of talent and experiences makes us more competitive and better prepared to successfully respond to the demands of our society. We value candidates who reflect the Diversity we enjoy in our Company.

By combining the real and the digital worlds, Siemens empowers its customers to transform their industries and markets, helping them to transform the everyday for billions of people. Siemens also owns a majority stake in the publicly listed company Siemens Healthineers, a globally leading medical technology provider shaping the future of healthcare. World's Best GBS (Global Business Services) 2023 - Winner
CEE Business Services Summit & Awards - Most Vibrant Employer in Hungary 2024
World's Best GBS (Global Business Services) 2024 - Runner-up

---

As one of the world’s largest retailers and the largest private employer in the United Kingdom, Tesco serves millions of customers a week in our stores and online.

In Europe, Tesco operates in Hungary, the Czech Republic, and Slovakia, offering great value to customers every day. Tesco's operations in Hungary have been serving shoppers since 1995.

To standardize processes, reduce the cost to serve, enable agility in the business and empower colleagues to do even more for our customers, we have set up a dedicated team called Tesco Business Services across our markets. In 2004, the first centre in Bengaluru, India was established.

The Budapest centre established in 2019 provides dedicated support for colleagues and customers in the Czech Republic, Hungary and Slovakia markets.

Based in our Váci út office, these multi-functional and specialist teams drive operational excellence of services, improve scale for our systems and processes globally and create business leading capabilities.

Over the course of the last years, we have been on a journey to create a sustainable competitive advantage for Tesco through a world-class business services model. In spring 2023, we changed our name from Tesco Business Services to Tesco Business Solutions as we drive a solutions mindset to whatever we do, and whomever we partner with.

In 2023, Tesco Business Solutions won the World's Best GBS (Global Business Services) award by SSON. In March 2024, Tesco Business Solutions was named the Most Vibrant Employer in Hungary at the CEE Business Services Summit & Awards in Warsaw. In 2024, Tesco Business Solutions was named as runner-up for the World's Best GBS (Global Business Services) award by SSON.

Title: Full Stack Developer
Description:
Location: Firenze, Italy

Thales people architect solutions at the heart of the defence-security continuum. Interoperable and secure information and telecommunications systems for defence, security, and civil operators, are based upon innovative use of radiocommunications, networks, and cybersecurity. We are ground breaking new digital technologies such as 4G mobile communications, cryptography, cloud computing and big data for use in physical protection systems, and critical information systems.

Sesto Fiorentino is the Headquarter of Thales Italia. It hosts two Domains: Ground Transportation Systems (GTS) and Security (SIX). The activity of GTS domain: Security systems, telecommunications, supervision, control & management information and signalling solutions for trains, trams and metros Regarding railway solutions, Thales is the homologated supplier of Rete Ferroviaria Italiana for Axel Counters, Tunnel Security, Energy Saving, SCADA systems and Asset Management. Italy is Thales Group’s competence centre for tramway signalling solutions. The activity of SIX domain: mission critical solutions and applications for assets and citizens security (supervision, control and information management systems) as well as cybersecurity. Thales offers solutions to protect the information systems and critical data of its civilian and military customers and helps its customers to detect and prevent cyberattacks by devising secure architectures from the design stage, overseeing these architectures and ensures that they are kept in secure working order. Italy is Thales Group’s competence centre for Airport security and operations management solutions.

The Senior Software Engineer will be responsible for software development and operational support, covering the full development lifecycle from design to testing and maintenance.

The role involves designing, developing, and maintaining software systems, including improving legacy code, analyzing system performance, troubleshooting issues, and optimizing efficiency.

Additionally, the engineer ensures code quality and proper documentation while staying updated with evolving technologies. Strong collaboration with teams, technical expertise, and maintaining positive customer relationships are also key aspects of the position.

Key Responsibilities

 Design and Develop Software Systems – Analyze requirements, design architecture, and implement large-scale applications for critical infrastructure with high availability and performance. Full Development Lifecycle – Contribute to all phases, from inception to deployment, ensuring well-designed, testable, and efficient code. Performance & Troubleshooting – Analyze, diagnose, and optimize software for reliability and cost-effectiveness. Continuous Improvement – Research new technologies, recommend enhancements, and support architectural reviews. Collaboration & Communication – Work closely with system engineers, testers, and technical staff while maintaining strong customer and supplier relationships. Agile & DevOps Practices – Operate within an Agile team, managing tools, configurations, and environments for development, integration, and production.


Skills, Experience And Qualifications

 Required strong knowledge of: Java Angular Quarkus or Spring Framework RDBMS SQL Event-Driven Microservice Architecture Development; Streaming & Messaging (Kafka) Nice to have knowledge of: Kubernetes, Helm Reactive Programming NgRx; API Development & Management (OpenAPI, Swagger) Karate Test Framework Keycloak (Oauth2/OIDC) Kafka Streams Master's degree in engineering (Telecommunications, Electronic, ICT). Min. 3 years’ experience in the design and development of complex software architectures. Fluent in Italian and English. Ability to design and write secure code, applying best practices to prevent vulnerabilities and ensure the protection of data and systems Good interpersonal skills and communication skills, including the ability to work in an Agile team environment Ability to manage Customer and Suppliers relationships and to work in an international environment. Availability to travel


At Thales we provide CAREERS and not only jobs. With Thales employing 80,000 employees in 68 countries our mobility policy enables thousands of employees each year to develop their careers at home and abroad, in their existing areas of expertise or by branching out into new fields. Together we believe that embracing flexibility is a smarter way of working. Great journeys start here, apply now!

Thales (Euronext Paris: HO) is a global leader in advanced technologies specialized in three business domains: Defence & Security, Aeronautics & Space, and Cybersecurity & Digital identity. It develops products and solutions that help make the world safer, greener and more inclusive.

The Group invests close to €4 billion a year in Research & Development, particularly in key innovation areas such as AI, cybersecurity, quantum technologies, cloud technologies and 6G.

Thales has close to 81,000 employees in 68 countries. In 2023, the Group generated sales of €18.4 billion.

Title: Python Software Engineer - Internal Applications and Tools
Description:
Summary

We are seeking a skilled Python Developer to contribute to an internal Python Flask client-server application that involves serial file processing using RabbitMQ and Redis. You will play a key role in building and maintaining a system that involves components both in Linux and Windows environments in all stages – starting with design, implementation, up to deployment and maintenance.

Job Description

This job might involve versatile array of roles, technologies and actions incl. design of nice API, playing with load balancing, performance tweaking (incl. OS-related stuff), digging through logs etc. If you enjoy and have experience in backend development, we’d love to hear from you. In case you'd be interested, you may dig into some other related projects and applications incl. frontends, web server technologies, too.

In this role, you will:

Independently manage and plan your workload. Strategize and implement future improvements for the application. Utilize your problem-solving skills to identify and fix bugs. Develop, maintain, and optimize a Python Flask client-server system. Manage and monitor RabbitMQ and Redis for queuing. Implement and maintain Kafka for log collection. Utilize Elasticsearch and Kibana for system monitoring and visualization. Monitor RabbitMQ queues using Grafana. Deploy applications using Ansible scripts. Perform maintenance and troubleshooting on both Linux servers and Windows servers. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration and operation of the system. Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code. 

Requirements: 

Proven experience as a Python Programmer. Proficiency in Python Flask or FastAPI framework Some experience with RabbitMQ, Redis, Kafka, Elasticsearch, and Kibana. Familiarity with Grafana for monitoring. Proficiency in using Ansible for deployment. Solid understanding of Linux and Windows server environments. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. 

Other technologies you might encounter: Docker, C#, Amazon S3, MySQL.

Employee Perks, Benefits

 please visit our website: https://www.eset.com/sk/o-nas/kariera/benefity/

Basic wage component (gross): from 2600 EUR

Performance bonus 2 times per year up to 10% of the basic salary paid for the evaluation period (usually 6 months).

* The final basic wage component can be adjusted accordingly to the individual skills and experience of the selected candidate.

Benefits

Health & well-being

BenefitPlusHealthcare (check-ups/annual programs)Multisport cardTravel card "električenka"Supplementary pension savingSick days

Family

Marriage allowanceChildbirth allowanceParental contributionESET family events (Family day, St.Nicholas)

Office

Refreshments in the office (fruits, coffee, soft drinks)Let´s get together breakfastActivity room, quiet roomESET events (Žranica, Christmas party..), teambuildings

Other

Loyalty allowanceLoyalty extra days offLoyalty cakeLoyalty glass awardRefer a friendChristmas presentsDiscounts from external providers

Primary location

Bratislava

Additional locations

Time type

Full time

Get to know us:

Bratislava is the true home of ESET, housing the world headquarters of the company.

The majority of ESET software is developed in the heart of Technology Division based in Bratislava.

It is as well the center of ESET research and other HQ divisions – like finance, operations, sales and business, communication and marketing.

Along the fact that ESET in Bratislava is the business global business HQ, it is regional sales center for the region of Europe, Middle East and Africa – and of our business activities in Slovakia – as well.

Established: 1992

At ESET, diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are integral to our corporate culture. We believe in creating a respectful environment, where everyone feels valued and respected, welcoming applications from individuals of all backgrounds, including race, gender, age, religion, disability, and sexual orientation.

Company Description:
For more than 30 years we have been here helping to watch over and protect progress.  Over a billion users worldwide rely upon ESET’s solutions to stay secure from increasingly sophisticated digital threats. ESET´s award-winning IT security software and services provide protection in over 200 countries and territories worldwide, with its software localized into more than 30 languages. 

Meanwhile, the world continues to move forward at pace. When ESET was founded, the Internet was in its infancy. Now technology is part of everything we do and is central to the continued advancements in our society. Most of the time technology does just what it is supposed to, but in order to ensure continued progress in the digital age we need someone to question what’s going on in the background.

And that’s why we are here – to continue protecting technology from threats, enabling everyone to fully embrace it’s potential and rely on it. 
Put simply - when technology enables progress, ESET is here to protect it.

ESET - Progress. Protected.

Visit www.eset.com to learn more

Title: IT Student Assistant
Description:
Company Description

Are you an IT student ready to kick-start your career with a great cup of coffee in your hand? Would you like to learn more about the link between IT and the commercial mindset? If so, we look forward to receiving your application

We are looking for two university students who want to join our world of coffee and tea. As a student, you will play an important role in the successful implementation and maintenance of a contract management system (CLM) in our company. You will act as an internal "super user" with in-depth knowledge of how to use the system, maintain contract templates, guidelines and instructions, collect improvement suggestions and present them to your immediate manager. So if you want to learn how to really streamline workflows across an international organization, this is the perfect opportunity!

As a student assistant, you will work closely with several cross-functional departments, which will give you a real opportunity to learn the dynamics of an international company. You should have a positive attitude towards new tasks - in other words, you should want to learn how to use IT to find solutions to commercial challenges. There are opportunities to be part of our European and global team where we share knowledge across a wide range of disciplines.

We prioritize social gatherings such as team events, annual Nordic conferences, coffee tastings, Friday bars and more. Here you get the opportunity to network and get to know the Nordic Nordic organization.

Job Description

We are looking for two student assistants; one role will focus on (i) implementation and maintenance and the other role will focus on (ii) training and system knowledge. One will be a law student and the other will be studying an IT related program.

Implementation & Maintenance Assist with the implementation and maintenance of the contract management system from IT perspective.Monitor system performance and report issues as they arise.Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to ensure the system meets the needs and expectations of the organization.Help ensure data integrity and security in the CLM solution.Assist with the development and implementation of system enhancements and upgrades.Support the development and implementation of policies and procedures related to the CLM solution.Training & System knowledge Help provide technical support and training to users of the CLM solution.Help maintain system documentation and user manuals.Maintain training material and reintroduce relevant trainingCollect internal feedback on the system performance and present it to the project team/leader.

Qualifications

Studying an IT program, e.g. Business and IT, BSc in Business Administration and Digital Management, Digital Design and Interactive Technologies.Can work based in CopenhagenFluent in English and one of the Nordic languages (Danish, Swedish or Norwegian)Highly driven and thrives on working flexibly and independently

Additional Information

The expected working hours are 15 hours per week and you will report to our Nordic IT Manager, Evelina Petrauskiene- please send an email if you have any questions: Evelina.petrauskiene@jdecoffee.com

This is a unique opportunity to learn and develop in an exciting international fast-growing company. You will have competent, caring and supportive colleagues and become part of a unique culture with great brands and great coffee!

We are located in Ørestaden in brand new offices with fitness facilities, massage and a choice of 3 different canteens for your lunch – and of course the world´s best coffee.
Primary Description: JDE Peet's · Copenhagen Municipality, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
Location: Copenhagen Municipality, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
Company Description:
We are the world's leading pure-play coffee and tea company, with local roots dating back over two centuries: In 1753 in Joure, the Netherlands, Egberts Douwe founded his first coffee outlet. Over a century later, in 1895, Johann Jacobs opened his first grocery business in Bremen, Germany. Then in 1966, in Berkeley, California, Alfred Peet opened his first Peet's coffee store.

Today, we unleash the possibilities of coffee and tea in more than 100 countries with a portfolio of over 50 brands, including L’OR, Peet’s, Jacobs, Senseo, Tassimo, Douwe Egberts, OldTown, Super, Pickwick and Moccona. We serve approximately 4,100 cups of coffee or tea every second, and in 2023 generated total sales of EUR 8.2 billion and employed a global workforce of more than 21,000 employees.

We:

• are powered by our purpose: We unleash the possibilities of coffee and tea to create a better future;
• are led by our vision: A coffee & tea for every cup; and  
• believe: It’s amazing what can happen over a cup of coffee or tea.

Title: IT-Security-Manager/-in (w/m/d)
Description:
Jeden Tag für jedes Leben. MACHEN KÖNNEN.
Qualität, Patientensicherheit, Forschung, Ausbildung - wir übernehmen Verantwortung für München: Die München Klinik gGmbH ist ein Verbund aus vier Kliniken mit Standorten in Bogenhausen, Harlaching, Neuperlach, Schwabing sowie der Fachklinik für Dermatologie und Allergologie in der Thalkirchner Straße. Jährlich lassen sich im Durchschnitt rund 135.000 Menschen stationär behandeln. Mit aktuell rund 7.000 Mitarbeiter*innen ist der Klinikverbund der größte Anbieter von Gesundheitsdienstleistungen im süddeutschen Raum.
IT-Security-Manager/-in (w|m|d)
Infrastruktur und Telekommunikation
für 38,5 Std./Woche in Vollzeit, Teilzeitbeschäftigung ist möglich.
Die Stelle ist sofort unbefristet zu besetzen.
Standort: München Klinik Zentrale Verwaltung, Fritz-Erler-Straße
Das Technologiemanagement der München Klinik gGmbH vereint die Abteilungen Medizinprodukte, Informationstechnologie und Telekommunikation beim größten kommunalen Gesundheitsdienstleister im süddeutschen Raum. Wir sind der umfassende Dienstleister in allen Bereichen der Informationstechnologien der München Klinik.
Du übernimmst folgende Aufgaben:

Entwicklung, Optimierung und -standardisierung von Sicherheitsprozessen innerhalb des Technologiemanagements, die sich aus dem ISMS ergeben
Umsetzung von Maßnahmen aus ISMS-Audits mit TM-Bezug und Ausarbeitung von operativen Arbeitsanweisungen mit TM-Bezug, welche ISMS-Verfahrensanweisungen ergänzen
Aktive Mitwirkung an Ausschreibungen neuer Projekte durch Spezifikation/Überprüfung von IT-Sicherheitsanforderungen
Verantwortung für die technische Absicherung von Anwendungen und Systeme
Überprüfung von Bestandssystemen auf technische Sicherheitslücken und Überwachung von externen Sicherheitsmeldungen wie BSI/LSI sowie Bewertung + ggf. Delegation
Mitglied des Notfallteams für die Behandlung von Cybersicherheitsvorfällen und Abstimmung mit relevanten Gremien und Interessensgruppen (CAB, ISB, DSB)

Mit diesen Eigenschaften passt Du zu uns:

Abgeschlossenes Hochschulstudium der Fachrichtung Informatik oder Wirtschaftsinformatik oder abgeschlossenes Hochschulstudium mit mindestens 3 Jahren Berufserfahrung im Bereich der IT-Sicherheit 
Deutschkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift (mind. Niveau C1)
Kenntnisse einschlägiger IT-Sicherheitskonzepte sowie Architekturen auf dem Gebiet von Zero-Trust, Defense in Depth, Least Privilege Access, Security by Design, Vulnerability Scans, NAC (802.1x) sowie XDR - SIEM - SOC von Herstellern wie Sentinal One, Trend Micro, Check Point oder Palo Alto
Kenntnisse der Sicherheitsstandards ISO 27001, BSI IT-Grundschutz und/oder B3S Medizinische Versorgung der DKG
Kenntnisse in der Administration von Microsoft-Umgebungen (Windows Server, Active Directory)

Darauf kannst Du dich freuen:

Flexible Arbeitszeiten: Mobiles Arbeiten und flexible Gleitzeitregelungen für eine optimale Balance zwischen Beruf, Freizeit und Familie
Attraktive Vergütung: Gehalt nach TVöD mit regelmäßigen Steigerungen, 30 Tagen Urlaub bei einer 5-Tage-Woche, München-Zulage und Jahressonderzahlung
Zusätzliche Absicherung: Arbeitgeberfinanzierte Altersvorsorge, vermögenswirksame Leistungen und steueroptimierte Entgeltumwandlung
Familienfreundlichkeit & Gesundheit: Unterstützung bei der Kinderbetreuung und Pflege von Angehörigen sowie ein umfassendes Angebot im Betrieblichen Gesundheitsmanagement
Mobilität: Fahrtkostenzuschuss bis zu 46,55 € monatlich für das Deutschlandticket Job oder die Isar Card Job
Mitarbeitervorteile: Exklusive Rabatte und Sonderkonditionen bei zahlreichen Partnerunternehmen über Corporate Benefits
Teamzusammenhalt: Arbeiten in einem motivierten und kollegialen Team, das Herausforderungen gemeinsam meistert und sich gegenseitig unterstützt

Kontakt:
Die Tätigkeit ist mit EG 12/13 TVöD-K/VKA bewertet. Die genaue Einstufung erfolgt individuell, basierend auf Deiner Erfahrung und Qualifikation
Für Rückfragen steht Dir Herr Ritter, Abteilungsleitung Infrastruktur, T 089 45227-9378, gerne zur Verfügung.
 Wir freuen uns über Deine Online-Bewerbung bis zum 10.03.2025.
Chancengleichheit ist für uns mehr als eine gesetzliche Pflicht. Die Gleichstellung aller Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter, unabhängig von Geschlecht, Herkunft, Alter, Hautfarbe, Weltanschauung, Religion, Behinderung oder sexueller Identität wird aktiv gefördert und ist fester Bestandteil unseres Selbstverständnisses und unserer Unternehmenskultur als Arbeitgeberin der Weltstadt München. Schwerbehinderte Bewerberinnen und Bewerber werden bei gleicher Eignung bevorzugt berücksichtigt.
Ihre persönlichen Daten rund um Ihre Bewerbung behandeln wir mit Sorgfalt und höchster Vertraulichkeit.

Title: Werkstudent:in Data Science (m|w|d)
Description:
BayWa r.e. JobportalEisenbahnstraße 150, 72072, Tübingen, DeutschlandStundenweise

Wir bringen Solarstrom auf jedes Dach – komm an Bord und packe mit an!

BayWa r.e. ist ein Zuhause für all diejenigen, die mit uns die Welt verändern möchten. Bei uns gilt: r.e.think energy – wir denken Energie neu – wie sie produziert, gespeichert und am besten genutzt werden kann, um die globale und für die Zukunft unseres Planeten unerlässliche Energiewende umzusetzen. Mit einer Karriere bei BayWa r.e. kannst du weltweit Veränderungen bewirken. Mit Standorten in 30 Ländern haben wir schon jetzt über 4.500 Mitarbeiter, die global agieren und in Zusammenarbeit mit lokalen Unternehmen die Zukunft des Energiesektors proaktiv gestalten.

Mit ca. 300 motivierten Überzeugungstäter:innen und einer mehr als 30-jährigen Erfahrung sind wir als BayWa r.e. Solar Energy Systems GmbH der führende Photovoltaik-Großhändler in Deutschland. Jeden Tag versuchen wir näher am Kunden zu sein und gemeinsam das zu schützen, was uns allen am wichtigsten ist: die Welt in der wir leben.

Dabei können wir auf eine starke Unterstützung unserer Muttergesellschaft BayWa r.e. AG vertrauen.

Aufgrund unserer dynamischen Entwicklung suchen wir Dich ab sofort als Werkstudent:in Data Science (m|w|d)zur Verstärkung unseres Teams in Tübingen:

Deine Aufgaben

Du aggregierst, bereinigst und analysierst Daten aus unseren IT-Systemen Du erstellst und verbesserst Dashboards und Berichte mit Microsoft Power BIDu entwickelst und implementierst Datenmodelle, Algorithmen und Apps (z.B. Streamlit in Python)Mit Deinen Ergebnissen unterstützt Du unser Reporting, Projekte zur datengetriebenen Prozessverbesserung sowie Geschäftsentscheidungen in verschiedenen Unternehmensbereichen (Supply Chain, Vertrieb, Einkauf, …)

Dein Profil

Du bist Student:in im Bereich der Wirtschaftswissenschaften, Informatik, Data Science oder ähnlichDu besitzt gute Anwenderkenntnisse in Python und/oder R. Erfahrungen mit SQL und mit Microsoft Azure sind zudem von VorteilDu hast Spaß daran große Datenmengen auszuwerten und Informationen abzuleitenDu bist gut organisiert und hast immer ein Auge für DetailsTeamfähigkeit, Eigenverantwortlichkeit, und ein Sinn für Humor runden Dein Profil ab

Deine Benefits

Unser kununu-Score von 4,4 spiegelt unsere wertschätzende und freundschaftliche Unternehmenskultur widerModerne Arbeitsplatzausstattung Eine tolle Arbeitsatmosphäre und spannende Aufgaben im aufstrebenden Feld der erneuerbaren Energien  Flexible Arbeitszeiten Mobiles Arbeiten Kantinenessen mit breiter Auswahl Mineralwasser, Kaffee und gute Laune for free Last but not least: Du treibst die Energiewende in einem tollen Team voran und sorgst auf diese Weise dafür, dass unsere Zukunft wieder ein Stückchen grüner wird. 

Du hast Lust bekommen, mit uns zusammen die Zukunft zu verändern? Prima! Dann bewirb Dich am besten gleich.

Deine Kontaktperson

Wir freuen uns auf Deine Bewerbung!

Bitte kontaktiere uns bei Fragen zur Stellenausschreibung.

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
The Role

As a Data Engineer, you will play a crucial role in creating and managing the dataflows used by production machine learning models and data scientists. You will be responsible for collaborating with cross-functional teams, engineers, product managers and data scientists to understand requirements and deliver high-quality solutions. You will be expected to implement best practices in data management, coding, testing, and deployment, ensuring scalability, performance, and security. Strong problem-solving skills, excellent communication, and the ability to adapt to new challenges in a fast-paced environment is essential for this role.

Key Responsibilities

Design, build, and maintain large-scale data pipelines to ingest, process, and transform complex financial dataDevelop data ingestion frameworks to handle high-volume and high-variety data feedsImplement data quality control measures to detect and handle data anomalies, duplicates, and inconsistenciesOptimize data pipeline performance for scalability, reliability, and latencyCollaborate with data scientists to integrate machine learning models into the data pipeline and ensure seamless data flowDevelop and maintain model serving infrastructure to support real-time predictions and batch scoringImplement model monitoring and logging to track performance, data quality, and model driftManage cloud-based infrastructure to support data pipeline and model serving workloadsTroubleshoot data pipeline issues, data quality problems, and model performance degradationCollaborate with cross-functional teams, including data science, product, and engineering teams to ensure alignment and effective communication

Required Skills, Experience, And Qualifications

5+ years of experience in a data engineering or similar role, with a focus on building and deploying data pipelines and machine learning models3+ years of experience with Databricks, PySpark, and Apache Spark2+ year of experience with Apache Airflow, Apache Kafka, and KubernetesStrong Python skills, with 3+ years of experienceExperience with production machine learning model deployment and managementKnowledge of cloud-based infrastructure and services AWS and AzureExperience with data warehousing, data lakes, and data martsFamiliarity with containerization using Docker and orchestration using KubernetesUnderstanding of messaging and streaming using Apache KafkaExperience with workflow management using Apache AirflowStrong problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot complex data pipeline and machine learning model issuesExcellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work with data scientists, engineers, and senior stakeholdersDegree educated in Computer Science or relevant subjectExcellent spoken and written EnglishExperience of driving innovation within teamsPositive, can-do approach to work, delivering on commitmentsAble to earn respect and build trust through high-quality delivery and by demonstrating value addedAct with integrity, with the ability to make decisions, taking accountability for the consequences of these decisionsCreative approach to problem solving, can look at existing situations and problems in novel ways and propose innovative solutions

About Us

We are a diverse group of visionary innovators who provide trading and workflow automation software, high-value analytics, and strategic consulting to corporations, central banks, financial institutions, and governments. Founded in 1999, we have achieved tremendous growth by bringing together some of the best and most successful financial technology companies in the world.

 Over 2,000 of the world’s leading corporations, including 50% of the Fortune 500 and 30% of the world’s central banks, trust ION solutions to manage their cash, in-house banking, commodity supply chain, trading and risk. Over 800 of the world’s leading banks and broker-dealers use our electronic trading platforms to operate the world’s financial market infrastructure.

ION is a rapidly expanding and dynamic group with 13,000 employees and offices in more than 40 cities around the globe,

Our ever-expanding global footprint, innovative products, and over 40,000 customers worldwide provide an unparalleled career experience for those who share our vision. Learn more at iongroup.com.

Simply put, we help our customers do more, faster and better than before. We believe our investments in research and development are shaping the future of automation and enabling our customers to transform their business. And we embrace the power of community, working with each other and with our customers to succeed through a positive culture of continuous improvement.

Title: Cyber Security Consultant
Description:
Sogeti is een ambitieuze en dynamische organisatie met een geweldige werksfeer en een platte structuur. Ga je bij ons aan de slag? Dan kun je rekenen op honderden enthousiaste collega’s die niet alleen klaarstaan om klanten te ondersteunen, maar ook elkaar graag helpen om samen topresultaten te behalen. Bij Sogeti draait het niet alleen om goede resultaten, maar ook om plezier tijdens het werk. Deze snelgroeiende groep collega’s haalt veel energie uit hun vak, en dat voel je op de werkvloer. BU Noordoost, met een vestiging in Groningen, biedt de ideale omgeving om jouw talenten verder te ontwikkelen.Als Cyber Security Consultant bij Sogeti word je onderdeel van de hechte Security Community. Met (cyber)borrels, inspirerende kennisdelingssessies en een hoop gezelligheid staan alle collega’s altijd voor elkaar klaar! Daarnaast krijg je ook nog de kans om uitdagende en gave opdrachten bij grote, aansprekende klanten uit te voeren.
Werken als Cyber Security Consultant bij Sogeti
Digitale veiligheid is voor jou essentieel en je geniet ervan om uit te zoeken hoe je systemen en organisaties veiliger kunt maken. Met jouw kritische blik spoor je snel zwakke plekken op en los je deze in een mum van tijd op. Je komt altijd met creatieve oplossingen en denkt in mogelijkheden: ‘het is goed, maar hoe maken we het nog beter?’ Dit vakmanschap, gecombineerd met jouw positieve mentaliteit, maakt jou de perfecte Cybersecurity Consultant waar Sogeti naar op zoek is!Als Consultant draag je bij aan het versterken van Sogeti’s Cybersecurity-diensten. Je werkt op projectbasis of wordt gedetacheerd bij diverse organisaties, waar je adviezen geeft én implementeert. Jij zorgt ervoor dat 'veilig voelen' verandert in 'veilig zijn'. Hiervoor zet je jouw kennis van IT GRC, PIA, AVG en Risk in en maak je gebruik van toonaangevende tools uit de markt.Wonen én werken in de regio Noordoost bij Sogeti!Bij Sogeti snappen we dat je graag werkt in de regio waar je woont. Daarom kun je aan de slag voor onze regiovestiging in Noordoost Nederland, met als uitvalsbasis onze locatie in Groningen. Door slim om te gaan met klantbezoeken en gebruik te maken van werken op afstand, beperken we je reistijd. Als voorstander van hybride werken, moedigen we bovendien aan om (deels) vanuit huis te werken.
Wie ben jij?
Ben jij een creatieve consultant met een passie voor cybersecurity én een flinke dosis ondernemingsgeest? Dan is deze rol jou op het lijf geschreven! Je krijgt de kans om je technische kennis te combineren met je talent voor communicatie en probleemoplossing.Jij bent een creatieve (self) selling consultant met goede cybersecurity ideeën.Jij neemt graag het initiatief in een project, maar bent ook een luisterend oor voor collega en klant.Jij weet alles van governance, risk en compliancy en weet dit te vertalen naar je dagelijkse werkzaamheden.Jij hebt een technische opleiding afgerond op hbo- of wo-niveau.Je hebt relevante certificeringen zoals CISSP, CISM, CIPP, CISA en je wil graag bijblijven middels opleidingen.Je beheerst de Nederlandse taal in woord en geschrift op minimaal C1/C2 niveau.Klinkt dit als jouw ideale volgende stap? Solliciteer nu en groei mee in een dynamische en toekomstgerichte werkomgeving!
Dit bieden wij jou
Ben je klaar voor een uitdagende baan met volop mogelijkheden om jezelf te ontwikkelen én een aantrekkelijke beloning? Dan ben je bij Sogeti aan het juiste adres! Wij zoeken iemand die graag het verschil maakt en zichzelf verder wil verdiepen in de wereld van cybersecurity en consultancy.Salaris tot € 6.000,00.Aantrekkelijke lease-regeling met hybride en volledig elektrische auto’s.26 vakantiedagen (met de optie om extra dagen bij te kopen), een goede pensioenregeling en een jaarbonus.De inrichting van jouw thuiswerkplek.Een toffe en betrokken community.Werken voor de top 200 klanten van Nederland.Standplaats Groningen.Bij Sogeti krijg je alle ruimte om jezelf te blijven ontwikkelen. Denk aan het behalen van certificeringen, nuttige trainingen en inspirerende technische meetings. En naast jouw groei als expert, is er volop ruimte voor gezelligheid. Of het nu gaat om een bedrijfsuitje of een spetterend feest, jij hoort erbij!Ben jij klaar voor deze volgende stap? Solliciteer nu en ontdek de mogelijkheden bij Sogeti!
You make technology work. Solliciteer als Cyber Security Consultant!
Ben jij gemotiveerd om bij te dragen aan een veilige digitale wereld? Solliciteer dan nu en word onderdeel van ons team als Cyber Security Consultant! Bij ons kun je een belangrijke rol spelen in het beveiligen van digitale omgevingen. We bieden je de kans om jouw kennis en vaardigheden in te zetten voor uitdagende projecten. Samen werken we aan het voorkomen van cyberdreigingen en het beschermen van gevoelige informatie. Houd er rekening mee dat een PES-screening deel uitmaakt van het onboardingproces bij Sogeti.Currently we are specifically looking for professionals who speak fluently Dutch at a C1 level and reside in the Netherlands.
Heb je nog vragen over de vacature van Cyber Security Consultant?Jouw recruiter, Henk Wouda, beantwoordt ze graag. Bell, app of mail gerust.tel: +31627576343
Company Description:
Part of the Capgemini Group, Sogeti makes business value through technology for organizations that need to implement innovation at speed and want a local partner with global scale. With a hands-on culture and close proximity to its clients, Sogeti implements solutions that will help organizations work faster, better, and smarter. By combining its agility and speed of implementation through a DevOps approach, Sogeti delivers innovative solutions in quality engineering, cloud and application development, all driven by AI, data and automation.

Title: Information Security Officer
Description:
Als Information Security Officer bij Cistec ben je dé expert die tijdens een klus de klant ondersteunt bij het verbeteren van hun informatiebeveiliging. Je werkt nauw samen met stakeholders om risico’s in kaart te brengen, strategieën te ontwikkelen en beveiligingsprogramma’s te implementeren die aansluiten bij de unieke behoeften van elke organisatie.
In deze veelzijdige rol beoordeel je de huidige informatiebeveiligingspositie van opdrachtgevers en voer je diepgaande risicoanalyses uit om eventuele zwakke plekken te identificeren. Op basis van deze inzichten ontwikkel en implementeer je beveiligingsbeleid, strategieën en processen die precies aansluiten bij de behoeften van de klant. Je houdt toezicht op de naleving van belangrijke normen en regelgeving, zoals ISO 27001, NIST en de GDPR, en zorgt ervoor dat opdrachtgevers voldoen aan alle wettelijke en branche-eisen.
Daarnaast adviseer je de opdrachtgever over hoe ze hun beveiligingsmaatregelen kunnen verbeteren en ondersteun je hen bij het opstellen van plannen voor incidentrespons en noodherstel. Je voert beveiligingsaudits en gap-analyses uit om kwetsbaarheden te identificeren en komt met praktische oplossingen om deze aan te pakken. Verder organiseer je trainingen en workshops om het bewustzijn rond informatiebeveiliging te vergroten en de naleving van beleid te verbeteren.
Je bent niet alleen de expert, maar ook een vertrouwde adviseur en sparringpartner voor opdrachtgevers. Met jouw kennis en inzichten help je hen om niet alleen hun huidige beveiligingsniveau te versterken, maar ook om voorbereid te zijn op toekomstige uitdagingen in een steeds veranderend digitaal landschap.
Wat kun jij van ons verwachten:Je krijgt bij ons direct een vast contract omdat wij geloven in een langdurige samenwerking.In ons 70/30 model is je salaris gebaseerd op de klus die je uitvoert. Afhankelijk van je niveau is dit bruto tussen de €7.500 tot €15.000.Een positie voor 36 tot 40 uur welke hybride is uit te voeren.Een mobiliteitsbudget van €1.000 euro. Dit kun je gebruiken voor een leaseauto of laten uitkeren in salaris.8% vakantiegeld.Een goede pensioenregeling.Mogelijkheden om certificaten te behalen die relevant zijn voor jouw vakgebied.Je wordt onderdeel van een thuishaven met experts die de passie voor techniek delen en samen zoeken naar een klus die bijdraagt aan jouw ontwikkeling/interesses.
Wat verwachten wij van jou?Minimaal een HBO- of WO-diploma in Informatica, Security Management, of een ICT gerelateerde richting.Minimaal 3 tot 5 jaar ervaring met informatiebeveiliging.Kennis van beveiligingsstandaarden en frameworks zoals ISO 27001, NIST, NEN7510 of BIO. Ervaring met risicobeheer, beveiligingsaudits en incidentrespons.Uitstekende communicatieve vaardigheden en het vermogen om complexe technische informatie helder en bondig over te brengen.Een proactieve en resultaatgerichte houding met sterke analytische en probleemoplossende vaardigheden.Certificeringen zoals CISSP, CISM of CISA.
Hoe is het om onderdeel te zijn van Cistec?Bij Cistec sta jij centraal. Wij begrijpen wat jij nodig hebt, omdat we als oprichters zelf uit de ICT komen. We weten hoe uitdagend en dynamisch de wereld van IT is, met een overvloed aan opdrachten en kansen. Ons doel is om daarbinnen het verschil te maken door een omgeving te creëren waar jij je écht thuis voelt en waar je kunt groeien – zowel professioneel als persoonlijk.
We zien onze samenwerking niet als een standaard werkrelatie, maar als een partnerschap. Bij ons draait het om jouw ontwikkeling. We ondersteunen je met opleidingsmogelijkheden, certificeringen en trainingen die je helpen om het beste uit jezelf te halen. En natuurlijk hoort daar een goed salaris bij, dat groeit naarmate jij groeit. Jouw inzet en ontwikkeling worden bij ons écht gewaardeerd.
Daarnaast helpen we je met zorgvuldige begeleiding om een opdracht te vinden die perfect bij jou past. Niet alleen qua technische vaardigheden, maar ook qua persoonlijke ambities en interesses. Op die manier draag je niet alleen bij aan het succes van onze opdrachtgevers, maar ook aan jouw eigen carrière en toekomst.
Bij Cistec geloven we dat we samen verder komen. We creëren een hechte community waarin collega’s elkaar inspireren en versterken. Een plek waar je je gesteund voelt, nieuwe uitdagingen met vertrouwen aangaat en met trots terugkijkt op wat je bereikt.
Skill: Skills: Information Security, Informatica, +6 more
Company Description:
Cistec is dé thuishaven voor IT-experts die zich inzetten om Nederlandse bedrijven te ondersteunen met geavanceerde IT-oplossingen en diepgaande technische kennis. Wij brengen gespecialiseerde developers, cybersecurity-experts en netwerkconsultants samen om organisaties te helpen bij complexe projecten en strategische uitdagingen.

Dankzij ons multidisciplinaire team bieden wij maatwerkoplossingen op het gebied van IT-beveiliging, infrastructuur en softwareontwikkeling. Of het nu gaat om het optimaliseren van IT-systemen, het versterken van cyberweerbaarheid of het realiseren van innovatieve digitale transformaties, Cistec staat klaar als betrouwbare partner.

Met passie voor technologie en een focus op kwaliteit bouwen wij samen aan een veilige en toekomstbestendige IT-omgeving.
