Title: IT Analyst
Description:
About the teamWe are a BizDevOps multidisciplinary team (IT, FIN, RISK) using Scrum agile methodology. We closely cooperate with IT Development Team, that gives us opportunities to gain interdisciplinary overlap and use modern technologies, e.g. Python or Azure cloud.We provide support and continuous development of our internal application used for the internal & external reporting according to the regulatory requirements of Solvency II / IFRS17. We have end users from 10 countries from Finance and Risk organization.
What will you doCollects, analyses, and refine business and IT requirements (from IFRS17 and local GAAPs), to the development team. IT analyst creates refined user stories on team's backlog and oversees they are identifiably traced within release management process.As a member of BizDevOps team, works on implementing received requirements to Aptitude solution (3rd party software). Implementation is realized in SQL procedures, configurations in xls format, and adjustments to Scheduler files.Participates in all project life-cycle phases with IT analysis, minor developments, unit testing of own implementations, and bug fixing.The bug fixing is required mostly for configurations of accounting engine. Root cause analysis and debugging is required for ST, SIT, UAT phases, as well as during the production runs.Supports the team in Incident, Change, and Problem management on Production, and manage Production activities in compliance with ITIL processes.Be able to report on any results with analytical storytelling, which includes describe the use case, identify and collect the underlying data, process the data (incl. cleaning), visualise in a right form, present to target audience, explain the context and deviations, highlight important features from presented data. Currently we use Power BI to help with transparency of Operational tasks on production and in release management and visualizing of Bugs root cause analysis.Communication with multiple teams from reporting chain is required to align and coordinate on assigned topic.
How your profile looks like2+ years' experience of work in business or IT analysis, preferably with reporting applicationsProficient usage of SQL (queries, procedures), MS Excel (pivot tables, queries, formulas), Power BI.Usage of python is advantage (opportunity to learn it on the job).Usage of AI tools is supported on the project in pilot initiatives.Usage of automation tools for improving efficiency is supported on the project.Knowledge of IFRS standards is advantage. IT industry knowledge is necessity.Knowledge of Agile/Scrum methodology and willingness to work in this styleFluent and comfortable in professional EnglishAbility of independent logical thinking, good communication skills, pro-activity.Team player in a very communicative team.
Why chose usSubstantial budget for education (conferences, hard and soft skills trainings, language courses)International team – English use on daily basisNew modern offices near Anděl, but also home office flexibility5 weeks of vacation, 5 Well-being days3% employer supplemental pension monthly contributionVolunteering days to support our communityMeal contribution, Cafeteria program, monthly home office allowanceMultisport card, partnership with various companies (Makro, Datart, Sony, ...)iPhone, O2 Family discountsEmployee referral bonuses to encourage the addition of great new people to the team

Title: Graduate Programme - Software Development and Testing (July Start Date)
Description:
Are you passionate about coding and developing world-class products that are used every day by people across the globe? Do you want to work within a rapidly growing business which offers an incredible range of opportunities to develop your career? Do you want to be part of a team that creates value for our customers, their clients and our business?

FNZ is the power behind many high-scale financial services platforms. Our customers rely on us to create web applications that meet their own high standards for usability and design. These range from highly usable sites for direct investors to sophisticated systems for wealth managers. They always need to be fast, reliable, responsive/adaptive and accessible.

We are currently looking for multiple university graduates to join our talented teams across Europe. You do not require any previous commercial experience to join our Technology Solutions Graduate Programme.

Our Graduate Programme is specially designed for graduate and early career candidates who are looking to take their first steps into a major FinTech. Over a period of approximately 30 weeks, you will gain experience in FNZ’s Analyst Tester, Analyst Developer and Production Support functions, combining both practical work experience and training & development. Upon completion of the programme, candidates will be assigned to their new technologies role within the team, as part of a long-term unlimited employment contract.

During This Programme You Will

Be part of a full-time, salaried graduate cohort.Discover how the software development lifecycle works at FNZ, with comprehensive learning and development courses.Discover software testing of FNZ platforms, detecting bugs and writing solutions documentation.Participate in business and systems analyst duties as part of the Analyst Testing team.Work, meet and learn from international colleagues from all around the world.

Our graduate programme commences twice a year, with our next cohort intake in July 2025.

Who You Are

You have an A or B+ equivalent (2.5 or better according to Czech GPA) bachelor’s degree, in either Computer Science or related STEM discipline (please note that we require candidates to be graduated with no academic commitments prior to the cohorts starting),You have a passion for problem-solving and technology,Although no previous software development experience is required, successful candidates will be expected to acquire skills in C# .NET and SQL,You enjoy working as part of a diverse, international team.Able to relocate to Brno, with pre-existing working eligibility (either EU citizenship or Czech work visa).

What can FNZ offer you?

Relocation support for candidates relocating from outside of the Czech Republic (including flights, temporary accommodation, and relocation payment).Signing bonus paid after completion of the probation periodPotential discretionary bonus payment for high achievers.A competitive salary and excellent benefits, including benefit points, meal allowance, sick days and social events.A highly successful, rapidly growing, global business that is leading the delivery of financial services via cloud computing and partners with some of the world’s largest companies.Global career opportunities for our employees at any of our offices in the UK, Czech Republic, Australia, New Zealand, China and more.

About FNZ

FNZ is committed to opening up wealth so that everyone, everywhere can invest in their future on their terms. We know the foundation to do that already exists in the wealth management industry, but complexity holds firms back. 

We created wealth’s growth platform to help. We provide a global, end-to-end wealth management platform that integrates modern technology with business and investment operations. All in a regulated financial institution. 

We partner with over 650 financial institutions and 12,000 wealth managers, with US$1.5 trillion in assets under administration (AUA).

Together with our customers, we help over 20 million people from all wealth segments to invest in their future.

Title: Computer Scientist IT Networks
Description:
InleidingBinnen ArcelorMittal België (AMBE) produceren we staal, gebruik makende van state of the art automatisatie- en optimalisatietechnieken. De afdeling IAM, wat staat voor “Industrial IT, Automation and Models”, zorgt voor de informatisering en automatisering van alle productie en logistieke processen.
Wat houdt de job in?Als netwerkspecialist kom je terecht in een fascinerende en hoogtechnologische IT-wereld, in een team van dynamische en gemotiveerde collega’s en sta je in voor de uitbouw van een stabiele en geborgde netwerk infrastructuur. Na een opleidingsperiode, waarbij je inzicht verwerft in onze installaties, ons proces en onze IT- infrastructuur, zal je:samen met het team instaan voor de continuïteit, de groei en vernieuwing van de netwerk infrastructuur dit vanaf het design tot en met de indienstnamesvragen van interne klanten analyseren en vertalen in technische opdrachten voor je collega’s,daarnaast ook proactief de noden van interne klanten inschatten en helpen de infrastructuur hierop te voorzien,opvolgen van de kwaliteit van de service,ingeschakeld worden in tal van projecten en autonoom een project leiden met verschillende medewerkerseen rol spelen in het bepalen van de globale architectuur van de netwerk infrastructuur
Ben jij de geschikte kandidaat?Je beschikt over een master in een van volgende richtingen: ingenieurswetenschappen, computerwetenschappen, industriële wetenschappen met als specialisatie ICT, elektrotechniek of elektronica.Je bent geïnteresseerd in de nieuwste IT-technologieën en netwerk infrastructuurJe bent organisatorisch sterk, je bent ondernemend en hebt de capaciteiten en de ambitie om een projectteam te leiden.Je bent sociaal, communicatief en in staat om je vlot te integreren in nieuwe en bestaande teams.Je werkt goed samen met alle niveaus binnen de onderneming, van arbeider tot managementJe staat permanent open voor nieuwe kennis en ideeën.
Wat bieden wij jou?Vast contractAantrekkelijk loonpakketResultaat gebonden premiesAnciënniteitspremie (na 1 jaar in dienst)Maaltijdcheques van €8 brutoGeschenkencheques en ecochequesAuto -en fietslease40+ verlofdagenDoorgroeimogelijkhedenGroepsverzekeringHospitalisatieverzekering (gezinsleden kunnen aangesloten worden)GSMLaptopGedeeltelijke terugbetaling van uw internetrekeningReisverzekeringVriendenkring (kortingen op cinematickets/pretparken, sinterklaasfeest, reizen, loopwedstrijden, Sidmar Motor Rijders,…)Begeleiding: als nieuwkomer krijg je een peter/meter aangewezen. Deze persoon zal ervoor zorgen dat je je snel thuis voelt en zal je wegwijs maken doorheen het bedrijf. + basisopleiding die je laat kennismaken met het bedrijf.Restaurant: broodjesbar en zelfbedieningsrestaurant.
Hoe verloopt de sollicitatieprocedure?Online applicatieKennismakingsgesprek met HR en je toekomstige collegaEindselectiegesprek met hoofd van HR en de afdelingContractvoorstel
Voel je het al kriebelen om te beginnen? Solliciteer nu!Diversiteit en inclusie maken ons nóg sterker!Ons personeelsbeleid baseren we op diversiteit en gelijke kansen. Wij selecteren de kandidaten op basis van hun kwaliteiten, ongeacht hun leeftijd, geslacht, herkomst, overtuiging, handicap, nationaliteit enz.

Company Description:
ArcelorMittal Belgium is part of the ArcelorMittal Group, a leading steel and mining company. At our plants in Gent, Geel, Genk and Liège, we convert raw materials into steel products with high added value. Every year, we ship around 6 million tons of flat carbon steel to automotive and industrial customers. 

For us, steel is the fabric of life, as it is at the heart of our modern world from railways to cars to washing machines, etc. We are actively researching and producing steel-based technologies and solutions that make many of the products and components we use in our everyday lives more energy-efficient.

ArcelorMittal Belgium has a workforce of 5,800 employees. The total number of direct and indirect jobs is estimated at 13,000. Our employees’ knowledge and motivation are two of our main assets. They play an essential part in the further optimization of our safety performance, product quality and overall productivity. Through our core values of sustainability, quality and leadership, we operate responsibly with respect to the health, safety and wellbeing of our employees, contractors and the communities in which we operate.
Specialties: steel,ethanol

Title: Database Administrator
Description:
Perchè scegliere NOI? Con oltre 600 dipendenti, S3K è uno dei principali partner in Italia per aziende del settore pubblico e privato su tematiche di Security e Digital Transformation.S3K è specializzata nella progettazione e nello sviluppo di soluzioni in ambito CyberSecurity, SAP Intelligent Enterprise, Cloud & App Dev, Modelling & Simulation, Data Science & Big Data e Product Lifecycle Management.Il nostro purpose è rendere il mondo digitale un luogo accessibile, sicuro e sostenibile.Siamo un Partner affidabile e punto di riferimento costante per i nostri clienti, siamo dotati di una struttura organizzativa flessibile e reattiva che permette di rispondere in modo rapido alle esigenze del mercato e di mantenere alta la soddisfazione dei clienti. L’investimento in Ricerca e Sviluppo è costante e permette all’azienda di rimanere sempre al passo con l’evoluzione tecnologica e di sviluppare prodotti e soluzioni innovative.
Job Description:
Per il potenziamento del team, S3K è alla ricerca di un Database Administrator che abbia esperienza nel monitoraggio e gestione dei DB. Si occuperà di gestire la manutenzione e riparazione del database, nonché di monitorare e ottimizzare le prestazioni e la capacità del database, pianificando i futuri requisiti di espansione. Svolgerà infine attività di organizzazione, coordinamento e implementazione di misure di sicurezza al fine di proteggere il database.
Si richiede: Esperienza di almeno 5 anni nel campo ICT;Laurea triennale in discipline tecnico-scientifiche;Capacità di lavoro in team, capacità organizzativa e spiccate doti comunicative;Proattività, capacità di lavorare per obiettivi, problem solving 
Skills: esperienza nel definire, costruire e ottimizzare modelli e schemi di database;dimestichezza nell’applicazione di metodi e strumenti standard per misurare un'ampia gamma di indicatori di prestazione pertinenti (tempo di risposta, disponibilità, sicurezza, integrità, ecc.);competenza nella produzione di procedure di database e istruzioni per altri analisti o amministratori;capacità di monitoraregestire database;competenza nell’investigare, identificare e correggere problemi o incidenti relativi ai database;capacità nel formare, supportare e orientare altri professionisti su questioni relative al database.
È richiesto il possesso di certificazioni di livello “professional” in ambito DBMS.In particolare, deve possedere la certificazione MongoDB DBA Certified ed una tra le seguenti certificazioni: • Oracle Database Administrator Certified Professional;• AWS Certified Database; • PostgreSQL DBA Certified; • MySQL Database Administrator. 
Eventuali ulteriori certificazioni saranno valutate e considerate premianti qualora attinenti all’ambito.
Zona di lavoro: Roma nord-est, onsite presso la sede del Cliente in ambito PA.Potrebbe esser previsto un servizio di reperibilità. 
Il Piano retributivo e i relativi benefits saranno commisurati all’esperienza professionale e valutati insieme alla persona.
La ricerca è rivolta ad ambo i sessi (L.903/77)

Title: Software Consultant/ IT Consultant (m/w/d)
Description:
Deine Mission

In dieser vielfältigen und vielseitigen Rolle bist du zuständig für die Beratung und technische Umsetzung, Einrichtung, Implementierung und Konfiguration von Kundenprojekten/-aufträgen im Bereich Abrechnung und Verwaltung von Pflegeorganisationen sowie der punktuellen technischen Unterstützung im Hintergrund bei Supportfällen. Dies können z.B. Schnittstellen oder Systemupdates, aber auch kundenspezifische Berichte oder Konfigurationen in der Datenbank sein.

Was du tun wirst: 

Vorbereitung, Installation und Konfiguration der hauseigenen Lösung auf SQL Basis im direkten Zusammenhang mit ELGA Selbständige Umsetzung von Kundenaufträgen resp. technischen Aufträgen aus Kundenprojekten. Ausarbeitung von Lösungen, Architekturen und Umstiegsmöglichkeiten für den Kunden Einrichten von Schnittstellen, Durchführen von Updates, Implementieren von Konfigurationen und Anpassungen in den Kundenlösungen resp. der Datenbank Test, Diagnose und Fehlerbehebung während den Kundenprojekten sowie als Unterstützung im Hintergrund für den Support Mitarbeit in der täglichen Verbesserung von Abläufen, Standards sowie der Softwarelösungen und eingesetzten Tools

Dein Profil

Eine abgeschlossene IT-Ausbildung (HTL, FH, Universität) ist von Vorteil Erfahrung in der Systemadministration, Datenbankadministration oder Softwareprogrammierung Nachweisliche Datenbankkenntnisse in SQL / T-SQL und MSSQL Datenbanksystemen Erfahrung in den Bereichen Netzwerktechnik, Betriebssystemen und Applikationen Deine außerordentlichen Steuerungsfähigkeiten stellen sicher, dass Du Projekte erfolgreich leitest und abschließt Bereitschaft, Neues zu lernen sowie pragmatische, strukturierte und organisierte Arbeitsweise Ein Teamplayer mit guten Deutsch- und Englischkenntnissen Kenntnisse über Abrechnungsprozesse in Pflegeorganisationen und/oder Kenntnisse in ELGA sind ein großes Plus 

Warum myneva?

Eine verantwortungsvolle Aufgabe mit Sinn: Unsere Software-Produkte ermöglichen unseren Kunden den Fokus auf ein besseres Leben der Klient:innen durch mehr Zeit für Pflege & Betreuung Arbeit in Teilzeit möglich. Einstufung laut Kollektivvertrag ST1 ab EUR 3.077,- mit der Bereitschaft zur Überzahlung je nach Qualifikation und Erfahrung Eine abwechslungsreiche und spannende Aufgabe in einem zukunftsorientierten und wachsenden Umfeld mit flachen Hierarchien, kurzen Entscheidungswegen und vielen Gestaltungsmöglichkeiten Einen gut organisierten Onboarding-Prozess und Mentor:innen, damit du dich vom ersten Tag gut in unserem Unternehmen einleben kannst Neben dem beruflichen Alltag ist uns auch der private Austausch wichtig, zum Beispiel bei gemeinsamen Mittagessen Eine moderne Bürofläche im Austria Campus und das Öffi-Ticket (Jahreskarte der Wiener Linien) Möglichkeit bis 45% der Arbeitszeit im Mobile Office zu verbringen 

Kontaktinformationen

Wenn das nach dir klingt, freuen wir uns über deine aussagekräftigen Bewerbungsunterlagen inkl. Angabe deiner Gehaltsvorstellung und dem nächstmöglichen Eintrittsdatum über unser Online-Bewerbungsformular.

Über uns

 Willkommen bei myneva - gemeinsam gestalten wir die digitale Pflege. 

myneva gehört zu den führenden europäischen Softwareanbietern für den sozialen Sektor. Unsere Lösungen konzentrieren sich darauf, die Welt um unsere Klient:innen und deren Bedürfnisse zu gestalten. Durch die Digitalisierung von Prozessen helfen wir Sozialeinrichtungen, mehr Zeit für die Unterstützung ihrer Klient:innen zu gewinnen, um ihnen ein bessere Lebensqualität zu ermöglichen.    

Als ambitioniertes Team verfolgen wir zunehmende Internationalisierung und die klare Mission #1 in Europa zu werden.

Lead the information security awareness program across the company.  Continuously assess the current information security risks of data, systems and networks.  Lead the vulnerability management process and execution of penetration tests.  Identify new information security technologies and countermeasures.  Evaluate vendor products and work with internal stakeholders to achieve a timely implementation.  Coordinate the security incident response and remediation actions.

Solid knowledge of various information security frameworks ( ISO 27000 certification preferred). CISSP, CISM, CISA (preferred but not mandatory). Experience with working with global teams in various time zones. Well-developed influencing and stakeholder management skills. Ability to educate a nontechnical audience about information security best practices. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. Excellent communication skills in English, both written and verbally.

Title: Junior Cyber Security Consultant
Description:
Job Description & Summary

Are you interested in joining a vibrant, diverse and cohesive team, helping top organizations protect their information and physical assets? Then a job within PwC’s Cybersecurity consulting team could be for you! At PwC Netherlands, over 150 highly skilled professionals at the Cybersecurity business unit are making our society safer by solving a wide variety of cyber security issues for our clients. (E) Privacy, Ethical Hacking, Identity & Access Management (IAM) and Forensic Technology Solutions (FTS) are some important cornerstones of the Business Unit Cybersecurity.

What will you be doing?

You will support the execution of projects based on topics and clients you find interesting. Some examples include:

Helping to define a security organization (governance, processes, roles and responsibilities);Advising a company on how to manage the threat of ransomware in their environment;Advising organizations on techniques for monitoring and detecting malicious activities within their environment;Designing the security architecture of an enterprise.

Requirements

You have 0-3 years of work experience;You have completed a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree program in an IT related study ( e.g. Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology, Cyber security);You speak fluent English and also Dutch and are living in Europe;You have a highly analytical mind and enjoy solving complex puzzlesYou are a team player;You are genuinely interested and well known with Microsoft Cyber Security topics like Monitoring and Detection, Endpoint security, DevSecOps and Security risk management

What are we offering?

At PwC, you will have the opportunity to be yourself, get the best out of yourself in a high-performance organisation and grow within our global network. As part of our team we offer:

A competitive salary, permanent contract, attractive pension plan and the opportunity to grow rapidly;Customised training for professional growth and leadership development;Motivating work environment where collaboration with ambitious colleagues and recognition for your contributions are highly valued;Comprehensive benefits including "well-being budget" for physical and mental health;Flexibility of hybrid working, including ergonomic home office and fixed expense allowance including internet allowance;Attractive mobility options, including electric lease car, car waiver allowance and the possibility of using different shared transport providers;Fun extras such as various informal company activities;32 vacation days per year.

Getting started at PwC

Are you interested in this vacancy and do you meet the requirements? Then let us know what motivates you and fill in your details. After we’ve received your application,

You’ll immediately receive confirmation in your inbox;If your qualifications match the profile that we have in mind, then we’ll contact you within two weeks for a short introduction meeting;If everyone is enthusiastic, we’ll schedule an online assessment. Depending on the result, you'll receive an invitation for an initial interview. Click here for more information about the application process.

If you would like more detailed information about this position at PwC, don't hesitate to contact us! Raihana Naseri will be happy to help you via e-mail, raihana.naseri@pwc.com.

Title: Python & Databricks Engineer
Description:
Hybrid - 2-3 Days working from the Office
Project Description:We are embarking on an exciting project that requires expertise in a diverse range of technologies. This project aims to enhance our systems' efficiency and performance through the implementation of cutting-edge tools and methodologies. As part of our team, you will be responsible for deploying and maintaining critical infrastructure components, streamlining development workflows, and optimizing system performance. This project offers an opportunity to work with state-of-the-art technologies and contribute to the evolution of our IT landscape.
Responsibilities:- Develop and maintain scalable data pipelines using Databricks, PySpark, and SQL to support investment strategies.- Work with large-scale financial datasets, ensuring high-quality data processing and storage.- Implement best practices for structured and unstructured data management, including market, risk, and portfolio data.- Maintain ACID-compliant RDBMS solutions for accurate and consistent financial data storage.- Optimize Databricks performance for real-time and batch data processing.- Enhance PySpark performance to handle high-volume financial transactions and analytics.- Improve query execution efficiency and reduce data processing latency for time-sensitive investment operations.- Develop and manage CI/CD pipelines to automate data workflows and deployment in cloud and on-prem environments.- Collaborate with DevOps teams to integrate data solutions into enterprise investment platforms.- Ensure data security, compliance, and auditability to meet regulatory requirements (e.g., MiFID II, Basel III, GDPR).- Utilize Databricks visualization tools to create reports and dashboards for portfolio managers and risk analysts.- Provide real-time data insights to support investment decision-making.- Work closely with quants, traders, and risk teams to optimize data accessibility and usability.
Mandatory Skills Description:- Databricks Concepts- Databricks performance optimizations- ACID properties of RDMS- Python, PySpark- SQL Concepts- Databricks Queries and Visualization- Exposure to CI/CD DevOps Pipelines

Title: Junior Software Engineer
Description:
Welcome!

Our Growth is Creating Great Opportunities!

Our team is expanding, and we want to hire the most talented people we can. Continued success depends on it! Once you've had a chance to explore our current open positions, apply to the ones you feel suit you best and keep track of both your progress in the selection process, and new postings that might interest you!

Thanks for your interest in working on our team!

Adtran seeks a Junior Software Engineer to work on the execution of ML/AI-driven Network Intelligence Solutions. You will collaborate with a highly skilled team of engineers, data scientists and subject matter experts to develop proof-of-concepts, explore AI-driven insights, and define next generation of data intelligence products.

Responsibilities

Develop, and optimize scalable software solutions for AI/ML-driven network intelligence products. Write maintainable, and efficient code using Python and TypeScript. Implement and maintain microservices and serverless architectures using AWS cloud services (Lambda, Step Functions, SageMaker, etc.). Develop and deploy ML/AI models and data pipelines, working closely with data scientists and ML engineers. Ensure high-performance data processing and storage, utilizing AWS services such as Redshift, Athena, and Glue. Collaborate in the PoC development cycle, transitioning experimental solutions into production-ready systems. Maintain best practices for CI/CD pipelines, ensuring seamless deployment and integration. Participate in code reviews, debugging, and performance tuning to ensure system efficiency and reliability. Design and implement cloud-native architectures on AWS, focusing on cost-efficiency, security, and scalability. Work with containerization and orchestration tools (Docker, Kubernetes, AWS Fargate) when necessary. Ensure security best practices, including authentication, authorization, and data encryption for cloud-based applications. Optimize AWS resource utilization, ensuring reliability and cost-effectiveness. Collaborate with ML engineers and data scientists to develop machine learning pipelines and real-time inference systems. Implement data processing workflows for feature engineering and model training. Contribute to the development and optimization of AI models, ensuring scalability and efficiency in production. Develop solutions for real-time network insights and anomaly detection, leveraging AI-driven analytics. Work closely with the Product Owner to refine requirements, user stories, and acceptance criteria. Actively participate in Agile ceremonies (sprint planning, retrospectives, daily stand-ups). Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, DevOps engineers, and cloud architects. Provide mentorship and guidance to junior developers, ensuring skill development and knowledge sharing. Stay up to date with new technologies, AI/ML advancements, and best practices in cloud computing. Troubleshoot complex system issues, ensuring high availability and performance. Contribute to technical documentation, ensuring clarity in architecture and implementation details. Ensure source code management best practices, using Git and following CI/CD guidelines. Explore new frameworks, libraries, and methodologies to enhance development efficiency. 

Basic Qualifications

Master of Science in Engineering in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering, Computer Information Science, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent.  At least 2 years of active professional experience in software development. Proficiency in Python. Experience in other scripting languages is a plus. Strong understanding of machine learning workflows, data processing, and AI-driven insights. Hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines and version control (Git). Experience working in SAFe/Agile environments (Scrum/Kanban) and collaborating with Product Owners and cross-functional teams. Problem-solving, debugging, and performance optimization skills. B2+ English proficiency, with strong communication and teamwork abilities. Strong ownership attitude. 

Preferred Qualifications

Experience working across time zones and cultures. Experience developing microservices and serverless applications. Experience in the networking, telecom, or cybersecurity industry. Familiarity with Wi-Fi networks, mesh topologies, and standards (e.g., IEEE 802.1X). Experience developing and deploying large-scale, distributed cloud services. Strong knowledge of data engineering, ETL processes, and big data analytics. Hands-on experience with data visualization tools (QuickSight, Tableau, Kibana, etc.). Experience with containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes, AWS Fargate). Background in high-performance computing, real-time data processing, or AI-driven automation. Proficiency in prototyping AI/ML applications. Experience working across time zones and culturally diverse teams. Proven experience in designing and implementing the Lakehouse Architecture. 

Compensation And Benefits

Stable employment conditions based on an employment contract (turnover rate below 4%)1 additional vacation day for all, and 1 extra after 10 years being with usFlexible working hours and possible hybrid work (presence in the office in Gdynia 3 days a week)English lessons during working hoursInternal training program to support your training needsPaid employee referral programMultisport Card3% employer contribution to PPKPrivate Health Care at Medicover (extended package for employees and possibility to enroll family members)Strong team-oriented and friendly work culture Access to various sports activities and eventsModern office (well-equipped gym and playroom) close to the SKM/PKM stations

Title: Python Engineer – Climate
Description:
Your Team Responsibilities

We are building cutting-edge software and data workflows to identify and analyze the exposure and impact to climate change. Clients from across the capital ecosystem use our integrated data, analytical tools, indexes and insights for a clear view of the climate transition. We are seeking an outstanding Software Engineer to join our ESG&Climate Application Development team in the Pune/Mumbai or Budapest offices. As part of a global team you will collaborate in in cross-functional teams to build and improve our industry-leading ESG, Climate and Net-Zero solutions.

Your Key Responsibilities

Deliver new functionalities for Operations platform and for upcoming next gen applications for the ESG & Climate Business.Monitor and optimize application performance.Closely collaborate with Product Management, Research and Product Development, Quality Assurance, Data Operation and IT Infrastructure on all stages of software development life cycle.Having very good Hands-On working experience in Python and Fast API/Flask/Django or similar Rest API based Frameworks.Should have worked on at least one end to end Development project from scratch.Worked in a team to implement features and partner with Product Owners, UI/UX Team, Architects, and QA to develop implementation plans with a focus on innovation, quality, sustainability, and delivering value to our business clients.Responsible for delivery of high-quality enterprise offerings within schedules.The candidate should have excellent problem solving and debugging skills.The candidate is expected to have excellent communication and good leadership skills.

Your Skills And Experience That Will Help You Excel

Good hands-on working experience in Python.Experience in research-oriented calculation frameworks like Numpy and PandasProficient in RESTful Web Services using Fast API, Django or Flask.Good Understanding and hands on experience with SQL/NoSQL DatabasesGood understanding of the importance of testing in software development and the usage of unit testing framework like pytest/unittest.Source code control systems, especially Git. Hands on cloud technologies – Google or Azure preferredHands on experience with Azure Databricks, Spark, or similar frameworkExperience in building batch/ETL/integration process on cloud preferred Google, AzureExperience in developing and managing microservices on cloud.DevOps, and well versed with security practices.Exposure and advocate of Open source softwareExposure to use of AI, LLM to solve business problems is added advantage.Experience In designing solution for data-driven applicationsStrong communication, interpersonal and problem-solving skillsBachelor’s degree in computer science, Mathematics, Engineering, related field, or equivalent experience

About MSCI

What we offer you

Transparent compensation schemes and comprehensive employee benefits, tailored to your location, ensuring your financial security, health, and overall wellbeing.Flexible working arrangements, advanced technology, and collaborative workspaces.A culture of high performance and innovation where we experiment with new ideas and take responsibility for achieving results.A global network of talented colleagues, who inspire, support, and share their expertise to innovate and deliver for our clients.Global Orientation program to kickstart your journey, followed by access to our Learning@MSCI platform, LinkedIn Learning Pro and tailored learning opportunities for ongoing skills development.Multi-directional career paths that offer professional growth and development through new challenges, internal mobility and expanded roles.We actively nurture an environment that builds a sense of inclusion belonging and connection, including eight Employee Resource Groups. All Abilities, Asian Support Network, Black Leadership Network, Climate Action Network, Hola! MSCI, Pride & Allies, Women in Tech, and Women’s Leadership Forum.

At MSCI we are passionate about what we do, and we are inspired by our purpose – to power better investment decisions. You’ll be part of an industry-leading network of creative, curious, and entrepreneurial pioneers. This is a space where you can challenge yourself, set new standards and perform beyond expectations for yourself, our clients, and our industry.

Title: Junior Python/Golang Developer
Description:
Summary

ESET rozširuje spektrum svojich bezpečnostných technológií a do tímu Network Defense Technologies hľadá novú posilu na pozíciu Python/Go Software Engineer. Tím pôsobí v oblasti výskumu a vývoja technológií sieťovej bezpečnosti, ktoré sú vyvíjané prevažne ako cloud-native.

Job Description

Budeš súčasťou tímu, ktorý zodpovedá za:

 návrh a vývoj interných nástrojov/systémov pre analýzu sieťovej prevádzky výskum nových technológií v oblasti sieťovej bezpečnosti a analýzu ich použiteľnosti pre účely produktu aktívnu spoluprácu na komplexnom softvérovom produkte od návrhu až po samotnú integráciu a jeho nasadenie

Ako súčasť tímu budeš mať možnosť zúčastniť sa celého vývojového cyklu produktu a budeš:

 sa podieľať na štúdiu a výskume nových technológii implementovať novú funkcionalitu produktu, navrhovať jednotlivé časti systému a ich API rozširovať svoje znalosti v oblasti sieťovej bezpečnosti a spracovania sieťovej prevádzky rozširovať svoje skúsenosti s paralelným programovaním prispievať k zlepšeniu kvality kódu cez code reviews a pravidelný refactoring udávať smerovanie vývoja cez pravidelné meetingy a brainstormingy mať možnosť špecializovať sa v oblasti, ktorá je pre teba najzaujímavejšia

Počas prvých troch mesiacov zistíš, že si schopný oveľa viac, než si doteraz predstavoval, a naučíš sa ešte lepšie rozvíjať svoje zručnosti. Zoznámime ťa s jedinečným prístupom nášho tímu k výskumu a vývoju.

Hľadáme programátora, ktorý má skúsenosti s Go alebo Pythonom, ale okrem školských projektov nemal možnosť nabrať ďalšie pracovné skúsenosti.

Požiadavky:

 minimálne stredoškolské, ideálne vysokoškolské vzdelanie v obore informačné technológie praktická skúsenosť s jazykom Python alebo Go znalosti v oblasti algoritmov a dátových štruktúr ochota a otvorenosť učiť sa novým veciam základné znalosti práce s OS Linux anglický jazyk minimálne na úrovni B1

Výhodou sú (s čím sa u nás stretneš):

Company Description:
For more than 30 years we have been here helping to watch over and protect progress.  Over a billion users worldwide rely upon ESET’s solutions to stay secure from increasingly sophisticated digital threats. ESET´s award-winning IT security software and services provide protection in over 200 countries and territories worldwide, with its software localized into more than 30 languages. 

Meanwhile, the world continues to move forward at pace. When ESET was founded, the Internet was in its infancy. Now technology is part of everything we do and is central to the continued advancements in our society. Most of the time technology does just what it is supposed to, but in order to ensure continued progress in the digital age we need someone to question what’s going on in the background.

And that’s why we are here – to continue protecting technology from threats, enabling everyone to fully embrace it’s potential and rely on it. 
Put simply - when technology enables progress, ESET is here to protect it.

ESET - Progress. Protected.

Visit www.eset.com to learn more

Title: Analyst OSINT
Description:
Our job everyday is to protect the data and critical assets of businesses world-wide by discovering hidden vulnerabilities... before the bad guys do!At CybelAngel, we see beyond perimeters to protect businesses from the most critical cybersecurity threats. Fortune 500 Global to mid-size companies world-wide, trust CybelAngel's global team of approximately 160 team members to protect their businesses from digital threats. With a combination of advanced machine learning, cyber analysis expertise, and a powerful suite of software solutions, CybelAngel detects and resolves our clients potential threats, long before they can fall into the hands of cyber criminals.Our capabilities expand every day to uncover new risks, detect more threats, protect more clients, and create new possibilities for our employees.With people in France, Europe and the US, CybelAngel's global footprint allows for a thriving hybrid, office and remote-work environment. We are looking for exceptional ‘go-getters' who share our ambitious vision, innovative culture, high commitment to ethics, and enthusiasm for being the best possible place to work!Our values: Be Bold Be Curious Stronger Together 
In this role, you'll be equipped to:You will be responsible for the detection, analysis, and reporting of Cybersecurity intelligence during the Proof-of-Concept (POC) stage in the sales process. Through technical expertise of our tools and a strong investigative skill set, you will help protect the world's largest organizations from Cyber threats.  Operate CybelAngel tools to plan, design and execute Trials. Investigate wide ranging Cyber and business threats using OSINT methodologies. Address critical analytical, technical, and operational issues. Leverage technical findings to help meet and exceed revenue targets. Collaborate cross functionally with Product, Sales, and Operations teams to share Cybersecurity knowledge and best practices. 

Requirements

 Experience in an analytical role (intelligence, military, cyber etc.). Knowledge of OSINT and CTI tools. Ability to conduct research (dark web, social media, etc.). Interest for cybersecurity topics! Good communication skills: both written & verbal. Fluent in French and English; proficiency in additional languages is a plus. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills including an ability to think ‘on your feet' when faced with challenging questions in our sales environment. Excellent team and autonomous work capabilities. 

Benefits

How we'll take care of you:💰 Salary range: 35 to 40 K€ based on your level of seniority and competencies you will demonstrate during the hiring process.🏦 20% bonus, based on company and individual performances.📍 The office is base in the 9th arrondissement of Paris but you can work from home 2 days a week. 🍱 Debit card for paying for lunch, with company contribution.👩‍⚕️ Healthcare insurance, with company contribution.🖥️ Remote allowance. 🏋🏾‍♀️ Monthly credits to spend with CSE partner. 🏝️ 5 weeks of holidays and RTT.🏅 Subsidy for one sporting event per year.🌍 Green team.💛 Diversity & Inclusion group. 🌈 Very friendly and benevolent atmosphere.
90% of our People recommend CybelAngel.92% are happy with the work life balance at CybelAngel.
Your hiring journey with us : 30' call with Romain, Recruiter, to discuss about expectations from both ends. 45' call with your future manager Vincent, Pre Sales Manager, to discuss context and projects and to evaluate mission fit. 60' Business case with members of the Pre Sales / Sales / CyberOps teams to assess your technical expertise against past achievements.
Company Description:
CybelAngel is a global leader in cybersecurity solutions focused on external attack surface protection and management. As an early pioneer in ‘outside-in’ search technology, approaching cybersecurity just as an attacker would carry out infiltration, CybelAngel has developed the industry’s most extensive defense for external attack vectors, where the majority of cyber-attacks are initiated. Combining expanded discovery and analysis, CybelAngel finds unknown assets and exposures to preemptively diffuse attack vectors that cyber criminals use to breach systems and wreak havoc.

CybelAngel proudly protects some of the largest global enterprises representing various sectors including the Pharmaceutical, Manufacturing, Retail, and Financial Services.
Specialties: Digital Risk Protection,Data Breach Prevention,Stop Data Leaks,Threat Intelligence,Cybersecurity

Title: Working Student Artificial Intelligence (m/w/d)
Description:
COME ON BOARD

Wir sind eine dynamische und schnellwachsende Unternehmensberatung, die das Beste aus beiden Welten vereint: die Agilität eines Startups kombiniert mit der Expertise und Erfahrung unseres Top-Managements. Wir unterstützen führende Unternehmen in den Bereichen IT-Strategy, Cybersecurity, Data Analytics, Cloud, AI und ESG. Du unterstützt bei der Entwicklung und Implementierung von KI-Algorithmen und -AnwendungenDu führst Datenanalysen, -bereinigungen und -aufbereitungen für KI-Modelle durchDu evaluierst und optimierst bestehende KI-ModelleDu arbeitest an verschiedenen Projekten im Bereich der Künstlichen Intelligenz mitDu recherchierst neue Technologien und Methoden im Bereich der KI

DEIN PROFIL

Du bist in einem Studiengang mit vorzugsweise IT-Schwerpunkten z.B. (Wirtschafts-) Informatik, Künstliche Intelligenz, Softwareentwicklung, Data Science, Data Engineering oder verwandten Disziplinen immatrikuliertDu hast gute Kenntnisse in mindestens einer Programmiersprache (z. B. Python, Java, oder C++)Du arbeitest eigenständig und strukturiertDu begeisterst Dich für KI und Machine LearningDu bist teamfähig, motiviert, leistungsbereit, flexibel, kommunikativ und eigeninitiativDu hast Freude an der interdisziplinären Zusammenarbeit und VerantwortungDu verfügst über sehr gute Deutschkenntnisse und sichere Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift

Deine Benefits

Unterstützende Teamkultur: Gemeinsam mit Dir setzen wir innovative Ideen in die Tat um, fördern Teamwork und feiern unsere Erfolge zusammen.Schnelle Verantwortungsübernahme: Als junges Unternehmen mit flachen Hierarchien bieten wir Dir spannende Aufgaben und volle Verantwortung.Klare Karriere- und Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten: Wir unterstützen Deine Weiterbildung durch regelmäßiges Feedback und vielfältige Schulungsmöglichkeiten. Deshalb entscheidest Du, welche Software, Methoden oder Arbeitsmodelle Du nutzt, um Deine Ideen umzusetzen.Team-Events: Unsere regelmäßigen Events stärken den Teamzusammenhalt und sorgen für gemeinsame Erlebnisse abseits des Arbeitsalltags.

Über uns

Vom Anschreiben bis zur abschließenden Entscheidung verstehen wir den Bewerbungsprozess als eine Gelegenheit für ein intensives gegenseitiges Kennenlernen. Zeig uns, wer Du bist und wir zeigen Dir, was Dich bei uns erwartet. Wenn es zwischen uns passt, sind wir bereit, gemeinsam durchzustarten!

Du bewirbst Dich schnell und einfach über die Online-BewerbungWir screenen Deine Unterlagen innerhalb einer WocheAnschließend laden wir Dich zu einem persönlichen Kennenlernen einDein Angebot wird erstellt und die Onboardingvorbereitung startetDu bist Teil von TRUSTEQ und lernst Deinen Buddy und alle TRUSTEEs kennen

Company Description:
We are leaders in specialist recruitment and workforce solutions, offering advisory services such as learning and skill development, career transitions and employer brand positioning.

As the Leadership Partner to our customers, we invest in lifelong partnerships that empower people and businesses to succeed. We help you achieve your career goals and deliver your business needs by combining meaningful innovation with our global scale and insights.

Last year we helped over 280,000 people find their next career. Join the millions of people around the world that our specialist recruitment consultants provide with up-to-date information on career options, interesting insights and specific industry trends.

We help our customers define and implement strategies to create inclusive and equitable workplaces. Through harnessing and analysing data, we support business decision making and advise on how to access Talent Networks. We also assist in identifying attractive employer propositions by truly understanding a company’s identity, and support clients with all aspects of their Early Careers proposition, from strategic planning through to operational execution.

Hays is the market leader in the UK and Asia Pacific and one of the market leaders in Continental Europe and Latin America. The c.12,800 people we employ around the world partner with clients and candidates to power the world of work. Every day our expert consultants help thousands of candidates find their next role, and they also help clients reshape workforces and deal with talent shortages. In the year to 30 June 2021, we placed 77,000 people in permanent jobs and 244,000 people into temporary roles. For more information about our global network, strategy and Group financial results, visit www.haysplc.com

Title: Cyber Security Internship
Description:
Primary Location

Netherlands-The Hague

NATO Body

NATO Communications and Information Agency (NCIA)

Schedule

Full-time

Salary (Pay Basis)

1,424.59

Grade

INTERN

For more than 75 years, NATO’s mission has been to preserve peace and security in the Alliancefor nearly one billion citizens. The NATO Communications and Information Agency (NCIA) is NATO’s technology and cyber hub. We are a team of 3000 civilian and military staff, working together to connect all corners of NATO and maintain its Edge from 30 locations across the Alliance.

We are a key partner in NATO's Digital Transformation, working hand in hand with industry to provide technical solutions and expertise, facilitating political consultations and decision-making, and enabling multi-domain operations.

Our experts provide secure static and deployable communications infrastructure, satellite communications and information technology services, connected the Alliance’s forces, and strengthening NATO’s defence and deterrence posture. Fulfilling NCIA’s missions is possible because of our greatest force, our people. In order to reinforce NATO’s edge, we aim to hire, train and retain the very best staff.

Our staff members represent both the diversity and unity of our Alliance. When you join NCIA, you will be part of an organization where you can contribute authentically to the mission and purpose of NATO and help us ensure seamless connectivity among Allied partner nations.

About The Program

The NCIA internship is a 6-month program based at one of our key hubs in The Netherlands, Belgium or Portugal. Our internship opportunities start from either 1 March or 1 September with the start date being dependent on the timeline to secure the required security clearance to work within the NATO community. During an internship, you will join and support a diverse international team and simultaneously learn from our experts via on-the-job training, working independently on purposeful projects or initiatives during your tenure.

About The Internship

Internship duration: 6 months

Location:  The Hague, Netherlands 

The NATO Cyber Security Centre (NCSC) is responsible for planning and executing all lifecycle management activities for cyber security. In execution of this responsibility, it provides specialist cyber security-related services covering the spectrum of scientific, technical, acquisition, operations, maintenance, and sustainment support. NCSCprovides services in the specialist security areassuch as: CIS Security, Cyber Defence, Information Assurance, Computer Security and Communications Security.

The intern will be assigned to a project for integrating Authonomous Cyber Defence agents with automated cloud incident responses.

Duties And Responsibilities

 Assist in designing, deploying and maintaining an IaC-based cloud infrastructure. Develop, test and integrate automated and AI-based incident response workflows. Participate in research and development initiatives. Support preparation of publications and presentations.

About You

The valuable knowledge and experience that you bring to this role is:

 Basic cybersecurity knowledge Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) Hands on experience with IaC tools (Terraform, Ansible) Hands on experience with programming\scripting languages (Python, Bash)

Incident Management

Follows agreed procedures to identify, register and categorise incidents.Gathers information to enable incident resolution and allocates incidents as appropriate.

IT Infrastructure

Contributes, under supervision, to routine infrastructure operation. Gains understanding of infrastructure components and services by following the activities of experienced colleagues.

Research

Within given research goals, assists in selection and review of credible and reliable resources.Searches for relevant material using specialised websites and sources, reads relevant articles to update knowledge of the relevant field.Reports on work carried out and may contribute sections of publication-quality material.Curates, under guidance, a personal collection of relevant material.

 Eligibility Criteria 

To be eligible to apply for our internship program, you will need to meet the following criteria:

 You are a national of a NATO member country You are currently studying towards a university-level degree or have recently graduated in the past 12 months A thorough knowledge of one of the two NATO languages, both written and spoken, is essential and some knowledge of the other is desirable. Most of the work of the NCI Agency is conducted in the English language.

We also request that you please attach the following documents to your application form:

 Copy of the university degree you have completed and/or Proof of ongoing studies with the dates clearly mentioned if you are still studying

Application Process

The application process for an internship at NCIA is:

Ø Apply via the NCIA Careers site by 23:59 CET 16 th March 2025

Ø If selected to progress to the first stage evaluation this will consist of a logic, numeracy and behavioral gamification exercises in addition to on-demand video questions aligned to the requirements of the internship

Ø Virtual interviews will take place in the month of April

Ø Tentative offer to be presented to successful candidates in early May

Compensation

Netherlands

You will be compensated at a fixed taxable rate of 1,424.59 EUR per month, based on 38 hours of work per week and for reasonable travel expenses to start on day 1 and to return to your home location once the internship is complete.

Thank you for your patience while we consider your application.To learn more about NCIA and our work, please visit our website .

NCIA prides itself on being an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment of mutual respect and value uniqueness and differences in gender, gender identity, race, ethnic or cultural origin, age, religion, sexual orientation and physical or neurocognitive ability.

Additional details on the conditions of application can be found via the NCIA career site.

Company Description:
Working for peace, security and freedom for one billion people. 
Official LinkedIn account of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization. 
#NATO #WeAreNATO
 
Comments posted by followers do not necessarily represent official opinion or policy of member governments, or of NATO.    

NATO is a military alliance established by the signing of the North Atlantic Treaty on 4 April 1949. NATO’s essential purpose is to safeguard the freedom and security of its members through political and military means.

POLITICAL - NATO promotes democratic values and encourages consultation and cooperation on defence and security issues to build trust and, in the long run, prevent conflict.

MILITARY - NATO is committed to the peaceful resolution of disputes. If diplomatic efforts fail, it has the military capacity needed to undertake crisis-management operations. These are carried out under Article 5 of the Washington Treaty - NATO’s founding treaty - or under a UN mandate, alone or in cooperation with other countries and international organizations.

Source: http://www.nato.int/nato-welcome/index.html and http://www.nato.int/history/nato-history.html

Title: Data Protection & Compliance Specialist
Description:
Type: Full-time and permanent contractLocation: Runeberginkatu 14–16, 00100 HelsinkiApplication DL: 10.3.2025
Are you interested in data protection, compliance, and automation? Aalto EE is looking for a Data Protection & Compliance Specialist to ensure that data processes align with privacy regulations while maintaining business efficiency.
Your role As a Data Protection & Compliance Specialist, you will be responsible for ensuring that Aalto EE operates in compliance with GDPR and other data protection regulations. You will work closely with internal stakeholders and external legal experts to maintain policies, automate data processes, and develop practical solutions for data governance.
In this role, you will:Draft and maintain privacy policies, guidelines, and compliance documentationMonitor data processing activities and ensure personal data is handled correctly and deleted according to retention policiesAutomate workflows and implement scripts to manage data securely and efficiently (e.g., with Power Automate)Conduct internal audits and process reviews to ensure adherence to guidelines and best practices Support internal teams, including marketing and business operations, in understanding and implementing data protection measuresStay up to date with the latest developments in data protection, privacy, and compliance through continuous learning
What makes you a great fit?
You thrive in a role that combines compliance expertise with technical problem-solving. You are proactive, analytical, and able to turn regulatory requirements into practical, hands-on solutions. A logical approach and attention to detail are key to succeeding in this role.
What we expect from you:Previous working experience in similar responsibilities and a relevant degree (e.g., in computer science, information technology, cybersecurity, business administration, or legal studies)Experience or strong understanding of data protection regulations (e.g., GDPR)Technical and scripting skills for data processing and automationFoundation in working with or willingness to learn Microsoft Power Automate, along with the ability to develop and utilize complex formulas in ExcelStrong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to develop automated workflows.Excellent communication skills in English (Finnish is considered an advantage).
Additional valuable skills:Experience working with CRM systems (e.g., Microsoft Dynamics).Understanding of compliance frameworks beyond GDPR (e.g., CCPA).Familiarity with data security best practices. We can offer you: Diverse and meaningful responsibilities in a company owned by Aalto UniversityComprehensive introduction to the new role and supportive team environment - we do not expect you to master everything, but your enthusiastic attitude and desire to develop into a true Data Protection Specialist An inspiring work environment and colleagues who passionately approach their work, supporting your success in your role and enjoying free time togetherA flexible hybrid working model and working hours, along with a fixed monthly salary depending on your background and experienceCulture and sports benefits, lunch benefit, and extended occupational health carePracticalities:This is a full-time and permanent position, where you will be employed directly to Aalto EE. We hope that you are able to start as soon as possible. Aalto EE’s office is located in Töölö, Helsinki and we hope you are able to work at the office at least a few days per week as part of a hybrid model. Salary in this position is 4200-4800 €/month (gross) depending on the level of your experience, and will be negotiated individually. 
Sounds like you? Great!Please submit your CV and motivation letter in PDF-format by the latest 10th of March via our application system here: https://emp.jobylon.com/applications/jobs/277845/create/ . With a role-specific motivation letter you can provide more information about your relevant skills and why this would be an interesting opportunity for you. Remember to use the application system, we do not accept applications by email. 
Aalto EE's core values are impact, curiosity and respect. We actively strive to promote diversity in our work community and to welcome people from different backgrounds into our work community and as our customers, and to include everyone in our community. We welcome applicants from different backgrounds.
For questions regarding the application process and schedules, please contact Managing Recruitment Consultant Sara Juutinen (+358 44 302 3518, sara.juutinen[at]atalent.fi).

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Quale sarà la tua sfida? 

Bip ha creato all’interno del proprio Competence Centre “xTech” il più nutrito gruppo di Data Scientist in Italia (fonte: statistiche LinkedIn), e dall’Italia coordina anche i propri gruppi di Data Scientist locali presso le proprie sedi estere. 

Nell’ambito della continua crescita ed evoluzione di questo effervescente gruppo, che opera sui nostri clienti in tutti i settori, e ci ha consentito di introdurre l’Intelligenza Artificiale presso le realtà enterprise più importanti d’Italia, siamo alla ricerca sia di profili junior/intermediate (dai neolaureati a profili con almeno 2 anni di esperienza), sia profili middle-senior (dai 3 ai 5 anni di esperienza). La provenienza da società di consulenza direzionale o informatica sarà considerata un forte plus. 

Il/La Data Scientist in Bip evolve non solo le proprie competenze di AI e Machine Learning, ma anche la comprensione dei fenomeni legati al Business dei nostri Clienti e le proprie capacità di tradurli in algoritmi e poi di comunicare e utilizzare i risultati degli stessi per migliorare ed efficientare i processi. 

I/Le nostri/e Data Scientist verranno introdotti in contesti progettuali dove comprenderanno le esigenze del Cliente, daranno indicazione ai Data Engineer sulla preparazione desiderata dei dati, sceglieranno o costruiranno i migliori mix di modelli più adatti al caso specifico, discuteranno gli output con il cliente e consegneranno il modello per l’ottimizzazione e passaggio in produzione finale ai Data Engineer. 

In contesti più semplificati in cui la componente di Data Engineering è meno elaborata, i nostri Data Scientist procederanno in autonomia anche nella data preparation e nel porting in produzione dei modelli ingegnerizzati. 

Oltre alle progettualità, ai/alle Data Scientist sarà richiesto un contributo attivo per alimentare la Community con attività di ricerca, scouting, concept di nuove soluzioni e business development. 

Sarai tu ad entrare nel nostro team? 

Requisiti Indispensabili: 

Laurea Specialistica in Ingegneria Informatica, Ingegneria Matematica, Informatica, Statistica o discipline affini (STEM); 

Forte approccio quantitativo e brillanti doti analitiche; 

Passione e competenza in ambito data exploration, analisi dati e creazione di modelli: il nostro team disegna e sviluppa sistemi a supporto di decisioni strategiche per il business; 

Competenze statistiche, di Data Mining, Machine Learning; 

Solida conoscenza e comprovata esperienza in programmazione e scripting con Python 

Conoscenza di tematiche di Deep Learning, NLP e analisi dati non strutturati 

Esperienza con strumenti di version control (es. Git); 

Comprensione di tecnologie legate ai Big Data come Hadoop, MapReduce, Spark 

Conoscenza approfondita di database relazionali e di costrutti SQL e SQL Programming; 

Conoscenza di database non relazionali 

Per profili mid-senior, esperienza comprovata di gestione tecnica delle risorse (persone) su progetto 

Indispensabile la conoscenza fluente di italiano e inglese professionali 

Plus: 

Conoscenza dei linguaggi PySpark o Scala 

Esperienza di lavoro su piattaforma Databricks 

Esperienza nello sviluppo di applicazioni di Gen AI 

Conoscenza e l’utilizzo di API Cloud di Intelligenza Artificiale dei principali cloud provider (Google, Microsoft, AWS, IBM) e di altri strumenti di Advanced Analytics di Vendor specializzati 

Conoscenza di tecniche di semi-supervised e self-supervised learning. 

Esperienza con framework di lavoro AGILE (esempio: Scrum, Kanban), soprattutto per profili mid-senior. 

Soft Skills: 

Profili junior 

Standing consulenziale 

Ottime doti relazionali e comunicative 

Orientamento al cliente e al raggiungimento degli obiettivi 

Buona attitudine a lavorare in team 

Precisione e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze 

Disponibilità per trasferte in Italia e all’estero 

  

Profili mid-senior 

Standing consulenziale 

Spiccate doti comunicative e interpersonali 

Orientamento al cliente e al raggiungimento degli obiettivi 

Adattabilità e flessibilità 

Precisione e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze 

Ottime capacità di gestione di progettualità complesse 

Capacità di coordinamento di un team 

Disponibilità per trasferte in Italia e all’estero.

  Perchè Bip?

People at the center of our culture

Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialità e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.

Lavorare in BIP è un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti. 

Challenge yourself

Avrai la possibilità di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attività e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, l’autonomia e la capacità di assumerti responsabilità e metterti in gioco.

Unlocking your potential

Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi all’avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.

Work-life Integration

Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworking fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration

Diversity, Equity and Inclusion

Valorizziamo l’unicità e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutte le nostre persone abbiano pari opportunità di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro

Il nostro approccio alla diversità e all’inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrità e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, più ampi.

Promuoviamo l’inserimento e l’integrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette – in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 –.

Next Steps

Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prenderemo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.

Se c’è un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte all’interno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.

L’iter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.

L’ordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.

In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunità future.

Se dovessi identificare tu stesso/a ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.

Su di Noi

Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato l’esperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: l’innovazione e la digitalizzazione.

Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze più all’avanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.

Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualità su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.

Crediamo nel valore dell’eccellenza, che è la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.

Company Description:
A network of thinkers, creatives and creators. An ecosystem made of insights, skills and research. Skeptical by nature and optimistic by education - we do not believe in pre-packaged solutions and we conceive of consultancy as a tailored product, which enhances the strength of our customers, opening up new opportunities.

We are men and women of thought, who build, plan, actualize. Probably one of the most curious minds you will ever work with.
We are in the business of ideas but we know that ideas alone are not enough to change a market - you have to turn them into projects, putting your hands and heart into it.
The status quo is meant to be turned upside down for the benefit of our customers. There is no choice that is not crucial. It will seem extreme, perhaps, but if we had not been radical in our choices, we would not be here. To exist is to dare and we dare, together with our customers, from day one.

BIP. Here To Dare

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
A hazai IT piac dinamikusan fejlődő szereplője, a Kontron Hungary Kft., a Kontron csoport tagja – korábban S&T Consulting Hungary Kft., több mint huszonöt éve működik sikerrel a hazai és nemzetközi informatikai szolgáltató piacon. Stabil háttérrel, tapasztalt kollégákkal, kiemelkedő szakértelemmel és a legfejlettebb technológiákkal dolgozó csapatunk bővítéséhez keresünk kollégát az alábbi pozícióba:

Data Scientist

Title: Information Technology Specialist
Description:
HACA Partners in brief
Created in 2016, HACA Partners is an approved audit firm (cabinet de révision agréé - supervised by the CSSF) focusing its energy and expertise to its core businesses: external audit, internal audit, regulatory & compliance, risk management and consulting services.Since its launching, the firm is in constant development with a team now composed of more than ninety professionals.The objective of HACA Partners is to offer to its clients the services of professionals with a wide range of experience and expertise.We are seeking an experienced IT Technician to develop, maintain, and support our internal IT services. The role will involve managing and optimizing Microsoft 365 tools, supporting end users, and ensuring the security and efficiency of our IT infrastructure. You will be responsible for implementing and supporting solutions like Microsoft Intune, Autopilot, MDM, Defender, and other key technologies used within our organization.www.hacapartners.lu
Your role
As an IT Technician – Internal IT Services
Key Responsibilities
Develop, deploy, and maintain internal IT services, with a primary focus on Microsoft 365 (M365), including Intune, Autopilot, MDM, and Microsoft Defender.Configure, monitor, and optimize M365 security and compliance features to ensure company-wide protection.Provide technical support and troubleshooting for internal end users, resolving issues with hardware, software, and networking.Implement and manage MDM policies and profiles to ensure seamless and secure device management across the organization.Support and configure Microsoft Autopilot for device provisioning and deployment, ensuring a smooth onboarding process for new hires.Collaborate with the IT team to integrate new software solutions and streamline workflows using M365 tools.Monitor and manage endpoint security with Microsoft Defender, performing regular audits and remediation where needed.Develop and maintain documentation for internal IT processes, configurations, and troubleshooting guides.Assist with software deployment and configuration across a variety of devices (Windows, macOS, mobile devices).Troubleshoot and resolve IT issues efficiently while maintaining high levels of customer service for end users.Provide guidance to internal teams on best practices for using M365 tools to improve productivity and security.Help ensure that internal IT infrastructure adheres to best practices, security standards, and compliance requirements.
Requirements
2 to 5 years of experience in an internal IT support or technician role, focusing on end-user support and system management.Strong hands-on experience with Microsoft 365 suite, including Intune, Autopilot, MDM, Defender, and other M365 services.Experience with configuring and managing Microsoft Azure Active Directory, security policies, and device management.Proficiency in troubleshooting and supporting Windows and macOS environments.Understanding of endpoint security best practices and experience with security tools (e.g., Microsoft Defender).Strong knowledge of network concepts (VPN, TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP).Ability to create and maintain internal documentation, guides, and user manuals.Excellent communication skills and the ability to provide clear, user-friendly IT support to all employees.Ability to manage and prioritize multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.Strong attention to detail and a proactive approach to problem-solving.Preferred Skills:Microsoft certifications such as MS-900, MS-101, or Security+.Familiarity with PowerShell or scripting for automation and system management.Experience with other M365 services like SharePoint, Teams, or OneDrive.Knowledge of ITIL or other IT service management frameworks.
Our offer
Young and dynamic CompanyDiversified and interesting clientsLearning curve with experienced professionals and trainingsWarm work environmentFlexibility at work (homeworking)Salary Package in line with market + benefits.
