Title: Junior Data Engineer
Description:
Junior Data EngineerOTP Bank’s digital transformation journey leverages the power of Cloud to drive innovation, enhance operational efficiency, and deliver exceptional digital banking experiences. By adopting scalable, secure, and intelligent cloud solutions, we aim to transform our IT infrastructure, enable seamless data-driven decision-making, and foster agility in responding to evolving customer needs.
Job DescriptionAs a Junior Data Engineer, you will contribute to the design, building, and management of data pipelines that support data-driven decision making across various products and services. You will have the opportunity to be part of OTP Cloud Journey and shape the future of banking.You will collaborate with stakeholders to understand data requirements, model data flows, transform raw data, ensure data quality, and comply with data governance standards. You will use your skills and experience in software engineering, cloud data engineering, data platforms, and data visualization to deliver scalable and reliable data solutions. OTP’s mission is to become leading bank of the digital era. As employees we work with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. We nurture values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.
Responsibilities• Collaborate across squads to define data requirements, roadmaps, use cases, and metrics for data products or features.• Design and document data models, schemas, and flows that meet business and analytical needs.• Extract, transform, and load data from various sources using query languages, tools, and APIs.• Ensure data quality, completeness, and reliability across data pipelines.• Develop and implement data tools, tests, and monitors to optimize data performance and troubleshoot issues.• Comply with data governance policies and standards for data security, privacy, and classification.• Contribute to the data glossary and data catalog to document data sources, definitions, and lineage.
Required Qualifications• Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Math, Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, or related field.• Experience in data engineering, data science, software development, or data modeling.• Knowledge of programming languages, such as Python, Java, Scala, or C#• Knowledge of Microsoft Azure data platform• Knowledge of frameworks, such as Databricks, Spark, Kafka• SQL data query language knowledge• Growth Mindset and willingness to learn
Additional/Prefered Qualifications• Knowledge of data visualization tools, such as Power BI• Relevant Microsoft Azure Cloud certifications are a plus• Strong communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills• Fluent in Hungarian and intermediate or above level of English is a must
Perks/Benefits• Yearly Bonus• Cafeteria• Private Health Insurance• Discounted Banking Services• Trainning and Development Opportunities• Sports/Fitness Discounts
Company Description:
Az OTP Csoport Magyarország egyik legnagyobb pénzügyi szolgáltató vállalata. A nemzetközi terjeszkedés eredményeként az OTP Csoport ma már meghatározó regionális szereplő a kelet-közép-európai piacon, Magyarországon kívül további 11 országában van jelen.

Az OTP Csoport több mint 17,5 millió ügyféllel rendelkezik, a lakossági szegmensben piacvezető Magyarországon, Szlovéniában, Szerbiában, Montenegróban, illetve Bulgáriában. 

A csoport zászlóshajója az OTP Bank, mely korszerű pénzügyi szolgáltatások széles körét nyújtja Magyarországon. A Csoport a lakossági terület mellett a vállalati ügyfelek magas színvonalú kiszolgálását is prioritásként kezeli, az agrárvállalatok számára az anyabank és a legtöbb leánybank speciális termékeket kínál.

Az OTP Bank Magyarországon 350 fiókból álló fiókhálózatot működtet, alkalmazottainak száma meghaladja a 10 000 főt.



OTP Group is one of the biggest financial suppliers in Hungary. As a result of an international expansion OTP Group is a determining player on the banking market within the CEE region. The bank is present in 11 countries besides Hungary.

OTP Group is one of the leading financial service providers within the region with over 17,5 million customers. We retained our position as the market leader credit institution in the retail segment in Hungary, Montenegro and Bulgaria. 

As its flagship unit, OTP Bank Hungary provides a wide range of state-of-the-art financial services in Hungary, while offering, through the network of local Group subsidiaries, solutions to a number of other special financial needs including the distribution of investment funds, home and other specific savings, and auto financing. In addition to retail, our Group also gives priority to serving corporate customers to a high standard, with the parent bank and most subsidiary banks offering special products to agricultural companies.

OTP Bank operates with more than 350 branches in Hungary and the number of its employees exceeds 10.000.

Title: UI Developer Intern
Description:
Your Team Responsibilities

We are seeking a junior and motivated web developer to design, develop, and maintain web portals that deliver an intuitive and engaging user experience. The team is responsible for developing an internally used web application, supporting the daily work of various Data operations teams within the company. The application is a python app, using the Django framework on the backend and - currently - jQuery on the frontend, that we are planning to replace with React.js. The team's most important responsibility is to implement new feature requests while also being on the lookout to improve existing processes. In addition to the development function, the team is also fully responsible for managing all application instances, from front to back, which includes deployment and all related devops functionalities as well. We are also in the process of migrating the application to a cloud native environment, leveraging the capabilities of docker and kubernetes.

Your Key Responsibilities

Working together with team members / stakeholders to understand feature requestsImplementing basic features and functionalities based on provided business requirements and user needsWriting unit tests for the backend codeHelp developing and maintaining CI/CD pipelinesParticipate in team meetings and code reviewsMaintain simple and clear documentation of code and processesUpdate project-related documentation as needed

Your Skills And Experience That Will Help You Excel

Strong interest in web development and python knowledge is required, some experience is preferredFamiliarity with JavaScript, React.js, html and CSS is a plusBasic understanding of database systems (e.g., SQLite, PostgreSQL, Oracle)Exposure to version control systems like GitFamiliarity with Agile methodologiesGood communication and teamwork abilities

About MSCI

What we offer you

Transparent compensation schemes and comprehensive employee benefits, tailored to your location, ensuring your financial security, health, and overall wellbeing.Flexible working arrangements, advanced technology, and collaborative workspaces.A culture of high performance and innovation where we experiment with new ideas and take responsibility for achieving results.A global network of talented colleagues, who inspire, support, and share their expertise to innovate and deliver for our clients.Global Orientation program to kickstart your journey, followed by access to our Learning@MSCI platform, LinkedIn Learning Pro and tailored learning opportunities for ongoing skills development.Multi-directional career paths that offer professional growth and development through new challenges, internal mobility and expanded roles.We actively nurture an environment that builds a sense of inclusion belonging and connection, including eight Employee Resource Groups. All Abilities, Asian Support Network, Black Leadership Network, Climate Action Network, Hola! MSCI, Pride & Allies, Women in Tech, and Women’s Leadership Forum.

At MSCI we are passionate about what we do, and we are inspired by our purpose – to power better investment decisions. You’ll be part of an industry-leading network of creative, curious, and entrepreneurial pioneers. This is a space where you can challenge yourself, set new standards and perform beyond expectations for yourself, our clients, and our industry.

MSCI is a leading provider of critical decision support tools and services for the global investment community. With over 50 years of expertise in research, data, and technology, we power better investment decisions by enabling clients to understand and analyze key drivers of risk and return and confidently build more effective portfolios. We create industry-leading research-enhanced solutions that clients use to gain insight into and improve transparency across the investment process.

MSCI Inc. is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversifying its workforce. To all recruitment agencies

MSCI does not accept unsolicited CVs/Resumes. Please do not forward CVs/Resumes to any MSCI employee, location, or website. MSCI is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited CVs/Resumes.

Description: Looking for Senior System Administrators and Full-stack Developers for automation projects
Primary Description: Hungarian Central Statistical Office · Budapest, Budapest, Hungary (On-site)

Company Description:
The Hungarian Central Statistical Office (HCSO) is a professionally independent public administration agency under the government. The Office provides data for the parliament and public administration, social organizations, local authorities, scientific bodies, economic organizations, the general public and the media as well as for international organizations and users abroad. Official data regarding the socio-economic situation as well as the changes in the population of the country are published by the HCSO.

The publicity work of the office is based on the following guiding principles:

    - objectiveness, impartiality and competency
    - wide-ranging publicity and transparency of data (ensuring simultaneously the protection of individual data)
    - synchronous information dissemination
Specialties: Official statistics

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
If you're ready to dive into the world of data and tackle exciting challenges that shape our business decisions, BrokerChooser is the place for you. We are eager to welcome a skilled Data Engineer with a passion for data-driven solutions to our team.
Here, your contributions will play a crucial role in optimizing our data infrastructure and influencing our strategic direction. Join us and help pave the way for data innovation that drives our success!
✨ We're building the company culture for growth:We dream big and build world-class products - We believe in taking full ownership of our projects and expect everyone on our team to bring their best ideas and initiatives to the table.Ship fast and learn from it - We blend the structure of a corporate environment with the agility of a startup, launching new features daily, trying new technologies and running numerous A/B tests to see what works best.We're going international - We're attracting top talent from across Europe and beyond, building a diverse, multidisciplinary team that’s as dynamic as the FinTech world we’re shaping.Strong feedback culture - We run an advanced feedback system that prioritizes open communication and offers the opportunity to delve deeply into your performance in monthly discussions.Annual salary benchmarks, equity option - We offer competitive salaries based on market benchmarks that are adjusted annually ensuring that your compensation remains fair and competitive.
✔️ What you'll be doing:Develop and maintain scalable, efficient data pipelines that integrate data from diverse sourcesLeverage data scraping and API solutions to gather and enhance our datasets, enriching our analytical capabilitiesCreate comprehensive reports that communicate findings clearly to stakeholders and facilitate data-driven decision-making.Actively provide insights and strategic recommendations based on deep data analysisEvaluate A/B tests rigorously and analyze resultsAssist in user research to understand customer behavior, preferences, funnel flow, contributing to product developmentDevelop statistical models, such as linear regression, to support forecasting, trend analysis, and strategic decision-makingPartner with our senior data expert on AI-based tasks and furthering our innovative capacities
Do you have what it takes?3+ years of relevant Data and Software Engineering experience, with strong proficiency in PythonA business and impact focused mindset, not afraid of big data sets, can independently draw conclusions and take the initiativeExcellent communication skills and the ability to present data-driven insights to non-technical stakeholdersWorking proficiency in English; no exam is needed, but interviews and tests might be conducted in EnglishProven experience in building and maintaining ETL pipelinesStrong SQL skillsFamiliarity with cloud computing services, particularly GCP and AWSExperience with data warehouse solutions (eg. BigQuery, Redshift, Snowflake)Proficient in BI tools (e.g., Tableau, Metabase, Power BI) and data visualization best practices
The salary range for this (medior) position is 1,400,000 - 1,750,00,000 HUF gross / month.
What do we do?In today's fast-paced FinTech landscape, we stand out as a leading global platform for brokerage comparison and financial education. Based in Budapest, Hungary, we’re here to guide individual investors all over the world with clear, unbiased, and thorough reviews of brokerage services worldwide.
Founded by finance professionals, we combine cutting-edge AI and Data Science with expert analysis to compare over 100 brokers, catering to diverse investment needs. We are a tight-knit team of 45 professionals, growing at an impressive annual rate of 50%, all while being completely bootstrapped. Our goal? To hit $4 million in annual recurring revenue (ARR) by 2024, with a potential to grow 30 times over.
Our insights are regularly featured in top-tier publications like Bloomberg, Financial Times, Forbes, and CNBC. Our innovative approach has earned us the title of Best Fintech Startup in Hungary by CESA. Plus, the feedback we provide is often implemented by industry leaders like Interactive Brokers.
We’re proud to serve nearly 700,000 monthly users across more than 200 countries, offering personalized advice in over 60 languages, saving over 10,000 people from scams every month.
To learn more about the team, visit our Career site and check out this video.
Company Description:
Compare, choose, trade!

BrokerChooser helps retail investors find online brokers fitting their needs. 

We test more than 100 industry-leading brokers worldwide, evaluating 50,000 critical data points; we execute thousands of trades using real money by opening a live account at each analyzed broker. We also offer tools and articles designed to assist beginners and more experienced traders alike.

Title: Cyber Security Analyst
Description:
Introduction

You will join IBM Security Services which is a division of IBM Consulting, responsible for delivering security services to its large global customers, alongside major digital transformation projects in the application and cloud domains. You will join a team of 20 + Security Analysts who are looking after to monitor, detect and respond to cyber threats. This is an excellent opportunity to learn and apply cybersecurity fundamentals using leading edge tools. Learn more about what SOC, Security Operations Centre - https://www.ibm.com/topics/security-operations-center . We look for motivated junior professionals who are keen to learn and grow.

Your Role And Responsibilities

You will be:

 A part of day to day activities of the Security Operations Center (SOC) Improving the cybersecurity posture by identifying, verifying, and understanding cyber events. Collecting, analyzing, and correlating security events and using data to enable recommendation of mitigation of potential incidents Identifying events that pose a threat to the confidentiality, availability and integrity of information or systems Performing event and incident tracking using ticket management system Providing event and incident operational and executive reporting Supporting the 24x7x365 SOC by providing a view of security events and network activity.

Preferred Education

None

Required Technical And Professional Expertise

 Knowledge of operating systems (Linux, Windows) Knowledge of computer network basics Good English language proficiency Very good analytical and problem solving skills Openness to learn new technologies Good communication skills Team work attitude

Preferred Technical And Professional Experience

 Bachelor’s Degree in either of the disciplines: Computer Science, Automation, Electronics, Electrical, Telecommunications, Computer Engineering Knowledge of either of SIEM tools - Sentinel, Qradar or Splunk Experience in one of the domains: Identity and Access, Data Security, Network & Endpoint Security, Cloud Security, Security Operation Centre, etc. At least 1 year of professional working experience
Company Description:
At IBM, we do more than work. We create. We create as technologists, developers, and engineers. We create with our partners. We create with our competitors. If you're searching for ways to make the world work better through technology and infrastructure, software and consulting, then we want to work with you.

We're here to help every creator turn their "what if" into what is. Let's create something that will change everything.
Specialties: Cloud,Mobile,Cognitive,Security,Research,Watson,Analytics,Consulting,Commerce,Experience Design,Internet of Things,Technology support,Industry solutions,Systems services,Resiliency services,Financing,IT infrastructure

Title: IT AUDITOR
Description:
Mi lesz a feladatod?A bank IT folyamatainak ellenőrzése.A jogszabályoknak, group szintű előírásoknak és belső szabályzatoknak való megfelelés, valamint a hatékonyság vizsgálata.Részvétel a vizsgálati program összeállításában.Az ellenőrzések lefolytatása az előkészítési szakasztól a helyszíni vizsgálatokon át az írásba foglalásig és egyeztetésig.Jelentés elkészítése angol nyelven.Kapcsolattartás társterületekkel és a bécsi központtal. Miért érdemes velünk dolgozni?Biztonság és fejlődésStabil nemzetközi háttérrel rendelkező multinacionális vállalat vagyunk,Versenyképes juttatási csomagra számíthatsz,Egyéni célokhoz igazított karrierút, előrelépési lehetőségek várnak,Elkötelezett, támogató vezetőkkel és eredményorientált kollégákkal dolgozunk.Támogatás és juttatásokSzámos Cafeteria juttatási elem közül választhatsz: SZÉP kártya, extra szabadnap, munkába járási támogatás, egészségbiztosítás, jegyek kulturális rendezvényekre és sporteseményekre,Kedvezményes lakáshiteltámogatást és dolgozói hitelt biztosítunk,Nyelvi, szakmai és soft skill képzések várnak,Figyelünk Rád és segítünk Neked, hogy mind szakmailag, mind a személyes fejlődésedben sikereket érhess el.Közösség és összetartozásSegítőkész kollégák és befogadó légkör vár,Közös célunk a kiváló ügyfélélmény, amiért együtt dolgozunk,Közösségi tevékenységeken is részt vehetsz: sportkörök, Young Generation program, éves Raiffeisen Bank találkozó,Jól-lét program, mely során figyelünk kollégáink fizikai és mentális egészségére,Értékesítői workshopokon fejlődhetsz és kapcsolatokat teremthetsz,Visszajelzés alapú kultúrában hiszünk, számítunk a véleményedre!
Csatlakozz hozzánk, ha...Szakirányú főiskolai/egyetemi (közgazdasági vagy pénzügyi) végzettséggel rendelkezel.1-2 év tapasztalattal rendelkezel IT Audit, IT kockázatelemzési területen.Kockázati fókusz és lényeglátás, pontos és precíz dokumentáció jellemző rád.Magas szintű írásbeli és szóbeli kommunikációs képességgel rendelkezel magyar és angol nyelven egyaránt.Szívesen közreműködsz előre mutató javaslatok kidolgozásában.CISA minősítés előnyt jelent.
Digitális kompetenciákHa Te is a mobilodon intézed el mindennapi ügyeidet, nyitott vagy a digitális újdonságokra, nem ijedsz meg egy Teams megbeszéléstől, akkor nincs más teendőd, mint az, hogy jelentkezz hozzánk! Nálunk egy olyan összetartó csapat tagja lehetsz, ahol folyamatosan új megoldásokat keressük és a digitális eszközök a mindennapi munkavégzésünk szerves részét képzik.
Company Description:
Az osztrák Raiffeisen Bank International leányvállalataként a Raiffeisen Bank Zrt. egyidős a hazai kétszintű bankrendszerrel: 1987 óta meghatározó tagja Magyarország pénzügyi és gazdasági életének. Tevékenysége kiterjed a lakossági szolgáltatásoktól a nagyvállalati  szegmensig, a számlavezetéstől a szofisztikált pénzügyi megoldásokig. Az univerzális banki működés számos szakterületen ad lehetőséget szakmai kibontakozásra nemcsak tapasztalt szakemberek, de pályakezdők számára is. 

A Bank szervezeti kultúrája mindig erős megkülönböztető erővel bírt a leendő és a meglévő munkatársaink szemében. Munkatársaink megbecsülése az egymás iránti tiszteletben, a közvetlen hangvételben, az igényes munkakörnyezetben és kiemelkedő színvonalú képzési rendszerünkben is megnyílvánul. Ezek olyan értékeink, melyek időtállónak bizonyulnak.
 
Ahogy bankon belül, úgy környezetünkben is vannak számunkra fontos, felkarolandó társadalmi értékek, melyeket adományokkal, szponzorálással, valamint munkatársaink önkéntes munkájával is támogatunk. Rendre bizonyítjuk, hogy a csapatszellem nemcsak a munkában vezet sikerre: a hazai bankok közöttii sporttalálkozókon az elmúlt években mindig a dobogón végzett a Raiffeisen Bank.

Te is gondolkozol Raiffeisen karrierben? 
Jelentkezz hozzánk!
https://www.raiffeisen.hu/karrier
Specialties: People & Culture,Financial Services,Bank

Title: Full Stack Developer - aiSim
Description:
aiMotive began developing its innovative aiSim in the nascent days of simulation in automated driving. Building this expertise has allowed us to create the first ISO26262 certified tool available to the broader automotive industry. TCL 3 enables aiSim to be an integral part of a development and verification toolchain up to ASIL D, ensuring deterministic, realistic, and repeatable testing.
Check out our latest video about aiSim! 
We are seeking a full stack developer to join our aiSim Web Development team. The team’s main responsibility is to develop a feature-rich web application as a greenfield project both for editing simulated maps and scenarios in a 3D world and for configuring, executing and monitoring a large number of simulations.
Job Summary Develop and expand our web application using React with Typescript, with 3D features in three.js.Write robust, maintainable code.Work on our next generation 3D editor application from the architectural planning, through core-feature development, all the way to the UI developmentDesign and implement REST APIs for internal and external data transferHandle database models and views via Django.Get involved in feature planning by discussing the customer’s needs.Collaborate closely with other aiSim software development teams and graphic artists

Considered as a plus Docker experienceKubernetes experienceExperience with websockets, video streamingC++ experienceExpericence with 3D modelling software (like Maya, 3Ds MAX, Blender) and game engines (Unreal, Unity)
What We Offer Competitive salary and long-term bonus systemFitness opportunitiesCorporate health insurance packageFree lunch every workday, nearby at one of the best all-you-can-eat restaurants in Budapest or delivered by Wolt for WorkWork on the hottest applied research problem in an agile working culture, backed by a strong, stable and future-proof industrial partnershipVisit relevant international conferences, submit patents of new solutionsWe believe: people over process, we are keen to maintain a work-life balance

Title: Data Analyst - Product
Description:
At Shapr3D, we’re transforming how industries design and innovate. From automotive and aerospace to consumer tech and industrial design, our platform powers some of the boldest ideas across industries that shape 16% of the global GDP.

Our multi-platform product has earned the Apple Design Award and is regularly featured in Apple Keynotes. With Series B backing and a rapidly growing user base, we’re scaling fast - and this is your chance to be part of the journey.

Interested in finding out what Shapr3D and Budapest have to offer? Check out this page!

“Growth comes from challenges, and Shapr3D gives you plenty of both. This is a place for those who want to push themselves while contributing to a product that’s redefining the CAD industry. As a Data Analyst, you’ll drive critical product and marketing decisions, directly shaping how professionals work worldwide.” - Tibor Kolozsi, VP of Product

Within the organization

We are a small Data Team at Shapr3D, but we have a big impact. As our product becomes more complex and we make the transition from B2C to B2B, we are responsible for making sure that our data systems can handle the increased load and that people can get the information and insights they need quickly and easily.

We work with teams across the company as we believe that having a healthy data-informed mindset is essential to Shapr3D’s success. We are committed to building a world-class product and engineering organization, and we believe that our Data Team is essential to achieving this goal. We are here to keep the conversation honest, connect the dots and help our stakeholders evaluate the short and long-term impact of their decisions.

Read more about scaling-up engineering at Shapr3D (https://csi.pet/pFDkv) and listen to some thoughts from our Engineering VP on managing hyper-growth. (https://csi.pet/UeMYA)

What you'll do

Own core data sets end-to-end. Ensure data quality, define metrics, create and maintain ETL/ELT flows, and make data visible and accessible through data visualization and dashboards.Improve data literacy within the company. Help stakeholders understand and use data effectively by answering their questi stakeholders. Use your data analysis skills to answer specific questions and solve prons, providing training, and developing common data standards.Perform ad-hoc analyses, experiments and report your findings tooblems for the business. Communicate your findings to stakeholders in a clear and concise way.Develop a unified view of customer behavior through deeper analysis into how our features are being used

What you'll bring

Experience with creating and maintaining datasets, data visualization, and dashboards for business problemsStrong data analysis (e.g. cohort and funnel analyses), communication skills and a business mindsetSolid SQL foundations. Python knowledge and experimentation is a plusExperience in SaaS business and KPI settings, B2B experience is a plusA natural curiosity and a willingness to challenge yourself and try different solutionsWilling to grow into a thought partner: ready to ask hard questions and challenge your stakeholders across all seniority levels

A sneak peek into our stack...

We built our infrastructure on top of AWS and DatabricksWe use multiple external tools for data visualization and analytics including Tableau, Mitzu, Hubspot, and SalesforceMost of our code is written in Spark SQL and Python (sometimes PySpark)

What do we offer?

✨ Ownership & Impact – Be part of a startup shaping the future of design and manufacturing, with equity options.

🌍 Relocation Support – Full relocation package if you’re moving to Budapest, one of Europe’s fastest-growing tech hubs.

📚 Learning & Growth – Work alongside some of the industry’s best minds and continuously evolve your skills.

🏥 Comprehensive Benefits – Private healthcare, life insurance, gym membership, and more.

📍 Office-First Culture – We believe in in-person collaboration to build something extraordinary (Read more about our approach [https://csi.pet/EGxz8]).

You can read more details about our benefit package here (https://csi.pet/6YQsB)

About Shapr3D

We don’t just innovate - we create a new status quo in 3D design. With a multi-platform product redefining CAD, we’re on a mission to disrupt a 40-year-old industry and empower creators worldwide.

By joining us, you’ll contribute to a top-tier product that’s won the Apple Design Award and is regularly featured in Apple Keynotes. But what we’re most proud of is our growing global user base, designing the future every day.

If this excites you, let’s talk! And don’t worry if you don’t tick every single box - we hire for potential and mindset.

📩 Submit your CV in English and join the Shapr3D revolution.
Company Description:
Shapr3D is the leading multi-platform CAD software, delivering precision, flexibility, and efficiency across devices, including iPad, Mac, Windows, and Vision Pro. Built on Siemens Parasolid®, Shapr3D offers advanced modeling tools and seamless collaboration, streamlining the design process from concept to production.

With Shapr3D, you can:

- Accelerate early-stage design workflows, quickly exploring concepts and iterating on ideas.
- Create precise, manufacturing-ready models with History-Based Parametric Modeling.
- Conduct real-time design reviews and spatial collaboration using immersive Vision Pro workflows.
- Integrate with industry-standard CAD tools for smooth data exchange and compatibility.
- Collaborate efficiently through secure cloud workflows with instant synchronization across teams.
- Protect your designs with enterprise-grade security and compliance.

Shapr3D is tailored to address the challenges of traditional CAD systems. Its cross-platform capabilities streamline early-stage conceptual design and single-part modeling for manufacturing tooling and fixtures, eliminating bottlenecks and enabling faster time-to-market with improved team collaboration.

Adopted by industry leaders and professionals worldwide, Shapr3D is redefining CAD for product design, architecture, and engineering. From exploring initial concepts to creating precise, manufacturing-ready models, and conducting real-time design reviews with Vision Pro, Shapr3D delivers a reliable solution for today’s most demanding workflows.

Since its founding in 2015, Shapr3D has been at the forefront of CAD innovation, equipping professionals and enterprises to tackle modern design challenges with confidence.

Download Shapr3D from the App Store, Microsoft Store, or our website. htttps://www.shapr3d.com/download

Title: Data Associate - KYC6
Description:
The Role
KYC6, a division of ION Analytics, is a trusted and independent provider of global intelligence for Anti-Money Laundering (AML), Anti-Corruption and Cyber Security professionals. We own and maintain a database of actionable data from 240+ countries and our services enable clients to make informed decisions during the due diligence process and manage risk related to financial crime, money laundering, and terrorist financing.
As part of our expansion, we are seeking Data Associates with proficiency in one or more of the following languages: French, Arabic, Portuguese, Spanish, Italian, or German along with English. The job involves the research of individuals, corporations, and their networks via a combination of manual methods and automated processes. An ability to read between the lines and attention to detail are essential qualifications for this role, which is key to maintaining and expanding the database.
The role requires a systematic and proactive approach to continuous improvement around data and content gathering, data management and analysis. Solid research skills and a problem-solving mindset are key to support the growth of the business. Good communications skills with the ability to collaborate closely with teams in different technical and business-related functions and global locations as well as sound organisational skills are also prerequisites.
As a Data Associate you will become an expert on AML compliance and actively contribute to data innovation, increasing value for our clients while fostering an inclusive and open culture.
Key Responsibilities
Daily monitoring and processing of relevant content published by official sources, among which regulatory enforcement agencies and financial regulators, via a combination of manual and automated processesScreening of media sources to identify in-scope news and events on financial crimes, bribery, and corruption related to high-risk individuals and entities on the regions and countries assignedContinuous monitoring of PEP changes and elections in order to process relevant updates in a timely manner Contribute to content quality and expansion by ensuring active curation of existing sources and increase data coverage Subject matter expertise on legislation and regulation around Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and Combating Terrorism Financing (CTF) on the regions and countries assignedHelp with process automation, by supporting the team with building and maintaining data scraping tools and pipelines to monitor, extract, and process data from a variety of sources, especially public websites Continuously enhance and optimize data gathering and workflow processes via automation and subject matter expertiseWork on data point extraction and bulk data clean-up projects through innovative technical solutions
Required Skills, Qualifications, And Experience
Proficiency in one or more of the following languages: French, Arabic, Portuguese, Spanish, Italian, or GermanStrong proficiency in English, as it is the primary working language within the company and teamKnowledge of open-source intelligence gathering (OSINT)Basic knowledge of SQL and programming languages such as Python or Java, especially in relation to libraries and tools for web-scraping and data processingFluency with Excel
Preferred Skills
Understanding of AML/CFT Regulations, FATF Guidelines, PEPs and Sanction policiesWork experience in research / compliance / risk management or finance fieldInterest in current affairs, media, politicsHands-on experience with SQL database queries and web-scrapingTechnical expertise with ETL/ELT pipelines, data models, LLMsBachelor’s degree in risk management, Business, Finance, Law, International Relations, Political Sciences, Information Technology (IT)Strong work ethic and hunger for constant improvementExcellent communication and interpersonal skills Flexible with the ability to prioritize and re-prioritize due to conflicting demands Problem-solver with a focus on delivering results Proven capability to work on own initiativeAttention to detail with ability to analyse large data setsSound analytical and critical thinking skillsHighly meticulous and responsibleExceptional organizational, multi-tasking, prioritization and time management skills Ability to work independently and as part of a multicultural team across the globe
About Us
We’re a diverse group of visionary innovators who provide trading and workflow automation software, high-value analytics, and strategic consulting to corporations, central banks, financial institutions, and governments. Founded in 1999, we’ve achieved tremendous growth by bringing together some of the best and most successful financial technology companies in the world.
 Over 2,000 of the world’s leading corporations, including 50% of the Fortune 500 and 30% of the world’s central banks, trust ION solutions to manage their cash, in-house banking, commodity supply chain, trading and risk. Over 800 of the world’s leading banks and broker-dealers use our electronic trading platforms to operate the world’s financial market infrastructure.
ION is a rapidly expanding and dynamic group with 13,000 employees and offices in more than 40 cities around the globe.
Our ever-expanding global footprint, cutting edge products, and over 40,000 customers worldwide provide an unparalleled career experience for those who share our vision.
ION is committed to maintaining a supportive and inclusive environment for people with diverse backgrounds and experiences. We respect the varied identities, abilities, cultures, and traditions of the individuals who comprise our organization and recognize the value that different backgrounds and points of view bring to our business.
ION adheres to an equal employment opportunity policy that prohibits discriminatory practices or harassment against applicants or employees based on any legally impermissible factor.
Company Description: We’re visionary innovators who are delivering mission-critical trading and workflow automation software to financial institutions, corporations, central banks, and governments. By combining our passion for automation with a strategic view on the industries we serve, we design solutions that improve decision-making, simplify complex processes, and empower people. Simply put, we help our customers do more, faster and better than before. We believe our investments in research and development are shaping the future of automation and enabling our customers to transform their business. And we embrace the power of community, working with each other and with our customers to succeed through a positive culture of continuous improvement.
Specialties: Financial Institutions,Corporations,Governments & Central Banks

Title: Developer Intern
Description:
Rólunk / About us

Az ExxonMobilnál küldetésünknek tekintjük, hogy vezető szerepet vállaljunk az energiaszektor világméretű megújításában, ezáltal elősegítve a modern életforma terjedését, és a zéró kibocsátású jövő építését.

A világ egyik legnagyobb, tőzsdén jegyzett energia- és vegyipari vállalataként olyan egyedi és sokszínű munkavállalói közösséget tudhatunk magunkénak, amely büszkén áll ki vállalatunk tevékenysége és értékei mellett.

Upstream, Product Solutions és Low Carbon Solutions üzletágaink sikere munkatársaink tehetségének, kíváncsiságának és elhivatottságának eredménye. Kollégáink nap mint nap azon dolgoznak, hogy megoldásokat kínáljanak stratégiánk optimalizálására a vegyi anyagok, kenőanyagok és az alacsonyabb szén-dioxid kibocsátású technológiák terén.

Csatlakozz az ExxonMobilhoz, ahol ötleteidet olyan fenntartható megoldások formájában kamatoztathatod, amelyek hozzájárulnak az emberiség életminőségének javításához, miközben a társadalom változó igényeihez is alkalmazkodnak. Tudj meg többet arról, hogy vállalatunk Mit, Miért, és Hogyan csinál, és milyen lehetőségeket kínálunk a közös munkára.

Globális Üzletközpontunkat (Global Business Center - GBC) 2004-ben hoztuk létre Budapesten. Az ExxonMobil világméretű üzletágait mintegy 2000 fős sokszínű, nemzetközi munkavállalói közösségünk segíti. Büszkék vagyunk arra, hogy befogadó, biztonságos és energiával teli munkakörnyezetben dolgozunk, ahol célunk, hogy valamennyi munkatársunk számára izgalmas, hosszú távú karriert biztosítsunk. Együtt fejlődünk, együtt növekedünk. Büszkék vagyunk arra, hogy törekvéseink elismeréseként magunkénak tudhatjuk Az év felelős munkáltatója címet, valamint a Sokszínű munkahelyért és Ergonómiai programért kapott díjainkat.

At ExxonMobil, our vision is to lead in energy innovations that advance modern living and a net-zero future. As one of the world’s largest publicly traded energy and chemical companies, we are powered by a unique and diverse workforce fueled by the pride in what we do and what we stand for.

The success of our Upstream, Product Solutions and Low Carbon Solutions businesses is the result of the talent, curiosity and drive of our people. They bring solutions every day to optimize our strategy in energy, chemicals, lubricants and lower-emissions technologies.

We invite you to bring your ideas to ExxonMobil to help create sustainable solutions that improve quality of life and meet society’s evolving needs. Learn more about our What and our Why and how we can work together.

We established our Global Business Center (GBC) in Budapest in 2004. Our diverse, international community of around 2000 employees supports ExxonMobil's global business sectors. We take pride in working in an inclusive, secure, and dynamic work environment filled with energy. Our goal is to provide every team member with an exciting and long-term career. We grow together, we develop together. We are proud to have earned recognition for our efforts, including the title of Responsible Employer of the Year and awards for Diversity in the Workplace and Ergonomics programs.

A te szereped a csapatban / What role will you play in our team

IT csapatunk erősítésére keresünk olyan Automation Developer gyakornokot, akivel a 6 hónapos gyakornoki program után is együtt dolgozunk hosszú távon és közösen nézünk szembe az energia szektor kihívásaival. A gyakornoki csapatunk tagjaként lehetőséged lesz automatizálni az üzleti és IT folyamatainkat, az egész szervezetünk számára értékteremtő és érdekes feladatokon dolgozni, beleérte a Cyber Security, Software Engineering, API Development, Cloud Operations, Network Operations és egyéb területeket. IT projekteken keresztül architektekkel, szakértőkkel együttműködve, multikulturális környezetben szerezhetsz tapasztalatot a legújabb technológiákról.

At our IT Organization we are looking for University students to join our 6 month Internship program as Automation Developer Intern to help take on the world’s energy challenges with us through a career in ExxonMobil.

Forming part of an Intern team working on automating business and IT processes, you will be trusted with interesting tasks bringing business value across our entire organization, including Cyber Security, Software Engineering, API Development, Cloud Operations and Network Operations and so on. As an Intern you will have the opportunity to participate in real IT projects and work together with our architects, subject matter experts as part of a multicultural environment gaining valuable experience in cutting edge new technologies.

Our Global Business Center (GBC) in Budapest was established in 2004. Our diverse and multinational workforce of ~2,000 fellow colleagues has been powering ExxonMobil’s global businesses ever since. We are proud to work in an inclusive, safe, and vibrant work environment and we are aiming to provide an exciting, long term career to all our employees. We develop together, we grow together. Proudly awarded as Responsible employer of the year and received HRKomm award for Diverse workplace and award for Ergonomic program.

Mi lesz a feladatod? / What you will do

Együttműködés más IT csapatokkalNapi szintű kollaboráció architektekkel és szakértőkkelDefiniált és priorizált feladatok, projektekAgile munkametódus alkalmazása a DevOps csapatbanÚj end-to-end megoldások létrehozása központjaink számáraA gyakornoki idő végére komplett megoldás fejlesztése, bevezetése, dokumantálásaTapasztalat .NET, Python, Java, Javascript, HTML5 és adatbázis technológiákban Azure Cloud vagy AWS ismereteAlapvető ismeretek CI/CD: Github, Jenkins, Azure DevOps technológiákbanOktatás biztosítása az automation munka elsajátítására gyakorlati példákon keresztülPartner with other IT teams in the organizationCollaborate with architects and subject matter experts on an everyday basisWork on pre-defined and prioritized automation tasks and projectsWork as part of a DevOps team of Interns practicing agile methodologyCreate new end to end productivity and business solutions for our offices and production sitesBy the end of the internship develop and implement solutions with documentationWe are offering trainings to understand the automation concept through used cases and best practices

Téged keresünk / About you: skills and qualifications

Ha folyamatban vannak az informatikai BSc vagy MSc tanulmányaid Ha van tapasztalatod programozás, monitorozás, automation területenHa érdekel az Automation DevelopmentHa jó probléma megoldó és analitikai képességgekkel rendelkezel Ha jól szervezett vagy, hatékony multikulturális környezetben és virtuális csapat munkábanHa jó alapjaid vannak angol nyelvből szóban és írásban Ongoing BSc or MSc studies in Computer Science or relevant fieldSome experience in programming, monitoring and automation Interest in automation developmentExperience in .NET, Python, Java, Javascript, HTML5 and basic knowledge of database technologies is an advantageFamiliarity with Azure Cloud or AWS or any other cloud platforms is welcomedAwareness of CI/CD: Github, Jenkins, Azure DevOpsGood problem solving, planning and analytical skillsStrong organizational and interpersonal skills and effective multi-cultural & virtual team workSolid verbal and written communications skills in English 

Amit Kinálunk / What Awaits You
Lehetőség a gyakornoki pozíció hosszabbításáraRugalmas munkaidőInspiráló és sokszínű csapatokÉrdekes, ösztönző munkakörnyezet nemzetközi cégnélFejlődési lehetőség nyelvtudásod, kommunikációd erősítésére, funkcionális és egyéb képzésekOpportunity for internship extension Flexible working hours Inspiring and diverse working teamsInteresting, stimulating work environment in an international atmosphereOpportunities to enhance communication and language skills, job specific and broader trainings 

Stay connected with us

Learn more at our website
Follow us on Facebook or LinkedIn
Get an insight from one of our employees

Company Description:
The need for energy is universal. That's why ExxonMobil scientists and engineers are pioneering new research and pursuing new technologies to reduce emissions while creating more efficient fuels. 

We're committed to responsibly meeting the world's energy needs.

We aim to achieve #netzero emissions from our operated assets by 2050 (for Scope 1 and 2 greenhouse gas emissions) and are taking a comprehensive approach to create emission-reduction roadmaps for major operated assets.

Title: Software Engineer
Description:
OPSWAT, a global leader in IT, OT, and ICS critical infrastructure cybersecurity, delivers an end-to-end platform that gives public and private sector organizations and enterprises the critical advantage needed to protect their complex networks, secure their devices, and ensure compliance. Over the last 20 years our commitment to innovative technology has earned the trust of more than 1,700 organizations, governments, and institutions globally, solidifying our role in protecting the world’s critical infrastructure and securing our way of life.

The Position

We are looking for a hands-on Software Engineer to join our growing Technology Development Center in Veszprém. This is an exciting opportunity to work on a talented team building and re-engineering OPSWAT's security products. If you are a knowledgeable, creative, passionate individual who is interested in designing and building unique security solutions that no one else is building, then you are the one we are looking for!

What You Will Be Doing

Plan, design and develop C++ - based cyber security application and softwareReview design spec/codingProduct maintenanceImplement new versions of the productDesign specifications and write test casesProvide inputs and documentation of new or existing featuresPartner with your scrum team members on delivering sprint commitmentsWork with local and remote engineering teams to deliver on quarterly goals


What We Need From You

Strong command of C++Hands on experience with C# and Python2+ years programming experience for Linux platformsGood command of spoken and written EnglishExpertise in multi-threaded programming and memory managementCI/CD experience, good skills in version control (preferably Git)Experience working in QT framework is nice to haveExperience with REST API utilization and SDK integration would be an assetExperience with Bitbucket, Jira, Confluence will be preferredKnowledge in the field of data science is an advantageIt’s good to have experience with Agile / Scrum working environment


Why You'll Love Working Here

Stable, growing international company background with an exceptional customer groupOpportunity to improve your professional skillsThe newest technology environmentLanguage course and opportunity for active recreation – kettlebell, football and office massage


OPSWAT is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to providing an environment where equal employment opportunities are extended to all employees and applicants, free of discrimination and harassment of any type. All employment decisions are based on individual qualifications, job requirements, and business needs without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other category protected by federal, state, or local laws.

Recruiting Agencies: we do not accept unsolicited resumes from third party agencies for any of our open positions. To submit resumes for our jobs, there must be a recruiting contract approved by our legal team and endorsed by both parties. We are currently not accepting additional 3rd party agencies at this time.
Skill: 9 of 10 skills match your profile - you may be a good fit
Company Description:
OPSWAT protects critical infrastructure. Our goal is to eliminate malware and zero-day attacks. We believe that every file and every device pose a threat. Threats must be addressed at all locations at all times—at entry, at exit, and at rest. Our products focus on threat prevention and process creation for secure data transfer and safe device access. The result is productive systems that minimize risk of compromise. That’s why 98% of U.S. nuclear power facilities trust OPSWAT for cybersecurity and compliance.

OPSWAT. Trust no file. Trust no device.

www.opswat.com 

Visit us on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube.

http://www.twitter.com/opswat
http://www.facebook.com/opswat
https://www.instagram.com/opswat
https://www.youtube.com/user/opswat1

Title: Data Engineer (Medior/Senior)
Description:
About Us:
At Inivate, we are a dynamic and innovative data consultancy company founded in 2022, with a mission to harness the power of data and transform it into business outcomes. Specializing in data engineering, business intelligence and artificial intelligence, we provide cutting-edge solutions that help businesses unlock their full potential.
While we are based in Budapest, our work and impact extend far beyond the region. As we rapidly grow, we are looking for multiple talented professionals from across Hungary to join our team and deliver meaningful results to our customers.
Position: Data Engineer - Medior/Senior
What You'll Do:Design, develop, and optimize high-performance data pipelines.Dive into data modeling, creating well-structured solutions that simplify complex data sets.Collaborate with our team of skilled data scientists and engineers to bring innovative ideas to life.Work closely with clients to help them leverage their data for meaningful, impactful decision-making.
Got What It Takes? Essentials:Proficiency with at least one cloud platform (AWS, Azure, GCP).Expertise in relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL) and optionally in NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Cassandra, DynamoDB)Experience with cloud-native data warehouses like Snowflake, BigQuery, or RedshiftProficiency in Python, SQL, and optionally Scala or Java for working with big data toolsKnowledge of popular data modeling techniques (like dimensional modeling or Data Vault 2.0)Proven track record of designing and implementing efficient data pipelinesExpertise in clean coding practices, version control with GIT, and CI/CD processes
Bonus Points:Understanding of data lakehouse architectureFamiliarity with cloud-native services like AWS Glue, Azure Data Factory, and GCP DataflowKnowledge of modern ETL/ELT tools such as dbt, Apache NiFi, or MatillionFamiliarity with data streaming and stream processingExperience with orchestration tools like Apache Airflow or DagsterKnowledge of big data technologies and handling unstructured data is a plus.Familiarity with working in large enterprise environments is highly regarded.
Perks of Joining Inivate:Competitive compensation that reflects your expertise and contributions.A dynamic team of data professionals who thrive on collaboration and innovation.Flexible work arrangements to suit your lifestyle, including remote work.(Office days: 1 day only every 2nd week, ensuring a balanced approach to in-office collaboration and remote flexibility)Access to continuous learning and development opportunities that go beyond a basic subscription + possibility to collaborate with industry experts.A company culture that values creativity, teamwork, and data passion, while prioritizing well-being and work-life balance.

Ready to Make Data Dance?If you're eager to make an impact in the data world and work with a team of talented professionals, we want to hear from you! Hit the apply button and let’s discuss how you can be part of shaping the future of Inivate.
Skill: Skills: MySQL, PL/SQL, +7 more
Company Description:
"We create the data-driven future for you to stay ahead in the digital race."

At Inivate, we work to help companies evolve towards data-driven maturity by increasing the data acumen of employees and managers, so they will be able to further boost the company’s digitalization efforts. Worldwide, the gap is getting wider between those who are already doing this and those that are still waiting. Our goal is to help you with this evolution. This change starts with people, continues with processes, and is completed with the right tools and solutions.
Hiring Manager Subtitle: HR Generalist at Inivate

Title: Junior Software Engineer
Description:
A Fornax ICT új csapattagot keres Junior IT alkalmazás – paraméterező és fejlesztő pozícióba. Olyan kollégát keresünk, aki nyitott a tanulásra, szeretne és képes a megfelelő mentorálás mellett, illetve a projektmunkák során fejlődni.
A Fornax ICT a hazai és nemzetközi IT piacon ismert és elismert, 35 éve működő Fornax cégcsoport tagja, amely 100 %-ban magyar tulajdonban lévő informatikai vállalat. Cégünk szoftverfejlesztői-, rendszerbevezetői-, és támogatói feladatokat vállal, amely megoldásával több hazai és nemzetközi díjat is kiérdemelt. A Fornax az elmúlt több mint negyed évszázad alatt nem csak sikeres fejlesztéseinek, kiemelten erős szakembergárdájának, de proaktív probléma-megoldási technikáinak is köszönheti, hogy mára már ismert név itthon és több környező országban.Kezdetek óta hiszünk abban, hogy a tradíció és innováció együtt hozza az eredményeket. Számunkra a siker záloga a jól képzett szakmai csapat, az elhivatottság és a változásra/újításra való képesség.
Milyen feladatokra számíthatsz nálunk?Energia szektorban működő ügyfeleink üzleti folyamatainak megértése és a cég saját fejlesztésű Workflow és Workforce Management rendszerében történő folyamati reprezentációinak elkészítése (konfigurálás és paraméterezés)Részvétel a kapcsolódó fejlesztési (backend és frontend) feladatok elvégzésébenFejlesztés és paraméterezés során létrehozott folyamatok, funkcionalitások fejlesztői teszteléseAz elvégzett munka dokumentálásaA pozíció sokrétűsége miatt együttműködés valamennyi projektszereplővel (ügyfél és saját projektcsapat)Agilis módszertanban való fejlesztés és scrum csapatban való munkavégzésHatáridők nyomonkövetése, betartása
Várjuk a jelentkezésed, amennyiben:
heti 40 órában tudsz dolgozniszakirányú egyetemi végzettséged van vagy folyamatban lévő szakirányú egyetemi tanulmányaidat végzed2-3 éves alapszintű programozási ismereteid vannakadatbázis alapismeretekkel rendelkezelangol nyelvtudásod középszintű (főként szakmai anyagok megértéséhez fogod használni)az irodai alkalmazások területén is jól boldogulsz (Microsoft Office)rendszerszemlélettel, analitikus gondolkodással rendelkezel, a folyamatábrákban való gondolkodás nem ismeretlen számodraszemélyiséged nyitott a projektjeink értékteremtési folyamatának több szintjén való részvételében. (az üzleti probléma megértése annak specifikálása, folyamatokban való gondolkodás és fejlesztés)rendelkezel egy vagy több backend és/vagy frontend technológia alap ismeretével
Előny, ha:volt már olyan szoftverfejlesztéshez köthető hobbiprojekted, amit elejétől a végéig Te készítettélérdeklődő vagy, tanulni és fejlődni szeretnélegy hosszútávú és változatos feladatokkal teli karrierben gondolkozolnem riaszt meg egy komplex probléma / feladat, akár önálló elvégzése semtalálkoztál már munkafolyamat-menedzselő rendszerrel
Miért érdemes hozzánk csatlakozni?Stabil hátterű cégünk, 35 éve van jelen a hazai és nemzetközi piacon, kollégáink közül sokan 10+ éve dolgoznak csapatunkbanVáltozatos, sokszor egyedi termékekkel és folyamatokkal találkozhatszÖnálló munkavégzésre és csapatmunkára is lehetőséged leszA jó teljesítményt értékeljük és megbecsüljükHome office lehetőséggel élhetszCéges eszközöket biztosítunk (laptop, telefon, egyéb eszközök)Támogatjuk az agglomerációból utazó munkatársak bejárásátBéren kívüli cafetéria csomagot (SZÉP kártya, egészségbiztosítás, óvoda és bölcsőde támogatás) biztosítunkTeljeskörű magánegészségügyi szolgáltatásban lehet részedHeti kétszeri gyümölcsnappal támogatjuk az egészséges életmódotFiatalos, befogadó szakmai légkör vár, ahol az ötleteidet javaslataidat szívesen fogadjákDíjazott családbarát vállalat vagyunkIrodánk a belvárosban található, jól megközelíthető helyen (WestEnd környéke). Modern, színvonalas irodai környezet, kiváló infrastruktúrával.Csoportszintű, valamint vállalati szabadidős és szakmai rendezvényeken vehetünk résztHangulatos, tágas közösségi terünkön és konyhánkban, kedvedre válogathatsz többféle kávé- és teafajták közül, mely segíti a feltöltődésedet is.A jelenlegi vírushelyzetből fakadó kockázati tényezőket minimalizáljuk

Title: Python Engineer (Data Enrichment)
Description:
Description

SEON is the leading fraud prevention system of record, catching fraud before it happens at any point across the customer journey. Trusted by over 5,000 global companies, we combine your company’s data with our proprietary real-time signals to deliver actionable fraud insights tailored to your business outcomes. We deliver the fastest time to value in the market through a single API call, enabling quick and seamless onboarding and integration. By analyzing billions of transactions, we’ve prevented $200 billion in fraudulent activities, showcasing why the world’s most innovative companies choose SEON.

As a Python Engineer, you will be pivotal in designing, developing, and optimizing backend services for SEON’s Data Enrichment product area. You will bridge the gap between foundational engineering contributions and senior technical leadership, driving system improvements, mentoring team members, and delivering reliable and scalable systems integral to SEON’s fraud prevention solutions.

This role will report to the Software Engineering Team Lead and offer flexibility in our Budapest office under a hybrid work schedule.

WHAT YOU’LL DO:

Technical Contributions

Design and implement robust backend solutions that enhance the scalability, performance, and reliability of Data Enrichment services.Lead technical investigations and resolve complex issues affecting system performance or reliability.Contribute to reducing technical debt and improving operational efficiency by implementing technical best practices.Work with other teams to design and implement cross-team solutions and integrations.

Collaboration and Mentorship

Act as a mentor to junior and mid-level engineers, providing technical guidance and fostering professional growth.Actively participate in technical design discussions, helping shape the team’s technical roadmap.Collaborate with the Engineering Manager to align technical efforts with team and business goals.Proactively share knowledge and encourage best practices within the team.

Monitoring and Support

Improve monitoring systems and enhance system observability to ensure high availability and reliability.Proactively identify system bottlenecks and inefficiencies, recommending and implementing solutions.Support the automation of recovery processes to minimize downtime and error resolution time.

WHAT YOU’ll BRING:

Strong expertise in Python, including RESTful API design.Advanced knowledge of networking concepts, proxies, and system architecture.Proven experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS) and containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).Ability to identify, design, and implement scalable and maintainable solutions.Excellent problem-solving skills and a proactive approach to addressing technical challenges.Strong collaboration skills, with experience mentoring and supporting other engineers.Fluent in English (written and verbal).

NICE TO HAVE:

Experience with monitoring tools (e.g., Kibana) and CI/CD workflows (e.g., GitHub Actions).Familiarity with AWS services, including DynamoDB, Lambda, and Auto Scaling Groups.Knowledge of additional technologies and platforms, such as:ElasticSearchRedisArgoCD
WHAT WE OFFER:

Employee stock ownership plan (ESOP)Hybrid working environment (3 days in the office per week)Flexible hoursGenerous Holiday allowance Access to significant opportunities for learning and developmentPrivate health insurance, including dependants (inc. employee assistance & mental health support)Complimentary weekly language coursesEnhanced Parental leaveMonthly company breakfast and weekly Lunch allowance'Work from anywhere' 60-day remote work

Title: Java Software Engineer
Description:
OPSWAT, a global leader in IT, OT, and ICS critical infrastructure cybersecurity, delivers an end-to-end platform that gives public and private sector organizations and enterprises the critical advantage needed to protect their complex networks, secure their devices, and ensure compliance. Over the last 20 years our commitment to innovative technology has earned the trust of more than 1,700 organizations, governments, and institutions globally, solidifying our role in protecting the world’s critical infrastructure and securing our way of life.

The Position

We are looking for a driven and passionate Java Software Engineer to join our growing software engineering team. Join the MetaDefender Sandbox Team focuses on innovating cutting-edge sandbox and threat intelligence solutions – on premise and in the Cloud. As part of an international team with members in Vietnam, Spain, Georgia and Hungary you will have the opportunity to work on an amazing product, both locally and remotely around the world.

What You Will Be Doing

Working in close alignment with Engineering Manager and Product Owner: planning, designing, developing, and managing Java-based applications and software Analyzing requirements, exploring system features and defining functionality of applications Proposing changes to the current Java codebase and following through with refactoring, changing and extending it Performing the code reviews, writing unit tests Creating relevant documentation Providing recommendations for continuous improvement Working alongside other engineers (and engineering teams) to build quality, secure and up-to-date applications 


What We Need From You

3+ years’ experience in Java development Solid programming and design skills in Java Core, Object Oriented Programming, design patterns, best practices Experience with Spring framework: Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Spring Security Experience with MongoDB, RESTful API, OAuth 2.0, JSON data Experience with Jira, CD/CI, Git, SonarQube Bachelor’s or master’s degrees in software engineering, Information Technology, Computer Sciences or Mathematics Good written and verbal English communication skills Willingness to go very deep and understand low level code structures/ mindset of being able to reverse engineerIt’s an advantage if you are able to use static and dynamic methods to analyze malicious scripts and documentsIt’s good to have experience with agile development methodologies Experience with Linux systems, Docker, Microservices, Container orchestration (Kubernetes, Docker swarm...) is nice to haveVisual Basic and JavaScript experience is welcomedCybersecurity domain experience is a plus


Why You’ll Love Working Here

Stable, growing international company background with an exceptional customer groupOpportunity to become familiar with the Cybersecurity space and malware analysis softwareThe newest technology environment Extra benefits – supported sport activities (kettlebell training and football), massage, language courses, equipped kitchen etc. Attractive working environment – nice office full of accessories (fruits every day, coffee, breakfast, tea etc.) Regular team events and Happy Hour activities 


OPSWAT is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to providing an environment where equal employment opportunities are extended to all employees and applicants, free of discrimination and harassment of any type. All employment decisions are based on individual qualifications, job requirements, and business needs without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other category protected by federal, state, or local laws.

Recruiting Agencies: we do not accept unsolicited resumes from third party agencies for any of our open positions. To submit resumes for our jobs, there must be a recruiting contract approved by our legal team and endorsed by both parties. We are currently not accepting additional 3rd party agencies at this time.

OPSWAT protects critical infrastructure. Our goal is to eliminate malware and zero-day attacks. We believe that every file and every device pose a threat. Threats must be addressed at all locations at all times—at entry, at exit, and at rest. Our products focus on threat prevention and process creation for secure data transfer and safe device access. The result is productive systems that minimize risk of compromise. That’s why 98% of U.S. nuclear power facilities trust OPSWAT for cybersecurity and compliance.

OPSWAT. Trust no file. Trust no device.

As one of the world’s largest retailers and the largest private employer in the United Kingdom, Tesco serves millions of customers a week in our stores and online.

In Europe, Tesco operates in Hungary, the Czech Republic, and Slovakia, offering great value to customers every day. Tesco's operations in Hungary have been serving shoppers since 1995.

To standardize processes, reduce the cost to serve, enable agility in the business and empower colleagues to do even more for our customers, we have set up a dedicated team called Tesco Business Services across our markets. In 2004, the first centre in Bengaluru, India was established.

The Budapest centre established in 2019 provides dedicated support for colleagues and customers in the Czech Republic, Hungary and Slovakia markets.

Based in our Váci út office, these multi-functional and specialist teams drive operational excellence of services, improve scale for our systems and processes globally and create business leading capabilities.

Over the course of the last years, we have been on a journey to create a sustainable competitive advantage for Tesco through a world-class business services model. In spring 2023, we changed our name from Tesco Business Services to Tesco Business Solutions as we drive a solutions mindset to whatever we do, and whomever we partner with.

In 2023, Tesco Business Solutions won the World's Best GBS (Global Business Services) award by SSON. In March 2024, Tesco Business Solutions was named the Most Vibrant Employer in Hungary at the CEE Business Services Summit & Awards in Warsaw. In 2024, Tesco Business Solutions was named as runner-up for the World's Best GBS (Global Business Services) award by SSON.

Title: Data Scientist in Security Field
Description:
Company Description

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.

Job Description

About the Position:

We are looking for an innovative and driven Data Scientist to join our Security Operations Center Technology (SOCT) squad at DT Technik. In this role, you will apply advanced data science techniques to enhance your organization's security posture and protect against evolving cyber threats.

This is an exciting opportunity to take on a completely new task within the team, working closely with the cybersecurity team. You will lead the effort to design and implement a machine learning models from the ground up, aimed at identifying anomalies in log data and inventory databases to detect security threats.

This position is ideal for an experienced Data Scientist who is eager to take ownership of building new solutions, even if prior experience in the security field is not required.

Key Responsibilities:

Design and implement machine learning models to analyze large datasets and identify patternsDevelop algorithms to flag potential security issues and anomalies in log data and inventory databasesCollaborate with cybersecurity teams (Security Analysts and Engineers) to ensure the models and algorithms align with operational needs and to integrate data-driven solutions into existing security infrastructureDesign and maintain data pipelines for processing security-related informationConduct research on emerging threats and develop innovative approaches to address themOptimize and automate security processes using data science techniquesProvide technical expertise and support for security incident investigationsUtilize tools and platforms such as Apache Hadoop, Apache Spark, Elastic Stack, Trellix Intrusion Detection SystemDocument workflows, models, and findings to ensure transparency and reproducibility

Qualifications

Required Skills:

Studies in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field3+ years of experience in data science or a related field, (preferably with a focus on security applications)

Advanced Knowledge:

Advanced knowledge of machine learning algorithms and statistical modeling techniquesProficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or JavaExpertise in supervised and unsupervised machine learning techniquesExperience with neural networks and deep learning frameworksExperience with big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark)Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills

Basic Knowledge:

Linux and Windows operating system basicsNetworking fundamentals

Optional Skills:

Proficiency in German is a plus but not requiredUnderstanding of cybersecurity concepts, threats, and best practicesKnowledge of network security protocols and encryption techniquesRelevant security certifications (e.g., CISSP, CEH) are a plusDomain expertise in cybersecurity, threat intelligence, anomaly detection, and risk assessment

Additional Information

What We Offer:

A unique opportunity to take ownership of a brand-new project within the SOCT teamA collaborative and supportive work environmentAccess to cutting-edge tools and platformsProfessional growth and development opportunities

About You:

You are a creative and self-motivated problem solver who thrives in building solutions from the ground up. You have a strong background in data science and machine learning, and you’re excited by the challenge of applying your expertise to a new and impactful domain. Your ability to work independently while collaborating with a dynamic team makes you an excellent fit for this role.

 Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

Title: AI Software Developer
Description:
WorldQuant develops and deploys systematic financial strategies across a broad range of asset classes and global markets. We seek to produce high-quality predictive signals (alphas) through our proprietary research platform to employ financial strategies focused on market inefficiencies. Our teams work collaboratively to drive the production of alphas and financial strategies – the foundation of a balanced, global investment platform.

WorldQuant is built on a culture that pairs academic sensibility with accountability for results. Employees are encouraged to think openly about problems, balancing intellectualism and practicality. Excellent ideas come from anyone, anywhere. Employees are encouraged to challenge conventional thinking and possess an attitude of continuous improvement.

Our goal is to hire the best and the brightest. We value intellectual horsepower first and foremost, and people who demonstrate an outstanding talent. There is no roadmap to future success, so we need people who can help us build it.

Technologists at WorldQuant research, design, code, test and deploy firmwide platforms and tooling while working collaboratively with researchers and portfolio managers. Our environment is relaxed yet intellectually driven. We seek people who think in code and are motivated by being around like-minded people.

The Role: We are building a new software engineering team with strong applied AI orientation to amplify WorldQuant's success. The team will be focusing on creating company-wide applications to address our colleagues’ every day problems. You will have a chance to work with a broad range of teams at WorldQuant, helping them to be more productive with custom solutions.

Collaborate with cross-functional distributed teams.Gather, analyze and spec out requirements, and manage product deliverables.Design and build scalable AI-driven products addressing real-world problems.Stay current with the latest technical advancements, particularly in the field of AI and LLMs.

What You’ll Bring

Strong programming skills, preferably in Python.Exceptional analytical skills and a passion for solving complex problems.Thorough understanding of how AI works and familiarity with language models.Understanding of vector databases and other relevant data structures.Working knowledge in various databases and messaging technologies is a strong plus. (SQL, Redis, Kafka etc.)Excellent communication skills in English.Mature, thoughtful attitude with the ability to operate in a collaborative, team-oriented culture.A strong delivery mind-set, drive to get things done.Experience in finance is not required.

What We Offer

Competitive compensation package Core benefits include: premium private health insurance and life insurance with savings plan Support for every aspect of life through Employee Assistance Program and fully covered sick leave Strong culture of learning and development: training courses, library, guest speakers, share and learn events, global conferences Regular offsite team buildings, annual conferences and occasional global summits – opportunity to travel and connect with our local and global teams Employee resources groups with strong diversity and inclusion culture

The policy also describes legal and contractual limitations on these rights. The specific rights and obligations of individuals living and working in different areas may vary by jurisdiction.
